story:
MRF Multitools Store

or

AVAILBALE ON AMAZON

 

SUCCESFULLY FUNDED ON KICKSTARTER

FEATURED ON

Hello, INDIEGOGO! We are MRF Multitools-engineers who love every day carry tools and cannot imagine their life without creating something multi functional and useful. 

29 May Update

Orders 56-86 have been shipped. Track numbers we can provide in PM, just write your email and order number. Track numbers You may track in 17TRACK app (android, ios or web version).

25 May Update

First 55 orders have been already send this week to You. On 28th May on Monday we will send 40 more orders. Thanks great to our patient backers. People You are the Best of the Best. We promise everyone will get their Multitools and Kits. Yes it was a long way and You supported Us and trusted us. Its very important for us. p.s. if your order is 1-55 number , You may contact us and we will provide tracking number to You ( for this info just write PM with Your order number and email). Can’t wait when Multitools will arrive to You, our EDC backers.

MAY 4 UPDATE !!!GREAT NEWS!!! NEXT WEEK WE START INDIEGOGO SHIPPING!!!

THANKS GREAT FOR YOUR PATIENCE!!! NEXT WEEK WE START SHIPPING INDIEGOGO ORDERS, SO WE ASK YOU

!!! CHECK YOUR SHIPPING ADDRESSES  !!!

IF YOU HAVE ANY NOTES FOR US ABOUT SHIPPING DETAILS, PLEASE INFORM US

WE PLAN TO SHIP ALL ORDERS DURING THE MAY

APPROXIMATE SHIPPING TIME IS 

EUROPE 5-12 DAYS

ASIA 2-3 WEEKS

JAPAN 7-18 DAYS

USA 9-17 DAYS (DEPENDS ON HOW FAR FROM NY)

CANADA 2-3 WEEKS

SOUTH AMERICA 3-4WEEKS

AUSTRALIA 17-25 DAYS

ALL CUSTOMS DECLARATIONS WILL BE MATCHED AS A GIFT FOR YOU FROM US, SO WE HOPE THERE WILL BE NO PROBLEMS WITH YOUR LOCAL CUSTOMS

THANKS GREAT FOR UNDERSTANDING

UPDATE 18 Feb First Universal 3.0 are ready

 

UPDATE №1 Laser cut-DONE!!!

 OUR STORY

All MRF Multitools products were originally designed for ourselves. We engineer everything under strict quality and durability standards. We wanted to design a quality credit card multitool knife that can easily fit in your wallet or cardholder and will have as much functions and tools as your tool box. There are a lot of different credit card multitools on marketplace.But UNIVERSAL 3.0 is not like the other compact multitools you have owned before. 

Universal 3.0 60+ tools credit card knife was born after long 2 years of designing, prototyping and testing in different conditions by our fans worldwide. 

Universal 3.0 is made of 440с High Carbon Hardened Stainless Steel. 

Survival Orange looks great

Universal 3.0 Handle makes You Universal 3.0 more Multifunctional

Perks

Why Not Titanium? 

While titanium is a strong material, but 440с High Carbon Hardened Stainless Steel is an excellent material for knives, axes and survival tools. Worldwide top multitool brands manufacture their knives from 440с High Carbon Hardened Stainless Steel.

440с High Carbon Hardened Stainless Steel exhibit of these five key properties:

  • HARDNESS
  • TOUGHNESS
  • WEAR RESISTANCE
  • EDGE RETENTION
  • CORROSION RESISTANCE

Why you need a Сredit Сard Pocket Knife? 

How many times have you been in a situation where you’ve said to yourself, “A knife would be really handy now!” 

There are a lot of situations when a pocket knife can come in handy or just make the simple things in life more enjoyable or sometimes even can save your life 

• Open boxes 

• Open letters 

• Cut zip ties 

• Cut paracord 

• Sharpen a stick or a pencil

• Self-defense 

Specifications 

Dimensions 85 × 55 × 2 mm (3.3 × 2.1 ×0.08 in) 

Weight 52 gramms (1.9 oz) 

Material 440c High Carbon Hardened Stainless Steel

Hardness 52-54 HRC 

Blade Length 50mm (1.9 in) 

Easily fits in your wallet with your credit cards

Basic Tools 

Ultimate gear for survival or defence

Spoke Wrenches 13G (3.5mm),14G (3.4mm),15G (3.2mm)

works both in North and South hemispheres

military and survival

Other Basic Tools 

•Box Opener •Butterfly Wrench •Scraper •Inch & Metric Drill Guide •O2 Wrench •BBQ Grill Scraper •Shovel •Wire Striper Slot •Sheet Thickness Gauge •Sundial compass •Inch/Metric Rulers •Metric compass & Inch compass •Protractor •Quick Angles •L-square

Tool Sets 

•Set of Wrenches: inch (3/16",1/4",5/16",3/8",7/16",1/2",9/16",10/16",11/16") -metric (3mm,4.5mm,5mm,5.5mm,6mm,7mm,8mm,10mm,12mm,13mm,15mm ) 

•1/4"Hex Bit Driver & Leatherman standard Bit Driver 

•Scredwdrivers (1/8", 3/16", 5/16")

•Wire Bender Hole (1.2 mm, 1.5 mm, 1.6 mm, 1.8 mm, 2 mm, 2.2 mm, 2.5 mm ) 

•Spoke Wrenches 13G (3.5mm),14G (3.4mm),15G (3.2mm) 

Packaging and Manual

Universal 3.0 manual will be added to every credit card tool and will help you to use all the functions properly

Designing and Manufacturing

 

After INDIEGOGO campaign we will inform all our loyal backers about the manufacturing process and all the news via our social media making photos and video.

Shipping 

Our default worldwide shipping method will be only WITH tracking (no additional costs needed). Every backer will get his tracking number on email. 

About US

MRF Multitools was founded in 2015 and is a department of MRF-Engineering.

We create credit card multitools and EDC keychains. Our mission is to provide premium gear to the modern explorer. We believe that your everyday gear should be functional and minimal. We're here to design quality products that will last you for a long time.

Since 2010 MRF-ENGINEERING has been engaged in development of various plug-and-produce equipment (general mechanical engineering, automated systems, vending and automatic selling machines, etc.) Our team consists from skilled design engineers (mechanics, technologists, electronics engineers and electricians). In appropriate cases we involve contractors – software developers, industrial designers, interface designers etc. We carry out full support of the project at all stages: creation of the concept and Specification; conceptual design with necessary calculations and selection of accessories; front-end and detailed design and registration of design documentation; production and adjustment of prototype; assistance in industry engineering of serial sample.

Follow US on Facebook & Instagram

https://www.instagram.com/mrf_multitools/

Risks and challenges

If MRF Universal 3.0 is successfully funded, we will have to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadline. We have manufacturing, operations, and logistics set up and ready to go. As you have read above we are in engineering, production and designing since 2010. The funding raised on Kickstarter will be used for production and manufacturing. Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of productions. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule to make you the best damn everyday carry ever. After Kickstarter campaign we will inform all our loyal backers about the manufacturing process and all the news via our social media making photos and video.

story:
Spent iced coffee grounds are mixed and melted down with recycled plastic bottles to create the fibers for our innovative Switchback Shirt. We use a waterless dye technique, and our shirt features are built into its fibers, meaning they won't wash out. This prevents chemical additives from washing into our water supplies. 

 

 

 

 

We use a dye method that reduces energy and water waste at our factories. By using a "closed-loop" of CO2 vapors, not only can we reuse stored CO2, but we are able to circumvent the need for water to dye textiles.     

 

 

 

Our fabric has been proven to lower the temperature around your body, making it perfect for those hot travel days. Ice Cafe is a sustainable yarn whose’ benefits will never wash out. This keeps pollutants from harming our water supplies.   

 

 

We’ve transformed your morning cup and kept the life cycle of coffee going strong! Coalatree works hard to bring you the most innovative technology that supports a healthy you and a healthy planet. By utilizing discarded materials like coffee grounds and plastic bottles, we’re keeping our waste streams small and making our positive impact big! 

 

 

FROM PLASTIC TO PRACTICAL

The Switchback Travel Shirt is also made from recycled plastic bottles. Instead of discarded bottles going into the waste stream and often finding their way into oceans, the bottles are shredded into flakes and dried. Those flakes are melted down and extruded through a sieve into small fibers. The coffee is then mixed in to create yarn! 

 

 

 Our shirt is stain, wrinkle, and odor resistant, making it easy to clean. No need to find a last-minute laundromat when you're on the road, smells and messes wont' stick to the Switchback.

 

Our Switchback Shirts pack into their own pockets, making them easy to stash and carry when you need to. They help to make the most out of your adventures by keeping your wardrobe light and versatile.

story:
Meet GRICH!!!

Get Your 55% sale now!

Grich is fully compatible with all top devices out there. Grich works with Apple iOS as well as Android products. With Grich You will be able to pay attention to the smallest details out there in your drawing  and don't worry Grich got your screen protected from scratches.

 

Easily switch from screen to paper. Grich's design allows You to use it both on tablets and papers making it multifunctional and great choice to carry around in your pocket instead of Styluses or regular pencils. Choose Grich instead of others. 

The small needle and core will help you to pay attention to the smallest details when sketching. Grich is a top choice for Architects. With Grich your drawing and sketches will be much cleaner and all the details will be visible and perfect.

 

Grich is Multi-Functional as it comes handy for all. With ruler-tool make sure that your footprint is in place. Be on top with Grich use it in combination with other drawing tools or just simply get your 2nd Grich with twice lower price!!

The architect’s will find Grich perfect to take with you. By taking Grich  you won’t forget about the rest of your tools. By just taking Grich you get leveler, ruler and built in screw driver and much more!!!

 

Thr Grich comes with new and compact screw driver. Reach to the smallest details with Grich as it is just 0.3mm thick and is the most precise of all the screw drivers.

The Grich is made in accordance with product  basics basics. It will fit into your wardrobe perfectly and you will be able to take it out for every possible occasion.

story:
Being in the outdoors is a simple pleasure and we wanted to bring you a product that would be a simple pleasure to use! 

We are Full Windsor! We are a small outdoors brand driven by design, creativity and curiosity. This is our 5th kickstarter product launch. We have extensive experience, we have the manufacturing capabilities and we know what we are doing. Last year we released our Muncher titanium multi utensil on kickstarter, fulfilling every pledge to our 4553 wonderful backers with a product that then went on to be featured in Outside Magazine's 'Gear of the Year' 2018. Now stocked around the world by reputable retailers such as REI, the Muncher was a great success. We're now back on Kickstarter, with what we consider to be our best product yet - The Splitter titanium multi utensil.

The joining mechanism for the tongs is a small stainless steel pin fixed to the spatula that inserts into a keyhole slot in the spork's end. The tongs use the titanium materials flex to operate at the perfect force. The spatula has a chamfered edge that allows it to get under the fiddliest of food morsels. 

It also features a serrated corner edge that allows it to cut into and check if food is cooked through whilst cooking. The long spork is perfect for getting into deep food packets and can be used as both a eating and serving utensil. When joined together into tongs the spatula can still be used to get under food and then the spork grips down onto the items to grasp them firmly. Its functionality makes it great for picking up all kinds of food.

Both the spork and spatula feature a unique joining slot that allows the utensils to join together into a single compact unit when not in use. We have designed the connection so it is a simple click to separate the two utensils.

We use the best!  

Titanium is one of the most common metals found in nature. It is lightweight, strong, non-toxic and resistant to corrosion. Titanium is less heat-conductive than other metals, meaning it is safer to use when cooking. The Splitter uses aerospace grade 1mm sheet titanium. One millimetre might sound thin, but once it is three dimensionally formed into shape, it is very rigid. The reduced thickness is vital for the material flex needed for the tongs to function just so. After many, many prototypes we have refined the form into everything it needs to be.

Sustainability is at the heart of what we do. Titanium is one of the most beneficial metals to recycle because it can be reused again and again with virtually no loss of quality. It is cheaper and less environmentally dangerous to recycle titanium components into new materials than it is to mine fresh titanium from the earth. Also titanium can be reused almost infinitely, a benefit that increases every time a titanium product is recycled.

The Splitter will use 100% recycled card for it packaging that is fully recyclable. This means no part of the product will ever need to end up as landfill. This is very important to all of us at Full Windsor!

The long spork allows you to get right to the bottom of deep food packets to get every last morsel of food - YUM!!!

We are all set up with our manufacturing partner who specializes in the manufacture of high-end titanium products and metal engineering. We have been working with them for the past 6 months, on everything from prototype development to drawing up the final product specifications for the Splitter. They are all ready to start making the tooling and begin the production process. 

The money raised from kickstarter will allow us to make the different sets of tooling and place an order for the initial production run. 

The Full Windsor team is very experienced in terms of designing and manufacturing new products. We have been doing it for the last 7 years, ever since Full Windsor was founded in 2011. Mark Windsor, our founder (skinny dude below on the right), has been working as a product designer, bringing new products to life for the last 13 years. He has worked as a product designer for some of the worlds best design firms. 

We successfully launched our Muncher - Titanium Multi Utensil in 2017 fulfilling all 4553 pledges. Previous to this we successfully launched both our Nutter and Breaker Cycle Multi Tools on Kickstarter. We can't state how much we appreciate all the backers sharing the journey with us and allowing us to do what we do.

Our Muncher - Titanium Multi Utensil, which was featured in Outside Magazine's 'Gear of the Year' 2018,  can also be included into your pledge when backing the Splitter Titanium Multi Utensil. Please see rewards at top of page for further details.

 A massive thanks goes out to www.digitalanthill.com for help creating the video.

story:
Introducing DARTER, a micro pen with a secret hidden sewing kit. DARTER is beautifully machined from aluminium and brass in our East London workshop.

Why did we put a sewing kit in a pen? Our answer is: because we can.  

Our cutting-edge "Swiss Turn" machinery and team can cut parts smaller and with more precision than most CNC workshops.

 

At first, our intention was to make the world's smallest refillable pen. Early on, however, we noticed that our designs had wasted space between the refill and the outer sleeve.

 

Our passion is making small, useful tools. At the design stage, every line and every detail are considered as we try and maximise functionality. Our speciality is in adding useful features into everyday miniature objects. Only when the design is complemented do we add these features, but never at the expense of beautiful simple lines. After much research, we felt that the perfect addition to the empty space in our pen would be a small selection of thread and sewing needles.

 

At first, we thought it impossible to machine a sewing kit so small that it would fit within this space. Any additional thickness to the pen would have been a deal breaker. Finally, following an intensive month of machining and testing (and the breaking of a few of our tiniest drills), the world's smallest sewing kit was born.

 

 

 

1. The DARTER pen had to be small - really small. So small, in fact, that it could be added to your keychain and go unnoticed. It needed to be no larger than a door key.

 

 

It was crucial that the DARTER was not uncomfortable in your pocket, and so we set the diameter of the pen to 7.5mm and its length to 58mm.

 

2. The DARTER is made in-house in our East London workshop. If a feature in the design needed to be outsourced locally or overseas, we got rid of it. For us, it was essential that every part of this pen could be made using our own machinery and our own expertise.

 

We learnt a lot from 3Coil, our sister company, who launched a successful Kickstarter campaign. Working with factories that have 40 years of experience means we have a wealth of expertise and capabilities to tap into. This said, since these companies are such huge businesses, they have many departments and customers. Making a change or tweaking a design can take over a month for a simple revision.

 

 

But waiting around was no good for this project. At Ornisi, we are just as impatient as you. We don’t want to wait around. We want changes to happen in a few hours, not a few days or weeks. If we do have to make a revision, we want a shiny part in our hands by the end of the day.

 

 

To achieve this rapid prototyping solution, a different strategy to normal was needed. From Day 1, our creatives worked closely with our engineer. This meant that at the end of the design stage, this daily collaboration gave birth to an awesome product that not only looked and worked great, it could also be made on our machine by our engineer the very next day.

 

Incredibly, our time for prototyping has reduced from one month to less than one day. Our in-house manufacturing is up to 1000 parts per day. Our machines run 24/7. 

 

3. It was important that our pen was refillable with a quality refill. Many pens on the market are either sealed and not refillable, or else use cheap refills that dry out quickly. A non-refillable pen is very wasteful. We wanted a pen which could both write well, and which would last a lifetime.

 

Therefore, because of their quality and size, we decided to use Cross matrix ballpoint refills. All our pens ship with black ink.

 

4. The DARTER pen doesn’t need to carry metres of thread – just enough for emergency wardrobe malfunctions. Our kit carries the right amount needed for ‘on the go’ repairs.

 

This said, sometimes a job may require an extra-long piece of thread for a larger emergency repair. The DARTER can also be used in this situation.

 

 

Why do we manufacture in-house?  

 

 

We produce beautiful turned parts in rapid time. Our expert team, from designers to our engineer and machinist, produce amazing results. Believe us when we say we can turn an idea or a sketch into a production part within 48 hours.

 

 

It can be frustrating for both our team and our backers to have to wait weeks, even months, for things to happen in our manufacturing partners’ factories. But by making this ourselves, the momentum never diminishes. Plus, we can share this amazing journey with you – you can even see your pen being made through a webcam inside our machine. Should we need to make any changes or overcome any obstacles you can watch us fix the problem in real time.

 

Specification

 

  • Maximum size needles 27mm x 0.75mm diameter
  • Length of thread on a bobbin - 100cm (39")
  • Max length of thread on Darter Sew 2x 59cm (23") - 118cm total
  • Number of needles in Darter Sew - 4
  • Compatible Ink Refill - Cross Matrix Ballpoint Only 
  • Ink Colour - Only Black supplied
  • Silver Material - 2011 Aluminium 
  • Gold Material - CZ121 Brass

Colours available in the Cross Matrix range - Blue, Black, Red

 

We need your support

Our sliding head CNC machines require extremely precise material to be fed into them. This is not the usual ‘off the shelf’ lengths of aluminium or brass, but precision prepared material which is ground down to the exact same diameter along its 3-metre length. Since our machines run unattended, the slightest deviation in the diameter could jam the machine. In our test run of 100 parts, a lot of time was spent cleaning each piece from the cutting oil. The funding we raise will help us buy toleranced diameter material and an ultrasonic cleaning machine, which will speed up the assembly and shipping stage. In return for supporting us, not only will you receive the first DARTER pen in the world at half the retail price, we will also share with you every step of your pen’s journey, from precision metal to precision product. We hope you are as excited as us about this journey.

 

 

If you choose to buy 2 or more pens, all you need to do is select the main colour of the pen - either silver or gold.  At the end of the campaign we will email you a survey and you can customise each pen by selecting the button colour and band colour.
story_txt:
Introducing DARTER, a micro pen with a secret hidden sewing kit. DARTER is beautifully machined from aluminium and brass in our East London workshop.Our pen and sewing kit really is this tiny. The internal sewing kit is just ¼” in diameter (6.3mm)
 
 
 We have 4 options to choose from: all silver, all gold, silver with gold trim, and gold with silver trim. The silver is made from aluminium and the gold is made from brass. Every part is machined from a solid rod of aluminium and brass. There are no plastic parts.Why did we put a sewing kit in a pen? Our answer is: because we can.  Our cutting-edge "Swiss Turn" machinery and team can cut parts smaller and with more precision than most CNC workshops. At first, our intention was to make the world's smallest refillable pen. Early on, however, we noticed that our designs had wasted space between the refill and the outer sleeve.  
At ornisi, we pride ourselves on finding ways of utilising even the tiniest space.
  
We spent a long time designing this striking button feature on the back of our pens. Each button is machined and drilled from a solid metal bar.Our passion is making small, useful tools. At the design stage, every line and every detail are considered as we try and maximise functionality. Our speciality is in adding useful features into everyday miniature objects. Only when the design is complemented do we add these features, but never at the expense of beautiful simple lines. After much research, we felt that the perfect addition to the empty space in our pen would be a small selection of thread and sewing needles.  
Our machine and team work at rapid speeds. This shows a small sample of 3 days of work dialling in the machine. Everything fits perfectly.At first, we thought it impossible to machine a sewing kit so small that it would fit within this space. Any additional thickness to the pen would have been a deal breaker. Finally, following an intensive month of machining and testing (and the breaking of a few of our tiniest drills), the world's smallest sewing kit was born. Each sewing kit can hold 4 needles and 2 small lengths of thread.
 Every part of this pen has been meticulously designed. With its 4 dummy holes, the selector knob has been made to look like a button.
 
The Design Brief   1. The DARTER pen had to be small - really small. So small, in fact, that it could be added to your keychain and go unnoticed. It needed to be no larger than a door key.  It was crucial that the DARTER was not uncomfortable in your pocket, and so we set the diameter of the pen to 7.5mm and its length to 58mm. Our Swiss turn CNC machine with 4m bar feeder. It can be loaded with multiple lengths of material and left to run for days on end. When we go home, it keeps working.2. The DARTER is made in-house in our East London workshop. If a feature in the design needed to be outsourced locally or overseas, we got rid of it. For us, it was essential that every part of this pen could be made using our own machinery and our own expertise. All our pens have a brass sewing kit hiding inside.We learnt a lot from 3Coil, our sister company, who launched a successful Kickstarter campaign. Working with factories that have 40 years of experience means we have a wealth of expertise and capabilities to tap into. This said, since these companies are such huge businesses, they have many departments and customers. Making a change or tweaking a design can take over a month for a simple revision.  But waiting around was no good for this project. At Ornisi, we are just as impatient as you. We don’t want to wait around. We want changes to happen in a few hours, not a few days or weeks. If we do have to make a revision, we want a shiny part in our hands by the end of the day.  To achieve this rapid prototyping solution, a different strategy to normal was needed. From Day 1, our creatives worked closely with our engineer. This meant that at the end of the design stage, this daily collaboration gave birth to an awesome product that not only looked and worked great, it could also be made on our machine by our engineer the very next day. All the colours of Darter.Incredibly, our time for prototyping has reduced from one month to less than one day. Our in-house manufacturing is up to 1000 parts per day. Our machines run 24/7.   
The DARTER pen is the perfect addition to any survival or every day carry kit3. It was important that our pen was refillable with a quality refill. Many pens on the market are either sealed and not refillable, or else use cheap refills that dry out quickly. A non-refillable pen is very wasteful. We wanted a pen which could both write well, and which would last a lifetime. Therefore, because of their quality and size, we decided to use Cross matrix ballpoint refills. All our pens ship with black ink. 
 The DARTER pen and sewing kit is always with you, so you can repair while you are out and about4. The DARTER pen doesn’t need to carry metres of thread – just enough for emergency wardrobe malfunctions. Our kit carries the right amount needed for ‘on the go’ repairs. Each pen contains a single bobbin, holding 1 meter of threadThis said, sometimes a job may require an extra-long piece of thread for a larger emergency repair. The DARTER can also be used in this situation.  
All our needles are No.10 Gold Eye Sharps needles – though small, they are tough and get the job done. Why do we manufacture in-house?     We produce beautiful turned parts in rapid time. Our expert team, from designers to our engineer and machinist, produce amazing results. Believe us when we say we can turn an idea or a sketch into a production part within 48 hours.  It can be frustrating for both our team and our backers to have to wait weeks, even months, for things to happen in our manufacturing partners’ factories. But by making this ourselves, the momentum never diminishes. Plus, we can share this amazing journey with you – you can even see your pen being made through a webcam inside our machine. Should we need to make any changes or overcome any obstacles you can watch us fix the problem in real time. Specification 
 
Maximum size needles 27mm x 0.75mm diameter
Length of thread on a bobbin - 100cm (39")
Max length of thread on Darter Sew 2x 59cm (23") - 118cm total
Number of needles in Darter Sew - 4
Compatible Ink Refill - Cross Matrix Ballpoint Only 
Ink Colour - Only Black supplied
Silver Material - 2011 Aluminium 
Gold Material - CZ121 Brass
Colours available in the Cross Matrix range - Blue, Black, Red We need your support Our sliding head CNC machines require extremely precise material to be fed into them. This is not the usual ‘off the shelf’ lengths of aluminium or brass, but precision prepared material which is ground down to the exact same diameter along its 3-metre length. Since our machines run unattended, the slightest deviation in the diameter could jam the machine. In our test run of 100 parts, a lot of time was spent cleaning each piece from the cutting oil. The funding we raise will help us buy toleranced diameter material and an ultrasonic cleaning machine, which will speed up the assembly and shipping stage. In return for supporting us, not only will you receive the first DARTER pen in the world at half the retail price, we will also share with you every step of your pen’s journey, from precision metal to precision product. We hope you are as excited as us about this journey. DARTER SEW includes 1x Brass cylinder, 1x Aluminium screw top, 4x No.10 needles
 Each DARTER PEN includes 1x Bobbin 1x Refill 1x Button 1x DARTER SEW with 4x No.10 needles
 
 
 
 
 
 
  If you choose to buy 2 or more pens, all you need to do is select the main colour of the pen - either silver or gold.  At the end of the campaign we will email you a survey and you can customise each pen by selecting the button colour and band colour.

story:
As humans of Planet Earth we have evolved and progressed so immensely from our caveman days in large part due to the tools we have created. Archeologists have discovered so much about what life was like for early humans based on the tools they used. We at StatGear have created the BitzBlade 2.0 as an epic tribute to the human ability, the drive to create and our aptitude for advancement.  

 In 2015 we launched the original BitzBlade campaign on Kickstarter which had over 700 backers. It was received very well but many of our backers had some great comments and recommendations for us to consider in the next iteration. We took all these suggestions into consideration when designing the BitzBlade 2.0. 

Here is a breakdown of the 1.0 & 2.0 differences: 

We wanted the BitzBlade 2.0 to be your go-to EDC tool so we had to incorporate as many useful and commonly used features into it as possible. 

We also wanted the BitzBlade 2.0 to be as easy to carry as possible so you can carry it alone and have one of the replaceable tools/blades stored in the tool as well as one double sided bit. Due to popular demand we also introduced a removable pocket clip stretch goal which we've met! You can also carry the BitzBlade in the included heavy duty nylon pouch which will hold the BitzBlade, additional 8 double sided bits and the remaining two interchangeable tools/blades. 

 If you wanted another carry option you can purchase the additional Black or Carbon Fiber handmade kydex sheath which allows you to comfortably carry the BitzBlade 2.0 on your belt. There's nothing like the sound and feel when you "snap" the BitzBlade 2.0 into the custom molded kydex sheath.

As the saying goes, this isn't our first rodeo! We've had several successful Kickstarter & Indiegogo campaigns and an entire fulfillment team at our disposal to help get the rewards out in a timely fashion. We are manufacturing the BitzBlade 2.0 with the same factory that currently produces many of our top selling products such as the TriTac EDC Tactical Pens & Pocket Samurai Keychain Knives. We are very confident in the quality of their work and ability to produce on schedule.

Here are some quotes from backers of our previous Kickstarter campaigns:

"Got the pen. Great job on the design. Pen is well made. Works very well. Smooth operation. The packaging was even well thought out.." - Matt (TriTac EDC Pen Campaign)

"Received one week ago in Singapore, great pen!" - Viet D.N. (TriTac EDC Pen Campaign)

"Got mine the other day. Great quality and great customer service dealing with my one complaint. Very happy with my new bag!" - Raevynhart (DIEM Duffel Campaign)

"My duffel and media case has arrived in Perth Australia. I'm very pleased with the quality of the products. Thanks StatGear!" - Gigi (DIEM Duffel Campaign)

"You're the first kickstarter that I've been in to ship early. Can't wait to start showing it to everyone." - AkoaKSGenesis ( Personalized Tactical Pen Campaign)

"I received my Diem Duffel and ANGLZ media case yesterday. Very nice! So nice that my husband commandeered the duffel bag (sigh)!! Thanks for a great product!" - Angela (DIEM Duffel Campaign)

"This is so awesome. I backed intending to give this to my dad for his birthday and with you shipping early it may make it under the wire!! Good job!" - Jessica (BOOMR Campaign)

"I love my Boomr so much that I don't even bother taking my camera bag with me anymore, I just throw this over my shoulder and off I go :) I love it so much, I'm regretting not ordering 2 so that my dad can have one too x" - Bryony (BOOMR Campaign)

"I dont shoot often, but i get very excited to carry my camera around to events because of your sling! People at fashion events ask me all the time about it because i dont use the typical OEM straps, and its very comfortable, too especially when running. the bungee part makes it easy on my shoulders. I love it! great product!!!" - Percival (BOOMR Campaign)

"Got mine & it is a great job. Thank you very much" - Brendan (SuperVizor XT Campaign)

"Thank you so much for this product! I gave it to my husband for Christmas and he keeps it on his visor. It's a nice safety loop for when he is driving in dangerous, watery areas. Just wanted to say--great job!" - Gina (SuperVizor XT Campaign)

If you have any questions, please email us at: cphbagservice@gmail.com

story:
Remember the last time your beloved bike was stolen? Just like it was yesterday. You did lock it, but in vain. We hope to turn the tragedy around and create a carefree cycling experience.

ZiiLock is more than a silent defender but an active bike guard connecting you to your bike. ZiiLock offers active protection with fingerprint & smartphone keyless entry, always-on theft alert, easy storage, and reliable smart features - all secured in a fold.

ZiiLock Production  & Shipping Details

 


Nowadays, biometric technology has been widely used in security systems - banking, social security, residential security, and most commonly - your smartphone. Any fingerprint is unique and hard to be replicated.

ZiiLock is equipped with a 508 DPI high-res capacitive sensing touch panel, which allows a safer and faster keyless unlocking operation. The low-power consumption components mean it’s always ready for your next ride.

Scan and go!

 

 

 

With an always-on Bluetooth connection pairing the ZiiLock to your smartphone, only a single tap is needed to wake your ZiiLock and instantly unlock it.

All the wireless communications are encrypted by AES 128 security. Say goodbye to the tedium brought on by old-school locks. Get going before anyone else.

 

 

  • AES 128 Encryption
    The AES 128 encryption Bluetooth system effectively protects your privacy. It is considered to be an extremely rugged and reliable solution.
     
  • Temper-hardened Steel Reinforcements
    ZiiLock uses heat-treated steel materials, giving it a solid structure that is not easily deformed or penetrated.
     
  • Resilient Bars & Seamless Rivets
    Each section is made of 6.5mm bars which are seamlessly linked by 7mm diameter high-strength rivets, allowing ZiiLock to withstand relentless pounding, pressure, and force.
     
  • Anti-Shear of 12-Ton Hydraulic Cutter
    Tested to withstand up to a 12-Ton hydraulic cutter attack. ZiiLock supports you with excellent resistance that even a professional thief cannot surpass easily.
     
  • Anti-drilling & Picking Resistant
    ZiiLock uses an advanced stamping method to create an alloy steel casing. High twist drilling and picking resistance prevent any brute force attack on the lock.
     
  • Durable IP67 Waterproofing
    All the components are arranged in a compact, waterproof structure which allows ZiiLock to withstand being immersed in water for over 30 minutes. Heavy rain, sludge, and dust are also not a threat.

 

Having your bike stolen is the worst feeling. Yet it’s estimated that over 1.5 million bicycles are stolen every year - almost two every minute. With ZiiLock, this can be prevented before it happens.

ZiiLock is embedded with a sensitive motion sensor, which can cleverly judge the unauthorized movements of your bike.

When someone is tampering with your bike, ZiiLock is no longer a silent defender. You will be notified via your smartphone, receiving an immediate S.O.S. from your ZiiLock. The theft alert system provides an extra layer of physical protection, keeping unwanted guests out.

 

If you need to share access with friends or families, ZiiLock APP makes the sharing process safe and easy. The friendly management system allows storage and identification of up to 20 fingerprints. 

For temporary code, simply set up access permissions and customize the time and duration as needed on the ZiiLock APP. You can grant anyone access to your lock allowing you to share the joy of riding.

 

With the ZiiLock APP, you can also easily find your ZiiLock as it marks your location each time you lock the bike. Enjoy the peace of mind knowing where your bike is and that it’s under 24-hour protection.

 

ZiiLock brings minimalist design and smart features together to enhance your carefree cycling experience. Its foldable design provides the security of an U-Lock with the flexibility of a chain.

The 98cm unfolding length enables a wider protective range, it can lock more than 3 regular bikes or 2 fat-tire bikes at once.  ZiiLock unfolds to easily fit around trees and oversized poles, protecting your valuable belongings any time, anywhere. 

Its palm-sized design and portability make it the ideal option for many scenarios. A stylish mounting bracket makes ZiiLock easily transported and installed.

The extra soft rubber surface protects your bike’s finish while ZiiLock’s tempered steel interior keeps your bike safe against theft. 

 

ZiiLock is embedded with an efficient lithium battery and low-power consumption components, supporting long-lasting protection for over a month.

When the battery runs out, you can still use ZiiLock by recharging or unlocking it with a mechanical key.

The inner race cylinder consists of a two-sided milling tooth combined with multiple bullet pieces. These ZiiLock components prevent counterfeiting and thwart any picking attempts.

 

 

Introducing Hero Red & Armour Gray.
Which is your superhero?

 

 

 

The ZiiLock team is based in Pasadena, California, together with the R&D team from Taiwan, the home of high-end bicycles such as Giant, Merida, and KHS Bikes. We share the know-how, as well as the passion, to build ZiiLock excellent.

All of us have experienced having our bikes stolen. It’s time to say NO! ZiiLock is dedicated to using the most advanced communication technology to build a proactive bike guard, allowing you to protect your bike while sharing the joy of cycling.

Being recognized as both an integrator, as well as an innovator of fingerprint biometric authentication and bike locks solutions, we strive for both an ingenious and intelligent design to reach true security. That's why we are named ZiiLock.

After months of polishing, ZiiLock is finally launched. ZiiLock offers active protection with fingerprint & smartphone keyless entry, easy operation, and trusted smart features - all secured in a fold.

You are the key to ZiiLock!

Environmental Testing
 

Production Ready

 

Why Indiegogo?

We chose Indiegogo to launch our project because it's full of creative people. ZiiLock is one of our most exciting products and we're eager to get it into the hands of Indiegogo's early adopters and hear your feedback.

Crowdfunding allows us to work with the factory to produce the right amount of units, without dealing with high storage costs and other related expenses. Because of this, we can spend more on development & the best components while saving you money on your purchase.

Please rest assured about backing us on Indiegogo. The shipping is guaranteed and we promise to give a FULL refund if we fail to ship you ZiiLock.

This is our #ZiiPromise

 

 

 

Any Additional Questions or Suggestions?
Shoot us your ideas at support@ziilock.com

These ZiiLock components prevent counterfeiting and thwart any picking attempts.  Introducing Hero Red & Armour Gray.Which is your superhero?   The ZiiLock team is based in Pasadena, California, together with the R&D team from Taiwan, the home of high-end bicycles such as Giant, Merida, and KHS Bikes. We share the know-how, as well as the passion, to build ZiiLock excellent.All of us have experienced having our bikes stolen. It’s time to say NO! ZiiLock is dedicated to using the most advanced communication technology to build a proactive bike guard, allowing you to protect your bike while sharing the joy of cycling.Being recognized as both an integrator, as well as an innovator of fingerprint biometric authentication and bike locks solutions, we strive for both an ingenious and intelligent design to reach true security. That's why we are named ZiiLock.After months of polishing, ZiiLock is finally launched. ZiiLock offers active protection with fingerprint & smartphone keyless entry, easy operation, and trusted smart features - all secured in a fold.You are the key to ZiiLock!Environmental Testing Production Ready Why Indiegogo?We chose Indiegogo to launch our project because it's full of creative people. ZiiLock is one of our most exciting products and we're eager to get it into the hands of Indiegogo's early adopters and hear your feedback.Crowdfunding allows us to work with the factory to produce the right amount of units, without dealing with high storage costs and other related expenses. Because of this, we can spend more on development & the best components while saving you money on your purchase.Please rest assured about backing us on Indiegogo. The shipping is guaranteed and we promise to give a FULL refund if we fail to ship you ZiiLock.This is our #ZiiPromise   Any Additional Questions or Suggestions?Shoot us your ideas at support@ziilock.com

story:
Meet My SuperCase

The World’s First Electric Weightless Suitcase

Hi, I am Martin the founder of My SuperCase. As an engineer, I travel often. I think all travellers will agree that one of the most frustrating parts of travelling is dragging a heavy luggage around, especially through non-flat surfaces. But what if we could create a luggage that can remove this frustration? A luggage that lets you move effortlessly throughout your journey? The key to the problem is the weight. 

After endless hours of research, design, and development, we finally made a breakthrough and developed the perfect “Electric Weightless System” that became the heart of My SuperCase. It is the world’s first patented electric weightless suitcase that makes “dragging” a thing of the past. 

WHY DOES THIS MATTER? It means My SuperCase can glide weightlessly across terrains up and down a slope effortlessly!! Designed with the utmost care for detail, SuperCase is smart, durable, spacious, moves effortlessly over rough surfaces and automatically synchronize to match any walking or running speed.

Our vision is to make the best luggage that makes travel effortless so you can be free to relax and enjoy your journey. 

  • My SuperCase Features Overview (26" U-Mov Model)

 

  • What makes moving a luggage such a pain?

Dragging the weight around! The problem when dragging a traditional luggage is the weight transferring to your arm causing your body to fatigue and making it incredibly hard to move in crowded spaces and angled surfaces. The answer, is to achieve a weightless effect by shifting the burden from your hands to the wheels of the suitcase. This is the secret of the SuperCase. 

 

  • World’s First Electric Weightless System™

The weightless effect only happens when the centre of gravity to the rotation axial is close to zero. To do this, we invented the world’s first weightless mechanics system that achieves this goal. 

My SuperCase’s innovative weightless system feature ultra-powerful brushless motors combined with the unique U-shaped design.  When powered on, the motor drives the suitcase body while balancing the axial near to zero, naturally shifting all the weight away from the user’s hands and onto the motor wheels. 

This revolutionary system changes the way we use a suitcase. For the first time, you will not be dragging around a heavy load. My SuperCase makes moving with a fully-loaded suitcase feel as light as a feather. U-Mov model fully loaded = 28Kg (Max).

 

  • Moves Easily Over Any Terrain

Manoeuvre SuperCase on any surface weightlessly with a pair of large anti-puncture tires. Specially designed air-trap hollow tires absorb impacts, bumps, and noise.

 
  • Always Synchronized To Your Pace

SuperCase can be easily operated by anyone regardless of walking speed. It always remains synchronized to the user’s pace, even when you are in a hurry. The built-in advanced sensors synchronize speed with the motion of the user in real-time. The ultra-quiet brushless motor easily handles loads of up to 28Kg (U-Mov Model) and automatically adjusts speed and power when moving from flat ground to uphill or downhill slopes.

  • Safety Stop

The suitcase also includes a safety feature that automatically stops it from moving when the handle is released. 

 

  • IATA & FAA Approved Battery

SuperCase is airlines friendly with IATA & FAA Approved Battery. It can also be removed from the suitcase to avoid problems when going through security or for when you want to charge your mobile devices.

 

  • Superior Durability

We designed SuperCase with a durable aluminium frame and 100% polycarbonate case （U-Mov & U-Mov lite Models). It has undergone hundreds of durability tests to ensure it can survive in the most extreme situations and travel over almost any terrain. 

 

  • Spacious Interior

SuperCase magically shifts the weight off your hands with zero compromise on packing space. Allowing you to pack more and still enjoy the feeling of effortless travel.

 

 

 

Our team have spent more than two years in designing and developing My SuperCase and together we have come a long way. Now we have several production-ready samples and everything is in place with the supply chain ready for production.  Mass production can start as soon as orders are collected from Indiegogo. 

The Development of My SuperCase

 

Perks We Offer

Optional ADD-ONS

You can also grab more of these accessaries with discount on the suitcase check out page.

story:
THE PROBLEM

Let’s face it.

Nowadays, airlines charge an arm and a leg for every extra piece of luggage or extra kg/lb above your ticket allowance.

You want to keep your luggage neat and organised, but you feel like all the  packing cubes out there are a joke?

We feel you! Poor stitching, zippers that catch the fabric and get stuck half way, ugly designs with mesh or flimsy fabric that does nothing to compress... Need we go on?...

 

Whether you’re a frequent traveller or you just enjoy occasional city breaks, space is a luxury and packing in a light, neat, space-efficient way is as challenging as a mental ninja warrior obstacle course.

Ok maybe not that much, but you get the picture.

 

THE SOLUTION

 

Qubix is the minimalist solution you've been waiting for. 

It doesn't just solve all the problems current packing cubes have, it also compliments any type of luggage so you can now travel in style.

 

 

Let's look at what makes your Qubix so amazingly #worthit:

 

 

We’re frequent travellers ourselves...

So we understand all too well the stress of fitting travel essentials in the limited space of a carry-on or check-in luggage.

Qubix gives you the perfect solution for neat, lightweight luggage that allows you to pack more and save space.

 

 

Your Qubix center compression zipper wraps twice around each cube, giving you the added flexibility of a 2 level compression.

No more dealing with the stress of your packing cubes not compressing or falling apart when fully compressed.

Qubix allows you to pack as much or as little as you want or need.

 

Keeping your luggage organised, compact and lightweight while saving up to 66% more space?

You better believe it!

With your new Qubix family, you can trust this isn’t just a possibility - it’s a given!

 

 

Have you ever looked outside the window from your airplane seat?

If so, then you must have felt your heart sink at the sight of your luggage being thrown around during loading or unloading from the airplane.

Without a compression cube, your clothes shift around and you arrive at your destination with a mess resembling the closet of a 3 year old in charge of organising their own wardrobe.

Trust Qubix to guarantee your clothes will travel neatly, no matter the abuse your luggage goes through during the epic wrestling sessions with the baggage handlers.

 

 

Let's put this one into context. The clothes you see in the picture above belong to a big guy. Think 6.3 ft (190 cm) muscular dude who loves cake.

Those, my friend, are really large clothes and your large Qubix can fit well over a weeks' worth of them.

By comparison, the cake loving guy’s girlfriend is your regular next door girl. Not too tall, not too short, not too skinny… you get the picture.

While the large Qubix fits a week's worth of the big guy’s wardrobe, we could fit 18 of his girlfriend’s everyday clothing items into that same cube and compressed it fully - no sweat!

And we didn’t cheat at all. Among those 18 clothes there are no underwear items or socks. That’s what your small Qubix is for!

#QUBIXISAMAZING

 

 

Take a close look at the zippers on your clothes. Chances are you'll find the letters "YKK," on a lot or all of them.

These babies are on everything from jeans, to coats, to sleeping bags.

That’s because they have an unrivalled global reputation for impressive construction and reliability.

Your Qubix zippers are corrosion resistant, super durable and guaranteed to work seamlessly for donky years (actual measure of time).

And because they are the real deal, your entire Qubix family comes with YKK zippers as a standard.

 

 

If you’ve used packing cubes before, you know most either pull apart like butter or are very flimsy. Or quite likely, both!

Your pain has been our pain for years and years.

Your Qubix family is reinforced with double-stitching at the seams and contour-tubing for extra durability you can truly rely on.

We’ve been stress-testing it (like seriously overstuffing it, on purpose!) for the past 6 months and wow do they hold up. Think the 'Bruce Lee' of packing cubes.

From London to Amsterdam to Budapest to Bali to Shanghai to Hong Kong and not a single sign of the cubes buckling under immense pressure! 

 

 

If we had a penny for every time we had to iron clothes after a flight…We'd probably have about a thousand pennies, what's that, about 10 bucks? Ok, it might not be a lot of money, but you get the gist :)

Would you want to go out and about looking like you just pulled your shirt or dress out of your a$$?.. Didn’t think so!

Your folding board helps you pack your clothes neatly and in the exact dimensions of your medium size Qubix. 

Simply fold and stack your shirts or dresses in the cube, then place the board on top before zipping up and compressing.

And did we mention?.. The antibacterial treatment ensures longevity of the fabric and keeps your clothes bacteria and odour free.  

 

 

Emma here is a petite girl who’s never lifted a dumbbell in her life!

And she’s compressing a fully stuffed large Qubix.

Do you see her struggle at all?

That’s because compressing with Qubix doesn’t require any elbow grease. None! 

All you need is a drop of determination and the super durable Qubix family.

 

 

Let’s be honest here: most packing cubes are unattractive - to say the least.

Qubix is a real sight for sore eyes.

It’s not even us saying this.

Reactions from other fellow travellers seeing Qubix is consistently along the lines of:

“Oh man, your luggage is neat” - Jess (New Zealand)

“Wow, I need to get me a set of these.” - Bud (USA)

“#worthit” - Kadek (Indonesia)

“Waaaaaay better than those flimsy things I buy at Bentley! Bring them on!!!!” - Mary Anne (USA)

“Well dang, these cubes are a sight for sore eyes” - Lola (Australia)
  

 

To sum up Qubix in just one sentence…

It’s your amazing-value-for-money family that does its job perfectly and helps you travel neater for many years to come.

#YOU'REWELCOME :)

Bring them on!!!!” - Mary Anne (USA)“Well dang, these cubes are a sight for sore eyes” - Lola (Australia)  
  To sum up Qubix in just one sentence…It’s your amazing-value-for-money family that does its job perfectly and helps you travel neater for many years to come.#YOU'REWELCOME :) 
 
    
 

 
 
  
Frequently Asked Questions
How is Qubix different from other packing cubes available on the market?The main 3 differences are the super sturdy build (durable fabric + double stitching at the seams), the double compression and the folding board that makes packing super quick and easy. What material is Qubix made from?The Qubix fabric is antibacterial, water-resistant heathered polyester. It’s super easy to maintain and has very high endurance capability over time. How do I care for my Qubix?Qubix only requires a bit of occasional care. You can easily wipe dirt or dust from its surface. For a more thorough clean:

Machine or hand wash cold
Air dry
Iron while still damp using low or medium heat

Is there a warranty for Qubix?Every item in the Qubix family is thoroughly inspected for quality assurance before your pledge is packaged to leave the factory. If you nonetheless receive a damaged item, simply send us a picture of the damage the minute you receive the package and we will replace it for you at no additional charge. What size should my luggage be to fit the packing cubes?Qubix fits perfectly into all kind of luggage sizes. For a shorter trip, you can even fit the small and medium cubes into your backpack for a neat, lightweight trip. How does the compression zipper work?The middle zipper is the compression one. When it’s unzipped, the cube is fully expanded and gives you maximum packing capacity. After you close the lid, you can compress the bag in 2 stages using the compression zipper, which wraps around your Qubix twice for increased flexibility. This brings together the top and bottom of the bag, gradually flattening out the cube content and reducing by up to 66% the space your stacked clothes would otherwise take. What kind of zippers do you use for Qubix?All the pieces included in the Qubix family come with YKK zippers as a standard. Do I have to pay VAT/tax when I receive my Qubix?Qubix ships globally and duties/taxes are different in each country. Because of that, we can’t retain additional duties/VAT in a way that’s accurate and fair for every backer. Any duties/VAT are the backer’s responsibility. If any duties apply, these may be charged at the time of receiving the package. To check whether or not there are duties/VAT charges for your reward in your country, please contact your local post office.
Got a question we haven’t answered yet?Contact us at contact@litetravel.co and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

story:
OOG (Outdoor Office Gear) has designed the world's first eco-friendly desk that lets you work from wherever. 

The traditional workplace is changing.  After a hundred years of cubicles and crowded elevators, we need to get out.  Work is a breeze when you can actually feel the breeze.  

 

During the pandemic, a group of designers and media professionals from New York, Boston, and Denver combined forces to develop a desk that would allow us to escape from small apartments and crowded family homes even if only for a few hours.  We quickly discovered that the best work environment is out in the real environment--in a favorite park, by the beach, or even just our own backyard.  With classrooms closed and offices shutdown, we found a new way to work.  

 

You'll never need to use a lame virtual background on Zoom again.  

OOG's Outdoor Desk is small enough to fit in a backpack and light enough to carry on the go.  Its collapsible design takes less than 15 seconds to setup. 

 

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL DESK STAND:  This desk stand is built to support a variety of work needs. It holds laptops, textbooks, sketch pads, tablets, beer pong cups, cell phones, and more.

PORTABLE & COMPACT: Our 15 x 11 inch desk made from 100% bamboo provides an eco-friendly surface. Our iron tripod adjusts from 24-to-55 inches, perfect for sitting or standing. It all folds up nicely into a backpack or bag so you can take it on the go.  

BETTER FOR YOUR BACK & NECK: Perfectly angle your desk so you can design, write, read, or draw without straining your back, shoulders, neck or wrists.  It's an ergonomic desk that will help improve posture and spinal health.  

 

GET THINGS DONE IN THE SUN:  No need to spend your life in a windowless office with flickering fluorescent lights. 

 

By supporting this campaign, you'll help to start a movement that encourages students and professionals to spend more time in our neighborhoods and nature.  For too long, furniture companies have charged a fortune for desks that make us feel trapped in one place--staring at the same four walls day after day. 

As work and school becomes more remote, we need new tools that enable us to explore and think outside the box.  

According to Google Trends, there's been a 400% increase in searches for "outdoor desks" in the past few months.  We want to be able to deliver the best solution for those seeking new ways to work and study.  

Thanks for being among the first to support our product and mission - and spread the word.

story:
SBSKIT #01 description

(included in Bundle Deal #1, 2, 3)

 

 

 

SBS DRYBAG 10L (description)

(included in Bundle Deal #2 & 3)


 

POWER PACKER (description)

(included in Bundle Deal #3)

 

 

Where’s the fun in running one campaign? 

Antoine is back again after taking Side by Side™ from being the one-man team back in 2017 to a small dream team it is now to get it done! 

The Power Packer launched back in April 2017 gaining support from over 62 countries helping over 21,000 lives since. But now Side by Side is back to bring the latest and greatest in travel accessories and changing the ways we travel. With the lessons learnt from the first campaign we understand that no two users are the same, The Travel Packer is made for every traveller and every trip no matter the destination, duration or climate! 

With the hard work we have put in we hope you enjoy the Travel Packer as much as we have and look forward to your feedback. Thank you!

Feel free to email us directly at hello@sidebysidegear.com if you have any additional questions.
story_txt:
SBSKIT #01 description(included in Bundle Deal #1, 2, 3)   SBS DRYBAG 10L (description)(included in Bundle Deal #2 & 3)
 POWER PACKER (description)(included in Bundle Deal #3)  Where’s the fun in running one campaign? Antoine is back again after taking Side by Side™ from being the one-man team back in 2017 to a small dream team it is now to get it done! The Power Packer launched back in April 2017 gaining support from over 62 countries helping over 21,000 lives since. But now Side by Side is back to bring the latest and greatest in travel accessories and changing the ways we travel. With the lessons learnt from the first campaign we understand that no two users are the same, The Travel Packer is made for every traveller and every trip no matter the destination, duration or climate! With the hard work we have put in we hope you enjoy the Travel Packer as much as we have and look forward to your feedback. Thank you!Feel free to email us directly at hello@sidebysidegear.com if you have any additional questions.

story:
Can your travel pillow do this?

 

 

After many restless flights and sleepless nights using existing one size fits all travel pillows, we realised that the U-shaped pillow just doesn't work. No matter what resting position we tried, we ended up drooping too far forward or to the side, ending up with a sore neck and a severe lack of sleep. Turns out we are not alone.

 

After experimenting with multiple travel pillows, we came to the realisation there is no such thing as a comfortable one size fits all travel pillow. Similar to a suit, or a pair of shoes, a travel pillow should be fitted to an individual's physique, in order for it to be effective and ensure proper support.  

 

 

Say Hello to CORI ❤️

 

The CORI Travel Pillow is the ultimate solution to support your neck in a neutral alignment while resting. The revolutionary modular design allows you to arrange the ultra-comfy memory foam cushions anyway you'd like to give you the perfect fit for any trip. Its silky soft fabrics will have you nodding off in no time - even if you're stuck with the middle seat!  

Offering unmatched support, comfort and portability, the CORI Travel Pillow significantly improves posture for better rest and happier necks.

 

CORI starts with 3 modular components to offer full customisation to suit your unique physique and preferred resting position. Simply shape it your way or even add on additional pillows for extra support. We encourage you to discover your own favourite configurations and mix and match your pillows to create a unique travel pillow that is made just for you. With CORI, your imagination is limitless.

Here are a few suggested configurations to get you started.

  

Features & Benefits

 

Premium Materials

CORI is crafted from premium materials and carefully sourced fabrics to ensure 1st class comfort and superior ergonomic support.

                                                                       

Your Ultimate Travel Companion

 

Simply roll, pack and go. CORI is your ultimate travel companion designed to provide superior customised support and luxurious comfort in a perfectly portable format. 

❤️ Add a Personal Touch

Add a personal touch by embroidering your name (up to 9 characters). Perfect for any gifting occasion from birthdays to graduation to anniversaries. Select the Deluxe CORI perk or the Personalised CORI perk and we'll contact you for your Personalised info.

While CORI was originally designed for travellers in mind, its revolutionary modular design allows CORI to be used by everyone whenever, wherever. From commuters to gamers to desk warriors, CORI provides world class customised support to suit your preference and physique.

 

 

CORI is available in an exciting choice of colours to reflect your personality. Guaranteed to put a smile on your face as you enjoy better support and a happier travel experience.

Here are some configuration suggestions for 4 Pillows. Feel free to experiment with all 4 pillows or even mix and match colours and find what works best for you.

           

     

✈️ Reduced Shipping Worldwide

We are working with a leading eCommerce logistics partner and am pleased to offer special reduced shipping rates worldwide using registered mail for added security. Having successfully delivered all orders on schedule in our last campaign, we are confident to deliver all our orders from early Dec 2018 onwards.

 

                     


For press inquiries and corporate sales, do contact us at hello@coritraveller.com

Review from our backers

story:
Short Summary

This summer camp in the East Lake neighborhood will be held in the East Lake Courts Recreation and Community Center every week beginning May 28 from Tues-Sat (9a - 5p).  This camp is named in honor of Ms. Lawrence (pictured above), a longtime resident of East Lake Courts, who started the camp about 10 years ago as a way to create a safe and fun place for kids to go during summer break.

Ms. Lawrence has experienced several health challenges in the last few months and as a result, Grove Street Settlement House has stepped up to provide technical assistance along with other community groups to ensure this camp will open on May 28th until August 7th and then transition to an after-school program.  This day camp will serve approximately 40 kids between the ages of 5 and 11 and is provided FREE OF CHARGE.  The mornings will be spent strengthening math and writing skills; reading skills will be addressed through the ALEXIA computer-based reading program.  In the afternoons, every week will have a different focus (arts & crafts, VBS, drama/performance, etc).  Because East Lake is situated in a vast food desert with no grocery stores close by,  a large community garden is being installed in May and the children/volunteers/community residents will manage the garden all summer and share in the produce grown. 

A healthy breakfast and lunch are being provided to all children who enroll; a snack will also be offered in the afternoon.

What We Need

We are hoping to raise at least $2500 initially.  These funds will be used to buy supplies for the camp (paper, markers, glue, etc.).  We are also hoping to take the kids on at least two field trips (Hunter Museum and Nature Center) - field trips require renting a bus, providing lunch, etc.  If we raise enough money, we would also like to pay a small stipend to 2-4 graduate students to serve as facilitators of the camp throughout the summer.
 
**It will only take 88 people contributing $25 each or 44 people contributing $50 each to meet our goal!**

The Impact

Ms. Lawrence's East Lake Summer Camp will provide a fun, safe, and educational option for children and their families.  For many families in low-income communities, affordable and accessible summer camp options are very limited.  This camp provides one no-cost resource for this neighborhood and reduces the number of young people with no focused or positive activity to engage in over the summer months.  Low-income children between the ages of 5 and 11 will directly benefit from this camp.  Indirect benefits are the reinforcement of basic math, reading, and literacy skills.  More direct benefits are to create a positive and fun place for children and their caregivers to participate in - one goal for the camp is to increase parental involvement over the course of the summer.  For the larger community, neighborhood safety is a citywide concern - this camp addresses one aspect of this concern.

Volunteer! 

The camp needs volunteers in 3 hour blocks of time - if you can help or if your church or civic group is interested, visit our Facebook page for more details.  Search for "Ms. Lawrence's East Lake Summer Camp" on Facebook.

Who We Are

Grove Street has been involved with several community-based initiatives during the past year - our goal is to provide the technical assistance and support to help community groups start a project.  We then transition out so the community group has full ownership of the project.  Common Ground Free Store is an example of how we work in the community.  We are intentional about creating a space where a variety of individuals, groups, and organizations can come together around a shared cause or concern.

story:
* Short Summary *

You will create a chapter in History today by getting involved in USAECR.

Sal Di Stefano and Vince Torrusio are the founders of USA Emergency Crisis Relief (USAECR). With over 25+ years of marketing, business strategy, professional sales strategy and business operating experience.

USAECR is a point of passion for both Vince and I. On "average" a Crisis is occuring each MONTH in America from hurricanes, floods, shootings and other major disasters. USAECR is dedicated "specifically" to addressing these crisis situations where IMMEDIATE first response ATTENTION is needed.

The main goal of USAECR is getting help immediate and swift in real time on the day events occur by working with first responders; community liasons, government offices, fire, law enforcement and church organizations. Also as a National Internet Web Based Charity USAECR will remove the need for costly administration fees, employee fees, operating overhead. One of the biggest complaints we have heard is so much of a donated dollar is used before the funds donated actually reach and serve the mission.

As a contributor your help is HISTORICAL. By making a contribution your dollars will help create a charity with a specific dedicated purpose and will put in place a charity that will address immediate crisis needs for years to come.

THANK YOU! for YOUR HELP in Making a Difference!

Crisis Today, Respond Today, Action Today

** What We Need & What You Get **

USAECR needs $25,000 in funding to launch the national charity. The funding is going to build the online community interactive web site that will be the hub for natiional action, correspondence and events as they occur along with typical legal, accounting, public relations, SEO and other fees associated with any startup charity.  

What is unique about USAECR national website is that it will:

  1. Give Donors control on where their donation goes. For example: Which crisis situtation do you want to donate to and it will keep you the donor abreast on funds raised and how those funds are being utillized. It will also give donors the option to choose funding for food, clothing, housing, medical and community first responders.
  2. The web page will allow community businesses in those areas to get involved in and make it known that they want to get involved and help by making their services available. There will be a link to these services and community support.
  3. For the first time in History volunteers can create their own FaceBook pages linking and supporting funds needed for current crisis situations via USAECR and will give volunteers the opportunity to become national Operation Managers; ownership and community action.
  4. Twitter and Facebook will be displayed giving the US community freedom to express their concerns and help...and much more.

If we do not reach the desired $25,000, the remaing difference will be made up by contacting and appealing to individual corporate donors etc, until all the funds are acquired to launch.

*** The Impact ***

* Your contribution is HISTORICAL. By helping USAECR you are helping change the way people get help, NOW. Your donation will begin a legacy of a new era in online giving that is focused on no beaucratic red tape, elaborate administration fees, but rather focus on Immediate help and specifically helping people who need immediate attention.

* We have done extensive research on charities and most charities have enormous administration cost, large payrolls and costly operating fees. USAECR is about community, people helping people, and by minimizing all cost, such as not having an office, our volunteers will work mobile or from home, not having expense accounts, you can be asssured that we are here to do one thing, give immediate help, swiflty, and quickly without wasted dollars going to administration cost, but to the MISSION.

* A charity with a heart! We want to change the way people are helped by giving them the most help they need. In many situations "immediate" housing, food, medical care is needed. Who is better to do that, than the first responders to those crisis situations and the community that serves them.

* This will change the way people get help fast, efficiently and precise. We are successful at making things happen and we believe we can help our community and people who need help in these unfortunate events. We may be helping you someday, too.

**** Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Perhaps you can't give $10, $20, $50, $100, $1000 right now. You can still help by informing people about this MISSION and the Historical impact it will make in OUR SHARED world and the world of others. Keep us in mind if you are great at creating followers on Facebook...you may be a potential Operation Manager volunteer postion.

Please Help. Make a Difference for years to come.

* This is Phase One of 5 Phase (just the beginning) fundraising focus.

* Professional Firms that USAECR will use to move forward:

1. Barklage, Brett, Wibbenmeyer & Hamill (law firm)

2. Brugere & Co (cpa firm)

3. Tech Solutions LLC (SEO strategy)

story:
Our Story

From May 16-18, we will hold the 6th annual Marines Helping Marines Fishing Tournament at the Anchor Marina in North East, Maryland. Each year we strive to provide a fun-filled weekend for approximately 25 or more severely wounded warriors and their families.

Veterans are paired up with professional anglers who will teach them the ropes of bass fishing. Together the two will perform as a team against other anglers. The tournament is open to the public. After the tournament concludes, a barbeque will be held for all and proceeds from the day will be given to the Marines Helping Marines foundation.

The Impact

These heroes are confined to the hospital for rehabilitation. Many of them cannot go home as they do not live close to the area. Through donations we are able to allow them and their families to leave the area for a weekend, meet new friends, engage in the community, and learn a little about bass fishing.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to provide each servicemember with the proper fishing equipment to compete in this tournament. Fishing companies do donate product, however that is not always enough. We also need to pay for hotel rooms for each veteran and their families. Your donations will also help pay for event registration fees, t-shirts and coins, food, travel expenses, entertainment, and advertising for the event.  This years hotel bill will surpass $4,000 alone.

Other Ways You Can Help

Besides making a small donation you can help spread the word about this great event. Please share the links with your friends and family.

story:
My Story

Hi there! I'm Django!

And these are my humans! Mayra and Fernando.

My humans decided to pursue their dream of becoming professional photographers and opened up their own business, Lightbug Studio. I have watched them work very late nights and make great sacrifices to keep their dream alive. 

My humans need a little boost right now to continue making awesome and creative photos and videos. Our mortgage payment is due Feb. 15th and your donation will help us stay in our home, pay some bills and give us a chance to keep working towards our dream job.

My humans are so dedicated and willing to sacrifice anything to achieve their goals, even the place where I grew up in and still LOVE. 

#SaveDjangosHouse

Here’s some photos of me and my humans.

This is when I first arrived at my house. I found out there was a park nearby and I LOVED it even more!

I loved my new home and my humans took good care of me.

They even taught me some tricks that I still know!

Here's the video

I started growing and growing and discovering life. My humans even made me an Instagram account: http://instagram.com/djangothelab

My humans sing me Happy Birthday

And of course I learned to do my own works of art, but my humans didn’t really like this.

 I call this the Couch Bone. 

This I call Snow in Summer.

This isn't art, I was just exfoliating my beautiful skin.

How awesome, right? So this is my family and some of my adventures. Please help us so I can keep my house and my backyard.

#SaveDjangosHouse


Here are the REWARDS

Postcard

Pin Button

T-Shirt



Risks & Challenges

We took great risk leaving our jobs and pursuing our dream, but we didn’t want to look back years from now and regret that we didn’t have enough courage to take the leap. We are not afraid of hard work and we know we are just beginning our journey. Our biggest challenge is pushing ourselves to stretch our creative limits on a daily basis. Even though it is hard to be small business owners, we love it and we are very passionate about it. We are working everyday to establish our photography brand here in El Paso, TX and we are accomplishing this one step at a time. Photography is our only source of income outside of odd jobs here and there, and that's why we have to work harder so Django is happy and has a house where he can live well. We are willing to do whatever it takes, even if it means eating ramen noodles forever. 

#SaveDjangosHouse.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can help us spread the word about our campaign!  Feel free to share it with your family and friends!
