story:
Send the Gun Show Loophole Tour back to Tulsa, OK

The worlds Largest Gun Show is held each year in Tulsa, Oklahoma
And it is canceled (they announced it on Monday AM), BUT we are still ready to go.. almost

Here is how you can help us get there

  • Pitch in $2 (for 2A) to pay for some gas & food (Thank You)
     
  • Grab the US Firearm Museums Book ($23 SHIPPED)
    AND our new supplement to the book will explore the Worlds Largest Gun Show, our experiences and adventures over the years along with interviews of those who promote and attend the show
    We will write, create and assemble the Tulsa Gun Show supplement LIVE
     
  • Grab a Patch Perk ($25 SHIPPED)
    (these are on hand and will ship as many as we can before we head out)


Are you ready to join the adventure?

Gun Show Loophole Tour

Cool Gun Stuff Across the USA

An honest look at firearms in the U.S.A. through;
Gun Shows, Gun Shops, Firearm Museums & Gun Collections

Gun Shops All Week, Gun Shows on Weekends

 

Sharing the Firearms Owners Experience

Since 2012, more than 200+ Gun Shops, 30+ Firearm Museums, 60,000 miles, 39 States

  • 2020 Tour (so far..)
    - SHOT Show 
    - New Mexico State 2A Rally in Sante Fe, NM
    - Arizona 2A Rally in Phoenix
     
  • 2019 Tour
    - 21 Gun Shops
    - 9 Firearm Museums
    - 12,000 miles
    - 19 States
     
  • 2018 Tour
    - 59 Gun Shops
    - 10 Firearm Museums
    - 11,950 miles
    - 16 States
     

  • 2017 Tour
    - 61 Gun Shops
    - 9 Firearm Museums
    - 12,200+ miles
    - 18 States

  • 2016 Tour
    - 49 Gun Shops
    - 6 Firearm Museums
    - 6,000+ miles
    - 6 States

Tulsa 2020 Trip Goals

  • New Firearm Museums !!
    - Panhandle History Museum - Learned about a NEW (for us) Firearm Museum in Texas we can visit on trip
    - another new museum (for us) Museum of the Fur Trade in Nebraska
    - the Boot Hill Museum in Dodge City Kansas is remodeling (is it open yet?)
    - the Daisy Airgun Museum and the Sanders Museum are both in Arkansas and not too far away
    - back to J.M Davis &  Woolaroc - and their awesome Colt collection
    - the 45th Infantry Museum (6th visit?)
    - the Lead Mines of World War I (are near Tulsa)
  • More Gun Shops
    - We visit Gun Shops, Shooting Ranges, Surplus Stores
  • The Return Route
    Which direction we head back to Tucson will depend on how successful the campaign is and the funds we raise

... Potential Return Routes

  • Texas ?
    - a visit to CloverTac's neck of the woods?
    - Waco & the Texas Ranger Hall of Fame Museum (one of my favorites)
     
  • Colorado ?
    - head back to Dragon Mans
    - Boot Hill museum on the way in Kansas
    - Denver Gun Shops
    - Museum of the Fur Trade in Nebraska
     
  • Arkansas ?
    - the Daisy Airgun Museum so much cool history here
    - the Sanders Museum we visited the area in 2012, it would be awesome to visit
     
  • California ?
    - got a lead on a Cutting Laser I could grab in California, depending on funds raised we could swing by on the return trip?

Stretch Goals 

if we Reach the Goal, we GO
if we Surpass the Campaign Goal, let do this...

  • $ 3,500 = Campaign Goal Met = "it's a GO"
  • $ 4,500+ = You just bought us all a GunChannels.com Reunion Dinner in Tulsa
  • $ 6,000+ = Long Return Trip - Lets add another state to or return route
  • $ 7,000+ = Firearm Museum Book Published - let's get the book published professionally
  • $ 9,000+ = Xtra Long Return Trip - OK two or more states on our way back to Tucson
  • $ 12,000+ = Xtra Tour Perks all around - we will have some fun with THIS
  • $ 20,000+ = Funds will go to 2021 Gun Show Loophole Tour prep for 2A Awareness in 2021
  • $ 200,000,000+ = We repeal the NFA

 


Needs & Challenges

The Van = is in OK shape, but could use a set of brakes, a professional tune-up, new spark plugs, and a few minor things to fix up before another road trip, AAA Membership, etc

Gas & Food = we travel cheap, but it still costs something to move the van

The Pup = just needs some shots, and a check up

  • If you are along our route and can help repair / maintain the van?
    - and are willing to help out CHEAP, please let us know
     
  • If you are along our route and are a Veterinarian?
    - and are willing to help out with the pup CHEAP (if there is a emergency)
    please let us know


Risks and Alternate Plan

Travel and exploring our Gun Community is what we do, so the only risks are any issues with the road or the van, otherwise we will go as far as we can with what funds get raised

  • We can't afford to go unless we reach the goal, so...
     
  • IF we don't reach the Campaign Goal, ALL Perks will STILL Ship
    - and all funds raised will go to working on the van & puppy so we are ready for the next adventure

Other Ways You Can Help

Some can't contribute, but you can STILL help:

  • We need Sugar Mamas, let old widow ladys know about how awesome we are
  • Get the word out
  • Make some noise about our campaign & the Gun Show LoopholeTour
  • Use the share tools here on Indiegogo !


Thank You for helping us share 2A

story:
January 18th, 2021 Update:

Fyi we don't take order anymore from Indiegogo. Please visit wwww.sidebysidegear.com to purchase directly from our website.

Feel free to contact us if you need any further information at HELLO@SIDEBYSIDEGEAR.COM

Stay organized,
Side by Side crew

___________________________

Today, daily commute can be stressful.

There are many new habits to adapt to: wearing a face mask, sanitizing your hands, avoiding unsafe contacts – which leaves you feeling overwhelmed.

But don't worry, we are here to help.  

 

 

Introducing the Side by Side Kit – a foldable Pouch with multi-compartment, plus 1x Touch-Pen keychain to reduce unsafe contacts and 1x refill Carabiner-Bottle.

 

 

 

 

 

The Pouch of the Side by Side Kit will be your new everyday carry. Slim and foldable, The Pouch fits seamlessly in your pockets or daily bag. It is made of lightweight fabric that is machine washable, offering a reusable way to carry your face mask.

With the double zipper compartments, you can separate your mask in-use from your spare masks, keeping them safe while saving single-use paper or plastic waste.

The backside pockets are made of elastic mesh to fit your hand sanitizer bottle and alcohol wipes with ease. 

 

 

 



 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

The splash-proof fabric of The Pouch protects your mask from raindrops or light spills.

Versatile and made to last, The Pouch can also be used to fit other essentials such as key card, passport, or medicine. Comes in 4 different color options.  

 

 

 

To clean, machine wash on cold or hand wash with mild soapy water and hang dry. Make sure do not use tumble dry, do to not iron, bleach, or use fabric softener. Tip: If you’re in a rush, simply wipe down the pouch with alcohol wipes for a quick refresh! 

 

 

 

A handy, pocket-size Touch-Pen to reduce potentially unsafe contacts when you're in the elevator; using the ATM or public touch screens; or filling out paper forms. Comes with a keychain ring to easily attach with your keys.

 

 

 

 

 

Our refill bottle has a slim design made to fit any pant pocket with ease. Comes with a detachable carabiner in case you’d like to hang it out for convenient access. Simply unscrew the cap to refill it with the hand sanitizer gel of your choice. Note: sanitizer gel not included.

 

 


 

Each Side by Side Kit includes: 1x pouch, 1x touch-pen, 1x refill carabiner-bottle (NOTE: sanitizer gel is not included). 

Pouch Color selection: When the campaign ends, you will receive a survey by email to select the color of your pouch. 

Packaging: To reduce single-use plastic waste we are packing the Side by Side Kit in a reusable packaging sleeve (ideal to store stationery or other small items).

story:
Dates: Thursday, May 23- Sunday, May 26, 2013

 

Price: $100 (our transaction fees increase to 9% if we have under 5 additional deposits; the normal deposit amount was $96, but we have to offset potential transaction costs, hence the additional $4)

 

We should have at least 5 additional guests, so our funding goal is $500 for this round.

 

We will either use the addtional deposit money for a food stock at the beginning of the trip or refund the additional to the guests, depending on what everybody wants to do. We'll deal with that the weekend of the trip. If we don't pool the money for food, we'll pool the cash and refund it equally per share per guest. We won't be pooling anything for beverages, so make sure to bring a little more  than you think you can drink during the four day weekend.

 

Payments are non-refundable unless the trip is cancelled. So you're in or you're out; don't be flaky, and don't beg for your money back if for some reason you can't attend at the last minute because the group is not going to catch your slack.

 

Note to outsiders: This is a closed, invite-only affair. If you have not been invited, please contact the group's administrators for further information.

 

If you have any questions, post them in the facebook group or email.

 

Thanks!

story:
MESAY3's mission is simple – make the world a better place by turn the world's greatest travelers into great communicators. Language should never be a hindrance to travelers, it is time to travel to the local culture with MESAY3.

During a global travelling, the most interesting thing is always not the local scenery, but the treasures of culture and interesting locals. With MESAY3, you can say 50 languages at once, easily surpassed all the language masters in the world. 

I bet the most difficult for you to forget will be the local unfamiliar faces which are extremely surprised when MESAY3 speaking.

With the experience of the first two generations of products, the new MESAY3 is now cheaper, smarter, more accurate and also has longer battery life and support more languages. What's more, we have made great efforts to improve the user interaction experience, and now the product is more user-friendly and even more elegant.

In addition, you will not be easily deceived, and you can complete in-depth travel with no one but MESAY3.There’s no doubt that a MESAY3 cloud make your trip safer, more free, and more cost-effective.

 

 

 

 

Introducing MESAY3, the third generation of the powerful AI translator from the MESAY brand, now custom-tailored for travelers. Press the button and talk to it in your native language, MESAY 3 will translate every words it hears into the target languages in 0.8 sencond with 97% accuracy.

Let's meet the first two generations:

The first generation - MESAY 1 -support 15 languages translation to Chinese or English

The 2nd generation - MESAY 2 -support 16 languages back-to-back translation.

Thanks to the supporters of the previous two generations. Without them, there is no MESAY3. After making the first two generations of products, we received feedback from many users, and some questions became the reason why we continue to improve our products.

After one year‘s hard work, MESAY 3 was born, as a better translator and a completely different device. Now MESAY3 support 50 languages back-to-back translation, with the largest 2.3 inch LCD touch screen but even more affordable.

From appearance to software, from design concept to the applicable crowd, it has been redesigned. Advances in AI technology and producing tech have resulted in a slim and beautiful body and a higher price/performance ratio.

If the first two generations are clumsy toddlers and young girls, then MESAY3 is a truly elegant adult woman. 

Check in the features to know more.

 

 

 

As the title says, MESAY3 is a device designed for travelers. In our opinion, language should never be an obstacle to your communication with the world.

When Cristiano Ronaldo plays a wonderful hat trick at the World Cup in Russia, the language should not be a hindrance to cheering and shouting at the scene. When children in Congo (gold) need medical and dietary assistance, language should not be a hindrance to selflessly helping them. When a reporter is discriminated against in another country, language barrier should not be his dangerous sign. When you want to go to the toilet in a strange city but no one responds, language should not be your obstacle.

Now, with MESAY3, shopping, ordering, asking for directions and buying tickets will not give you a headache when your interpreter is absent. 

An in-depth exchange can also be made. In China, old men always have a passionate heart on the streets, beautiful girls have the expectation of being approached by foreigners, young people may wish to make foreign friends like you. See what you missed!

With MESAY3, you will discover how boring it is to only see the scenery. 

Is MESAY3 in your package list now?

 

 

Feel free to look back at the text content and replay the translated audio

Only support on-line translations this version.

MESAY3 also has a built-in strong AI assistant who can answer many questions like Siri.

 

Check our testers to see how easy to use MESAY3 and how strong it is.

 

 

Supports translation of each two of the following languages.

 

 

 

 

"Jehovah scattered them from there over all the surface of the earth, and they gradually left off building the city. That is why its name was called Babel, because there Jehovah had confused the language of all the earth." - Genesis 11:8, 9 

The narrative of Tower of Babel explained that God was concerned that humans are disrespectful towards God by building the tower to escape the impossibility thoughts of living in God-creation world. Thus, God brought in the existence of different language to the world and scattered the people around the world so they were unable to understand one another. 

However, for thousands years until now, humans are still searching for a better way to communicate and understand each other.

As we can see, the world is filled with pain. If only language barrier isn't the problem, the world could perhaps not have any war. People will live peacefully without any miscommunication because miscommunication leads to a lot conflicts. If only people around the world speak the same language, the world will be different. More positivity, less negativity, this will be the dream of the world.

Before the 21st century, people solved this problem by studying each and every language. Interpreters that are experts in the languages are hired to translate. However, this is not effective enough for people since the World has all kinds of languages. Plus, humans has limited capabilities and limited time to learn every language spoken in the world.

As technology gets better in these recent years, Artificial Intelligence(AI) is introduced in the interpretation industry. AI now can outnumber human in many ways when it comes to languages.   

What makes us being determined to do this project was because a friend came on June 6th, 2015; and talked about traveling abroad. During their conversation, he commented that traveling abroad has become much more convenient because there are more international flights with a lower price, and traveling visa is easier to get.  

We were feeling very excited but then a question arose,  

"How did you communicate with foreigners when traveling abroad?"  

The conversation fell into a total silence.  

My friend admitted that he felt embarrassed and it wasn't so convenient when he was traveling abroad. Although he had a great time, there are also times because he wasn't able to communicate. He also joked that he had trouble approaching some ladies but gave up due to language problems.  

To cut the long story short, the conversation made us realize about the importance of language. Thus, the idea is approved by our friends. So we proceed to the development of the first generation of Mesay translation device. 

 

 

 

A senior hardware team from Shenzhen, China, a group of entrepreneurs who regard products as life.

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We’re thrilled to launch this campaign. This device arrives after countless months of dedicated work, all to achieve the best imaginable solution for you.

Still, we understand that risks and challenges lay ahead.

Delivering upon our promise to ship all of you the Mesays on time and fulfill your expectations are the final challenges that await us—and ultimately, the perfect reward.

MANUFACTURING & SUPPLY CHAIN

Before the campaign, we’ve spent over 10 months with manufacturers and suppliers. We have the right factory to have a cooperation in Shenzhen, the city of electronic products.

At the same time we started campaign, we have already started manufacturing small quantities of 200 products. This product has been successfully produced in small batches and rigorously tested.

Mesay co-founder, Seven, has worked in the Chinese Manufacturing company for over 10 years, and has enough ability and experience to control the supply chain.

We will keep you updated our journey from pre-production, tooling, manufacturing, to fulfillment so you understand what is happening behind the scene.

SHIPPMENT

We will ship the product as soon as possible after the crowdfunding has received the payment. There are some risks that the indiegogo's payment will be slower, causing our liquidity to be tight, which will result in a slower delivery process. But we will still do our best to complete all the orders. I hope that you can use our products as soon as possible.


If you need it urgently, please purchase Fastest Delivery 1-Pack MESAY3 award. You will be the first to get it by fastest delivery.


If you need it now, please contact us at customer-service@mesaytc.com and we have a bit of samples available.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If your friends have a plan to travel abroad, please don't hesitate to share MESAY3 with him. I guess he will be very grateful to you. Thank you very much!

However, for thousands years until now, humans are still searching for a better way to communicate and understand each other.
As we can see, the world is filled with pain. If only language barrier isn't the problem, the world could perhaps not have any war. People will live peacefully without any miscommunication because miscommunication leads to a lot conflicts. If only people around the world speak the same language, the world will be different. More positivity, less negativity, this will be the dream of the world.

Before the 21st century, people solved this problem by studying each and every language. Interpreters that are experts in the languages are hired to translate. However, this is not effective enough for people since the World has all kinds of languages. Plus, humans has limited capabilities and limited time to learn every language spoken in the world.

As technology gets better in these recent years, Artificial Intelligence(AI) is introduced in the interpretation industry. AI now can outnumber human in many ways when it comes to languages.   
What makes us being determined to do this project was because a friend came on June 6th, 2015; and talked about traveling abroad. During their conversation, he commented that traveling abroad has become much more convenient because there are more international flights with a lower price, and traveling visa is easier to get.  
We were feeling very excited but then a question arose,  
"How did you communicate with foreigners when traveling abroad?"  
The conversation fell into a total silence.  
My friend admitted that he felt embarrassed and it wasn't so convenient when he was traveling abroad. Although he had a great time, there are also times because he wasn't able to communicate. He also joked that he had trouble approaching some ladies but gave up due to language problems.  
To cut the long story short, the conversation made us realize about the importance of language. Thus, the idea is approved by our friends. So we proceed to the development of the first generation of Mesay translation device. 
 

 


 

A senior hardware team from Shenzhen, China, a group of entrepreneurs who regard products as life.
 

 

 

Risks & Challenges
We’re thrilled to launch this campaign. This device arrives after countless months of dedicated work, all to achieve the best imaginable solution for you.
Still, we understand that risks and challenges lay ahead.
Delivering upon our promise to ship all of you the Mesays on time and fulfill your expectations are the final challenges that await us—and ultimately, the perfect reward.
MANUFACTURING & SUPPLY CHAIN
Before the campaign, we’ve spent over 10 months with manufacturers and suppliers. We have the right factory to have a cooperation in Shenzhen, the city of electronic products.
At the same time we started campaign, we have already started manufacturing small quantities of 200 products. This product has been successfully produced in small batches and rigorously tested.
Mesay co-founder, Seven, has worked in the Chinese Manufacturing company for over 10 years, and has enough ability and experience to control the supply chain.
We will keep you updated our journey from pre-production, tooling, manufacturing, to fulfillment so you understand what is happening behind the scene.
SHIPPMENT
We will ship the product as soon as possible after the crowdfunding has received the payment. There are some risks that the indiegogo's payment will be slower, causing our liquidity to be tight, which will result in a slower delivery process. But we will still do our best to complete all the orders. I hope that you can use our products as soon as possible.
If you need it urgently, please purchase Fastest Delivery 1-Pack MESAY3 award. You will be the first to get it by fastest delivery.
If you need it now, please contact us at customer-service@mesaytc.com and we have a bit of samples available.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If your friends have a plan to travel abroad, please don't hesitate to share MESAY3 with him. I guess he will be very grateful to you. Thank you very much!

story:
Video Review From Cooperated Youtuber

 

Product Show:

It's a unique stylish design bag that better fit takes out on a raining day,
NebulaeS wishes to deliver the high-quality fashion products to our backers. Nebula bag is made by environmental-friendly material. It is waterproof, lightweight, pressure resistant, to protect your items inside, you can put this bag in your luggage and go travel. You deserve a nice bag like Nebula as your clutch bag or your shoulder bag.

  ​

Product Superiority: 

  • High-Quality PET Environmental Friendly Material
  • Unique Multi-Color Fashion Design  
  • Waterproof Surface  and Airtight Zipper  
  • Pressure-Resistant Protection case
  • Heavy Duty Metal Zipper Head and Snap Hook, you can change short strap or long strap.
  • Light Weight(140gram only) but Large Capacity 

Perfect For Outdoor Activity

Product Quality

How did the NEBULA bag differ from those on the market:

PRODUCT SIZE:

Choose Your Color, Enjoy World Free Shipping:  

 Crystal Series:

  • Blue                    
  • Grey
  • Clear
  • Pink

 Metalic Series:

  • Red
  • Blue
  • Gold
  • Grey

How to back this campaign:   

  • Click "Back It" 
  • Pick your reward level
  • 5 reward levels to meet your needs


Brand Concept:

With collaboration with Japanese fashionistas, with a philosophy of "simplicity, fashion, refinement" and a brand slogan of "humanity, green, science", We launched a fashion bag called "Nebula". With its unique, fashionable and natural design, "Nebula" fashion mini Bag is going to lead the new trend of MINI Bag industry. "Nebula" fashion mini bag was made by non-toxic and environment-friendly (Pet) materials. With superb quality processing, the Nebula appeared to be elegance, firmness, and amity. With human-oriented standard,”Nebula” fashion mini bag is aiming to bring you a high quality sense of fashion and a kind of clear lifestyle.

Risks and challenges

Like all Kickstarter projects, we will face certain risks and challenges in delivering this product at the quality we demand of ourselves. However, the NEBULAES team brings with it not only our passion but experience in engineering and manufacturing at scale, and we've made every effort to mitigate these risks for our backers.

With the support of our manufacturing and distribution partners, we are well prepared for the challenges ahead. We promise to be transparent and to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues that may come up and our solutions to such.

Feel free to reach out at service@nebulaes.com if you have any questions.

story:
This holiday season Amaryllo International is offering one of the most unique gift ideas around.  


Christmas is the time of year when we get together with family and friends to celebrate the love and compassion for each other.  Amaryllo would like to offer this feeling of closeness and security all year round.  

When you give a gift from Amaryllo, you are passing on the quality, comfort and dedication that goes into each product. 

The iCam HD gives you the peace of mind that your home and loved ones are always just a touch away.

Amaryllo wins 2015 CES Best of Innovation Award!!

Amaryllo International has just received one of the most prestigous awards given by the Consumer Electronics Association (CEA), producer of the Consumer Electronics Show (CES), the world's largest electronics show that takes place every year in Las Vegas, Nevada.

There are two tiers to the Innovation awards given by the CEA at CES.  The first is "Honoree".  Over 100 products were chosen as an honoree from 28 different product categories.

However, only the products that score the highest, AND above the required score, are awarded the "Best of Innovation".  This year 20 products were able to acheive the required score and receive this highest honor.

Amaryllo was chosen for the Best of Innovation award in the category of "Embedded Technology", beating out major companies like Samsung and Qualcomm.

We welcome you to come share the enjoyment with us this coming January 6-9 at CES in Las Vegas.   Our products will be on display at the Best of Innovation Awards Showcase, located in the Sands Expo at CES Tech West. You can find the Amaryllo booth also in the Sands Expo booth #70048



We are offering amazing deals on 2 models of the iCam HD exclusively during this holiday season!

And the crowd favorite iSensor!


This is NOT a fundraising campaign! 

It is an exclusive 'presale' event.


Back by popular demand, now in Christmas version!




For more information please see our website or our previous successful campaign.

For more product information visit our website:

http://www.amaryllo.eu/n40822d1whfeatures/?model=d1wh



For more product information visit our website:

http://www.amaryllo.eu/n40822b2befeatures/?model=b2be




Why not deliver directly to the person you wish to gift an iCam HD?  Just like Santa, we'll deliver your gift to whoever you choose anywhere in the world for FREE!!


We are offering FREE 4GB MicroSD cards to the first 100 Snow Cube and the first 100 Santa's Special orders.


When the campaign funds reach $10,000 we will give EVERYONE a FREE MicroSD card upgrade!*

Everyone who didn't pledge to get a MicroSD card before will now receive a 4GB MicroSD card; everyone who already got a 4GB MicroSD card will now get a 8GB MicroSD card; the 8GB will be upgraded to a 16GB MicroSD card!

Merry Christmas!

*Since the iChristmas has built in memory this does not apply for the iChristmas.



We are always looking for new ways to improve and lately Amaryllo has been working with Google to integrate innovative technologies into all its products.

Amaryllo is the first IP camera to integrate Google's browser-based real time communication service.  WebRTC offers extremely stable audio and video streaming without the need of downloading software add-ons or plug-ins.  

Recent News:

1. http://www.webrtc-solutions.com/topics/webrtc-solutions/articles/389356-amsterdam-based-company-reveals-first-webrtc-wireless-network.htm

2. http://blog.peer5.com/webrtc-the-future-of-the-web/

3. http://www.webrtcworld.com/topics/webrtc-world/articles/391226-amaryllo-announces-new-camera-line-with-webrtc-functionality.htm


       

Amaryllo is the first company to offer free cloud storage to consumers.  Through the iCam application, you can link your Google Drive with your camera.  Although the video is stored in your drive, you can manage and access them right through the app.  This saves you time and energy when searching for your video.  


Up to 1080x720 HD resolution gives you a crisp and clear look at what's going on.


Every Google account gives you 15GB free.  Link your iCam HD with your Google Drive and record every moment in HD quality.



Sometimes you want privacy and now it's easier than ever.  No need to power off your camera or unplug it anymore.




With the use of Google WebRTC, you can enjoy true 2-way audio in real time, not a push-to-talk method like most other IP cameras. *not included for the iChristmas


Simply add songs onto the MiscroSD card and through the app you can play, shuffle, and repeat you favorite songs or lullabies.

*only available with the Snow Cube

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iodfyRDzGgI


Day or night, you'll never miss a moment.  However, the IR LED can be disabled in the settings if you are concerned about the harmful radiation they emit.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8gF5fOjMEf0

*Not available on the iChristmas



1. Where can I find more information on the products?

Click on the camera for more information

You could also go to http://crowdfundingcast.tk/crowdfunding-cast-ep... to listen to our interview. 

How do I set it up?

The setup process takes only 1 minute if you know your WiFi password.  Our app will guide you through the steps and with a simple QR code scan, the camera is up and working. Here are the instruction videos.

Snow Cube and Santa's Special 

iChristmas



Will I or the gifted receive it before Christmas?

Rest assured that you will get all your perks in time, we will start shipping at the beginning of December.

We already have the packaging ready and we are beginning to stock our inventory.

Shipping will be done on a first pledged first send basis. To make this as smooth as possible we would like you to go to our website after you pledge. There you can enter your shipping information and will receive a shipping number.

This way we can start forwarding your information to our carrier to start processing.


How good is the "Night Vision"?*

Here is a video of the night vision as recorded by the iCam HD, the wall is about 3 meters away (the tiles on the floor are 1 meter each).  At up to 5 meters, objects are highly detailed, however you can still objects at 10 meters with less detail.


*The iChristmas does not support Night Vision, instead it has a high power flashlight

What is the power consumption?

The iCam HD uses only 2Amps/5Volts of power and therefore can be powered by using only a battery bank.  This ultra low power consumption guarantees that it will never overheat and possibly cause a fire in your home.


Do I need to download an application?

Yes, you will need to download the iCam HD 360 app (for Santa's Special and the Snow Cubu) or the iSensor HD app (for the iChristmas).

 or 

 They are available for both Android and Apple devices. 

                     
 


Do I have to pay the import taxes?

No, we work together with TNT express to ensure all the import taxes that come with your shipment are being covered. 


Can I use it outdoors?

No, our products are not weatherproof.  If we were to make them weatherproof, then we would not be able to give this good of a deal.  Weatherproof cameras are easily a couple hundred dollars more than in-house IP cams.


How secure is the P2P connection?

With our 256 bit encryption and Google's security there is nothing to worry about.

And you can rest assured that something like this doesn't happen with our camera's.


Is there a warranty and user manual?

Yes, there is a paper and digital user manual, and a warranty on parts for one year after purchase.



How can I record my videos?

You can record locally on the MicroSD card (up to 32GB) or link your Google Drive account for instant cloud upload.  Be sure to put a MicroSD in the back of the iCam as this a requirement to record any videos.

You can also choose which quality you would like to record at and the method for upload (continuous, event triggered, or disabled) 


What is the quality of the video?

The quality comes in HD, VGA or QVGA.

For recorded videos it depends on what quality you want the camera to use. This can easily be changed in the settings menu.

For the live viewing, the camera will automatically select the most appropriate quality based on your wifi bandwidth availability.  It will also adjust the quality to make sure the connection is stable and has minimal delay. 

http://www.amaryllo.eu/n40822videodemo/



What kind of WiFi connection speed do I need?

Our Cameras have built-in WiFi 802.11 bgn and both downloading and uploading speeds depend on your available bandwidth.

How long can I record video?  



What is the quality of the speaker?*



*the iChristmas does not support 2 way audio


Can I mount it on the wall or ceiling?

Yes! The iChristmas can be mounted on the wall or ceiling anywhere in the house with the included bracket. 


Or plug it into a USB power adapter and make it cordless!


For the Snow Cube and the Santa's Special we work with a Danish company who makes an aftermarket mount for the ceiling or wall.  You can contact them for pricing and ordering at their website:

www.spaceclub.dk

          

           

            


       



Can the infrared light be turned off?*

Yes, in the app you can enable or disable the IR LED lights so that you don't expose your loved ones to any unnecessary radiation that may be harmful to their eyes. 


*Not available on the iChristmas


We have a well-rounded team of engineers that are more than willing to hear any comments, questions, or feedback that you may have for us.  Don't hesitate to let us know.

Email us at: support.ai@amaryllo.eu




Our experienced sales team is always willing to explore any new opportunities that approach.  If you have a question or just want to get in touch with us, we're always willing to talk.

Email inquiries to: sales.ai@amaryllo.eu


Amaryllo was selected as a Cool Vendor by Gartner in their 2014 Connected Home Report . Gartner is the world's biggest investment research company.


 Amaryllo was also the recipient of 2 prestigious awards at Computex 2014. 

                                                    






"The iCam is every IP camera owners dream. It’s easy to setup, has 256-bit encryption, supports 1080 x 720 video without lag-time, and free cloud service. Then there are the little things like no contracts, no monthly fees, and a rocking Android app." - SecurityGem (iCam HD)

"An internet-accessible real-time monitor/alarm for infants, pets, home security or other applications." - PanTech Solutions

"[The setup was] simple, straightforward" - Techno Traveler 

"This cam is styled to fit in nicely on a kid’s shelf, rotates 360 and tilts up and down. Plus, it’s adorable when it moves around." -CES 2014 Blog (iCam HD)

"The Amaryllo iCam separated itself from the crowd." - Linux.com (iCam HD)



We have 20 innovation and design patents that are either pending or approved.  Shown below is iCam HD's industry design patent granted by The United States of America.




iChristmas Gift Pack


Snow Cube Gift Pack

Snow Cube Early Bird Special

 

 Only 100 Available!!!

Santa's Special Gift Pack


Santa's Early Bird Special

 

 Only 100 Available!!!

iChristmas Couple Pack


Snow Cube Couple Pack

Santa's Special Couple Pack

 

iChristmas Family Pack

Snow Cube Family Pack

 

Santa's Special Family Pack

 


Amaryllo International is a company headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. It designs, markets, and sells an increasingly larger line of wireless smart home networking products.

www.amaryllo.eu

story:
The African Diaspora World Tourism Awards (ADWTA) is a three-day event designed in appreciation of the service and dedication of leaders from around the world who have significantly impacted tourism and inspired the exploration of black culture and heritage sites around the globe. The event includes a travel expo, an 'Africana Extravaganza' cultural show, a 'Visit Africa' luncheon, a 'Hall of Fame' luncheon, and the main event, the ADWT Awards Gala and Ceremony.

What Your Contribution Means

During the Awards Gala and Ceremony, we will honor over 100 'Hall of Famers' and 'Who's Who' winners. We want to present them with trophies and plaques of appreciation. The creation of the 'Hall of Famers and Historic Places of African Diaspora Tourism' book is also a key component of this project. Thus, your donations will directly contribute to:
  • the purchase of trophies and plaques for Hall of Famers and Who's Who winners.
  • the production cost of the "Hall of Famers and Historic Places of African Diaspora Tourism' book.

Perks:

-For Tier 3, 4 and 5 donations, perks include a link to your organization on our website.

-Tier 4 and 5 donations include a complimentary copy of the book.

-For our special Tier 5 donors only, we will include your name in the book.

Who We Are

In conjucntion with the AD King Foundation- an IRS 501(c)(3) status non-proft organization dedicated to youth empowerment development and non-violent conflict resolution throughout the world- the ADWTA is presented by African Diaspora Tourism (africandiasporatourism.com)- an online magazine dedicated to exploring the culture, heritage, places and influences of people of African descent, past and present around the globe.

Because of this wonderful partneship, your donation may be eligible for a tax write-off.

Other Ways You Can Help

Know someone in the tourism industry? Spread the word to anyone you know that may be interested in attending, participating in, or donating to this event.
 
Visit www.ADWT-Awards.com for more info.

story:
THANK YOU for your support to make travels lighter and further! All orders were fulfilled. Please check out the updates for more recent information. For any questions, please email us: info@heyvacationist.com

 

 

(Drum Rolls, please)... Introducing Vacationist!... A versatile toiletry bag that holds all your essentials and more in an organized compact form!

  • Organized - Separate pockets for all your items
  • Hygienic - Keeps your toothbrush away from other items
  • Lightweight & Compact - Fits in backpacks or crowded luggage. Only 12oz (340g)
  • Expandable - Expands from 1" to up to 3"
  • Waterproof & Leakproof - Safe from all things may happen inside or outside
  • TSA compliant - Go through airport security easily
  • Durable - YKK zippers with strong Oxford fabric. Double-stitched outside

 

 

 

Large Detachable Pouch for all your Liquids

This clear TSA Compliant pouch holds all your travel-sized liquids and is easily removable for scanning. Use the attached strap to hang what you need in the shower so everything is accessible and nothing is forgotten. It's waterproof inside and out, and easy to clean as well - just rinse and you're done.

 

 

Separate Toothbrush Pocket

Keep your toothbrush away from all your other products with its own designated pocket. This pocket is even large enough for most electric toothbrushes. You can also put your travel toothpaste right inside this pocket to ensure they stay together during your travels.

 

Two Ways to Hang

Both the main bag and the large removable pouch can hang either by strap (g-hook) or suction cup. Whether you want to suction onto a mirror or in the shower, the suction cup can hold a fully-loaded bag for months on end.

 

Easy Access Exterior Pockets

A large pocket on one side of the bag makes grabbing your travel essentials easy. Makeup, accessories, eye mask, earphones, charging cords, keys can all be stashed here for easy access.

A slim pocket on the other side is perfect for your passport, airline tickets, trip details or other important documents while traveling.

 

Lightweight & Compact

Vacationist is packed with the most wanted features in a toiletry bag while weighing only as much as 2 apples and as big as your flip-flops.

 

Discreet and Hidden Pockets

Never be unprepared with a special pocket just for your personal effects. Stash your valuables to keep them hidden from wandering eyes- or hands.

 

Waterproof

Waterproof both inside and out, for protection no matter what happens. We don't like q-tips and cleaning fabric to get wet neither.

 

Washable

Keepin’ it fresh - Vacationist is entirely washable. Throw it into your washing machine with colors whenever you need a fresh start.

 

 

 

Hi, I am Ned :)

It all started a year ago. I was traveling to San Diego for the weekend with a traditional toiletry bag in tow. The sunscreen inside broke and it was such a mess; everything was smothered in greasy, white cream- even my toothbrush.

Since I travel often, I set out to find the perfect bag that would prevent any future messy mishaps. During my research, I noticed that the market is full of those one-pocket chaotic traditional bags.

After scouting out over fifty different toiletry bags, I realized that while a few had some neat features, none of them had it all. I thought to myself, I enjoy designing things and solving problems, so why not create the perfect travel bag?

I collaborated with many of my friends who are also avid travelers to learn which bags they used, which features they liked, and what they found lacking. I partnered with a frequent traveler and art enthusiastic, Catherine. With all the input we received, we began to design our first prototype.

Now I’ve just completed my first test trip with prototype #4, and it’s everything I had hoped for in a toiletry bag! Catherine also used it on her month-long California trip and she absolutely fell in love with it! Vacationist is the best travel bag you’ll ever need!

 

We sent Vacationist to several travelers from different professions around the world - Project Manager, Graphic Designer, Realtor, Blogger, Student... From USA, Germany, Croatia, Brazil, Vietnam... They used Vacationist during their trips. Here are what they said:


 

 

As a big THANK YOU for your support to lighter and further travels, we are giving amazing rewards to our backers who refer friends & family to our campaign page!

In order to refer friends and receive rewards:

  1. Log in to your Indiegogo account
  2. Share the campaign link by clicking the social media buttons on the campaign page

You can track your referrals through your Indiegogo profile. No extra shipping cost. We will ask your chose of color in water bottle and your size for shoes after the campaign is over. For more information about referral rewards: Que Water Bottle, V-Tex Travel Shoes

 

Due to the coronavirus outbreak, our shipment timeline moved to the April-May timeframe. We are sorry for this inconvenience. Please check out the updates for more recent information.

 

Get 35% commission by referring friends:

story:
Video e texto em Português abaixo / Video et texte en Français ci-dessous
Text auf Deutsch am Ende

⇓⇓⇓

 

"The breathability of sandals, but the foot-hugging security of a sneaker...
footwear to their purest form"(Sneaker Freaker)
"Step into the future" (Mashable)


 

With the iGUANEYE Jungle...

...your feet breathe, freed from the tightness of closed shoes.



...your feet are held, so you can run, jump and do whatever you want.




...your feet are protected, so you can move on rough grounds.





The iGUANEYE Jungle provides ultra-minimal foot protection. It acts like a second skin and follows all your movements.
A piece of Ultraflex elastomer only wraps around your big toe and your heel. By doing so, it secures a thick ergonomic sole under your feet and just like magic : IT HOLDS !
The Jungle is the most comfortable shoes ever ! Test the amazing feeling of barefoot comfort everywhere.



The Jungle LUX will provide you the ultimate comfort experience. It has been designed to follow you in all your activities. This sole version is made from a mixture of cork and latex. Flexible and adaptable it can adjust to your unique foot impression. This natural dual layer sole not only supports, but cork is a naturally antibacterial material, which absorbs sweat and prevents odors, ensuring both hygiene and comfort. The LUX sole is covered with a soft leather hide (a Vegan option will also be available). A rubber out-sole provides maximum resistance to abrasion.


The Jungle LIGHT version has exactly the same shape than the LUX version but it is made of EVA foam. Incredibly light and water-proof, it is also soft and super comfortable. The LIGHT version has the advantage to follow you even in water or when weather is rainy.

  
  




The 3D puzzle system allows to mix and match main body with sole types and colors. So you will be able to compose your own version. The two parts secure easily together. You can mount and dismount in seconds.





Like our first model (the Freshoes), the Jungle is inspired by the Amazonian Indians that used to dip their feet in liquid rubber from trees to protect them.


We have reproduced the experience and also dipped our feet in liquid rubber. That is how the iGUANEYE Freshoes were born.






Since our first crowdfunding campaign, we have sold more than 20.000 pairs of Freshoes all over the world...
From curious to customer to addict, once you have tried the unique comfort that iGUANEYE brings you will never want to go back to conventional sandals or flip-flops.

 

We are proud to produce 100% of our product near Porto in the beautiful north of Portugal. We have very strong relations with our industrial partners. They are family and they are committed to producing the best quality product as much as we are.

We have produced our 3D model in Rhinoceros 3D. Then with the help of INPACT (Leiria Portugal), we have printed several versions of our intricated design. INPACT works with the last generation of the 3DSystem SLS printer. We have selected two materials for the prints : Duraform Flex and Duraform TPU. Those flexible materials allow us to produce a prototype that mimic the final product accurately. We have printed 3 prototypes before we moved on to the first injection mold.



We have already produced 4 prototype injection and compression molds needed for the two versions of the Jungle. One for the rubber outsole of the LUX version, one for the complete LUX sole, one for the EVA foam for LIGHT version of the sole and finally one for the outer body that is the same part for both versions of the Jungle.



While the campaign is running we are still working and fine-tuning details to offer your feet the best fit they have ever experienced.
As soon as the goal of the campaign is achieved, we will launch the tooling of one group of molds for one size. February 2018.
After final testing and adjustments we will launch production of molds for all other sizes. March 2018.
Then we will produce all the Jungle pairs, pack them and ship them to you. April/May 2018.

 


At the end of the campaign, you will receive an online survey that will invite you to choose sizes and colors.

Sizing : The iGUANEYE Jungle adapts to your feet. The choice of the size is made easy as there are no half-sizes. Just pick your usual size, you can’t go wrong.
To make sure that you receive the size that fits you the best, simply use the size equivalence table, and the iGUANEYE size validation tool.
For Japanese, English and American sizes, you must refer to the size equivalence table.




Colors :  Here are the colors option you will be able to choose from.
-Main body : Black and Light Grey
-Light sole : Orange, Black, Light Blue and White
-Lux sole : Ash Grey, Turquoise, Black, Amber Orange





Main body is of course compatible with both version of the sole Light and Lux.

Have an idea for an additional color?  We are open to your feedback!
If you desperately want to see the Jungle in a color you love drop us an email and we will see if it is possible to add it (you may not be the only one ; )

Shipping : Since our first successful crowdfunding campaign, we partnered closely with TNT express and Fedex to fulfill every order correctly and on time. As soon as your parcel will leave our warehouse, you will receive a tracking number. Shipping time is 4 days for Europe, US and Canada and one week to 10 days for the rest of the world.

If you are reading those line, it is certainly because you feel that there is something special with the iGUANEYE Jungle. We share the same vision that this new idea has to become a reality. We can see the future but we will have to work hard to deserve it. You are part of our family now. So whether or not you back this project, please help us to spread the word about the iGUANEYE Jungle. It is really simple. Just share this link ( https://igg.me/at/jungle ) on your social media. You can also share photos, videos or just talk with your friends and family about the project. That is the most valuable thing you can do to help us. THANK YOU !

 

/////////////////////////////////////
TEXTO EM PORTUGUÊS  /////////////////////////////////////


Descalço e confortável, por todo o lado!

Com os iGUANEYE Jungle...

  • os seus pés respiram de alívio dos sapatos fechados
  • os seus pés estão prontos para tudo, correr, saltar ou o que lhe apetecer
  • os seus pés estão protegidos para os caminhos mais difíceis


Com os iGUANEYE Jungle os seus pés estão protegidos da forma mais efetiva e minimal, é como uma segunda pele que segue todos os seus movimentos.

Uma peça de borracha tecnica Ultraflex, presa no dedo grande e no calcanhar, ampara uma sola espessa e ergonómica que, como por magia, NUNCA CAÍ!

Os Jungle, são os sapatos mais confortáveis de sempre! Experimente a sensação de andar descalço e seguro por todo o lado.


Disponível em 2 versões: os Jungle LUX e os Jungle Light

Duas versões intercambiável : os Jungle LUX e os Jungle LIGHT.

  • Versão Jungle LUX, uma experiencia de conforto incrível!
    Desenhadas para seguir os seus movimentos, a sola desta versão é feita de uma mistura de cortiça e látex. Flexível e moldável, adapta-se a forma singular do seu pé.
    Esta sola natural e de camada dupla, não só ampara o pé como, pelas características anti-bacterias da cortiça, absorve o suor, evita odores e garante toda a higiene e conforto.
    A sola da versão LUX é ainda coberta por uma camada de couro macio (a opção vegan também estará disponível) e a sola exterior em borracha garante a máxima resistência ao desgaste.
     
  • Na versão Jungle LIGHT a forma é a mesma mas o material passa a ser espuma EVA. Super leve e à prova de água este é um material macio e confortável que lhe permite andar mesmo na água ou à chuva.


Duas partes que se montam como um puzzle 3D

O sistema de encaixe tipo puzzle 3D, permite combinar e trocar versões da sola e cores,
podendo compor a sua versão personalizada dos Jungle. As duas partes adaptam-se muito facilmente e podem ser montadas e trocadas em segundos.
 

Inspirado nos Índios da Amazônia

Assim como o nosso primeiro modelo, os Freshoes, os Jungle são inspirados nos índios da Amazônia, que utilizavam a borracha liquida das árvores para proteger os seus pés. Reproduzimos esta experiencia histórica e natural e assim nasceram os iGUANEYE Freshoes.
 

O nosso primeiro modelo já é um successo

Desde a primeira campanha de crowdfunding bem sucedida vendemos já mais de 20.000 pares de Freshoes para todo o mundo.
De curiosos a fãs incondicionais, os nossos clientes transformam-se assim que experimentam o conforto único das iGUANEYE, vai ver que não vai querer voltar a calçar sandálias ou chinelos tradicionais.
 

100% made in Portugal (Porto)

Temos orgulho de dizer que produzimos localmente, mais precisamente na região norte de Portugal. Temos uma relação de proximidade e confiança com os nossos fornecedores e parceiros, somos como que uma pequena família comprometida em dar a melhor e mais qualificada resposta para este desafio global.
 

Onde estamos agora
Planeamento

Produzimos o nosso modelo 3D com o Rhinoceros 3D. Com a ajuda da INPACT, uma empresa de Leiria (Portugal) que trabalha com impressoras 3Dsystem SLS de ultima geração, imprimimos várias versões e protótipos. Selecionamos dois materiais para as impressões: Duraform Flex e Duraform TPU. Estes materiais flexíveis permitem produzir protótipos fiáveis e muitos próximos do resultado final. Depois da impressão de 3 protótipos, avançamos para o primeiro molde de injeção.

No decorrer da campanha, vamos trabalhar no aperfeiçoamento dos detalhes para que a solução final se ajuste na perfeição à experiencia pretendida.

Assim que atingirmos o objetivo da campanha, iremos arrancar com a produção dos moldes para um tamanho.
Fevereiro de 2018.

Após os testes e ajustes finais, lançaremos a produção de moldes para todos os tamanhos. Março 2018.

Finalmente, vamos produzir todos os pares dos Jungle, embalá-los e enviá-los para vocês. Abril/Maio 2018


Tamanhos, cores e envio

Assim que a campanha terminar, irá receber uma pesquisa para indicar o tamanho e cor pretenida.

Tamanhos:
O iGUANEYE Jungle adapta-se ao seu pé. A escolha do tamanho é facilitada, pois não há meias-medidas, basta escolher o tamanho que usa habitualmente e nada pode dar errado. Para evitar qualquer engano, verifique a tabela de equivalência de tamanhos e a ferramenta de validação de tamanho iGUANEYE.
Para tamanhos Japoneses, ingleses ou Americanos, consulte a tabela de equivalência de tamanho.


Cores:
Existe um cem número de possibilidades de cores e, ao longo da campanha, poderemos adicionar opções. Estas são as cores que já selecionamos:
Corpo principal : Black e Ash Grey
Versão LUX: Ash Grey e Red Earth (mais opções dependendo do financiamento)
Versão LIGHT: Black, White e Orange (mais opções dependendo do financiamento)

Tem alguma ideia de cor? Estamos abertos a sugestões! Se deseja os seus JUNGLE numa cor específica envie-nos um email e veremos se é possível adiciona-la às opções!

Envio:
Desde a nossa primeira campanha que mantemos uma relação estreita com a TNT Express e a Fedex, para cumprir entregas e prazo corretamente. Assim que a sua encomenda sair dos nossos armazéns você irá receber um número de rastreio para que possa seguir o caminho dos seus Jungle. O tempo médio de envio é de 4 dias para a Europa, EUA e Canadá e entre uma semana a 10 dias para o resto do mundo.


Como nos pode ajudar? Partilhe!

Se se revê nesta campanha ou sente algo de especial pelas iGUANEYE Jungle e quer ajudar-nos de alguma forma, mesmo se não contribuir ajude-nos a espalhar a palavra mostrando as iGUANEYE Jungle aos seus amigos e família!
É muito fácil. Basta partilhar o link https://igg.me/at/jungle nas suas redes sociais.
Também pode partilhar as nossas fotos, vídeos ou apenas contar a nossa história numa conversa com amigos. Esta ajuda será muito valiosa para nós, OBRIGADO !


Perguntas frequentes



/////////////////////////////////////
TEXTE EN FRANÇAIS  /////////////////////////////////////

 

Comfortablement, comme pieds nus, partout

Avec les iGUANEYE Jungle...

  • vos pieds respirent, libérés de l'étanchéité des chaussures fermées.
  • vos pieds sont maintenus, de sorte que vous pouvez courir, sauter et faire ce tout que vous voulez.
  • vos pieds sont protégés, donc vous pouvez vous déplacer sur des terrains accidentés.


La iGUANEYE Jungle est une protection ultra-minimale pour les pieds. C'est comme une seconde peau qui suit tous vos mouvements.
Un pièce d'élastomère Ultraflex s'enroule autour de votre gros orteil et de votre talon. Ce faisant, elle maintient une semelle épaisse et ergonomique sous vos pieds et comme par magie: ÇA TIENT !
La Jungle est la chaussure la plus confortable au monde ! Testez l'incroyable sensation de pouvoir évoluer confortablement, comme pieds nus, partout.

 

2 versions interchangeables : la Jungle LUX et la Jungle LIGHT

La Jungle LUX vous procurera l'expérience de confort parfaite. Elle a été conçu pour vous suivre dans toutes vos activités. Cette version unique est faite d'un mélange de liège et de latex. Flexible et adaptable, elle s'adapte à l'empreinte unique de vos pieds. Cette semelle naturelle ne fait pas qu'apporter un excellent maintien à vos pieds. Le liège qui est un matériau naturellement antibactérien, absorbe la transpiration et prévient les odeurs, assurant à la fois l'hygiène et confort. La semelle LUX est recouverte d'une croûte de cuir souple (une option Vegan sera également disponible). La partie extérieure de la semelle est en caoutchouc et offre une résistance maximale à l'abrasion.

La version Jungle LIGHT a exactement la même forme que la version LUX mais elle est en mousse EVA. Incroyablement légere et imperméable à l'eau, elle est également souple et très confortable. La version LIGHT a l'avantage de vous suivre même dans l'eau ou par temps pluvieux.

 

2 pièces qui s'assemblent comme un puzzle 3D

Le système puzzle 3D permet de mélanger et d'assortir le corps principal avec les types de semelles et les couleurs. Vous pourrez donc composer votre propre version. Les deux parties s'assemblent très facilement. Vous pouvez monter et démonter la Jungle en trois secondes.

 

Inspirées par les Indiens d'Amazonie

Comme notre premier modèle (les Freshoes), la Jungle est inspirée par les Indiens d'Amazonie qui trempaient leurs pieds dans le caoutchouc liquide des arbres pour les protéger.
Nous avons reproduit l'expérience et avons également trempé nos pieds dans du caoutchouc liquide. C'est ainsi que sont nés les iGUANEYE Freshoes.

 

Notre premier modèle, la Freshoes est un succès

Depuis notre première campagne de crowdfunding, nous avons vendu plus de 20.000 paires de Freshoes partout dans le monde ...
De curieux à aficionados, une fois que vous avez essayé le confort unique qu'apporte iGUANEYE, vous ne voudrez plus jamais revenir aux sandales conventionnelles ou aux tongues.

 

Fabrication 100% portugaise (Porto)

Nous sommes fiers de produire 100% de nos produits près de Porto dans le nord du Portugal. Nous avons des relations très fortes avec nos partenaires industriels. Nous formons une famille et ils s'engagent à fond pour produire les produits de la meilleure qualité.

 

État d'avancement. Calendrier

Nous avons produit notre modèle 3D dans Rhinoceros. Puis, avec l'aide de la société INPACT (Leiria, Portugal), nous avons imprimé plusieurs versions de notre design. INPACT fonctionne avec la dernière génération d'imprimante SLS 3DSystem. Nous avons sélectionné deux matériaux pour les impressions : le Duraform Flex et le Duraform TPU. Ces matériaux flexibles nous permettent de produire des prototypes qui imitent le produit final avec précision. Nous avons imprimé 3 prototypes avant de passer au premier moule d'injection.

Nous avons déjà produit 4 prototypes de moules d'injection et de compression nécessaires pour les deux versions de la Jungle. Un pour la semelle en caoutchouc de la version LUX, un pour la semelle complète LUX, un pour la mousse EVA de la version LIGHT et enfin un pour le corps extérieur qui est le même pour les deux versions de la jungle.

Pendant le déroulement de la campagne, nous continuons à travailler et à peaufiner les détails pour offrir à vos pieds le meilleur confort possible.
Dès que l'objectif de la campagne sera atteint, nous lancerons la fabrication d'un groupe de moules pour une taille unique. Février 2018.
Après les derniers tests et ajustements, nous lancerons la production des moules pour toutes les autres tailles. Mars 2018.
Ensuite, nous allons produire toutes les paires de Jungle, les emballer et vous les expédier. Avril/Mai 2018.

 

Tailles, couleurs et expédition

À la fin de la campagne, vous recevrez un formulaire en ligne qui vous invitera à choisir les tailles et les couleurs que vous souhaitez.

Taille:

La iGUANEYE Jungle s'adapte à vos pieds. Le choix de la taille est facileté car il n'y a pas de demi-pointures. Choisissez simplement votre taille habituelle, vous ne pouvez pas vous tromper.
Pour vous assurer de recevoir la taille qui vous convient le mieux, utilisez simplement la table d'équivalence de taille et l'outil de validation de taille iGUANEYE.
Pour les tailles japonaises, anglaises et américaines, vous devez vous référer au tableau d'équivalence des tailles.


Couleurs:

Il y a beaucoup de possibilités pour les couleurs et nous pourrons en ajouter pendant la campagne.
Voici les couleurs que nous avons déjà sélectionnées.
Corps principal: Noir et Gris Clair.
Version LUX de la semelle: Gris foncé et Terre rouge (plus de couleurs en fonction de la somme atteinte).
Version LIGHT de la semelle: Noir, Blanc et Orange Clair (plus de couleurs en fonction de la somme atteinte).
Vous avez une idée pour une couleur supplémentaire? Nous sommes ouverts à vos propositions. Si vous voulez désespérément voir la Jungle dans une couleur que vous aimez, envoyez-nous un email et nous verrons s'il est possible de l'ajouter (vous n'êtes peut-être pas le seul).

Livraison:

Depuis notre première campagne de financement, nous faisons appel à TNT express et Fedex pour livrer chaque commande correctement et dans les temps. Dès que votre colis quittera notre entrepôt, vous recevrez un numéro de suivi. Le délai de livraison est de 4 jours pour l'Europe, les États-Unis et le Canada et d'une semaine à 10 jours pour le reste du monde.

 

La meilleure façon d'aider: partager, partager, partager!

Si vous lisez ces lignes, c'est certainement parce que vous pensez que les iGUANEYE Jungle ont quelque chose de spécial. Nous partageons donc la même certitude que cette nouvelle idée se doit de devenir une réalité. Nous pouvons voir l'avenir mais nous devrons travailler dur pour le mériter. Vous faites un peu partie de notre famille maintenant. Donc, que vous commandiez ou non, aidez-nous à faire connaître les iGUANEYE Jungle. C'est simple. Il suffit de partagez ce lien ( https://igg.me/at/jungle ) sur vos réseaux sociaux. Vous pouvez également partager les photos, les vidéos ou juste parler du projet avec votre entourage. C'est la chose la plus précieuse que vous puissiez faire pour nous aider. MERCI !

 

Questions fréquemment posées

 

 

/////////////////////////////////////
TEXT AUF DEUTSCH
/////////////////////////////////////


Barfuss Komfort überall

Mit dem iGUANEYE Jungle...

  • können Ihre Füße atmen, befreit von der Enge geschlossener Schuhe.
  • werden Ihre Füße gehalten, damit sie laufen, springen und sich frei bewegen können.
  • sind Ihre Füße geschützt, damit sie auch schwieriges Gelände bewältigen können.

Der iGUANYE Jungle bietet mit ultra-minimalem Design, optimalen Schutz des Fußes. Er passt sich wie eine zweite Haut an und folgt all Ihren Bewegungen.

Ein Stück Ultraflex Elastomer hält nur die große Zehe und die Ferse des Fußes. Durch diesen Halt, wird die ergonomische Sohle fixiert und wie durch Magie: ES HÄLT ! 

Der Jungle ist der komfortabelste Schuh aller Zeiten! Testen Sie das unglaubliche Barfußgefühl.

 

2 austauschbare Varianten : der Jungle LUX und der Jungle LIGHT

Der Jungle LUX bietet das ultimative Komfort Erlebnis. Er wurde designt, um Sie bei all Ihren Aktivitäten zu begleiten. Die Sohlenvariante ist ein Mix aus Kork und Latex. Flexibel und formbar, passt er sich an Ihren Fußabdruck an. Diese natürliche Kombination von Materialien in der Sohle sorgt nicht nur für Halt, sondern bietet mit dem integrierten Kork ein antibakterielles Material, das Schweiß und Gerüche aufsaugt. Die LUX Sohle ist mit weichem Leder überzogen (eine vegane Variante wird auch angeboten werden). Der Kunststoff an der Unterseite der Sohle bietet maximalen Schutz vor Abreibung.

Der Jungle LIGHT hat die gleiche Form wie die LUX Version, wird aber aus EVA Schaum erzeugt. Unglaublich leicht und wasserfest, mit weicher und komfortabler Passform. Die LIGHT Variante bietet den Vorteil auch Wasser oder starkem Regen zu trotzen.

 

2 Teile, die wie ein 3D Puzzle zusammenpassen

Das 3D Puzzle System gibt Ihnen die Möglichkeit die zwei Hauptteile mit unterschiedlichen Sohlen und Farben zu kombinieren und individuell zu gestalten. Die zwei Teile fügen sich leicht ineinander und lassen sich in wenigen Sekunden austauschen.

 

Inspiriert von indigenen Völkern des Amazonas

Wie auch das erste Modell von iGUANEYE – den Freshoes – wurde der Jungle von Überlieferung von indigenen Völkern des Amazonas inspiriert. Diese haben ihre Füße in flüssigen Kautschuk getaucht, um sie zu schützen.

Wir haben versucht diese Erfahrung in Experimenten nachzustellen, und so wurden die iGUANEYE Freshoes geboren.

 

Unser erstes Modell – der Freshoes – ist ein voller Erfolg

Seit unserer ersten Crowdfunding Kampagne, haben wir mehr als 20.000 Paar Freshoes auf der ganzen Welt verkauft.

Ob neugierig, experimentierfreudig oder Hardcore-Fan – wenn sie den Komfort den iGUANEYE bietet, erlebt haben, möchten Sie nicht mehr auf konventionelle Sandalen oder Flip-Flops wechseln.

 

100% made in Porto, Portugal

Wir sind stolz darauf unser Produkt zu 100% in der Nähe von Porto, im wunderschönen Norden von Portugal, zu erzeugen. Unsere Geschäftspartner sehen wir wie Familie, gemeinsam sind wir bestrebt, das beste Produkt zu erzeugen.

 

Wo stehen wir jetzt. Planung

Wir haben bereits unser 3D Modell in Rhinoceros entworfen. Danach wurden mit Hilfe von INPACT (Leiria Portugal) mehrere Versionen unserer komplexen Prototypen produziert. INPACT arbeitet mit der neuesten Generation von 3D System SLS Druckern. Zwei Materialien wurden für die Prototypen gewählt: Duraform Flex und Duraform TPU. Diese flexiblen Materialien ermöglichen es uns mit Prototypen zu arbeiten, die das Endprodukt genau nachstellen. Es wurden drei Prototypen entwickelt, bevor wir die Spritzgussformen fertiggestellt haben.

Vier Spritzgussformen wurden bereits produziert, gemeinsam mit den zwei Formpressen für die unterschiedlichen Varianten des Jungle. Eine für die Kunststoff-Außensohle der LUX Version, eine für die komplette LUX Sohle, eine für die EVA Schaumsohle der LIGHT Version und schließlich eine Form für beide Außensohlen, die sowohl bei der LUX als auch bei der LIGHT Versionen zum Einsatz kommt.

Während die Kampagne läuft, arbeiten wir noch weiter an der Perfektion der Details, um Ihren Füßen die beste Passform zu bieten, die Sie je erlebt haben.

Sobald das Funding Ziel erreicht wird, werden wir an der Fertigstellung der Formen und dazugehörigen Größe für eines der Modelle arbeiten. Februar 2018.
Nach Abschlusstests und Anpassungen werden wir die Produktionsformen für alle anderen Größen fertig stellen. März 2018.
Danach gehen wir in den Produktionslauf der Jungle Paare, verpacken und versenden diese. April/Mai 2018.

 

Größen, Farben und Versand

Am Ende der Kampagne erhalten Sie Zugang zu einer Online-Umfrage, um Ihre Größe und Ihren Farbwunsch zu eruieren.

Größen:
Der iGUANYE Jungle passt sich an Ihre Füße an. Die Wahl der Größe ist vereinfacht, da wir nur mit ganzen Größen arbeiten. Wählen Sie Ihre gewohnte Größe, hier können Sie nicht falsch liegen.

Um sicherzugehen, können Sie auch die Größentabelle und das „iGUANEYE Size Validation Tool“ nutzen.

Für Japanische, Englische und Amerikanische Größen nutzen Sie die Größentabelle.


Farben:
Es gibt eine Vielzahl an Möglichkeiten und wir fügen im Laufe der Kampagne eventuell noch weitere hinzu. Hier sind die bereits gewählten Farben:

Hauptteil : Black und Light Grey.
LUX Version der Sohle : Ash Grey und Red Earth (mehr je nach Funding).
LIGHT Version der Sohle : Black, White und Light Orange (mehr je nach Funding).

Haben Sie eine Idee für weitere Farben? Wir sind für Vorschläge offen! Falls Sie einen besonderen Farbwunsch bzgl. des Jungles haben, schreiben Sie uns doch bitte ein Email und wir werden sehen, ob wir ihn erfüllen können (Sie sind eventuell mit Ihrem Farbwunsch nicht alleine ;-) )

Versand :
Seit unserer ersten, erfolgreichen Kampagne arbeiten wir eng mit TNT Express und Fedex zusammen, um alle Bestellungen korrekt und pünktlich zu liefern. Sobald Ihr Paket unser Lager verlässt, werden Sie eine Tracking Nummer erhalten. Versanddauer für Europa, USA und Kanada sind 4 Tage, für den Rest der Welt sind es 10 Tage.

 

Wie können Sie helfen: teilen, teilen, teilen !

Wenn Sie diese Zeilen lesen, dann bestimmt, weil Sie auch denken, dass der iGUANEYE Jungle ein einzigartiges Produkt ist. Wir teilen die gleiche Vision: Eine neue Idee soll Realität werden! Die Zukunft ist zum Greifen nahe, aber es gibt noch viel zu tun.

Somit sind Sie Teil unserer Familie. Egal ob Sie das Projekt jetzt bereits unterstützen oder nicht, bitte helfen Sie uns den iGUANEYE Jungle mit der Welt zu teilen. Es ist sehr einfach. Teilen Sie diesen Link ( https://igg.me/at/jungle ) mittels Social Media. Sie können auch Fotos oder Videos sharen oder mit Freunden und Familie über das Projekt sprechen. Das ist der wertvollste Beitrag zum Projekt! VIELEN DANK !

 

Häufige Fragen
