⇓⇓⇓
 
"The breathability of sandals, but the foot-hugging security of a sneaker...footwear to their purest form"(Sneaker Freaker)"Step into the future" (Mashable)

 
With the iGUANEYE Jungle......your feet breathe, freed from the tightness of closed shoes.
...your feet are held, so you can run, jump and do whatever you want.
...your feet are protected, so you can move on rough grounds.The iGUANEYE Jungle provides ultra-minimal foot protection. It acts like a second skin and follows all your movements.A piece of Ultraflex elastomer only wraps around your big toe and your heel. By doing so, it secures a thick ergonomic sole under your feet and just like magic : IT HOLDS !The Jungle is the most comfortable shoes ever ! Test the amazing feeling of barefoot comfort everywhere.
The Jungle LUX will provide you the ultimate comfort experience. It has been designed to follow you in all your activities. This sole version is made from a mixture of cork and latex. Flexible and adaptable it can adjust to your unique foot impression. This natural dual layer sole not only supports, but cork is a naturally antibacterial material, which absorbs sweat and prevents odors, ensuring both hygiene and comfort. The LUX sole is covered with a soft leather hide (a Vegan option will also be available). A rubber out-sole provides maximum resistance to abrasion.
The Jungle LIGHT version has exactly the same shape than the LUX version but it is made of EVA foam. Incredibly light and water-proof, it is also soft and super comfortable. The LIGHT version has the advantage to follow you even in water or when weather is rainy.
    
The 3D puzzle system allows to mix and match main body with sole types and colors. So you will be able to compose your own version. The two parts secure easily together. You can mount and dismount in seconds.
Like our first model (the Freshoes), the Jungle is inspired by the Amazonian Indians that used to dip their feet in liquid rubber from trees to protect them.
We have reproduced the experience and also dipped our feet in liquid rubber. That is how the iGUANEYE Freshoes were born.

Since our first crowdfunding campaign, we have sold more than 20.000 pairs of Freshoes all over the world...From curious to customer to addict, once you have tried the unique comfort that iGUANEYE brings you will never want to go back to conventional sandals or flip-flops.
 


We are proud to produce 100% of our product near Porto in the beautiful north of Portugal. We have very strong relations with our industrial partners. They are family and they are committed to producing the best quality product as much as we are.We have produced our 3D model in Rhinoceros 3D. Then with the help of INPACT (Leiria Portugal), we have printed several versions of our intricated design. INPACT works with the last generation of the 3DSystem SLS printer. We have selected two materials for the prints : Duraform Flex and Duraform TPU. Those flexible materials allow us to produce a prototype that mimic the final product accurately. We have printed 3 prototypes before we moved on to the first injection mold.We have already produced 4 prototype injection and compression molds needed for the two versions of the Jungle. One for the rubber outsole of the LUX version, one for the complete LUX sole, one for the EVA foam for LIGHT version of the sole and finally one for the outer body that is the same part for both versions of the Jungle.While the campaign is running we are still working and fine-tuning details to offer your feet the best fit they have ever experienced.As soon as the goal of the campaign is achieved, we will launch the tooling of one group of molds for one size. February 2018.After final testing and adjustments we will launch production of molds for all other sizes. March 2018.Then we will produce all the Jungle pairs, pack them and ship them to you. April/May 2018.
 
At the end of the campaign, you will receive an online survey that will invite you to choose sizes and colors.Sizing : The iGUANEYE Jungle adapts to your feet. The choice of the size is made easy as there are no half-sizes. Just pick your usual size, you can’t go wrong.To make sure that you receive the size that fits you the best, simply use the size equivalence table, and the iGUANEYE size validation tool.For Japanese, English and American sizes, you must refer to the size equivalence table.Colors :  Here are the colors option you will be able to choose from.-Main body : Black and Light Grey-Light sole : Orange, Black, Light Blue and White-Lux sole : Ash Grey, Turquoise, Black, Amber OrangeMain body is of course compatible with both version of the sole Light and Lux.
Have an idea for an additional color?  We are open to your feedback!If you desperately want to see the Jungle in a color you love drop us an email and we will see if it is possible to add it (you may not be the only one ; )Shipping : Since our first successful crowdfunding campaign, we partnered closely with TNT express and Fedex to fulfill every order correctly and on time. As soon as your parcel will leave our warehouse, you will receive a tracking number. Shipping time is 4 days for Europe, US and Canada and one week to 10 days for the rest of the world.

If you are reading those line, it is certainly because you feel that there is something special with the iGUANEYE Jungle. We share the same vision that this new idea has to become a reality. We can see the future but we will have to work hard to deserve it. You are part of our family now. So whether or not you back this project, please help us to spread the word about the iGUANEYE Jungle. It is really simple. Just share this link ( https://igg.me/at/jungle ) on your social media. You can also share photos, videos or just talk with your friends and family about the project. That is the most valuable thing you can do to help us. THANK YOU !

 
/////////////////////////////////////TEXTO EM PORTUGUÊS  /////////////////////////////////////


Descalço e confortável, por todo o lado!

Com os iGUANEYE Jungle...

os seus pés respiram de alívio dos sapatos fechados
os seus pés estão prontos para tudo, correr, saltar ou o que lhe apetecer
os seus pés estão protegidos para os caminhos mais difíceis

Com os iGUANEYE Jungle os seus pés estão protegidos da forma mais efetiva e minimal, é como uma segunda pele que segue todos os seus movimentos.
Uma peça de borracha tecnica Ultraflex, presa no dedo grande e no calcanhar, ampara uma sola espessa e ergonómica que, como por magia, NUNCA CAÍ!
Os Jungle, são os sapatos mais confortáveis de sempre! Experimente a sensação de andar descalço e seguro por todo o lado.

Disponível em 2 versões: os Jungle LUX e os Jungle Light
Duas versões intercambiável : os Jungle LUX e os Jungle LIGHT.

Versão Jungle LUX, uma experiencia de conforto incrível!Desenhadas para seguir os seus movimentos, a sola desta versão é feita de uma mistura de cortiça e látex. Flexível e moldável, adapta-se a forma singular do seu pé.Esta sola natural e de camada dupla, não só ampara o pé como, pelas características anti-bacterias da cortiça, absorve o suor, evita odores e garante toda a higiene e conforto.A sola da versão LUX é ainda coberta por uma camada de couro macio (a opção vegan também estará disponível) e a sola exterior em borracha garante a máxima resistência ao desgaste. 
Na versão Jungle LIGHT a forma é a mesma mas o material passa a ser espuma EVA. Super leve e à prova de água este é um material macio e confortável que lhe permite andar mesmo na água ou à chuva.


Duas partes que se montam como um puzzle 3D
O sistema de encaixe tipo puzzle 3D, permite combinar e trocar versões da sola e cores,podendo compor a sua versão personalizada dos Jungle. As duas partes adaptam-se muito facilmente e podem ser montadas e trocadas em segundos. 
Inspirado nos Índios da Amazônia
Assim como o nosso primeiro modelo, os Freshoes, os Jungle são inspirados nos índios da Amazônia, que utilizavam a borracha liquida das árvores para proteger os seus pés. Reproduzimos esta experiencia histórica e natural e assim nasceram os iGUANEYE Freshoes. 
O nosso primeiro modelo já é um successo
Desde a primeira campanha de crowdfunding bem sucedida vendemos já mais de 20.000 pares de Freshoes para todo o mundo.De curiosos a fãs incondicionais, os nossos clientes transformam-se assim que experimentam o conforto único das iGUANEYE, vai ver que não vai querer voltar a calçar sandálias ou chinelos tradicionais. 
100% made in Portugal (Porto)
Temos orgulho de dizer que produzimos localmente, mais precisamente na região norte de Portugal. Temos uma relação de proximidade e confiança com os nossos fornecedores e parceiros, somos como que uma pequena família comprometida em dar a melhor e mais qualificada resposta para este desafio global. 

Onde estamos agoraPlaneamento
Produzimos o nosso modelo 3D com o Rhinoceros 3D. Com a ajuda da INPACT, uma empresa de Leiria (Portugal) que trabalha com impressoras 3Dsystem SLS de ultima geração, imprimimos várias versões e protótipos. Selecionamos dois materiais para as impressões: Duraform Flex e Duraform TPU. Estes materiais flexíveis permitem produzir protótipos fiáveis e muitos próximos do resultado final. Depois da impressão de 3 protótipos, avançamos para o primeiro molde de injeção.
No decorrer da campanha, vamos trabalhar no aperfeiçoamento dos detalhes para que a solução final se ajuste na perfeição à experiencia pretendida.
Assim que atingirmos o objetivo da campanha, iremos arrancar com a produção dos moldes para um tamanho.Fevereiro de 2018.
Após os testes e ajustes finais, lançaremos a produção de moldes para todos os tamanhos. Março 2018.
Finalmente, vamos produzir todos os pares dos Jungle, embalá-los e enviá-los para vocês. Abril/Maio 2018

Tamanhos, cores e envio
Assim que a campanha terminar, irá receber uma pesquisa para indicar o tamanho e cor pretenida.
Tamanhos:O iGUANEYE Jungle adapta-se ao seu pé. A escolha do tamanho é facilitada, pois não há meias-medidas, basta escolher o tamanho que usa habitualmente e nada pode dar errado. Para evitar qualquer engano, verifique a tabela de equivalência de tamanhos e a ferramenta de validação de tamanho iGUANEYE.Para tamanhos Japoneses, ingleses ou Americanos, consulte a tabela de equivalência de tamanho.
Cores:Existe um cem número de possibilidades de cores e, ao longo da campanha, poderemos adicionar opções. Estas são as cores que já selecionamos:Corpo principal : Black e Ash GreyVersão LUX: Ash Grey e Red Earth (mais opções dependendo do financiamento)Versão LIGHT: Black, White e Orange (mais opções dependendo do financiamento)
Tem alguma ideia de cor? Estamos abertos a sugestões! Se deseja os seus JUNGLE numa cor específica envie-nos um email e veremos se é possível adiciona-la às opções!
Envio:Desde a nossa primeira campanha que mantemos uma relação estreita com a TNT Express e a Fedex, para cumprir entregas e prazo corretamente. Assim que a sua encomenda sair dos nossos armazéns você irá receber um número de rastreio para que possa seguir o caminho dos seus Jungle. O tempo médio de envio é de 4 dias para a Europa, EUA e Canadá e entre uma semana a 10 dias para o resto do mundo.

Como nos pode ajudar? Partilhe!
Se se revê nesta campanha ou sente algo de especial pelas iGUANEYE Jungle e quer ajudar-nos de alguma forma, mesmo se não contribuir ajude-nos a espalhar a palavra mostrando as iGUANEYE Jungle aos seus amigos e família!É muito fácil. Basta partilhar o link https://igg.me/at/jungle nas suas redes sociais.Também pode partilhar as nossas fotos, vídeos ou apenas contar a nossa história numa conversa com amigos. Esta ajuda será muito valiosa para nós, OBRIGADO !

Perguntas frequentes

/////////////////////////////////////TEXTE EN FRANÇAIS  /////////////////////////////////////
 Comfortablement, comme pieds nus, partout
Avec les iGUANEYE Jungle...

vos pieds respirent, libérés de l'étanchéité des chaussures fermées.
vos pieds sont maintenus, de sorte que vous pouvez courir, sauter et faire ce tout que vous voulez.
vos pieds sont protégés, donc vous pouvez vous déplacer sur des terrains accidentés.

La iGUANEYE Jungle est une protection ultra-minimale pour les pieds. C'est comme une seconde peau qui suit tous vos mouvements.Un pièce d'élastomère Ultraflex s'enroule autour de votre gros orteil et de votre talon. Ce faisant, elle maintient une semelle épaisse et ergonomique sous vos pieds et comme par magie: ÇA TIENT !La Jungle est la chaussure la plus confortable au monde ! Testez l'incroyable sensation de pouvoir évoluer confortablement, comme pieds nus, partout.
 
2 versions interchangeables : la Jungle LUX et la Jungle LIGHT
La Jungle LUX vous procurera l'expérience de confort parfaite. Elle a été conçu pour vous suivre dans toutes vos activités. Cette version unique est faite d'un mélange de liège et de latex. Flexible et adaptable, elle s'adapte à l'empreinte unique de vos pieds. Cette semelle naturelle ne fait pas qu'apporter un excellent maintien à vos pieds. Le liège qui est un matériau naturellement antibactérien, absorbe la transpiration et prévient les odeurs, assurant à la fois l'hygiène et confort. La semelle LUX est recouverte d'une croûte de cuir souple (une option Vegan sera également disponible). La partie extérieure de la semelle est en caoutchouc et offre une résistance maximale à l'abrasion.La version Jungle LIGHT a exactement la même forme que la version LUX mais elle est en mousse EVA. Incroyablement légere et imperméable à l'eau, elle est également souple et très confortable. La version LIGHT a l'avantage de vous suivre même dans l'eau ou par temps pluvieux.
 
2 pièces qui s'assemblent comme un puzzle 3D
Le système puzzle 3D permet de mélanger et d'assortir le corps principal avec les types de semelles et les couleurs. Vous pourrez donc composer votre propre version. Les deux parties s'assemblent très facilement. Vous pouvez monter et démonter la Jungle en trois secondes.
 
Inspirées par les Indiens d'Amazonie
Comme notre premier modèle (les Freshoes), la Jungle est inspirée par les Indiens d'Amazonie qui trempaient leurs pieds dans le caoutchouc liquide des arbres pour les protéger.Nous avons reproduit l'expérience et avons également trempé nos pieds dans du caoutchouc liquide. C'est ainsi que sont nés les iGUANEYE Freshoes.
 
Notre premier modèle, la Freshoes est un succès
Depuis notre première campagne de crowdfunding, nous avons vendu plus de 20.000 paires de Freshoes partout dans le monde ...De curieux à aficionados, une fois que vous avez essayé le confort unique qu'apporte iGUANEYE, vous ne voudrez plus jamais revenir aux sandales conventionnelles ou aux tongues.
 
Fabrication 100% portugaise (Porto)
Nous sommes fiers de produire 100% de nos produits près de Porto dans le nord du Portugal. Nous avons des relations très fortes avec nos partenaires industriels. Nous formons une famille et ils s'engagent à fond pour produire les produits de la meilleure qualité.
 
État d'avancement. Calendrier
Nous avons produit notre modèle 3D dans Rhinoceros. Puis, avec l'aide de la société INPACT (Leiria, Portugal), nous avons imprimé plusieurs versions de notre design. INPACT fonctionne avec la dernière génération d'imprimante SLS 3DSystem. Nous avons sélectionné deux matériaux pour les impressions : le Duraform Flex et le Duraform TPU. Ces matériaux flexibles nous permettent de produire des prototypes qui imitent le produit final avec précision. Nous avons imprimé 3 prototypes avant de passer au premier moule d'injection.Nous avons déjà produit 4 prototypes de moules d'injection et de compression nécessaires pour les deux versions de la Jungle. Un pour la semelle en caoutchouc de la version LUX, un pour la semelle complète LUX, un pour la mousse EVA de la version LIGHT et enfin un pour le corps extérieur qui est le même pour les deux versions de la jungle.Pendant le déroulement de la campagne, nous continuons à travailler et à peaufiner les détails pour offrir à vos pieds le meilleur confort possible.Dès que l'objectif de la campagne sera atteint, nous lancerons la fabrication d'un groupe de moules pour une taille unique. Février 2018.Après les derniers tests et ajustements, nous lancerons la production des moules pour toutes les autres tailles. Mars 2018.Ensuite, nous allons produire toutes les paires de Jungle, les emballer et vous les expédier. Avril/Mai 2018.
 
Tailles, couleurs et expédition
À la fin de la campagne, vous recevrez un formulaire en ligne qui vous invitera à choisir les tailles et les couleurs que vous souhaitez.Taille:
La iGUANEYE Jungle s'adapte à vos pieds. Le choix de la taille est facileté car il n'y a pas de demi-pointures. Choisissez simplement votre taille habituelle, vous ne pouvez pas vous tromper.Pour vous assurer de recevoir la taille qui vous convient le mieux, utilisez simplement la table d'équivalence de taille et l'outil de validation de taille iGUANEYE.Pour les tailles japonaises, anglaises et américaines, vous devez vous référer au tableau d'équivalence des tailles.

Couleurs:
Il y a beaucoup de possibilités pour les couleurs et nous pourrons en ajouter pendant la campagne.Voici les couleurs que nous avons déjà sélectionnées.Corps principal: Noir et Gris Clair.Version LUX de la semelle: Gris foncé et Terre rouge (plus de couleurs en fonction de la somme atteinte).Version LIGHT de la semelle: Noir, Blanc et Orange Clair (plus de couleurs en fonction de la somme atteinte).Vous avez une idée pour une couleur supplémentaire? Nous sommes ouverts à vos propositions. Si vous voulez désespérément voir la Jungle dans une couleur que vous aimez, envoyez-nous un email et nous verrons s'il est possible de l'ajouter (vous n'êtes peut-être pas le seul).Livraison:
Depuis notre première campagne de financement, nous faisons appel à TNT express et Fedex pour livrer chaque commande correctement et dans les temps. Dès que votre colis quittera notre entrepôt, vous recevrez un numéro de suivi. Le délai de livraison est de 4 jours pour l'Europe, les États-Unis et le Canada et d'une semaine à 10 jours pour le reste du monde.
 
La meilleure façon d'aider: partager, partager, partager!
Si vous lisez ces lignes, c'est certainement parce que vous pensez que les iGUANEYE Jungle ont quelque chose de spécial. Nous partageons donc la même certitude que cette nouvelle idée se doit de devenir une réalité. Nous pouvons voir l'avenir mais nous devrons travailler dur pour le mériter. Vous faites un peu partie de notre famille maintenant. Donc, que vous commandiez ou non, aidez-nous à faire connaître les iGUANEYE Jungle. C'est simple. Il suffit de partagez ce lien ( https://igg.me/at/jungle ) sur vos réseaux sociaux. Vous pouvez également partager les photos, les vidéos ou juste parler du projet avec votre entourage. C'est la chose la plus précieuse que vous puissiez faire pour nous aider. MERCI !
 
Questions fréquemment posées
 
 
/////////////////////////////////////TEXT AUF DEUTSCH/////////////////////////////////////

Barfuss Komfort überall
Mit dem iGUANEYE Jungle...

können Ihre Füße atmen, befreit von der Enge geschlossener Schuhe.
werden Ihre Füße gehalten, damit sie laufen, springen und sich frei bewegen können.
sind Ihre Füße geschützt, damit sie auch schwieriges Gelände bewältigen können.

Der iGUANYE Jungle bietet mit ultra-minimalem Design, optimalen Schutz des Fußes. Er passt sich wie eine zweite Haut an und folgt all Ihren Bewegungen.
Ein Stück Ultraflex Elastomer hält nur die große Zehe und die Ferse des Fußes. Durch diesen Halt, wird die ergonomische Sohle fixiert und wie durch Magie: ES HÄLT ! Der Jungle ist der komfortabelste Schuh aller Zeiten! Testen Sie das unglaubliche Barfußgefühl.
 
2 austauschbare Varianten : der Jungle LUX und der Jungle LIGHT
Der Jungle LUX bietet das ultimative Komfort Erlebnis. Er wurde designt, um Sie bei all Ihren Aktivitäten zu begleiten. Die Sohlenvariante ist ein Mix aus Kork und Latex. Flexibel und formbar, passt er sich an Ihren Fußabdruck an. Diese natürliche Kombination von Materialien in der Sohle sorgt nicht nur für Halt, sondern bietet mit dem integrierten Kork ein antibakterielles Material, das Schweiß und Gerüche aufsaugt. Die LUX Sohle ist mit weichem Leder überzogen (eine vegane Variante wird auch angeboten werden). Der Kunststoff an der Unterseite der Sohle bietet maximalen Schutz vor Abreibung.
Der Jungle LIGHT hat die gleiche Form wie die LUX Version, wird aber aus EVA Schaum erzeugt. Unglaublich leicht und wasserfest, mit weicher und komfortabler Passform. Die LIGHT Variante bietet den Vorteil auch Wasser oder starkem Regen zu trotzen.
 
2 Teile, die wie ein 3D Puzzle zusammenpassen
Das 3D Puzzle System gibt Ihnen die Möglichkeit die zwei Hauptteile mit unterschiedlichen Sohlen und Farben zu kombinieren und individuell zu gestalten. Die zwei Teile fügen sich leicht ineinander und lassen sich in wenigen Sekunden austauschen.
 
Inspiriert von indigenen Völkern des Amazonas
Wie auch das erste Modell von iGUANEYE – den Freshoes – wurde der Jungle von Überlieferung von indigenen Völkern des Amazonas inspiriert. Diese haben ihre Füße in flüssigen Kautschuk getaucht, um sie zu schützen.
Wir haben versucht diese Erfahrung in Experimenten nachzustellen, und so wurden die iGUANEYE Freshoes geboren.
 
Unser erstes Modell – der Freshoes – ist ein voller Erfolg
Seit unserer ersten Crowdfunding Kampagne, haben wir mehr als 20.000 Paar Freshoes auf der ganzen Welt verkauft.
Ob neugierig, experimentierfreudig oder Hardcore-Fan – wenn sie den Komfort den iGUANEYE bietet, erlebt haben, möchten Sie nicht mehr auf konventionelle Sandalen oder Flip-Flops wechseln.
 
100% made in Porto, Portugal
Wir sind stolz darauf unser Produkt zu 100% in der Nähe von Porto, im wunderschönen Norden von Portugal, zu erzeugen. Unsere Geschäftspartner sehen wir wie Familie, gemeinsam sind wir bestrebt, das beste Produkt zu erzeugen.
 
Wo stehen wir jetzt. Planung
Wir haben bereits unser 3D Modell in Rhinoceros entworfen. Danach wurden mit Hilfe von INPACT (Leiria Portugal) mehrere Versionen unserer komplexen Prototypen produziert. INPACT arbeitet mit der neuesten Generation von 3D System SLS Druckern. Zwei Materialien wurden für die Prototypen gewählt: Duraform Flex und Duraform TPU. Diese flexiblen Materialien ermöglichen es uns mit Prototypen zu arbeiten, die das Endprodukt genau nachstellen. Es wurden drei Prototypen entwickelt, bevor wir die Spritzgussformen fertiggestellt haben.
Vier Spritzgussformen wurden bereits produziert, gemeinsam mit den zwei Formpressen für die unterschiedlichen Varianten des Jungle. Eine für die Kunststoff-Außensohle der LUX Version, eine für die komplette LUX Sohle, eine für die EVA Schaumsohle der LIGHT Version und schließlich eine Form für beide Außensohlen, die sowohl bei der LUX als auch bei der LIGHT Versionen zum Einsatz kommt.
Während die Kampagne läuft, arbeiten wir noch weiter an der Perfektion der Details, um Ihren Füßen die beste Passform zu bieten, die Sie je erlebt haben.
Sobald das Funding Ziel erreicht wird, werden wir an der Fertigstellung der Formen und dazugehörigen Größe für eines der Modelle arbeiten. Februar 2018.Nach Abschlusstests und Anpassungen werden wir die Produktionsformen für alle anderen Größen fertig stellen. März 2018.Danach gehen wir in den Produktionslauf der Jungle Paare, verpacken und versenden diese. April/Mai 2018.
 
Größen, Farben und Versand
Am Ende der Kampagne erhalten Sie Zugang zu einer Online-Umfrage, um Ihre Größe und Ihren Farbwunsch zu eruieren.
Größen:Der iGUANYE Jungle passt sich an Ihre Füße an. Die Wahl der Größe ist vereinfacht, da wir nur mit ganzen Größen arbeiten. Wählen Sie Ihre gewohnte Größe, hier können Sie nicht falsch liegen.
Um sicherzugehen, können Sie auch die Größentabelle und das „iGUANEYE Size Validation Tool“ nutzen.
Für Japanische, Englische und Amerikanische Größen nutzen Sie die Größentabelle.
Farben:Es gibt eine Vielzahl an Möglichkeiten und wir fügen im Laufe der Kampagne eventuell noch weitere hinzu. Hier sind die bereits gewählten Farben:
Hauptteil : Black und Light Grey.LUX Version der Sohle : Ash Grey und Red Earth (mehr je nach Funding).LIGHT Version der Sohle : Black, White und Light Orange (mehr je nach Funding).
Haben Sie eine Idee für weitere Farben? Wir sind für Vorschläge offen! Falls Sie einen besonderen Farbwunsch bzgl. des Jungles haben, schreiben Sie uns doch bitte ein Email und wir werden sehen, ob wir ihn erfüllen können (Sie sind eventuell mit Ihrem Farbwunsch nicht alleine ;-) )
Versand :Seit unserer ersten, erfolgreichen Kampagne arbeiten wir eng mit TNT Express und Fedex zusammen, um alle Bestellungen korrekt und pünktlich zu liefern. Sobald Ihr Paket unser Lager verlässt, werden Sie eine Tracking Nummer erhalten. Versanddauer für Europa, USA und Kanada sind 4 Tage, für den Rest der Welt sind es 10 Tage.
 
Wie können Sie helfen: teilen, teilen, teilen !
Wenn Sie diese Zeilen lesen, dann bestimmt, weil Sie auch denken, dass der iGUANEYE Jungle ein einzigartiges Produkt ist. Wir teilen die gleiche Vision: Eine neue Idee soll Realität werden! Die Zukunft ist zum Greifen nahe, aber es gibt noch viel zu tun.
Somit sind Sie Teil unserer Familie. Egal ob Sie das Projekt jetzt bereits unterstützen oder nicht, bitte helfen Sie uns den iGUANEYE Jungle mit der Welt zu teilen. Es ist sehr einfach. Teilen Sie diesen Link ( https://igg.me/at/jungle ) mittels Social Media. Sie können auch Fotos oder Videos sharen oder mit Freunden und Familie über das Projekt sprechen. Das ist der wertvollste Beitrag zum Projekt! VIELEN DANK !
 
Häufige Fragen

story:
Cook with wood

The Cook-a-burra Camp is a portable aluminum stove fueled by nature! The Cook-a-burra won't get your cookware covered in soot, use it like a regular stove top, roast a potato or toast a marshmallow. Or simply use it as a really, REALLY good heater!

Light it up

Simply snap your sticks to size and light 'em up. Now you can enjoy a wood fire without having to carry an axe or saw. Don't chop down a forest, just gather the sticks on the ground.

Cook it like it's hot!

Our design is efficient and burns wood completely right down to a fine ash. The unique internal design has been tested, modified, tested and modified over again to get the most heat. It's so efficient that once the fire is established there is no smoke!

It's easy to clean

Let it cool down and shake out the ash. Really, that's it!

Stow it

Fold in the legs and close the lid for storage. Any left over ash wont fall out in transit. You can also store your firelighters and matches in the stove.

Risks & Challenges

We have already paid for factory tooling and now just need to place the order! Every project has risks and we have set in place our manufacturing and shipping partners. We will do everything possible to minimise delays

story:
Neckpacker™ is a unique travel jacket and vest with a patented hood system that makes resting and sleeping on-the-go easier and more comfortable than any travel pillow before.

 

 

Groundbreaking sleeping comfort

Most importantly though, we've incorporated something completely new and unique: a patented hood system with a built-in inflatable pillow. Our patented hood system cradles your neck when you’re on-the-go. Whether you’re just resting or full-on sleeping upright, you’ll stay comfy and relaxed. Neckpacker is far more comfortable for sleeping, than any other previous travel-pillow or neck support system before.
 

Created by real travel-aficionados

We developed the Neckpacker hood system for ourselves and for our fellow tourists. We all travel often. We all wanted our travel items within easy reach plus we all wanted to be able to relax, rest, and sleep upright comfortably on planes, trains, cars whenever we were ready.

This photo shows the Neckpacker hood with its outer cover unfastened, demonstrating the inner components and structure.

Supreme comfort

According to studies, the patented Neckpacker pillow + its support-strap system is a huge leap compared with traditional travel pillows. It fully eliminates stress on the cervical spine and relieves tensions of the shoulder- and neck-area muscles. It is so efficient in supporting and relaxing the cervical area, that it has been successfully tested also for neck-area rehabilitation for strapped neck muscles.

 

 

Neckpacker™ jackets and vests were developed by travelers for travelers, so you can sleep comfortably while sitting upright on a plane, a train, a bus, on in a car, or at an airport, or whenever you just want to grab a quiet moment of total relaxation.

 

 

Design & quality

Many of the best Scandinavian fashion and sportswear designers have contributed their ideas and vision to the design of our Neckpacker garments.

Neckpacker™ jackets and vests are unisex with a dash of sports styling that is perfect for all your everyday occasions. The fabrics are comfortable, soft, lightweight and breathable. The fit is relaxed and lets you move freely and feel cosy and comfy whether you’re moving or resting.

We select all our fabrics with extreme care. They are light and durable, water repellent, yet breathable. These are the same well-tested fabrics that are used by well-known European manufacturers for their most advanced sports clothing. 

 

Years of development

We at Neckpacker™ started our quest for relaxation perfection 5 years ago, long before the first travel jackets found their way to the market.

Neckpacker jackets and vests are the culmination of years of development and testing. We patented our innovative solution and now it’s ready for you.

Our Neckpacker integrated pillow is really easy to use. Simply raise the hood over your head as usual, then squeeze a pump that’s located in the left chest pocket. Squeeze it through the canvas, no need to open the pocket. This inflates the air-cushion located around your neck, cheeks and the back of your head. Two lateral straps on both sides of the hood stabilize your head vertically and wrap around the air-cushion system. Your head and neck will feel incredibly stable and comfortable and you’ll be ready for a great rest.

Neckpacker™ system is simple and easy to use and to maintain. Before machine washing, simply detach and remove the air-cushion and pump from your jacket or vest. Velcro® fasteners make it fast.

Tech Specs

 

 

Informing us for your size:

After the campaign is concluded, we will email you a survey where you can select your size(s) and provide us with your address, so we know what to send you and where to send it.

Sizing:
Both jacket and vest are unisex. To confirm the size that fits you best, take one of your own jackets that fits you well and lay it on a flat surface. Take a measuring tape and compare the dimensions with those in the size chart below.

 

Materials:

Main material: 100% polyester

Effect material: 100% polyamide 

Lining mesh: 100% polyamide

Hood lining: 92% CO, 8% EA

 

You have the chance to be one of the first to select and order your Neckpacker, getting it with a price that will be available only for this campaign.

Choose your product from the pledges offered, but be fast, the best Early-Birds are bound to take off fast!

“I travel a lot due to my work, mainly long intercontinental flights. Since I’m a light sleeper, falling asleep on the plane has always been an almost impossible task for me.

“I was given the opportunity to test the Nekpacker jacket with its integrated pillow system. After the first flight I was quickly and positively surprised. Even on narrow second-class seats, I slept so well!

“It is amazing how the Neckpacker hood supports my head as if my cheeks are resting on soft pillows placed on both sides of my head. All the while, my neck and head feel amazingly light and relaxed. That lateral strap support system really works.

“I’d say that from now on my Neckpacker jacket will definitely be as integral to my travels as my passport!”

Ville Koivisto, producer

 

Bit of History

The story told by Niklas Kuusela, inventor of the Neckpacker concept

“After the Easter holiday of 2012 my friends and I were driving back home from the Finnish Lapland where we had been snowboarding and partying for several days. The road trip was long and tiring. Although I was tired after all our activities, I just couldn’t fall asleep. My head was bouncing from one side to the other, against the car window and back to the other side. I borrowed an inflatable neck pillow from one of my friends. That was a little bit better but I was still too uncomfortable to sleep. I couldn’t completely rest my head sideways with the poor lateral support and when my head was tilting forward, the pillow offered almost no support at all. I tried turning the pillow around backwards, but then with the pressure on my throat I felt I was choking.

“In those desperate, tired hours I started to wonder if there could be more innovative way of handling the situation. I Imagined an inflatable pillow which could wrap around the front, sides, and back of my head, somewhat like a helmet. To inflate the borrowed pillow, I had to huff and puff, then keep the air in while closing the plug when blowing air from my mouth. It was just too messy and annoying. I began to imagine a pump to inflate my ideal pillow.

“After being awake some twelve hours in a car, I finally arrived home and managed to get a good long sleep. I woke up well rested but my idea of the ideal travel pillow still kept buzzing in my head.

“Eventually I sat down and started sketching my idea. I got carried away and spent almost another sleepless night, this time with great spirit and energy. The next day I called a friend who is a designer and knows about materials and production. We sat down and I showed her my concept. She immediately understood my idea and got enthusiastic about its innovation. She helped me with more technical sketches and put me in contact with people who helped me to build the first prototypes.

“Once I started testing mock-ups, I immediately realized that the air cushion system was really comfortable. It was something totally new and different but it lacked something. Although it was super comfortable, it didn’t offer enough vertical and lateral support.

“Thinking about how to create this needed support, I eventually came up with the idea of a hood-type cushion with diagonal straps on both sides. At that point I needed some way for the straps to attach to the shoulders. That’s the moment the idea of a vest with an integrated inflatable hood was born! 

"Moving forward I realized that the vest could also serve as a handy garment for storing all the small items that we all usually carry with us when we travel like tickets, passport, and phone.

“Since my idea was getting more serious and complex, I asked my best friend, who had a good touch for marketing and commercial issues, if he wanted to join the team. He carefully evaluated the concept and the prototypes. He quickly agreed that I was creating something big and he eagerly jumped on board.

“We worked on more prototypes, each working better than the one before. When we felt we had the right prototype we presented it to TEKES, which is a governmental innovation fund for start-up innovations that have global market potential. The people in the TEKES office gave us the green light and they provided an investment grant that was big enough to start the patenting process, plus more testing and prototyping.

“We continued working out the details of the development, met with producers for the various parts, and had 1:1 drawings and prototypes made of all of the elements.

“We started testing our product with various people including a good mix of genders, ages, body types, and nationalities. Our testers’ general reaction was ‘WOW! This is amazing!'

“People were astonished at how the Neckpacker system’s head support was effective without tensing a single muscle. ‘Feels like my head is floating in the clouds,’ said one. ‘I feel like sitting down and falling asleep straight away,’ said another. Those were typical comments from our testers and those moments kept us working even harder and believing more and more in the future commercial success of our product.

“We talked with business advisors and investors, always listening carefully to their advice on how we should proceed to establish and commercialize our product. Again and again we were advised to consider crowdfunding as a tool for introducing and establishing our product on the international stage.

“At the same time we expanded our team with people who had experience that we lacked at that point. As we progressed and our patent was granted we decided that crowdfunding would be the best way to get the necessary boost that our start-up needed AND to launch our product in the best possible way.

“That’s pretty much our story. From a hazy idea born of a tired mind in the backseat of a car in the darkness of a snowy winter night to a patented travel jacket and vest. We are now ready for production and to hit the market with the results of our innovations. We’ve come a pretty long way!”

Mikko & Niklas, the inventors.

 

 Timeline
story_txt:

Neckpacker live on Fox-TV:
Fox-tv's Kurt "CyberGuy" presenting Neckpacker: https://www.facebook.com/CyberGuyOfficial/video...
Check out Neckpacker vest and jacket live on Fox-tv morning show:http://video.foxnews.com/v/5432818363001/?playl...("Reinvented summer gear makes summer travel easier")

I began to imagine a pump to inflate my ideal pillow.“After being awake some twelve hours in a car, I finally arrived home and managed to get a good long sleep. I woke up well rested but my idea of the ideal travel pillow still kept buzzing in my head.“Eventually I sat down and started sketching my idea. I got carried away and spent almost another sleepless night, this time with great spirit and energy. The next day I called a friend who is a designer and knows about materials and production. We sat down and I showed her my concept. She immediately understood my idea and got enthusiastic about its innovation. She helped me with more technical sketches and put me in contact with people who helped me to build the first prototypes.“Once I started testing mock-ups, I immediately realized that the air cushion system was really comfortable. It was something totally new and different but it lacked something. Although it was super comfortable, it didn’t offer enough vertical and lateral support.“Thinking about how to create this needed support, I eventually came up with the idea of a hood-type cushion with diagonal straps on both sides. At that point I needed some way for the straps to attach to the shoulders. That’s the moment the idea of a vest with an integrated inflatable hood was born! "Moving forward I realized that the vest could also serve as a handy garment for storing all the small items that we all usually carry with us when we travel like tickets, passport, and phone.“Since my idea was getting more serious and complex, I asked my best friend, who had a good touch for marketing and commercial issues, if he wanted to join the team. He carefully evaluated the concept and the prototypes. He quickly agreed that I was creating something big and he eagerly jumped on board.“We worked on more prototypes, each working better than the one before. When we felt we had the right prototype we presented it to TEKES, which is a governmental innovation fund for start-up innovations that have global market potential. The people in the TEKES office gave us the green light and they provided an investment grant that was big enough to start the patenting process, plus more testing and prototyping.“We continued working out the details of the development, met with producers for the various parts, and had 1:1 drawings and prototypes made of all of the elements.“We started testing our product with various people including a good mix of genders, ages, body types, and nationalities. Our testers’ general reaction was ‘WOW! This is amazing!'“People were astonished at how the Neckpacker system’s head support was effective without tensing a single muscle. ‘Feels like my head is floating in the clouds,’ said one. ‘I feel like sitting down and falling asleep straight away,’ said another. Those were typical comments from our testers and those moments kept us working even harder and believing more and more in the future commercial success of our product.“We talked with business advisors and investors, always listening carefully to their advice on how we should proceed to establish and commercialize our product. Again and again we were advised to consider crowdfunding as a tool for introducing and establishing our product on the international stage.“At the same time we expanded our team with people who had experience that we lacked at that point. As we progressed and our patent was granted we decided that crowdfunding would be the best way to get the necessary boost that our start-up needed AND to launch our product in the best possible way.“That’s pretty much our story. From a hazy idea born of a tired mind in the backseat of a car in the darkness of a snowy winter night to a patented travel jacket and vest. We are now ready for production and to hit the market with the results of our innovations. We’ve come a pretty long way!”Mikko & Niklas, the inventors.   Timeline

story:
Mi nombre es Jhonatan Fontalvo,  en este momento acabo de terminar mi pre grado en ingeniería administrativa en la universidad nacional de Colombia con grados en abril del 2018, estudios que me costaron demasiado esfuerzo en terminar, por que trabaje durante toda la universidad, algunas  situaciones externas y una cantidad de errores propios de los cuales he aprendido.
Ahora quiero hacer lo que siempre he querido y es vivir un poco, crecer, conocer, aprender, ensenar, explorar y resumo todos estos verbos en uno solo: viajar.
He seleccionado Estados unidos como el país donde quisiera viajar, ya que tuve la oportunidad de conocerlo en varias ocasiones gracias a mis familiares que viven allí, y quede realmente encantado con las personas, la cantidad de culturas que allí conviven, su desarrollo y todas los lugares increíbles por conocer que este país ofrece.
Eso fue ya hace 11 años y siendo sincero mi sueño siempre ha sido volver a New york ciudad donde viví por 6 meses.

Requiero el apoyo de todos ustedes para poder financiar con esta campaña gastos asociados a: pasaporte, visa, pasajes. y apoyar un poco mi viaje, ya que cuento con un capital propio que he recogido.

No siendo más, si sienten una pasión parecida por lo que  he escrito aquí o simplemente desean y podría ayudarme estaría muy agradecido, adicional mente si logro mi meta estaré publicando muchas fotos de cada lugar, personas y demás cosas conocidas.

story:
Sleep Better. Venture Higher.

As any experienced adventurer will tell you, sleep is rough at high-altitude. The Altimate™ mask, is a unique drug-free high-altitude sleep solution that can make the difference between a good trek and a great trek. A breakthrough innovation and soon-to-be an essential item in any adventurer’s pack list, the Altimate™ mask provides a natural and effective wearable solution to help alleviate the sleep problems and exhaustion that challenge high-altitude adventurers. In addition, early results of a study suggests that it also helps reduce the severity of headaches that can be experienced at high altitudes.

The Altimate™ mask modulates natural breathing patterns at rest to facilitate breathing. Based on early testing data, the result is a deeper sleep with fewer interruptions and less severe headaches, which may contribute to a stronger performance at altitude.

 

The Altimate™ Mask Solution

Designed by the team at Trudell Medical International, the Altimate™ mask was developed specifically to serve the rapidly growing population of high-altitude hikers, trekkers, and adventurers who suffer from poor sleep leading to exhaustion and negatively affected performance. Guides and adventurers shared their experiences on treks around the world, consistently identifying poor sleep as a primary factor determining not only the success but full enjoyment of their experience. Intrigued, and ideally positioned to help, the Trudell team has spent over 12 months developing and testing the Altimate™ mask with the help of adventurers and high-altitude scientists. And now it’s ready.

Ours is a unique device that combines a mask that covers the mouth and nose during sleep, providing airflow resistance only upon exhalation, and a modified neck tube to comfortably secure the mask to the face.  It is designed to help regulate your natural breathing pattern that is often compromised or restricted at high altitudes, where oxygen is thin.

The Altimate™ mask offers an all-natural, portable solution that will alleviate sleep disruption caused by shallow or rapid breathing or troublesome apneas that disrupts sleep, diminishes adventurers’ much-needed rest and recovery and interferes with the full exploration experience.  Further testing suggests that an additional benefit is users may experience less severe headaches that can be experienced at high altitude.

 

Comfortable style that delivers.

Altimate™ is a soft face mask that is held in place by a breathable textile neck tube. It’s designed to form a gentle seal around the mouth and nose, fitted and secured in place with adjustable strings. Unlike current drug alternatives, the Altimate™ mask is a completely natural solution to sleep deprivation at altitude. It is not a pharmaceutical, which typically have unwanted side effects.

 

Sleep disruption can and does affect everyone at altitude.

The construction and technology of the Altimate™ mask offer a natural, elegant, and lightweight solution to a common, yet complex sleep problem that diminishes the quality of the journey experience and can force high-altitude adventurers to abandon their expedition.

 

 

 

Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Email us directly at altimateadventure@trudellmed.com

 

How does Altimate™ mask work?

Altimate™ mask is designed to cover both the mouth and nose and secured in place within a soft neck tube made of a stylish, breathable, high-performance textile. An adjustable cord and cord lock system holds the mask in place over the mouth and nose, creating a seal. Our valving system allows for minimal resistance on inhalation, with airflow resistance only upon exhalation. The rebreathing reservoir is another unique feature of the mask, designed to allow for the return of some exhaled CO₂. Worn during sleep, the combination of mild exhalation resistance and CO₂ rebreathing acts to minimize disrupted sleep at altitude by regulating breathing and alleviate headache severity.

During activity, the mask should be removed from the neck tube and stowed. The neck tube may be worn to protect adventurers from outdoor elements.

 

We are Trudell Medical

Trudell Medical International works with patients, their caregivers, and healthcare providers to help people all over the world to breathe better and live fuller lives. As a leader in medical device research and development with a focus on devices that address respiratory ailments, Trudell is uniquely positioned to put forth a new and elegant solution to the problem of high-altitude sleep disturbance.

Intrigued by the challenge of improving human perseverance and performance at high altitude, Trudell Medical International has assembled a working group inspired by the “lean startup” model. Our mission is to explore and ultimately solve a problem faced by a number of high-altitude adventurers: poor quality, troublesome, interrupted sleep. We wanted to find a way to optimize sleep at altitude naturally. Led by altitude medicine researchers and in consultation with seasoned adventurers, we put our heads, hearts, and nearly 40 years of respiratory health experience to the task. And, we've found a way to solve the problem through our extensive research, understanding of human physiology, and some beautiful design engineering.

As we say at Trudell, “Nothing is ever achieved without passion,” and the Altimate™ mask is proof of that enduring belief.

 

Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Email us directly at altimateadventure@trudellmed.com

 

Meet the Team!

Bob

 “I have over 20 years of experience in the medical device field, developing solutions that truly help people live better lives. I was thrilled to have the opportunity to lead a small development team to find solutions by focusing on developing a deep understanding of the needs of users. I enjoy the excitement of working in new areas and learning new information and ways of working every day.”

 

Jason

“Being a part of medical device sales, marketing, and product development for nearly 20 years in multiple countries on three different continents, I jumped at the opportunity to join an initiative that would explore new and exciting markets filled with people who are passionate about what they do.  Even more exciting is that any prospective innovation was to be driven almost exclusively through customer inspiration.  It is exciting to be able to bring prior knowledge into a whole new learning experience.”

 

Alanna

“I’ve always been passionate about health and fascinated by the human body. Combining this with a competitive spirit and hunger for problem-solving, becoming a biomedical engineer just made sense. The opportunity to help people achieve their goals, push their body to its limits and explore beautiful places is an exciting challenge! Understanding this market, the body’s response to altitude and the needs of potential users has been a journey full of learning and continues to inspire me.”

 

Stephen

“Solving technical problems in the complex world of medicine has always intrigued me. Coupled with an interest in hiking and mountaineering, the goal of designing a system to assist with health concerns at altitude has been a perfect fit. Five years into the engineering profession, I have enjoyed the continuous learning and responsibility and am eager to apply this knowledge to further improve people’s lives.”

 

We need your support

We believe we’ve created an excellent, revolutionary product to help you venture higher and better fulfil your trekking goals. We are committed to ongoing research, development, and product improvement in order to perfect the solution for troubled sleep at altitude. Support our efforts by backing the Altimate™ mask project and providing your feedback. We count on high-altitude adventurers to give their honest opinions and reviews of our product and want to offer Indiegogo backers the first opportunity to try it. Back the Altimate™ mask today at more than 25% off the retail price and join the movement to sleep better and venture higher.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk is that the Altimate™ mask does not completely eliminate the sleep disruption caused to the body on high-altitude treks. Our team has already conducted a small pilot study with pre-market Altimate™ mask prototypes to test the technology. The outcomes were very promising, and we are now embarking on a larger study to confirm what we believe is an effective solution for high-altitude sleep disturbance.

Trudell Medical International continues to work directly with experienced partners across the global guide and adventurer community to test and build upon the truly great results we’ve achieved so far. From our extensive, iterative design process to clinical research with reputable academic authorities in the fields of altitude, sleep and respiration, we are confident that the Altimate™ mask will become the adventuring community’s first-choice option to improve sleep at high-altitude.

We have an aggressive timeline. So far, we have benefitted from our respiratory science experience and success and our strong manufacturing relationships to keep our project on track and on time. Our final clinical lab tests are underway, and early results are very positive. We are steadfastly focused on hitting our release date target of April 2018.

Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Email us directly at altimateadventure@trudellmed.com

story:
If you’re sitting in an airport lounge with your laptop, a cafe, a plane, a train or Uber; this is where TRACPOINT shines. Use the mouse right on your laptop palm rest or almost any other surface. 

Just like writing with your pen, TRACPOINT mouse is the perfect productivity tool for all your travel needs, optimize your mobile workspace and be just as productive on the move as you are in the office.

We have combined wireless presenter technology into the mouse, providing a pointer to manage your slides, highlight sections with SpotPoint and numerous other features that enable you to present and work with just one reliable device.

 

The Swiftpoint range of mice are the smallest in the world for a reason! At 24gm - less than 1oz (25% of the weight of a conventional mouse) the TRACPOINT is effortless to use, anywhere, anytime. The ergonomic shape and pen-grip design put your hand, arm and shoulder into a natural position to enable continuous unstrained work.

TRACPOINT has an integrated presenter so you no longer need to carry and worry about two devices when traveling. Never get caught short with a flat battery. Use your TRACPOINT as a spotlight, move between slides and as a functional tool to swap between applications or windows. 

Use the Swiftpoint Control Panel to configure and optimize all presenter functions, colors, SpotPoint size, button functions and speed. It's a complete presenter tool to make you even more productive.

TRACPOINT uses wireless technology to seamlessly connect to your computer for a reliable and accurate connection.

 

PRESENTER

Use the buttons or scroll wheel to confidently navigate through slides and presentations. The TRACPOINT's small size fits easily into the palm of your hand so you have both hands free to emphasize using hand gestures.

 

SPOTPOINT

TRACPOINT's SpotPoint feature lets you highlight and pinpoint critical areas of your presentation to engage your audience. Precisely navigate and identify key areas of your slides and desktop. Configure size and style of your SpotPoint.

 

ACTIVATE LINKS

Navigate the on-screen cursor to play or pause videos, open links and activate slides within your presentation to keep your audience on the edge of their seats. 

 

APPLICATION CHANGE

Use the unique TRACPOINT application changing feature to seamlessly swap between your presentation and associated materials. Build confidence with your materials and present any way you want.

 

We’ve spent hours researching the perfect shape, watching users struggle with a mouse, lifting and moving heavy and cumbersome devices. Even those beautiful white mice from the fruit company have many issues. Form and function must work together. We have the answer and the science to prove it. 

TRACPOINT is portable, connecting via Bluetooth and the highly accurate optical sensor is great on almost any surface. It's small enough to use on your laptop palm rest or flight tray table. Wherever you are and whenever you go the TRACPOINT is your productivity partner.

The pen-grip, small size, light weight and Rapid Charge battery combine to make the TRACPOINT the perfect travel mouse for work anywhere and anytime.

 

A 60 second charge gives up to 1 hour of use, while a full 1 hour charge gives up to 2 weeks of use. TRACPOINT has a great battery and charging system. The USB charging dongle simply plugs into any USB port your laptop or tablet. The self-locating magnet connector aligns the charge pins and safely holds the mouse in place when charging. Never get caught out with a flat battery again, work anywhere with confidence.  

 

We've made the TRACPOINT to be a specialty travel mouse, all you need in one simple package. You're getting the best travel features for a great price. 

 

With all TRACPOINT pledges you will get a complete travel package that includes: 

  • TRACPOINT Mouse and Presenter
  • USB-A Charger
  • Custom zip-lock carry and storage case
  • TRACPOINT software for Windows and Mac

To get the best performance out of your TRACPOINT mouse, presenter and GESTURE technology we created a CONTROL PANEL that gives you full control over your mouse. This configurable driver is MacOS and Windows friendly. The control panel lets you assign mouse button functions to keyboard actions, enabling you to be more efficient and productive. 

The CONTROL PANEL is the portal to your TRACPOINT customization, it's effortless to set up and optimize your mouse and presenter operation. 

We offer a lifetime of software upgrades through the control panel, we will be the TESLA of mice, providing you constant improvements and upgrades to ensure you are getting the very best productivity and support.

 

We are the only product that has done this. GESTURES are when you tilt/rotate the mouse to the right-hand side (this only needs to be a few degrees). A completely new set of functions are then associated to the mouse buttons, wheel and optical sensor. You can assign shortcuts to key functions, application switching or a variety for combinations, it's like using 2 fingers swiping across a trackpad.

GESTURES are unique to Swiftpoint products, these give a great improvement in productivity and efficiency while still using small hand movements. It's like navigating around a touch-screen using your fingers, use the mouse to control all of your functions.

 

 

Please help us by sharing with the people you know :)

We are ready for production, we need your pledge and support to kick-start our manufacturing. All the parts are made, compliance testing is underway and we are busy fine-tuning the software. These parts work beautifully, its like working on a watch. Our engineers work hard to ensure repeatable actions and light touch on all button interfaces. There is no strain on your hand, no stress on your fingers and the light weight makes the TRACPOINT effortless to use, anywhere, anytime. 

 

Like our previous campaigns, we will make our best efforts to ease the cost and burden of shipping by fulfilling rewards through multiple fulfillment partners around the world. To deliver TRACPOINT to you we will be using fulfillment partners in the USA and Hong Kong. Rewards bound for the US will ship from within the US. All other rewards will be shipped from Hong Kong.

Please note that we have tried to do our best but some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes.

If you are unsure of your country’s customs policy please check with your local authority.

 

Welcome to Swiftpoint! We’ve been known for delivering award-winning mouse products using our unique ergonomic design for over a decade. We put our designs through countless cycles of user testing, refinement and continued innovation. This ensures Swiftpoint products have great ergonomics, intuitiveness and efficiency to make you more productive.

Everything we do is about making robust, high quality and productive products that we’re proud to put our name on. Devices that make people’s lives better and more enjoyable. This is our fourth crowdfunded project. We create great hardware partnered with innovative software to ensure you get the best value, most productive tools. We’ll deliver on time and we promise you’ll love our latest travel companion.

We've had great success with crowdfunding, in 2014 we launched the revolutionary Swiftpoint GT, in 2017 The Z, a gaming mouse that was voted gaming innovation of the year by CES and in 2018 the ProPoint was delivered successfully to all of our supporters. By backing the TRACPOINT you know we will deliver a quality mouse and presenter to all of our backers.

We are committed to helping others, we donate a percentage of our revenue to B1G1 Business for Good with our focus on funding education in Nepal.

It's small enough to use on your laptop palm rest or flight tray table. Wherever you are and whenever you go the TRACPOINT is your productivity partner.The pen-grip, small size, light weight and Rapid Charge battery combine to make the TRACPOINT the perfect travel mouse for work anywhere and anytime. 
 A 60 second charge gives up to 1 hour of use, while a full 1 hour charge gives up to 2 weeks of use. TRACPOINT has a great battery and charging system. The USB charging dongle simply plugs into any USB port your laptop or tablet. The self-locating magnet connector aligns the charge pins and safely holds the mouse in place when charging. Never get caught out with a flat battery again, work anywhere with confidence.   
 We've made the TRACPOINT to be a specialty travel mouse, all you need in one simple package. You're getting the best travel features for a great price.  
 With all TRACPOINT pledges you will get a complete travel package that includes: 
TRACPOINT Mouse and Presenter
USB-A Charger
Custom zip-lock carry and storage case
TRACPOINT software for Windows and Mac
 
 To get the best performance out of your TRACPOINT mouse, presenter and GESTURE technology we created a CONTROL PANEL that gives you full control over your mouse. This configurable driver is MacOS and Windows friendly. The control panel lets you assign mouse button functions to keyboard actions, enabling you to be more efficient and productive. The CONTROL PANEL is the portal to your TRACPOINT customization, it's effortless to set up and optimize your mouse and presenter operation. We offer a lifetime of software upgrades through the control panel, we will be the TESLA of mice, providing you constant improvements and upgrades to ensure you are getting the very best productivity and support.  We are the only product that has done this. GESTURES are when you tilt/rotate the mouse to the right-hand side (this only needs to be a few degrees). A completely new set of functions are then associated to the mouse buttons, wheel and optical sensor. You can assign shortcuts to key functions, application switching or a variety for combinations, it's like using 2 fingers swiping across a trackpad.GESTURES are unique to Swiftpoint products, these give a great improvement in productivity and efficiency while still using small hand movements. It's like navigating around a touch-screen using your fingers, use the mouse to control all of your functions. 
 
 
 Please help us by sharing with the people you know :)  
 
  We are ready for production, we need your pledge and support to kick-start our manufacturing. All the parts are made, compliance testing is underway and we are busy fine-tuning the software. These parts work beautifully, its like working on a watch. Our engineers work hard to ensure repeatable actions and light touch on all button interfaces. There is no strain on your hand, no stress on your fingers and the light weight makes the TRACPOINT effortless to use, anywhere, anytime.  Like our previous campaigns, we will make our best efforts to ease the cost and burden of shipping by fulfilling rewards through multiple fulfillment partners around the world. To deliver TRACPOINT to you we will be using fulfillment partners in the USA and Hong Kong. Rewards bound for the US will ship from within the US. All other rewards will be shipped from Hong Kong.Please note that we have tried to do our best but some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes.If you are unsure of your country’s customs policy please check with your local authority. Welcome to Swiftpoint! We’ve been known for delivering award-winning mouse products using our unique ergonomic design for over a decade. We put our designs through countless cycles of user testing, refinement and continued innovation. This ensures Swiftpoint products have great ergonomics, intuitiveness and efficiency to make you more productive.Everything we do is about making robust, high quality and productive products that we’re proud to put our name on. Devices that make people’s lives better and more enjoyable. This is our fourth crowdfunded project. We create great hardware partnered with innovative software to ensure you get the best value, most productive tools. We’ll deliver on time and we promise you’ll love our latest travel companion.We've had great success with crowdfunding, in 2014 we launched the revolutionary Swiftpoint GT, in 2017 The Z, a gaming mouse that was voted gaming innovation of the year by CES and in 2018 the ProPoint was delivered successfully to all of our supporters. By backing the TRACPOINT you know we will deliver a quality mouse and presenter to all of our backers.
 We are committed to helping others, we donate a percentage of our revenue to B1G1 Business for Good with our focus on funding education in Nepal.

story:
The GOB∆G is a carry-on sized duffel bag designed so you can travel compact with all the gear you need. Its killer feature is the Max Pack Bag, which allows you to vacuum compress your soft items. This enables you to carry enough for a long trip in a 35 litre bag.

GOB∆G’s simple and robust design is engineered to last a lifetime. The outer bag is constructed from only two pieces of TPU coated ballistic nylon, a material commonly used to make inflatable boats. This ‘less is more’ design approach is continued throughout the product.

The Full Edge Zip is a 2 meter long, durable YKK zip that runs along the outer edge of the front and side panels. This means more of your gear is next to the zip; you'll never have to dig around at the bottom of your bag again.

More zip. Less hassle.

This feature doesn't need much explanation. It's the perfect size for 95% of the major airlines' carry-on, even Ryanair!

The Max Pack Bag is the GOB∆G's killer feature. It's a welded bag made from TPU coated nylon with an integrated vacuum check valve to compress all your soft goods. Just throw your gear into the bag, seal it and compress it. You can compress the bag by either using a vacuum cleaner or compressing it by hand.

Pack. Vac. Go.

We've had enough of those disposable plastic bags you get at the airport. Our integrated wash bag means an end to wasting time at airport security – your liquids and pastes are ready to go from the off. Just rip off the wash bag from its velcro attachment and you're good to go.

Shhhh... we've added a hidden pocket to the bag. Who doesn't love a secret pocket? It's also quite useful for your money, passport and other secret stuff. 

Here's what some of our early testers have been saying about the GOB∆G.

  • Hypalon is the ultimate in abrasion protection. We have placed it over the maximum wear areas like the base.
  • TPU Coated Ballistic Nylon the ultimate waterproof material. This is the stuff that inflatable power boats are made out of.
  • Metal G Hooks Forget those flimsy plastic buckles that you get on some bags. Ours are made out of metal. 
  • Monkey Fist Zip Pulls Made from high tensile strength para cord. A knot that a salty sea dog would be proud of.
  • YKK Zippers Everyone knows that all the best gear uses YKK zips not some rubbish imitation. Zips matter!

What's in the box?

James came up with the idea for the GOBAG two years ago. He was traveling a lot between London and Scotland for weekend trips on Easyjet flights and was frustrated that he couldn't take everything he needed as hand luggage. His cheap but functional solution was to pack all his clothes in a bin bag, vacuum the air out and zip tie the end. He thought "There's got to be an easier way to do this..."

The GOBAG was born.

Over the last two years we have put the GOB∆G through rigorous testing. Here are a few shots from our most recent wear trials.

We have sourced and secured a great manufacturer in China whose other clients include some big outdoor brands.

A member of the GOBAG Team go to China to supervise the manufacturing and oversee the quality control, ensuring that you get a great quality product. 

 

Backers: ahoy@wearegobag.co.uk

Business Enquiries: business@wearegobag.co.uk

Press Enquiries: press@wearegobag.co.uk

Thanks for taking the time to check out the GOB∆G! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.

#PackSmallThinkBig

We want to thank some fantastic people that have helped us out on the way.

ZZZONE BRISTOL Thanks Jonny for shooting the GOB∆G pictures. If you live in Bristol, you need to go down and say hi (or just check out their website zzzone.co.uk)

MATT ALANI who has worked on the audio for the videos. Check out some of his other work at shifted-sound.com

FRED INGLEBY braved the weather on a cold London afternoon to shoot the video. Thanks Fred!

CHRIS SLEIGH also helped us out in some wintery weather in the Scottish Highlands to get some great shots of the GOB∆G. 

Get Your Project Funded Today!

Pack. Vac. Go.
The Max Pack Bag is fully removable. Just unscrew the check valve, release the attachments inside the GOB∆G, and pop the cap on, then you're ready to go.

We've had enough of those disposable plastic bags you get at the airport. Our integrated wash bag means an end to wasting time at airport security – your liquids and pastes are ready to go from the off. Just rip off the wash bag from its velcro attachment and you're good to go.

We've also designed an adaptable laptop harness that holds your notebook securely away from the edges of the bag. It can take care of everything between 11-15 inches. One less thing to worry about.
Shhhh... we've added a hidden pocket to the bag. Who doesn't love a secret pocket? It's also quite useful for your money, passport and other secret stuff. 
Here's what some of our early testers have been saying about the GOB∆G.

The GOBAG was born.



A picture of James' trusty Singer Sewing Machine, bought for £20 on Gumtree.

GOBAG Wear Trial; Loch Tulla, Scotland

story:
The travel keyring made from eco-friendly faux leather, which helps travellers to capture their travel memories by attaching hand-painted flags of each country you have visited or will be visiting, with the added option to engrave a special memory or date to the back of each flag. 

Each FlagMate holds up to 30 Flags, BUT for you ULTIMATE TRAVELLERS,  we have a custom FlagMate which can hold up to 100 flags! (see below). 

FlagMate is available with a clip to attach anywhere you like...

Also available without a clip to use as an elegant stylish keyring 

Each Storyteller Flag is custom made and individually hand-painted, with a protected finish to avoid any scratching.

With the added option to PERSONALISE the back of each flag using up to 30 characters.

If you prefer not to personalise your Flag, we will simply add the name of the country on the back!

Use FlagMate to share your travel stories with other travellers from around the world. 

Simply send us a message on social media @storytellerteam or email us at hello@storytellertravel.co.uk adding how many flags you require. 

Simply send us a message on social media @storytellerteam or email us at hello@storytellertravel.co.uk letting us know how many flags you require and we will create an awesome bundle and CUSTOM FlagMate just for you!

We wanted to design a solution to address a major pain point for travellers around the world of how to best preserve their travel memories.

We combined the longevity of a journal with the simplicity of a souvenir to create FlagMate. 

Our friends who are already rocking their own FlagMates!

Storyteller was started with three main objectives: To build the best travel accessories; inspire more people to travel and help fund educational projects for individuals who are less privileged.  

Although travelling shows us so many positives, it also shows us the world’s biggest problems. Recent UNESCO figures show that there are 750 million youth and adults who are unable to read and write a simple sentence. 

This not only has long-term consequences for those individuals affected, but also for the next generation, who become part of a repeat cycle of inequality and poverty.

At Storyteller, we are passionate about wanting to make a real change to this problem and to do this, we work with with like-minded global charities to help fund their educational projects for both children and adults in less privileged areas of the world. 

Our Founder, Bhav in India running classes at The Barefoot College in India (April 2018). 

 

We also work with our friends in sport to help us share the importance of education. 

Shane Warne (Australian Cricketer) with our Founder and the Children from The Barefoot College. 

 

Ajinkya Rahane (Vice-Captain Indian Cricket Team) with our founder and speaking with the children from The Barefoot College. 

It is our vision to bring together passionate travellers from around the world in unity with a mission to do good. 

We hope you will support and join us on this journey of empowerment as together, we can make a difference.

Learn more about how we do good and the full list of projects we want to deliver: 

https://www.storytellertravel.co.uk/do-good/ 

The founder of Storyteller is Bhav Patel. Having practiced as a Lawyer for many years, he has led many Corporate Social Responsibility programmes, which has allowed him to work closely with large charities and understand the technical details of how the sector operates. He has since put this knowledge into practice by becoming an integral member of the UNICEF, NextGen, London team.

When Bhav first had the idea about creating FlagMate, he wanted to ensure that the company stood for two values that he was most passionate about, his love for travel and giving back to those less fortunate. He wanted to showcase the positives of travel, but also use this platform to show the educational problems around the world and create a community of like-minded people to come together and help resolve these problems.

The Storyteller team has since grown with like-minded individuals from backgrounds in law, branding, marketing, fashion and product design and the charity sector. 

Although we all have our own expertise, we all have two things in common, the love of travel and the passion to do good.

At Storyteller, we are passionate about using environmentally friendly and sustainable materials for our products. From the printing of our clothing to the materials used in our products and packaging, we use the best progressive and sustainable materials. Some of the materials we use include recycled card, plant-based materials, and non-PVC polyurethane microfibre.

Each FlagMate has cross coloured stitching and our favourite passport style stamped logo embossed into the high-quality faux leather

.

The flag designs are drawn into a piece of metal after which they are each hand-painted one by one. 

With the added option to laser engrave a special message to the back of each Storyteller Flag. The perfect way to capture your special memories.

Here are some of the countries already made and ready to go!

 

Each t-shirt is made from a mix of organic cotton and bamboo which is quick dry, wind resistant, comfortable and long-lasting in both material and style.

The bamboo is ethically sourced from China where it is pressed and crushed mechanically before being sent to India where it is produced sustainably creating the perfect tee for every traveller!

 

 

 

Our chosen manufacturers have years of experience in materials and product design, and we have obtained high-quality advice on the quality and durability of the materials we use, to ensure the products are of the highest quality possible.

Our manufacturers are able to deliver within 4-6 weeks of this crowdfunding campaign ending and therefore at the latest, we aim to start shipping orders by 1 December 2018 and in time for Christmas! If we surpass our funding goals substantially, we may need some extra time to fulfill orders. If this is the case we will update each and every single one of you with a new time frame.

Over the last eight months, we have continuously developed our products and are super proud of the results. The product has already been produced and has been fulfilled, please see our Instagram and website for social proof of fulfilling orders and happy customers. 

We need your help to spread the word about us and ensure that people are aware of our mission to do good around the world. 

Stay updated with everything Storyteller and follow our travels on social:

Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/storytellerteam/

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/storytellerteam/

AND HASHTAG #FlagMate #Storytellerteam

Send us a tweet: https://twitter.com/storytellertrav

Thanks again for your support of everything we're doing at Storyteller.  

 

The easiest way to get immediate assistance is to email us at hello@storytellertravel.co.uk  

We love hearing from backers with any feedback, requests or just to say hi, so please do drop us an email or contact us on social media (tags above) where you can also see the latest information an all things Storyteller. 

For inquiries regarding Distribution, Retail, and Partnerships please visit: https://www.storytellertravel.co.uk/wholesale/

Media enquiries: hello@storytellertravel.co.uk


Your support is going to allow us to start our journey, and help us make an impact in the world we live in. We are all very thankful for your support
