story:
WhizRider gives families the freedom to go everywhere safely without the bulk of a car seat. A unique harness-style system, created by 2 dads and developed based on the latest information from the biomechanics and accident research field. WhizRider is perfect for urban families who use ride-sharing apps and taxis, suburban carpooling and unexpected pick-ups, as well as family travel.

     

    Awards For Excellence...

     

     

     

    Featured In...

     

     

     

    WhizRider offers innovative safety features:

     

      Did you know...

      ...that many countries outside the USA accept the U.S. standard, have exceptional cases or do not have child safety requirements? For example:

      • Asia (Hong Kong, Japan, Singapore, South Korea, Taiwan, Thailand, Vietnam etc)
      • South Asia (India, Sri Lanka etc)
      • Latin America (Argentina, Chile, Columbia, Ecuador, Mexico, Peru etc)
      • European countries have exceptional cases for the use of Taxis (Belgium, France, Ireland, Italy, Netherland, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom*)
        *including the use of uber services (private hire vehicles)

       

       

      Although renting a car seat or booster may seem convenient, it can often be expensive enough to put a damper on your travel budget. They could be damaged or improperly cleaned—or maybe never cleaned. Keeping WhizRider on you means never having to wonder about your child’s safety in the car, even when you are traveling far from home.

       

      Never worry about where the car seat is again! Whether you are asking your partner to pick up the kids from school, or a friend wants to bring your child home from soccer practice, there will be no more frustrating realizations that they don’t have a safe way to ride in the car. Having WhizRider in your child’s backpack or your glove compartment or handbag means you are always prepared.

       

      Single car family? Frequent car-sharing riders? With WhizRider you are free to explore your city again—without dragging a car seat along. Take a spontaneous trip to the museum with an Uber, or hop in a friend’s car and grab lunch. Imagine the experiences that will open up for you and your children when bulky car seat logistics aren’t standing in your way.

       

      The standard advice when leaving children in someone else’s care is to install the car seat in the nanny or babysitter’s car. Even if they don’t plan on leaving, it is important to have a safe way to travel with the children in case of an emergency. What if they already had the solution on them? A nanny, babysitter, grandparent, or other caregiver who has a WhizRider stowed in their glove compartment or handbag is always ready for a car ride.

       

       

       

      From San Francisco to Vietnam to Morocco, families have been testing out WhizRider and have loved the convenience of traveling safely on holiday and around town. We look forward to posting your WhizKids' stories!! 

       

       

       

      We designed and developed WhizRider together with leading accident researchers, biomechanical engineers, and mountain climbing experts, among other experts in the fields of personal protection equipment. It is a unique harness system that guides the car seat belt into the proper position on the lap and shoulder to prevent injury. WhizRider is absolutely safe and fits in a pocket or backpack so it can always be there for your child’s safety.

      Our research led us to innovative concepts that redefine what a safe child restraint solution can look and feel like. Although WhizRider is ultra-portable, it does not compromise on safety.

      Major Safety Features That Reduce The Risk of  Injury

      • No Submarining: Leg loops prevent children from “submarining” under the lap belt or sliding forward.
      • Optimal Seat Belt Placement: Innovative metal clips keep the seat belt in correct position, even when children wiggle or fall asleep.
      • Extra Visibility: Glow-in-the-dark vest keeps kids safe at night.

       

       

      Installing WhizRider is a simple process, helping you feel confident that your child is securely restrained for every ride.

       

      Age and Size Requirements

      WhizRider is offered in 2 sizes (small and large) and is adjustable to fit children from ages 3 to 10 years old:

       

       

       

        You can see in this video how the innovative design of the WhizRider vest reduces the risk of injury and keeps the seat belt at optimum placement.

        WhizRider has undergone rigorous crash testing and surpasses the requirements of the U.S. Federal Standard, regulated by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA). These regulations include:

        • Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard (FMVSS) 213 for Child Restraint Systems
        • Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard (FMVSS) 302 for Flammability of Interior Materials

         

        Crash Tests

        The most important elements of a crash test video to determine safety of a restraint system both involve how much movement takes place:

        • How far does the dummy move forward in the seat (whether knee excursion or submarining under the lap belt).
        • How much the dummy’s head moves forward (forward excursion).

        If you focus on the dummy’s head and knees in this actual crash test footage, you can see that WhizRider holds the dummy’s body in a secure position through the duration of the impact.

        Through a random selection method, every single batch we produce is tested in accordance with FMVSS 213. We repeat these tests using dummies that represent three-year-old, six-year-old, and ten-year-old children. For additional security, we have been conducting tests in different testing facilities across the U.S. and Europe. 

         

        The Two Main Performance Benchmarks 

        Knee Forward Movement Comparison:

        • U.S. Federal Standards allow the child’s knees to travel 36” forward.
        • In crash testing, WhizRider allows the knees to move forward 20”.

        Head Forward Movement Comparison:

        • U.S. Federal Standards allow the child’s head to travel 32” forward. 
        • In crash testing, WhizRider allows the head to move forward 11”.

         

         

         

         

         

         

         

         

         

         

         

         

        As two fathers living in big cities with our families, we were frustrated we couldn’t find a suitable solution to secure our children in daily taxis and Ubers. Lugging along clunky car seats was inconvenient, but going without a car seat or booster was out of the question. From this frustration we were inspired to create WhizRider, a car seat you can always have on you.

        Both of us are members of the Swiss Alpine Club (the largest mountaineering club in Switzerland) as well as parents, so we instinctively focus on the quality, safety, and sustainability of the products our families use. The inspiration for the innovative design of the WhizRider vest comes from the safety features found on a climbing harness.

        Our younger kids feel like heroes when wearing their WhizRider safety vests and won’t take them off. Our older kid likes that it enables spontaneous city strolls and trips for the whole family. Now we’re excited to share WhizRider with you and families around the world.

        If your child is between 3 and 10 years old, WhizRider will work for you. If you like the freedom of unplanned adventures, using Uber, jumping in a taxi, or want a convenient and safe option for getting around with your kids, then your answer is here. Use WhizRider!

        Thanks for supporting our vision to help you live spontaneously with your kids without ever compromising safety

        Sincerely,

        Co-Founders

         

        Have A Question?

        See the FAQs tab at the top of the page or contact us at contact@whizrider.com. 

         

         

         

        We spent two years consulting with specialists from accident research, biomechanics, and personal protective equipment developers to create a compact car seat solution that also offers outstanding safety. This includes our production partner, Vaude Vietnam. Vaude Vietnam is the production house of the high-quality outdoor and climbing gear brands Edelrid and Vaude. 

        Our vision is to empower families with the freedom for spontaneous car trips and the confidence for changes in plans. No one should feel like they have to compromise their child’s safety just to get around town and show their kids some adventure. With WhizRider, you always have a safe, reliable car seat in your pocket.

         

        Engineered for Best-In-Class Quality Using Responsible Manufacturing

        We are aware of our responsibility when it comes to social and ecological responsibility. We evaluate every component of WhizRider to ensure it is of the highest quality and meets all safety, sustainability, and ethical standards.


         

        WhizRider is certified as a carbon neutral manufacturer, and all carbon dioxide emissions resulting from production, logistics, and disposal of our product are offset by supporting climate projects around the world. Whenever possible, all our materials are bluesign® or OEKO-TEX® certified to make sure that our components do not contain any harmful substances.

        Furthermore, we make sure that WhizRider is produced under controlled social conditions. Our manufacturers are audited to follow the principles of the Fair Wear Foundation, guaranteeing fair working conditions and respectful health and safety measurements.

        Our production facility in Vietnam:

        Our warehouse in Houston:

         

         

         

         

        We know the importance and value of a solid durable product. That’s why we’ve been working with supply chain experts and creating relationships with manufacturers that will allow us to move quickly post-campaign. We have done our homework and believe we have the best production team possible.

        We are confident we will meet our planned schedule, but there are risks that may be out of our control. If there are any delays, we promise to communicate with our backers right away. 

        After the campaign, we will share the steps of our journey towards manufacturing, packaging, and shipping, allowing each backer to stay in the loop and know where we are at in our timeline. Our goal is to make spontaneous car travel safer and more convenient for families.

U.S. Federal Standards allow the child’s head to travel 32” forward. 
In crash testing, WhizRider allows the head to move forward 11”.
            As two fathers living in big cities with our families, we were frustrated we couldn’t find a suitable solution to secure our children in daily taxis and Ubers. Lugging along clunky car seats was inconvenient, but going without a car seat or booster was out of the question. From this frustration we were inspired to create WhizRider, a car seat you can always have on you.Both of us are members of the Swiss Alpine Club (the largest mountaineering club in Switzerland) as well as parents, so we instinctively focus on the quality, safety, and sustainability of the products our families use. The inspiration for the innovative design of the WhizRider vest comes from the safety features found on a climbing harness.Our younger kids feel like heroes when wearing their WhizRider safety vests and won’t take them off. Our older kid likes that it enables spontaneous city strolls and trips for the whole family. Now we’re excited to share WhizRider with you and families around the world.If your child is between 3 and 10 years old, WhizRider will work for you. If you like the freedom of unplanned adventures, using Uber, jumping in a taxi, or want a convenient and safe option for getting around with your kids, then your answer is here. Use WhizRider!Thanks for supporting our vision to help you live spontaneously with your kids without ever compromising safetySincerely,Co-Founders Have A Question?See the FAQs tab at the top of the page or contact us at contact@whizrider.com.    We spent two years consulting with specialists from accident research, biomechanics, and personal protective equipment developers to create a compact car seat solution that also offers outstanding safety. This includes our production partner, Vaude Vietnam. Vaude Vietnam is the production house of the high-quality outdoor and climbing gear brands Edelrid and Vaude. Our vision is to empower families with the freedom for spontaneous car trips and the confidence for changes in plans. No one should feel like they have to compromise their child’s safety just to get around town and show their kids some adventure. With WhizRider, you always have a safe, reliable car seat in your pocket. Engineered for Best-In-Class Quality Using Responsible ManufacturingWe are aware of our responsibility when it comes to social and ecological responsibility. We evaluate every component of WhizRider to ensure it is of the highest quality and meets all safety, sustainability, and ethical standards. WhizRider is certified as a carbon neutral manufacturer, and all carbon dioxide emissions resulting from production, logistics, and disposal of our product are offset by supporting climate projects around the world. Whenever possible, all our materials are bluesign® or OEKO-TEX® certified to make sure that our components do not contain any harmful substances.Furthermore, we make sure that WhizRider is produced under controlled social conditions. Our manufacturers are audited to follow the principles of the Fair Wear Foundation, guaranteeing fair working conditions and respectful health and safety measurements.Our production facility in Vietnam:Our warehouse in Houston:    We know the importance and value of a solid durable product. That’s why we’ve been working with supply chain experts and creating relationships with manufacturers that will allow us to move quickly post-campaign. We have done our homework and believe we have the best production team possible.We are confident we will meet our planned schedule, but there are risks that may be out of our control. If there are any delays, we promise to communicate with our backers right away. After the campaign, we will share the steps of our journey towards manufacturing, packaging, and shipping, allowing each backer to stay in the loop and know where we are at in our timeline. Our goal is to make spontaneous car travel safer and more convenient for families.

story:
INTRODUCING

The Booe Hybrid 20 Waterproof Backpack

The first 100% waterproof, submersible, airtight, and floating backpack engineered with new TRU Zip™ Waterproof Zippers. This 20 liter waterproof backpack has you covered whether you’re heading out on the boat, hanging out at the beach, or commuting to the office. From the beach to city streets, keep your things safe, dry, and protected from the elements.

 

 

Capacity: 20 liters        Weight: 2.34 lbs        Height: 17.9"        Width: 11.8"        Depth: 5.9"

 

TRU Zip™ Waterproof Zippers

A NEW Revolution in Zipper Technology

The patented TRU Zip™ design is the first silent, sliding, toothless, and TRUly waterproof zipper system on the market. This complete zipper system introduces a fully-closed assembly that can be RF welded in applications that were never possible before. With an intuitive pull-to-close design that secures into an overmolded garage, TRU Zip™ offers a confident closure you can feel.

 

 

"TRU-Zip is the best innovation I’ve found in the entire outdoor industry in at least the past 5 years."

 

"TRU Zip technology represents the industry’s first toothless, waterproof zipper. Using the same extrusion methods behind the brand’s Gear Ties, the TRU Zip is airtight, resists snagging your gear, and repairs itself.”

 

"When the “TRU Zip” head docks into the depression at the far end, the soft bag is absolutely airtight: putting a solid hundred pounds of force on the top didn’t produce so much as a squeak.”

 

“[TRU ZIP] is completely waterproof — not just water-resistant, as many zippers billed as “waterproof” are — and doesn’t use the teeth that have defined what we think of as zippers for the last 125 years. The zipper closes with a design reminiscent of a Ziploc bag but is much stronger — strong enough to stand on one of the packing cubes without the zipper bursting”

 

"This new zipper uses no teeth and no coils. Unlike a seal that you press into place, like that found on zip-loc bags, this is based on an interlocking ball and socket rail design—pull the zipper and the rails lock into place. Both the mechanical action of the locking rails and a vacuum effect created when the zipper closes keeps these suckers sealed."

 

 

 

 

Removable Office Organizer

 

 

 

Capacity: 20 liters        Weight: 2.34 lbs        Height: 17.9"        Width: 11.8"        Depth: 5.9"

 

 

Removable Office Organizer

Fits a 15" laptop

 

Ready to be a part of our story? Thank you for your support! We want to make the whole process as simple as possible for you, from making a contribution to getting your perk.

 

1. Select "Back It"

2. Make a Contribution or Select ONE (1) Perk

Support us with a custom $ amount or select a perk.  Available colors:

3. Stay in Touch

Once you have made your contribution, feel free to message us with any questions or comments you have. You'll get emails with project updates and you'll be in the know about production status, inside news, and more.

 

What's Next?

Our first production order has been placed and is expected to be delivered in time for Christmas! In the meantime, help us spread the word about our campaign to all of your friends and family using the Indiegogo share tools.

 

A Message from our Founder - Dan Martinson

Almost 10 years ago I released my first product, the Gear Tie Reusable Rubber Twist Tie, which is now sold by leading retailers all over the world! I’ve been working on a new product with my business partners over the past 4.5 years called the TRU Zip Waterproof Zipper which we also manufacture here in Minnesota! TRU Zip was officially released to the market this past winter and won several awards including Outdoor Retailer’s Best in Show!

I'm excited to introduce you to my new brand Booē, a collection of waterproof bags featuring TRU Zip™ Waterproof Zippers! These bags are 100% waterproof, submersible, airtight, and they float! The first bag we're leading with is the Hybrid 20 Waterproof Backpack which we successfully funded this summer on Kickstarter and are now offering for pre-order here on Indiegogo.  Your contributions will help us cover tooling expenses and minimum order quantities.

We really appreciate your support!

 

The Impact

TRU Zip™ Waterproof Zippers are made here at our manufacturing facility in Maple Grove, MN USA.  By backing our project, you're supporting and helping create more jobs! 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we're met with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.

story:
HELP OUR NEIGHBORS IN LONG BEACH

In the aftermath of Sandy, cities like Long Beach, NY have been absolutely devastated. Personal loss of life and property has been devastating. The entire cost of this storm is already estimated to be at least $60 billion. Many of us have friends & family there, or simply go to Long Beach to enjoy the beach, the fun bars, and the great people. Many of us in other cities have also suffered great loss, but in many cases not as bad as Long Beach.
 
To those who can show their support, please consider doing so!
 
Please consider how much even a couple of dollars can help soften the blow and help people in need get back on their feet. Money will not replace the loss for many of these people, but many of them now will need shelter and food in the coming cold months of winter. Not everybody has family to go to.
 

WHAT HAPPENS WITH THIS MONEY

This is not an official charity, and I am only one Long Island resident trying to do what I can to help. Once we have met or exceeded our goal of $500,00 and the campaign has been funded, I will contact the City of Long Beach (http://www.longbeachny.org/). The money will either be given directly to them, or to whoever they instruct us.

story:
Air Hammock

Welcome to the most comfortable Hammock ever made. My name is Paul Grist and I have been a lifelong entrepreneur. During my life I was involved in multiple expeditions that required sleeping in hammocks overnight. I was never able to get a good nights sleep until the Air Hammock was conceived. 

Hammocks promote relaxation, piece of mind, facilitates creativity and generally helps people feel happier almost immediately. I am passionate about sharing the pleasures created by hammocks for friends, families, campers and outdoor lovers around the world.   

The Air Hammock is like laying on clouds in your own personal oasis. The Air Hammock has a built in inflatable air mattress that adds support and stability which allows you to relax and sleep without the numbness that sets in with other hammocks. Other hammocks cut off circulation, they become uncomfortable over time and are next to impossible to sleep in.

Air Hammock is the most viable solution to keep packing small and light weight while ensuring the best relaxation in a hammock you will ever experience. The hammocks will incorporate light weight, tear proof, nylon cotton blends that breathe, are easy to clean and water resistant.

The project needs up to $25,000 to complete designs, manufacture inventory, engage distributors and commence marketing. There should be little barrier to market as there is a large established industry and the air hammock will be competitively priced.  

There are 3 designs that will be available in both light brown and green colors. A basic single person hammock. A 2 person hammock with widening braces and a tent hammock with a removable rain cover and insect netting for recreational or extreme camping anywhere. The air hammock is the first of its kind in the world.

Enjoy Air Hammock delight. Your contributions will earn you 1 basic or a combination of hammocks for you and those you care about most to enjoy. Please share our campaign with Indigogo share tools and social media.

story:
Bagram Pack

Bagram Pack Bagram Pack is an Office / Gym / Travel backpack, 3-bags-in-1 bag. Bagram Pack 15 (22 liter capacity, 15 inch laptop storage capacity) and Bagram Pack 17 (30 liter capacity, 17 inch laptop storage capacity).

 

 

 

Bagram Pouch  

The Bagram pouch is made up of four models:  

Bagram L Pouch  

Bagram S Pouch  

RFID BP Pouch: RFID Blocking Passport Pouch  

i Pouch

 

Bagram L Pouch  

The Bagram L Pouch is designed to store toiletries when traveling, school supplies and cables, books and writing tools that can be used for school or work, and can be used as a pouch, hand carry bag or sling bag depending on the purpose.

 

Modular Belt  

The modular belt can be attached to BAGRAM pack 15, BAGRAM pack 17 or BAGRAM L Pouch. It is designed to be able to attach multiple small pouches to the modular belt depending on the purpose.

 

Bagram S Pouch 

The Bagram S Pouch is designed to store and assembled when you need extra space for traveling or non-traveling. Depending on the purpose, it can be attached to the Bagram Pack or modular belt, and designed to be worn on your pants or standard belt.

 

RFID BP Pouch(RFID Blocking Passport Pouch)  

RFID BP Pouch is an illegal anti-skimming passport pouch that protects important passports, credit cards and wallet from the pickpockets. It can be attached to the belt and designed to be used as a normal pant or hand carry pouch.

 

i Pouch  

The i Pouch can be used to charge the smartphone while the earbuds are plugged in. The small pouch (cigarette or Altoise neck candy case size) can also store credit cards. Depending on the purpose, it can be attached to the Bagram Pack, the module belt, and it is designed to be used on the normal pants.

 

ESHENA Magnetic Keychain   

The ESHENA and magnet keychain is easy to attach and detach due to magnetic.

Neoprene Handle  

Neoprene Handle is a removable handle for a comfortable grip and can be attached and detached to any handle in Bagram Pack 15, Bagram Pack 17.

ESHENA Raincover  

The rain cover is enough big to be used when there is no pouch or pouch is attached.

 

ABOUT US

 I (on the right) went to Afghanistan in 2011 and spent six months in the operation, making good use of military equipment. I especially liked military backpacks and the ability to put things or pouches on them was so unique and good. But it was a little inconvenient for me to use my military backpack in my everyday life to store my laptop and electronics. I thought I could make a nice bag if I could supplement this part.

ESHENA, the name comes from the Korean Army ASHENA troops in Afghanistan. ASHENA means "friends" and "colleagues" in Afghan language. Our products are inspired by the military equipment we used in Afghanistan, and we design products that are active and suitable for urban use. We are sponsoring Afghan children in poor conditions and 10% of our revenue is used for this.

WARRANTY

Please note that we provide 1 year of warranty from the day of purchase (based on delivery confirmation) only for breakdown of zippers (including zipper pulls). If the zippers of your bag break, email us at eshena.official@gmail.com and we will let you know what to do.

CUSTOMS & SHIPPING POLICY  

All rewards will be shipped from the warehouse in Seoul, South Korea and please note that import duties are not included in the item price or shipping cost. Customs depends on countries.  

Delivery usually takes 7-15 days from Seoul, South Korea to any countries in the world.  

The reward will be returned to us if you do not give us the exact (insufficient) address or if the recipient is not often on your shipping address.  

If you want us to resend it, we are afraid you will have to pay the return cost (as little as $ 20 to as much as $ 50) + re-shipping cost (as little as $ 20 to as much as $ 50).  

If you want a refund because the cost of re-shipping is high, the refund will be the amount of funding you pledge - the kickstarter fee (8% of the funding amount) - the return amount (less than $ 20 to as much as $ 50). 

Please understand that the return and return costs are high due to international shipping.

story:
MICRO - The World's Smallest Universal Travel Adapter with Surge Protection - Compatible in over 150 countries on all 7 continents. 

With Micro, you get the functionality of a universal travel adapter built into a cool design that matches the awesomeness of the gadgets you travel with. An adapter that’s simple, yet versatile and that feels extremely familiar, as if you’ve already used it and loved it all your life.

MICRO is perfect for all your travel essentials.

Micro makes your travel experience easier. Much sleeker and a lot cooler-looking, Micro is hands-down the world’s smallest and the best designed travel adapter you'll ever own.

“Different” and “new” is relatively easy. Doing something that’s genuinely better is very hard! - Sir Jony Ive - Senior VP Design - Apple  

 

Whether you are a business person with a small travel bag or a backpacker looking to minimize your travel load, Micro helps you stay light and ticks all the essential boxes with its innovative design and complete functionality.

 

How small is Micro? See for yourself!


 

 

The integrated casing covers any 3rd pin safely so you don’t have to worry about exposed plug pins ever again!

 

 

The top and bottom release levers have 2 positions: locked and unlocked.To release a set of pins, slide the lever to the left (unlocked position).

To lock a set of pins in place (either in open or stored position), slide the release levers to the right.

The four faces of MICRO are everything you need in almost every country in the world! 

 

 

The Americas and over 54 other countries - When you visit the United States, use the top lever to release the US pins, then lock them into position.

 

Australia and over 29 other countries - If you find yourself Down Under, use the top lever to release the US pins and twist them into position to match the Aussie socket type.

 

 

 

 

UK and over 47 other countries - The additional modular pin, seamlessly built into the Micro design, allows you to plug into UK-type sockets without having to use knives, pens or other dangerous options. Simply remove the modular pin from its location, slide it into the designated slot and press the side grip to lock it into position. Use the bottom lever to release the European pins, lock them into position, and you’re ready to plug your devices into UK-type sockets in seconds.

 

And when you're done, simply push to store and lock.

 

 

 

A power surge is a sudden spike in your home's or hotel's electrical current. The spike lasts less than a thousandth of a second, but it can be the end of your valuable devices. 

With Micro, you no longer have to worry about a surge frying your devices. The built-in 6.3A fuse keeps your devices safe, wherever you might be...

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

IF YOU WANT TO ORDER MORE THAN 10 MICRO's PLEASE CONTACT US AND WE WILL MAKE YOU A CUSTOM ORDER

 

 

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

 

MICRO is really awesome! Have you got a patent on it?

We knew you'd ask! And yes, MICRO is patent pending.

Are the pictures displayed on the campaign page of the final version of MICRO?

The footage on this page is of the final MICRO prototype. We will extend every effort to ensure the final version will be very close to this, although changes in design, functionality and materials might take place when optimising the design for certification and mass production.

I want to order multiple MICROs.

That's great! Check out some of our higher tiers that offer the number of units you wish to purchase.

What is the cost of shipping to my country?

MICRO will be delivered worldwide and the shipping cost is uniform for each ties, irrespective of the country you are from. To find out the shipping cost to your country, choose the tier you wish to pledge for and click on it. Once you've filled in your shipping details, Indiegogo will automatically display the shipping cost that will be added to your pledge. And the good news is: the higher the tier you pledge for, the lower the shipping cost.

Can MICRO be used in 13A sockets?

MICRO will be approved for up to 250V at 6.3A so it can be used with your regular gadgets (i.e. smart phone, tablet, etc.) in any country MICRO is compatible with.

What standards has MICRO been tested for?

After the InDemand campaign ends, MICRO will be tested according to CE and RoHs standards - the standards that travel adapter industry leaders follow. The testing is done by authorised laboratories to ensure MICRO meets all safety standards under normal use. MICRO has been designed to meet your requirements and allow you to use it worldwide without concern.

Does MICRO slouch if used with heavier plugs?

We've tested MICRO with plugs of all sizes. In fact, in the videos and photos displayed, we’ve used predominantly a UK plug because it is the heaviest. And as you can see, the results speak for themselves. However it is good to remember that the inside build of each socket is an important factor in how well MICRO holds.

What is MICRO made of?

MICRO is made of fire-retardant ABS, brass and environmentally friendly silicone.

Why do I have to plug MICRO upside down in Australia?

MICRO is plugged upside down in Australia to keep the correct plug-socket polarity in place. As a comparison, the European round pin socket has the Live connector on the right side, while the Australia socket has the Live connector on the left side.

What if I lose the modular pieces?

Although MICRO is modular, we’ve made sure to fit every component snuggly in the compact design. That makes the possibility of losing the modular pieces highly unlikely.

Do you guarantee delivery of my reward on or before December 2017?

While we will do our best to deliver all the rewards as soon as possible, it’s good to remember that some processes during mass production are not fully within our control and as such, the delivery date is not an absolute guarantee.

Also, because our Kickstarter backers have played an essential role in getting our project off the ground, we will be shipping their rewards first as a token of appreciation for their support early on. 

We value your support just as much and we will do our best to avoid any unnecessary delays so we can have your MICRO delivered to you as soon as possible.  

That being said, we’ve been very conservative in setting the delivery date. That’s because we’d rather exceed your expectations and deliver early than face delaying challenges and disappoint you.

One thing we can assure you of: we’ll maintain complete transparency and will communicate with you through all stages of manufacturing so you are always aware of the progress.

What shipping method will you use to send my reward?

We will use different couriers to ship to different countries, depending on the most efficient options. Please note each country has different import procedures and the custom clearance formalities may cause delivery delays that we have no control over.

What if my MICRO(s) arrived damaged?

According to statistics, 1% of all products shipped annually worldwide reach their destination damaged or faulty in some way due to mishandling.

We’ve done our due diligence and partnered with a highly qualified fulfilment centre to process all Indiegogo orders and ship your pledge efficiently and with the utmost care.

Nonetheless, in the unlikely situation your MICRO arrives damaged or faulty in any way, we will do our best to replace it as fast as possible.

Will I have to pay duties/VAT to receive my reward?

Because we ship globally and duties/taxes are different in each country, we cannot retain additional duties/VAT in a manner that is accurate and/or fair for each backer. Any applicable duties/VAT are therefore the responsibility of each backer. If any duties are applicable, these may be charged at the time of receiving the package.

To check whether or not there are duties/VAT charged at the time of receiving your reward, please contact your local post office.

What is your refund policy?

Once the campaign ends or your card is charged, your pledge (which we are extremely grateful for!) is immediately used to fire up the machines so MICRO gets delivered to you as soon as possible. For this reason, we cannot offer refunds to backers once their cards have been charged. In the very unlikely situation of a defective reward being shipped out, we will do our best to rectify the situation as soon as possible and in a manner that is satisfactory to you.

Does MICRO have a USB port?

MICRO doesn't have a USB port. Based on market research, people's biggest problem was that the adapters on the market are either small single socket ones, or they are universal and very bulky. Many of the adapters coming with a USB were slow-charging and ineffective.

Additionally the electronic components currently available on the market aren't small enough to allow for another function (i.e. USB port) while also maintaining MICRO’s small and compact design.

The most common gadgets people own/travel with are: mobile phones and laptop computers. Laptops come with USB ports as standard, so let’s address the issue of mobile phones.

When you buy any gadget that uses a USB port, it comes with a USB cable and a plug that fits the country you bought it from.

The market told us to create the world's smallest universal travel adapter solution that gives everybody the ability to adapt their plugs to any socket in the world, and look cool at the same time.

Got a question we haven't answered in our FAQs?

You are welcome to email us anytime at info@kickstartsuccess.co and one of our team members will get back to you with the answer faster than Usain Bolt runs 100m.
story_txt:
HERE IS A SNEAK PEAK OF MICRO's NEW SEXY DESIGN
MICRO - The World's Smallest Universal Travel Adapter with Surge Protection - Compatible in over 150 countries on all 7 continents. Patent PendingWith Micro, you get the functionality of a universal travel adapter built into a cool design that matches the awesomeness of the gadgets you travel with. An adapter that’s simple, yet versatile and that feels extremely familiar, as if you’ve already used it and loved it all your life.Compacting and combining all the functionality of a big, heavy, bulky universal travel adapter into a cool gadget that's smaller than a single socket travel adapter, Micro's versatility is second to none.MICRO is perfect for all your travel essentials.Micro makes your travel experience easier. Much sleeker and a lot cooler-looking, Micro is hands-down the world’s smallest and the best designed travel adapter you'll ever own.“Different” and “new” is relatively easy. Doing something that’s genuinely better is very hard! - Sir Jony Ive - Senior VP Design - Apple   Whether you are a business person with a small travel bag or a backpacker looking to minimize your travel load, Micro helps you stay light and ticks all the essential boxes with its innovative design and complete functionality. How small is Micro? See for yourself!   The integrated casing covers any 3rd pin safely so you don’t have to worry about exposed plug pins ever again!  The top and bottom release levers have 2 positions: locked and unlocked.To release a set of pins, slide the lever to the left (unlocked position).To lock a set of pins in place (either in open or stored position), slide the release levers to the right.The four faces of MICRO are everything you need in almost every country in the world!   The Americas and over 54 other countries - When you visit the United States, use the top lever to release the US pins, then lock them into position.  Australia and over 29 other countries - If you find yourself Down Under, use the top lever to release the US pins and twist them into position to match the Aussie socket type.  Europe and over 125 other countries - If you're traveling across Europe, use the bottom lever to release the European pins, then lock them into position.  UK and over 47 other countries - The additional modular pin, seamlessly built into the Micro design, allows you to plug into UK-type sockets without having to use knives, pens or other dangerous options. Simply remove the modular pin from its location, slide it into the designated slot and press the side grip to lock it into position. Use the bottom lever to release the European pins, lock them into position, and you’re ready to plug your devices into UK-type sockets in seconds.  And when you're done, simply push to store and lock.    A power surge is a sudden spike in your home's or hotel's electrical current. The spike lasts less than a thousandth of a second, but it can be the end of your valuable devices. With Micro, you no longer have to worry about a surge frying your devices. The built-in 6.3A fuse keeps your devices safe, wherever you might be...          IF YOU WANT TO ORDER MORE THAN 10 MICRO's PLEASE CONTACT US AND WE WILL MAKE YOU A CUSTOM ORDER   FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS MICRO is really awesome! Have you got a patent on it?We knew you'd ask! And yes, MICRO is patent pending.Are the pictures displayed on the campaign page of the final version of MICRO?The footage on this page is of the final MICRO prototype. We will extend every effort to ensure the final version will be very close to this, although changes in design, functionality and materials might take place when optimising the design for certification and mass production.I want to order multiple MICROs.That's great! Check out some of our higher tiers that offer the number of units you wish to purchase.What is the cost of shipping to my country?MICRO will be delivered worldwide and the shipping cost is uniform for each ties, irrespective of the country you are from. To find out the shipping cost to your country, choose the tier you wish to pledge for and click on it. Once you've filled in your shipping details, Indiegogo will automatically display the shipping cost that will be added to your pledge. And the good news is: the higher the tier you pledge for, the lower the shipping cost.Can MICRO be used in 13A sockets?MICRO will be approved for up to 250V at 6.3A so it can be used with your regular gadgets (i.e. smart phone, tablet, etc.) in any country MICRO is compatible with.What standards has MICRO been tested for?After the InDemand campaign ends, MICRO will be tested according to CE and RoHs standards - the standards that travel adapter industry leaders follow. The testing is done by authorised laboratories to ensure MICRO meets all safety standards under normal use. MICRO has been designed to meet your requirements and allow you to use it worldwide without concern.Does MICRO slouch if used with heavier plugs?We've tested MICRO with plugs of all sizes. story:
Click the Image for more information (visit  www.okply.com)

           PLY SNS :                                                        

     ***Indiegogo in-demand will end in May !! Don't miss the last pre-order opportunity.***

eCell Electronics complete the production system and started the first mass-produced product in June.  still available to buy PLY now.  we will ship every month.  Also buy at an offline shop and an online shop (ebay, Amazon etc.) at a  retail price.  PLY may give remote control as a free gift now.  

Available in the Korean market now. see the review of facebook. And 

Backers & Customers. Thank you for your feedback.

Riders Feedback

 

 Integrated HD Dash Cam   

PLY’s patented HD dash cam is embedded near the chin for incredible shot stability & shoots stunning 120° rider viewpoint footage. With HD (1280x720) resolution, 30 fps and a 1/3 inch sensor, PLY provide clear footage with no additional accessories/add-ons required.

Accident Record (Action Cam Function) In the unfortunate event of an accident, insurance and liability can depend on who can prove fault. PLY can record tangible video proof, utilizing the action cam function to record unexpected events that occur on the road.

 

Hands-Free Calls  

With an embedded speaker and mic, PLY allows riders to sync their smart phone audio to their helmet over Bluetooth. Take hands-free calls by pushing the take-call button once. Keep your grip on the handle for enhanced safety while communicating with your fellow riders.

Hear and be heard clearly on the road with active wind and traffic-noise cancelling. Always stay connected, even when out for a long ride.

Bluetooth Audio Navigation & Music Playback  

Compatible with your favorite navigation app, connect to Bluetooth to hear real-time directions to your final destination. With audio guidance, keep your focus on the road ahead. When connected to Bluetooth you can also listen to your favorite music, radio station or podcast. If a call is incoming, simply push the take-call button to answer and the music will pause. End the call and music will automatically resume playing.

 
Noise Reduction for Sound Quality 

Motorcycles at high speeds create loud wind noise. Wind noise resonates mainly in the low frequency bandwidth while the friction of wind against objects resonates primarily in the high frequencies. In PLY noise reduction technology is utilized to equalize both sound on the low and high frequency bandwidth allowing the human voice to be heard and spoken loud and clearly.

 

 

Air Circulation for Comfort
PLY has two vents in the front to allow for the inflow of cool air: one above the forehead and one beside the chin for upper and lower ventilation. Combined they provide for maximum air intake. Wide rear vents allow for the exhaust of warm air so you stay cool and comfortable.

 

Equipped with a fog, scratch and glare resistant sun visor, PLY keeps road vision clear and unimpeded. The visor handle can raise and lower the visor based on visibility needs. A full-face, flip-up shield provides a secondary layer of protection. Currently designed as a transparent screen, a smoke (tinted)  and silver chrome (mirror) shield are also in development. Shields can be removed or interchanged as needed.

 FOTA (Firmware On The Air)  

Through FOTA, the operating firmware for PLY can be upgraded wirelessly. FOTA will allow for remote bug repairs, software updates, and even the unveiling of additional new features

Helmet Size

Helmet Specification

 

Smart Specification

 

Team EcoCell Electronic 

Ecell Electronics is an embedded system and image processing technology company based out of South Korea. On the cutting edge of high-end image processing technology, Ecell Electronics develops video solutions for recording playback, storage and real-time preview even under the most extreme conditions. PLY marks the convergence of this technology, designed into a state-of-the-art helmet.

  Integrated HD Dash Cam   PLY’s patented HD dash cam is embedded near the chin for incredible shot stability & shoots stunning 120° rider viewpoint footage. With HD (1280x720) resolution, 30 fps and a 1/3 inch sensor, PLY provide clear footage with no additional accessories/add-ons required. Accident Record (Action Cam Function) In the unfortunate event of an accident, insurance and liability can depend on who can prove fault. PLY can record tangible video proof, utilizing the action cam function to record unexpected events that occur on the road. Hands-Free Calls   With an embedded speaker and mic, PLY allows riders to sync their smart phone audio to their helmet over Bluetooth. Take hands-free calls by pushing the take-call button once. Keep your grip on the handle for enhanced safety while communicating with your fellow riders.Hear and be heard clearly on the road with active wind and traffic-noise cancelling. Always stay connected, even when out for a long ride.Bluetooth Audio Navigation & Music Playback  Compatible with your favorite navigation app, connect to Bluetooth to hear real-time directions to your final destination. With audio guidance, keep your focus on the road ahead. When connected to Bluetooth you can also listen to your favorite music, radio station or podcast. If a call is incoming, simply push the take-call button to answer and the music will pause. End the call and music will automatically resume playing. Noise Reduction for Sound Quality Motorcycles at high speeds create loud wind noise. Wind noise resonates mainly in the low frequency bandwidth while the friction of wind against objects resonates primarily in the high frequencies. In PLY noise reduction technology is utilized to equalize both sound on the low and high frequency bandwidth allowing the human voice to be heard and spoken loud and clearly. Unlike headphones, helmets differ in position and distance from their ears, so in order to provide the best sound while driving, the helmet must be tuned to find the optimal sound.




Extended Battery LifeA 2800mAh lithium-ion battery is safely equipped in a battery slot located behind the neck. One full charge provides 23 hours of use when only in call stand-by mode. Even when operating all functionalities (call stand-by, music playback & recording) simultaneously, PLY can be used for 4+ continuous hours. At the low-battery threshold PLY automatically enters BT extension mode, for an additional 8 hours of call stand-by. Capable of reaching full charge in 3.5 ~ max 5 hours depending on simultaneous use, PLY is charged simply through any micro USB cable.

Control UXControlled by an intuitive 3-button control, PLY can be handled with minimal use of the hands. The Power button toggles On/Off while also controlling video recording. The Front Button toggles between BT/WiFi depending on your connectivity needs. The Back Button controls Bluetooth audio and call answering.
 
 
 Air Circulation for ComfortPLY has two vents in the front to allow for the inflow of cool air: one above the forehead and one beside the chin for upper and lower ventilation. Combined they provide for maximum air intake. Wide rear vents allow for the exhaust of warm air so you stay cool and comfortable. 
 Protective Sun Visor & ShieldEquipped with a fog, scratch and glare resistant sun visor, PLY keeps road vision clear and unimpeded. The visor handle can raise and lower the visor based on visibility needs. A full-face, flip-up shield provides a secondary layer of protection. Currently designed as a transparent screen, a smoke (tinted)  and silver chrome (mirror) shield are also in development. Shields can be removed or interchanged as needed.  




 FOTA (Firmware On The Air)  
Through FOTA, the operating firmware for PLY can be upgraded wirelessly. FOTA will allow for remote bug repairs, software updates, and even the unveiling of additional new features
 
 
Helmet SizeHelmet Specification Smart Specification   Team EcoCell Electronic Ecell Electronics is an embedded system and image processing technology company based out of South Korea. On the cutting edge of high-end image processing technology, Ecell Electronics develops video solutions for recording playback, storage and real-time preview even under the most extreme conditions. PLY marks the convergence of this technology, designed into a state-of-the-art helmet.

story:
Our Indiegogo campaign is over, so come visit us at our website to get your Easy Eddy Paddle Board!

Click here to visit our website: https://easyeddypaddleboards.com

 

Paddle boarding has become our favorite activity, but, let's face it, is not very convenient. Until now, the two options have been a difficult to store and transport hard boards or convenient, but poorly performing inflatable boards.

So we asked ourselves: How can we make a stand up paddle board that is both high-performance AND convenient (plus never need to be repaired)?

After years and many dollars in R&D, we're excited to bring you Easy Eddy, a convenient,  virtually indestructible,  high-performance three-piece paddle board!

We care about the oceans, lakes, rivers and ponds we paddle on, that's why we're making the Easy Eddy with recyclabled materials and ensuring that it is 100% recyclable. That means no styrofoam, no fiberglass, and no toxic PVC found in all non-recyclable hard boards and inflatable SUPs. 

As we developed and tested Easy Eddy, we realized that there were a few accessory items that make Easy Eddy even MORE convenient and portable.

Since our mission is to get MORE people on the water MORE easily and with hassle, we have manufactured a limited run of the following accessory add-ons:

  • Easy Eddy Carry Strap - INCLUDED WITH EVERY BOARD (MSRP of $50)
  • Artech Three-piece aluminum handled paddle - $50 (29% off MSRP of $70)
  • DELUXE Rolling Case - $200 (33% off MSRP of $300)
  • COMPLETE Easy Eddy Add On Pack - $235 (44% off MSRP of $420)

story:
deutsch / espanol
 

Worum geht es bei diesem Projekt „Grüner Tourismus“

¿De qué trata el proyecto "turismo verde"?

Grüner Tourismus bedeutet Nachhalitgkeit. Bei unserem Projekt geht um einen nachhaltigen Tourismus auf der schönsten Insel der Welt, Mallorca. Jährlich besuchen mehr als 13 Millionen Touristen die Insel, wobei mehr als 50% auf Autos und Roller zurückgreifen, um die Insel zu erkunden.

Die dadurch entstehende Umweltbelastung und der Co2 Ausstoß sind extrem hoch, sodass die Lebensqualität auf Mallorca stark beeinträchtigt wird. Das wollen wir von BikeKing ändern und in den nächsten Jahren zu 100 % auf Elektrofahrzeuge umrüsten. Bis zum Jahr 2025 wollen wir zu 100 % auf die Elektrovermietung setzen und die Marke BikeKing als Marktführer und Pionier etablieren.

Neben unserem Hauptstandort in Can Pastilla sollen in der Zukunft weitere Standorte in Palma Zentrum Palma Hafen, im Süd-Westen und im Norden der Insel entstehen.

Des Weiteren planen wir bis 2025 einen mit Solar,- und Windenergie betriebenen Parkplatz für unsere Fahrzeugflotte zu errichten.

 

El turismo verde significa sostenibilidad. Nuestro proyecto es sobre el turismo sostenible en Mallorca, la isla más bonita del mundo. Cada año más de 13 millones de turistas visitan la isla y más del 50 % utiliza coches y scooters para explorar la isla.

La contaminación ambiental y las emisiones de CO2 son muy elevadas, lo que afecta gravemente a la calidad de vida en Mallorca. En BikeKing queremos cambiar eso y convertir el 100 % en vehículos eléctricos en los próximos años. Para el año 2025, queremos centrarnos al 100 % en el alquiler de vehículos eléctricos y establecer la marca BikeKing como líder y pionero del mercado.

Además de nuestra ubicación principal en Can Pastilla, en el futuro se construirán otras ubicaciones en el centro de Palma, en el puerto de Palma, en el suroeste y en el norte de la isla.

Además de eso, planeamos construir un aparcamiento solar y eólico para nuestra flota de vehículos para el año 2025.

 

Ziele und Zielgruppe
Objetivos y grupo destinatario:

Unser Ziel ist es auf Mallorca und den benachbarten Balearischen Inseln eine nachhaltige und umweltfreundliche Fahrzeugflotte aus Autos, Motorrädern und Fahrrädern aufzubauen. Die Natur der Balearen muss erhalten bleiben, sodass auch zukünftig eine 100% Lebensqualität auf Mallorca garantiert werden kann.

Unsere Zielgruppe sind die 13 Millionen Touristen jährlich, die Mallorca als Reiseziel erkunden möchten.

 

Nuestro objetivo es construir una flota de coches, motos y bicicletas que sea sostenible y respetuosa con el medio ambiente en Mallorca y las Islas Baleares. El medio ambiente de las Islas Baleares debe ser preservado para que la calidad de vida en Mallorca esté garantizada al 100 % en el futuro.

Nuestro grupo objetivo son los 13 millones de turistas al año que quieren explorar Mallorca como destino turístico.

Wir haben unseren Ziele in 5 Etapen aufgeteilt:
Hemos dividido nuestros objetivos en 5 etapas:

  10,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte

  25,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte

  50,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte + Twizy Flotte

100,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte + Twizy Flotte + 1 weiterer Standort auf Mallorca

150,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte + Twizy Flotte + 1 weiterer Standort auf Mallorca

10.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco

25.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco

50.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco + flota de Twizy

100.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco + flota de Twizy + 1 emplazamiento adicional en Mallorca

150.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco + flota de Twizy + 1 emplazamiento adicional en Mallorca

 

Was passiert mit dem Geld
¿Qué pasa con el dinero que inviertes?

Dein Geld wird zu 100% in Firmenkapital umgewandelt, um in folgende Projekte zu investieren:-

Auf,- und Ausbau der Fahrzeugflotte

Auf,- und Ausbau der Standorte

Marketingaktivitäten, Kooperation mit Markenbotschaftern und Influencer

Su dinero será 100 % convertido en capital de la empresa para invertir en los siguientes proyectos:

Desarrollo y ampliación de la flota de vehículos, desarrollo y ampliación de los emplazamientos, actividades de Marketing, colaboraciones con embajadores de marcas e influencers

Wer ist BikeKing
¿Quién es BikeKing Mallorca?

Bikeking Mallorca wurde 2012 unter dem Namen „Svens Rollerking“ vom deutschen Unternehmer Sven Schmidthaus an der Playa de Palma gegründet. 2014 erfolgten neben der Namensänderung zu BikeKing auch die Erweiterung der Fahrzeugflotte und erste Kontakte zu Elektrofahrzeugen. 2017 startete Bikeking eine Kooperation mit dem Elektromotorrad-Hersteller Super Soco und erwarb die Exklusivrechte für die Vermietung von Elektromotorrädern auf Mallorca. Bis 2018 erweiterte Bikeking seine Elektroflotte auf 18 Fahrzeuge und vermietet neben Elektromotorrädern auch vier Twizys der Marke Renault. Die Marke Bikeking ist seit 2018 ebenfalls als geschützter Markenname im OEPM Register gelistet.

Bikeking engagiert sich des Weiteren aktiv im Sportsponsoring und ist seit 2016 Partner des mallorquinischen Drittligisten Club Deportivo Atlético Baleares. Seit 2018 ist Bikeking zudem, neben der Weltmarke Hyundai, einer der Hauptsponsoren der neugegründeten Frauenmannschaft von Atlético Baleares und setzt sich für die Gleichberechtigung im modernen Fußball ein.

 

BikeKing Mallorca fue fundada en 2012 bajo el nombre "Svens Rollerking" por el empresario alemán Sven Schmidthaus en la Playa de Palma. En 2014 la empresa cambió su nombre a BikeKing, amplió su flota de vehículos e hizo y apostó por primera vez por vehículos eléctricos. En 2017 BikeKing inició una colaboración con el fabricante de motocicletas eléctricas “Super Soco” y adquirió de esta manera también los derechos exclusivos para el alquiler de motocicletas eléctricas en Mallorca. Para 2018 Bikeking ya había ampliado su flota eléctrica a 18 vehículos, entre ellos también cuatro Renault Twizys y varias motocicletas eléctricas. La marca Bikeking también está inscrita en el Registro OEPM como marca protegida desde 2018.

Desde 2016 Bikeking también participa activamente en el patrocinio deportivo y es partner oficial del Club Deportivo Atlético Baleares, club de fútbol que milita en Segunda División B de Mallorca. Desde 2018 Bikeking también es uno de los patrocinadores principael del recién fundado equipo femenino del Atlético Baleares y está comprometido con la igualdad de derechos en el fútbol moderno.

 

Besuchen Sie uns auch unter: / Visítenos en:

Internet: www.BikeKing.es

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mallebike

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bikekingmallorca

TripAdvisor: BikeKing Mallorca
story_txt:
deutsch / espanol 
Worum geht es bei diesem Projekt „Grüner Tourismus“
¿De qué trata el proyecto "turismo verde"?

Grüner Tourismus bedeutet Nachhalitgkeit. Bei unserem Projekt geht um einen nachhaltigen Tourismus auf der schönsten Insel der Welt, Mallorca. Jährlich besuchen mehr als 13 Millionen Touristen die Insel, wobei mehr als 50% auf Autos und Roller zurückgreifen, um die Insel zu erkunden.
Die dadurch entstehende Umweltbelastung und der Co2 Ausstoß sind extrem hoch, sodass die Lebensqualität auf Mallorca stark beeinträchtigt wird. Das wollen wir von BikeKing ändern und in den nächsten Jahren zu 100 % auf Elektrofahrzeuge umrüsten. Bis zum Jahr 2025 wollen wir zu 100 % auf die Elektrovermietung setzen und die Marke BikeKing als Marktführer und Pionier etablieren.
Neben unserem Hauptstandort in Can Pastilla sollen in der Zukunft weitere Standorte in Palma Zentrum Palma Hafen, im Süd-Westen und im Norden der Insel entstehen.
Des Weiteren planen wir bis 2025 einen mit Solar,- und Windenergie betriebenen Parkplatz für unsere Fahrzeugflotte zu errichten.
 
El turismo verde significa sostenibilidad. Nuestro proyecto es sobre el turismo sostenible en Mallorca, la isla más bonita del mundo. Cada año más de 13 millones de turistas visitan la isla y más del 50 % utiliza coches y scooters para explorar la isla.
La contaminación ambiental y las emisiones de CO2 son muy elevadas, lo que afecta gravemente a la calidad de vida en Mallorca. En BikeKing queremos cambiar eso y convertir el 100 % en vehículos eléctricos en los próximos años. Para el año 2025, queremos centrarnos al 100 % en el alquiler de vehículos eléctricos y establecer la marca BikeKing como líder y pionero del mercado.
Además de nuestra ubicación principal en Can Pastilla, en el futuro se construirán otras ubicaciones en el centro de Palma, en el puerto de Palma, en el suroeste y en el norte de la isla.
Además de eso, planeamos construir un aparcamiento solar y eólico para nuestra flota de vehículos para el año 2025.
 

Ziele und ZielgruppeObjetivos y grupo destinatario:
Unser Ziel ist es auf Mallorca und den benachbarten Balearischen Inseln eine nachhaltige und umweltfreundliche Fahrzeugflotte aus Autos, Motorrädern und Fahrrädern aufzubauen. Die Natur der Balearen muss erhalten bleiben, sodass auch zukünftig eine 100% Lebensqualität auf Mallorca garantiert werden kann.
Unsere Zielgruppe sind die 13 Millionen Touristen jährlich, die Mallorca als Reiseziel erkunden möchten.
 
Nuestro objetivo es construir una flota de coches, motos y bicicletas que sea sostenible y respetuosa con el medio ambiente en Mallorca y las Islas Baleares. El medio ambiente de las Islas Baleares debe ser preservado para que la calidad de vida en Mallorca esté garantizada al 100 % en el futuro.
Nuestro grupo objetivo son los 13 millones de turistas al año que quieren explorar Mallorca como destino turístico.

Wir haben unseren Ziele in 5 Etapen aufgeteilt:Hemos dividido nuestros objetivos en 5 etapas:
  10,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte
  25,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte
  50,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte + Twizy Flotte
100,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte + Twizy Flotte + 1 weiterer Standort auf Mallorca
150,000 € Erweiterung der Super Soco Flotte + Twizy Flotte + 1 weiterer Standort auf Mallorca
10.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco
25.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco
50.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco + flota de Twizy
100.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco + flota de Twizy + 1 emplazamiento adicional en Mallorca
150.000 € Ampliación de la flota de Super Soco + flota de Twizy + 1 emplazamiento adicional en Mallorca
 
Was passiert mit dem Geld¿Qué pasa con el dinero que inviertes?
Dein Geld wird zu 100% in Firmenkapital umgewandelt, um in folgende Projekte zu investieren:-
Auf,- und Ausbau der Fahrzeugflotte
Auf,- und Ausbau der Standorte
Marketingaktivitäten, Kooperation mit Markenbotschaftern und Influencer
Su dinero será 100 % convertido en capital de la empresa para invertir en los siguientes proyectos:
Desarrollo y ampliación de la flota de vehículos, desarrollo y ampliación de los emplazamientos, actividades de Marketing, colaboraciones con embajadores de marcas e influencers

Wer ist BikeKing¿Quién es BikeKing Mallorca?
Bikeking Mallorca wurde 2012 unter dem Namen „Svens Rollerking“ vom deutschen Unternehmer Sven Schmidthaus an der Playa de Palma gegründet. 2014 erfolgten neben der Namensänderung zu BikeKing auch die Erweiterung der Fahrzeugflotte und erste Kontakte zu Elektrofahrzeugen. 2017 startete Bikeking eine Kooperation mit dem Elektromotorrad-Hersteller Super Soco und erwarb die Exklusivrechte für die Vermietung von Elektromotorrädern auf Mallorca. Bis 2018 erweiterte Bikeking seine Elektroflotte auf 18 Fahrzeuge und vermietet neben Elektromotorrädern auch vier Twizys der Marke Renault. Die Marke Bikeking ist seit 2018 ebenfalls als geschützter Markenname im OEPM Register gelistet.
Bikeking engagiert sich des Weiteren aktiv im Sportsponsoring und ist seit 2016 Partner des mallorquinischen Drittligisten Club Deportivo Atlético Baleares. Seit 2018 ist Bikeking zudem, neben der Weltmarke Hyundai, einer der Hauptsponsoren der neugegründeten Frauenmannschaft von Atlético Baleares und setzt sich für die Gleichberechtigung im modernen Fußball ein.
 
BikeKing Mallorca fue fundada en 2012 bajo el nombre "Svens Rollerking" por el empresario alemán Sven Schmidthaus en la Playa de Palma. En 2014 la empresa cambió su nombre a BikeKing, amplió su flota de vehículos e hizo y apostó por primera vez por vehículos eléctricos. En 2017 BikeKing inició una colaboración con el fabricante de motocicletas eléctricas “Super Soco” y adquirió de esta manera también los derechos exclusivos para el alquiler de motocicletas eléctricas en Mallorca. Para 2018 Bikeking ya había ampliado su flota eléctrica a 18 vehículos, entre ellos también cuatro Renault Twizys y varias motocicletas eléctricas. La marca Bikeking también está inscrita en el Registro OEPM como marca protegida desde 2018.
Desde 2016 Bikeking también participa activamente en el patrocinio deportivo y es partner oficial del Club Deportivo Atlético Baleares, club de fútbol que milita en Segunda División B de Mallorca. Desde 2018 Bikeking también es uno de los patrocinadores principael del recién fundado equipo femenino del Atlético Baleares y está comprometido con la igualdad de derechos en el fútbol moderno.
 
Besuchen Sie uns auch unter: / Visítenos en:
Internet: www.BikeKing.es
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mallebike
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bikekingmallorca
TripAdvisor: BikeKing Mallorca

story:
Your Grill for Everyday Carry 

Strong enough for the woods, sophisticated enough for the city.  This guiding principle lies at the heart of everything designed by Wolf and Grizzly.




 


 

 

 1. SIMPLE ASSEMBLY

The grill consists of two parts:  A frame that you spread open, and a cooking surface that you unroll and secure in place. There’s a swivelling stability rod under the grill surface that locks it in position for added weight support, and to ensure that your food is always secure, even with minor bumps as you add more fuel to your fire.

 

2. HEIGHT ADJUSTABILITY

Because there’s no such thing as “one fire fits all,” the WG Grill features three different height configurations:

 

HEIGHT 1 » 8.5" - The highest position, for cooking over a small wood fire.

HEIGHT 2 » 6.5" - Best for a charcoal BBQ on your driveway, backyard or balcony.

HEIGHT 3 » STAY-FLAT MODE - Expand the grill frame all the way out, and use what you have around you, so you can cook as high (or as low) as you feel compelled to.

 

3. 100% STAINLESS STEEL

Every component of the WG Grill — from the frame legs to the bolts and screws — is made out of stainless steel, ensuring that you don’t need to worry about the low melting point of aluminum or the low stability temperatures of teflon.  The 304 SS frame, rods and stability rod, as well as the technical stainless steel aircraft cable, make for a sturdy, corrosion-resistant experience that won’t have you wondering whether or not your portable grill can support you on your journey.  It can.

 

 

4. STORAGE AND CLEANING     

Smaller in diameter than most water bottles, and weighing in at approximately 1 kg (2.2 lb), the WG Grill is designed for easy transport and everyday use.

   

The WG Grill supporting the weight of 40 magazines (~16 kg / 35 lb). That’s about 320 hot dogs!

 



In all aspects of the grill design process, cleanability was at the forefront of the decisions that we made. Stainless steel’s nonporous and corrosion-resistant qualities keep the WG Grill naturally cleaner than many of its competitors. And we’ve avoided impossible-to-reach crevices to prevent the hidden build-up of bacteria.

Both the grill surface and frame are best cleaned by soaking them in hot water and then wiping them with a wet cloth. We’re also including a drying cloth so that you can wipe down the grill at your campsite, before wrapping it around the frame and stowing it away in its case. The cooking surface is also entirely dishwasher safe.



 

5. TIMELESS DESIGN

We’ve meticulously designed the WG Grill to ensure it’s built to stand the test of time — not only functionally, but also esthetically. Materials, finish and packaging were carefully selected so that a beautiful patina develops over time. You’ll be proud to watch this grill wear in, as it becomes a testament to the adventures that you’ll take with it.

 







                                      

6. ABOUT US

If you told me ten years ago that I’d be working at a startup called Wolf and Grizzly, investing heart, time and savings into building goods that get people outdoors… well, let’s just say that I wouldn’t have believed you. In fact, I spent most of the last decade at BlackBerry, first as an engineer, then later as a product manager responsible for the BlackBerry Keyboard. Yeah, that doesn’t sound quite so outdoors-y.  But what lay within me while there — and has always been a passion of mine — was the desire to build stuff for people.

I loved creating and using products that were beautifully functional, and functionally beautiful.  As BlackBerry’s device sales began to decline, and thousands were laid off, I had to choose between continuing to build out the dreams of others at a different high-tech firm, or starting to dream of what I would do when I was free. With the support of my family, my friends, and the people that later became part of the team, Wolf and Grizzly was formed in January of 2016.

One of the coolest things about WG is that it didn’t start with a product that we were trying to sell. Instead, it began with a frustration of mine that wasn’t specific to any single object.  Everything I owned could be grouped into one of two categories: things that looked great, but were weak — thus belonging in “the city” — and products that were functional and durable but clunky.  That second group of stuff didn’t feel like it could ever be used in the city without people staring at you awkwardly.

“Wolf and Grizzly” would become my outlet for creating a line of goods built to cater to the needs of adventurers in every context.

 

7. CREATIVE PROCESS

AN 18-MONTH ADVENTURE

In 2016, I reached out to an industrial designer that I had once worked with at BlackBerry — Joseph, who’s since become a good friend — and we began turning the principles and problems into a set of design requirements and kicked off an ideation phase. Teaming up with three other designers (Luke, Jack and Ryan), we then came up with a bunch of concepts that we felt were worth exploring further.  It took us eight months to get there.

One of those concepts was a portable grill — something that was light, easy to set up, and usable everywhere. This grill would need to stand in stark contrast with the “city grills” we’d seen or used, which were incredibly bulky and impractical for easy carrying, not to mention being ill-fitted for the woods.  It would also have to be far more usable in city and group contexts than the ultra-light options that were already out there.

Portable grill development began in October of 2016. Since then, we’ve worked the concept further and further, perfecting, prototyping and testing over and over and over again. We’ve encountered so many challenges, and often faced the option of making the “easy” design choices that others have made in the past: something heavier, harder to use, less robust. But we’ve pushed and pushed, constantly revising, even when it’s been hard and when it’s caused delays, in order to arrive at something that we think is amazing.  Something that’s enduring so it doesn’t just get tossed.  Something that’s got replaceable parts in case a component gets damaged over time.  Something that we’re proud to put our own names on.

 

__

FEATURED IN
