story:
WHY IS RADPAK DIFFERENT / BETTER?

HERE'S ONE OF THE REASONS...AND IT'S BIG  

900D Ballistic Nylon was developed for backpacks in late 2018. It's development was a push from backpack manufacturers to gain military contracts. Proving to be much stronger than Cordura and Polyester, Nylon 900D will become the material of choice for bags of the future.  But guess what? The future is now!

900D Nylon is already replacing the commonly used 600D Nylon for the military.  Its impenetrable design stops moisture to keep gear protected at all times.  And, 900D has been pressure tested to prevent tearing at 291 Newtons of force per square inch!  That's a lot of Newtons! 

900D Ballistic Nylon is the backpack material of the future.  RADPAK has it...NOW!  

--RADPAK Team

FRONT, BACK, AND WITH RAIN FLY

FILM PRODUCER MITCH BERGSMA REVIEWS RADPAK

Before you go any further, make sure you watch this video.  Don't just take our word for it...see what super influencer, film producer Mitch Bergsma told his nearly half a million Youtubers.

                                                  

         

                                                                       You gotta watch this!

Published on Feb 24, 2019

"Hey guys! Here's a new backpack called the RADPAK from MountNGo! This backpack literally has everything you have ever wanted in a bag! Check out my review of it and why it's so rad!"  --Mitch

AND, RADPAK OPENS LIKE A BOOK!

PERFECT FOR THE ADVENTURER/TRAVELER IN ALL OF US.

SECURE YOUR SNOWBOARD, SKIS OR SKATEBOARD...

...OR WHATEVER MAKES FOR YOUR FAVORITE ADVENTURE!

 

Salt Lake City, Utah - February 7, 2019 -- Lesley Murphy, star of The Bachelor, rocks the RADPAK backpack in Deer Valley, Utah! 

The RADPAK is a stylish bag but Lesley Murphy makes it look truly stunning!

We are absolutely thrilled to announce that a friend of RADPAK has agreed to lend her support.  Someone who will need no introduction for many of you, welcome Lesley Murphy! 

You may recognize Lesley from the popular television show "The Bachelor". She's an icon to many not just from her days on the hit television show but her bravery to undergo a double mastectomy. Her mother is a breast cancer survivor and after testing positive for the BRCA2 gene, Lesley underwent the preventative surgery. Today, she runs a luxury travel blog "The Road Les Traveled". Her travels take her to so many amazing places around the globe. In this photo she sports the Stratacous Series RADPAK by MountnGo on her skiing adventures in Deer Valley Utah!

So on we all go, with the rest of our adventure!

--RADPAK TEAM--

The RADPAK team has evolved by taking the best from three separate companies and melding them into one, to create the RADPAK backpack. MountnGo, GoScope and Stratacous have market presence and backers and supporters in excess of 50,000.  And we've heard from a lot of them who, in a nutshell have told us, "Hey, we need a backpack that is rugged and water resistant and can fit our clothing and gear plus some of our toys, like drones and cameras.  Oh, and it's gotta be carry-on size...and it can't be super expensive."

As project leader, MountnGo the company (www.mountngo.com), was first conceived with the knowledge that there are so many people out there taking life to another level~ squeezing the absolute most out of every day.  We wanted to make products especially for them...and we did. Our first products were not backpacks at all, but rather all-weather mounts for phones and tablets that can be taken anywhere people want to use digital devices. And, our working relationship with GoPro's Software Developer Program helped us create the first app in the world that remotely voice controls any GoPro camera ever made. You can find "theverbapp" in the Apple App Store.  So we've had the hearts and minds of travelers and adventurers in our sights right from the start.

But the driving force behind RADPAK, is Stratacous.  "Strat" lives what RADPAK is all about, every day!

STRAT WITH HIS MAN'S BEST FRIEND, ZONDERVAN.

Q.  How would you describe what you do?

A.  I travel the world and live life to the absolute fullest.  

Q.  And why does this resonate with so many people?  

A.  Everyone wants to travel and leave the reality they’re in.  Sometimes people have excuses as to why they can’t do it and thus they live vicariously through me.  But I want to take one of those excuses away so anyone can be ready, anytime, whether it's for one hour, one day, a few weeks or a year, to pick up and just go LIVE!  RADPAK will help them be prepared to do just that.  

Q. What will hitting or exceeding your financial goals mean for you?

 A. I hope this doesn't sound too corny...but I really love inspiring people to get up off the couch, maybe ease up a bit on their gaming (laughs), try new things--experience some of what I have experienced. I've found being prepared and organized is ultra-important.  With RADPAK, I want people to feel like they're ready to go, anytime, so travel becomes less hassle, more adventure.  So hitting our financial goal means I've helped a lot of people to experience life in a way they may have always dreamed.

Here's what people are saying about our prototype.... 

"When I heard you were doing this I thought to myself, 'this is going to be epic' Aaaaand it is.  It looks as if you’ve thought of everything for the design - accessible pockets, organization, comfort, weather resistance - all the things." 

"I like that name RADPAK. The zipper seal keep water and moisture out is an immediate must have. The suitcase aspect of it is so cool. Love how much it can hold gear, and stuff. Side pockets, USB port, it can do and hold just about anything you want. Wow I really want this backpack.﻿"

"I love having safe compartments for all my photography gear--even my drone.  It's amazing!" 

"I've gone through a ton of backpacks...this one seems really durable has pretty much just what I need.  Seems like they've thought of everything!"   

"One thing it has that I always look for, this sounds silly but a padded waist strap that has storage pockets. To me that is so important. Glad to see this one has them on both sides. It looks perfect for all my camera needs, GoPro, Insta360, Canon, and DJI. l'll be checking this out!﻿" 

GO BALLISTIC!  

NEW, 900D BALLISTIC NYLON MATERIAL PUTS RADPAK ON A WHOLE NEW LEVEL.  

IT'S RIDICULOUSLY DURABLE AND COMFORTABLE.

Another few words on 900D:  The "D" in 900D stands for "denier." The higher the "D," the stronger the fabric.  It does not directly correlate to thread count or weight (as in how much the fabric weighs). So comparatively 900D fabric is stronger than 600D, which is stronger than 400D, etc., but it doesn't weigh more.

BREAKTHROUGH MATERIAL: NO OTHER CONSUMER BACKPACKS OUT THERE THAT WE KNOW OF ARE MADE WITH THIS NEW, 900D BALLISTIC NYLON. IT'S LIGHT, IT'S MILITARY-GRADE DURABLE, IT'S WATER RESISTANT, AND IT LOOKS AMAZING.

 

With the Stratacous Series RADPAK by MountNGo, we've designed the world's most durable backpack for travelers, adventurers, and photographers with the latest in high tech features. RADPAK will prove to be the most powerful tool in your arsenal of gear. 

Whether it's hiking the Kalalau Trail in Hawaii, braving the corkscrew climb up Ancient Art in Utah, or simply just heading out for the day, RADPAK has you covered! 

Our team noticed that too many bags seemed to have been designed by people sitting behind computers. So we decided to hand the drawing board over to adrenaline junkie STRATACOUS (Strat). Strat designed the bag to be superior on every level. No matter the environment, no matter the adventure, he has created  a truly remarkable backpack! 

RADPAK allows you to pack in a ton of clothing, and  be drone, SLR, and GoPro ready at all times with easy access compartments to your most essential gear. You decide the configuration of the bag to meet your needs. 

Waterproof zippers and nylon wicking fabric prevent moisture from entering the pack. Need extra protection? RADPACK comes standard with an integrated rain fly tested to hold back the fiercest rain. Ski, snowboard and skateboard straps maximize carrying capacity, while padded straps and compartments carry bulky gear without loading you down. 

Ever struggle to charge your electronics on the go?  RADPAK comes with an integrated, water-resistant USB connection for hooking up to your external battery supply. Charge your gear without opening the bag, it's that easy!  Be prepared.  Be organize.  Be RAD.   --RADPAK Team--

Here's what makes it perfect for travelers, photographers and adventurers! 

Long trips, short trips, doesn’t matter...

- Ballistic 900D nylon exterior with rip- stop stress points (water resistant)  

- Integrated external USB connection for power devices outside of pack

- Rain fly with reversible design to hold shoulder straps and waist straps while traveling

- Honeycomb neoprene custom molded backing (breathable and sweat resistant)

- Snowboard/skateboard carrying straps and side load ski carrying straps 

- Molly webbing, D-rings, and added water bottle mesh compartment    

- Security band for connecting to roller bag trolley handle   

- Even load weight distributing dual shoulder strap design 

- And it's TSA carry-on compliant!

OUTSIDE

Are you someone who really enjoys experiencing life?  Truly living, not just surviving. The Stratacous Series RADPAK by MountnGo was designed by adventure traveler Stratacous, just for you. 

Our talented design team and manufacturing partner created the RADPAK backpack for active adventurers who seek to get the most out of life. RADPAK is functional, durable and looks pretty sweet too.  Short trips or long, take it everywhere you go!  

OUTSIDE

REMOVABLE, REVERSIBLE RAIN FLY ATTACHES FROM INSIDE THE BACKPACK

FITS AS CARRY-ON...IT'S TSA COMPLIANT!

HONEYCOMB NEOPRENE CUSTOM MOLDED BACKING (BREATHABLE AND SWEAT RESISTANT)--SO EASY ON THE BACK YOU WON'T BELIEVE IT.

                 SECURITY BAND FOR CONNECTING TO ROLLER BAG TROLLEY HANDLE.

EVEN LOAD WEIGHT DISTRIBUTING, DUAL SHOULDER STRAP DESIGN. STANDS UPRIGHT ON FLAT SURFACES EVEN WHEN EMPTY.  

INTEGRATED EXTERNAL USB CONNECTION FOR POWER DEVICES OUTSIDE OF THE BACKPACK.

CONVENIENT SAFETY POCKET.

QUICK-ATTACH D-RINGS.

NEW...Bright, electric green rain fly with reflective print logo lets you be seen.

NEW...And choose our inspiring pink rain fly with reflective print logo and we'll donate $1 for Breast Cancer Research.

INSIDE

TAILOR RADPAK TO SUIT YOUR SPECIFIC NEEDS. REMOVABLE, FLEXIBLE DIVIDERS CREATE SPACE FOR CLOTHING AND/OR GEAR AND EQUIPMENT, ALL IN ONE BACKPACK.

TONS OF ROOM FOR CLOTHES AND GEAR.

STORE DRONES, CAMERA AND VIDEO EQUIPMENT SAFELY AND SECURELY.

PADDED COMPARTMENT TO STORE YOUR LAPTOP.

STRAT STREETMAN: Was born and raised on the gulf of Mississippi.  Strat grew up skateboarding and skimboarding and started traveling after graduating in 2009.  This ignited his love for travel, adventure, and photography! He moved to Utah and joined DevinSuperTramp as a stunt athlete in 2013.  He has traveled to 47 states and 32 countries since. His goal is to inspire people to find and do what they love. He will be moving to Hawaii in May to start doing coral restoration to help save the oceans. 

KYLE SCAROLA:  Born and raised in South Florida, Kyle has spent most of his life on a tropical adventure. His addiction to the ocean is only shadowed by his passion for film making. In 2011, Kyle quit his 9-5 and started his own camera accessories company called GoScope.  For 7 years he's been running the Denver, NC based company. He's designed a wide range of accessories for Action Cameras, Mirrorless SLR Cameras, and Drone Quadcopters. Kyle's focus over the past three years has been concentrated in the drone market place. He's designed top-selling Specialty Backpacks and cases for DJI drones. Being a consumer himself, product development comes naturally to Kyle as he applies various inventions to real-world applications. "We are always improving engineering methods to stay ahead of the competition."    

ALLEN TAIT, BROCK TREDWAY, DAVE TOMER:  It's all about work/life balance, right?  We know it's incriminating with the beach in the background, but we do hold up the business end of this adventure. We've all got extensive financial services industry backgrounds (which comes in handy when you're launching a company) and are longtime entrepreneurs and friends.  That's us--from left to right, Allen, Brock and Dave from MountnGo. But we can't create an amazing, awesome backpack from the office or hanging out on the beach, so Strat and Kyle are out there crushing it, figuring out exactly what we need. Together, we believe we've created a backpack you'll ABSOLUTELY LOVE!

PRODUCT WARRANTY

At MountnGo, we stand behind our products.  If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality simply send it back and we will make it right. 

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

Cannot mark as gift, this is illegal, so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB Destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location.

Here is a handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the U.S. dollars to your local currency: https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/  

Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars.

Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars: http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-e...

SHIPPING POLICY 

Within 24 hours of your order being shipped you will receive a tracking link with your shipping details. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. 

Your order will ship out from our shipping facility in Denver, North Carolina. Domestic Orders will go through FedEx Ground Services (2-4 business days). Orders to Hawaii and Alaska will go through USPS (3-5 business days). International Orders are shipped with FedEx International Economy Services (5-8 business days).   

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. There are many moving parts that must be managed. However, the team has successfully launched over a dozen products and can confidently say that we are experienced in this process and have developed systems and processes to mitigate the risks and obstacles that will arise. Since production is underway, we have already overcome the most significant product development challenges.  We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible. Thanks for believing in us!
story_txt:
WHY IS RADPAK DIFFERENT / BETTER?
HERE'S ONE OF THE REASONS...AND IT'S BIG  
900D Ballistic Nylon was developed for backpacks in late 2018. It's development was a push from backpack manufacturers to gain military contracts. Proving to be much stronger than Cordura and Polyester, Nylon 900D will become the material of choice for bags of the future.  But guess what? The future is now!
900D Nylon is already replacing the commonly used 600D Nylon for the military.  Its impenetrable design stops moisture to keep gear protected at all times.  And, 900D has been pressure tested to prevent tearing at 291 Newtons of force per square inch!  That's a lot of Newtons! 
900D Ballistic Nylon is the backpack material of the future.  RADPAK has it...NOW!  
--RADPAK Team

FRONT, BACK, AND WITH RAIN FLY
FILM PRODUCER MITCH BERGSMA REVIEWS RADPAK
Before you go any further, make sure you watch this video.  Don't just take our word for it...see what super influencer, film producer Mitch Bergsma told his nearly half a million Youtubers.
                                                  

         
                                                                       You gotta watch this!
Published on Feb 24, 2019
"Hey guys! Here's a new backpack called the RADPAK from MountNGo! This backpack literally has everything you have ever wanted in a bag! Check out my review of it and why it's so rad!"  --Mitch
AND, RADPAK OPENS LIKE A BOOK!


PERFECT FOR THE ADVENTURER/TRAVELER IN ALL OF US.

SECURE YOUR SNOWBOARD, SKIS OR SKATEBOARD...

...OR WHATEVER MAKES FOR YOUR FAVORITE ADVENTURE!


 
Salt Lake City, Utah - February 7, 2019 -- Lesley Murphy, star of The Bachelor, rocks the RADPAK backpack in Deer Valley, Utah! 

The RADPAK is a stylish bag but Lesley Murphy makes it look truly stunning!
We are absolutely thrilled to announce that a friend of RADPAK has agreed to lend her support.  Someone who will need no introduction for many of you, welcome Lesley Murphy! 
You may recognize Lesley from the popular television show "The Bachelor". She's an icon to many not just from her days on the hit television show but her bravery to undergo a double mastectomy. Her mother is a breast cancer survivor and after testing positive for the BRCA2 gene, Lesley underwent the preventative surgery. Today, she runs a luxury travel blog "The Road Les Traveled". Her travels take her to so many amazing places around the globe. In this photo she sports the Stratacous Series RADPAK by MountnGo on her skiing adventures in Deer Valley Utah!
So on we all go, with the rest of our adventure!
--RADPAK TEAM--





The RADPAK team has evolved by taking the best from three separate companies and melding them into one, to create the RADPAK backpack. MountnGo, GoScope and Stratacous have market presence and backers and supporters in excess of 50,000.  And we've heard from a lot of them who, in a nutshell have told us, "Hey, we need a backpack that is rugged and water resistant and can fit our clothing and gear plus some of our toys, like drones and cameras.  Oh, and it's gotta be carry-on size...and it can't be super expensive."

As project leader, MountnGo the company (www.mountngo.com), was first conceived with the knowledge that there are so many people out there taking life to another level~ squeezing the absolute most out of every day.  We wanted to make products especially for them...and we did. Our first products were not backpacks at all, but rather all-weather mounts for phones and tablets that can be taken anywhere people want to use digital devices. And, our working relationship with GoPro's Software Developer Program helped us create the first app in the world that remotely voice controls any GoPro camera ever made. You can find "theverbapp" in the Apple App Store.  So we've had the hearts and minds of travelers and adventurers in our sights right from the start.
But the driving force behind RADPAK, is Stratacous.  "Strat" lives what RADPAK is all about, every day!

STRAT WITH HIS MAN'S BEST FRIEND, ZONDERVAN.
Q.  How would you describe what you do?
A.  I travel the world and live life to the absolute fullest.  
Q.  And why does this resonate with so many people?  
A.  Everyone wants to travel and leave the reality they’re in.  Sometimes people have excuses as to why they can’t do it and thus they live vicariously through me.  But I want to take one of those excuses away so anyone can be ready, anytime, whether it's for one hour, one day, a few weeks or a year, to pick up and just go LIVE!  RADPAK will help them be prepared to do just that.  
Q. What will hitting or exceeding your financial goals mean for you?
 A. I hope this doesn't sound too corny...but I really love inspiring people to get up off the couch, maybe ease up a bit on their gaming (laughs), try new things--experience some of what I have experienced. I've found being prepared and organized is ultra-important.  With RADPAK, I want people to feel like they're ready to go, anytime, so travel becomes less hassle, more adventure.  So hitting our financial goal means I've helped a lot of people to experience life in a way they may have always dreamed.



Here's what people are saying about our prototype.... 
"When I heard you were doing this I thought to myself, 'this is going to be epic' Aaaaand it is.  It looks as if you’ve thought of everything for the design - accessible pockets, organization, comfort, weather resistance - all the things." 
"I like that name RADPAK. The zipper seal keep water and moisture out is an immediate must have. The suitcase aspect of it is so cool. Love how much it can hold gear, and stuff. Side pockets, USB port, it can do and hold just about anything you want. Wow I really want this backpack.﻿"
"I love having safe compartments for all my photography gear--even my drone.  It's amazing!" 
"I've gone through a ton of backpacks...this one seems really durable has pretty much just what I need.  Seems like they've thought of everything!"   
"One thing it has that I always look for, this sounds silly but a padded waist strap that has storage pockets. To me that is so important. Glad to see this one has them on both sides. It looks perfect for all my camera needs, GoPro, Insta360, Canon, and DJI. l'll be checking this out!﻿" 

GO BALLISTIC!  
NEW, 900D BALLISTIC NYLON MATERIAL PUTS RADPAK ON A WHOLE NEW LEVEL.  
IT'S RIDICULOUSLY DURABLE AND COMFORTABLE.
Another few words on 900D:  The "D" in 900D stands for "denier." The higher the "D," the stronger the fabric.  It does not directly correlate to thread count or weight (as in how much the fabric weighs). So comparatively 900D fabric is stronger than 600D, which is stronger than 400D, etc., but it doesn't weigh more.

BREAKTHROUGH MATERIAL: NO OTHER CONSUMER BACKPACKS OUT THERE THAT WE KNOW OF ARE MADE WITH THIS NEW, 900D BALLISTIC NYLON. IT'S LIGHT, IT'S MILITARY-GRADE DURABLE, IT'S WATER RESISTANT, AND IT LOOKS AMAZING.
 
With the Stratacous Series RADPAK by MountNGo, we've designed the world's most durable backpack for travelers, adventurers, and photographers with the latest in high tech features. RADPAK will prove to be the most powerful tool in your arsenal of gear. 
Whether it's hiking the Kalalau Trail in Hawaii, braving the corkscrew climb up Ancient Art in Utah, or simply just heading out for the day, RADPAK has you covered! 
Our team noticed that too many bags seemed to have been designed by people sitting behind computers. So we decided to hand the drawing board over to adrenaline junkie STRATACOUS (Strat). Strat designed the bag to be superior on every level. No matter the environment, no matter the adventure, he has created  a truly remarkable backpack! 
RADPAK allows you to pack in a ton of clothing, and  be drone, SLR, and GoPro ready at all times with easy access compartments to your most essential gear. You decide the configuration of the bag to meet your needs. 
Waterproof zippers and nylon wicking fabric prevent moisture from entering the pack. Need extra protection? RADPACK comes standard with an integrated rain fly tested to hold back the fiercest rain. Ski, snowboard and skateboard straps maximize carrying capacity, while padded straps and compartments carry bulky gear without loading you down. 
Ever struggle to charge your electronics on the go?  RADPAK comes with an integrated, water-resistant USB connection for hooking up to your external battery supply. Charge your gear without opening the bag, it's that easy!  Be prepared.  Be organize.  Be RAD.   --RADPAK Team--

- And it's TSA carry-on compliant!

story:
The world’s most comfortable, versatile, and durable pair of waterproof, leather gloves.

The 4-Season Glove is designed to endure all of life’s challenges and enable seamless transition between work, play, and everything in between.

Life is awesome, but we have a tendency to restrict ourselves and fall into monotony. Give’r provides a tangible reminder to ourselves and those around us to seize opportunities in the everyday and to give life our all. Give'r promotes a lifestyle fueled by passion, purpose, challenge and adventure.

We aim to inspire the unrelenting pursuit of dreams, the confidence to take the road less traveled, and the desire to share the wonders of life with others.

We promote these beliefs by designing and creating straightforward, fun, comfortable apparel and accessories, made for the Give’r that lives within us all.

 Choosing to Give’r doesn’t solely pertain to outdoor adventures, it’s about giving it your all in everything you do. If you’re trying a completely new hobby, starting a company, or even moving halfway across the world to discover new experiences, the 4-Season Gloves are here to put adventure back in your hands.

These gloves are designed and built to get the job done so you can Give’r however you choose! Whether you’re a man or woman, parent or child, student or teacher, professional or amateur, these gloves were designed for YOU!  Get out there and live it up!

Designed for your day-to-day adventures, the 4-Season Gloves are perfect for travelers, adventurers, athletes, and everyone in-between. They’re more than just great-looking comfortable gloves, they’re a daily reminder to seize opportunities in the everyday and live your life to the fullest.

The new 4-Season Gloves’ leather exterior provides superior dexterity, durability, and insulation for your hands. The gloves are waterproof and designed to handle colder temperatures and intense winter weather, while at the same time tough enough to literally hold a burning log. 

The 4-Season Gloves keep you warm and comfortable whether you’re gardening, skiing, chopping wood, climbing a mountain, or even dog-sledding. They make the cut for essential everyday gear that looks good, feels good and gets the job done.

Use the 4-Season Gloves for any cold-weather sport, work, or recreational activities. These gloves are as multifunctional as you are.


Sizing (you will choose once the campaign is over):

If you have longer fingers and are on the line between sizes then go with the larger size of the two. If you are in between sizes on the chart, and like a tighter fit, then go with the smaller size; if you like a roomier relaxed fit, then go with the larger size.

Comparison to sizing on Classic Give’r Gloves: The 4-Season Gloves are designed to be more form fitting when compared to the Classic Give’r Gloves. While most customers wear the same size in both styles, if you are between sizes, or find your Classic Gloves to fit snugly, we recommend you select the larger size of options.

Initial Branding: 

 

Each glove is as unique as their owner, and we take great pride in the workmanship and attention to detail needed to make a pair of glove truly YOURS. Limit of three letters if you choose to have your gloves branded, branded on both the left and right hand.

Wax “Bomb-Proof” Coating:

We will hand-treat and bake your gloves with bee’s wax, saturating the all-leather shell, resulting in a look that is as tough as the gloves themselves.

We set out to design a timeless and stylish pair of gloves that is utilitarian through and through. Any day, any situation...this one glove does it all.

  Durable Shell

The outermost layer features top grade cow leather that is tanned and treated to be waterproof. While cheaper alternatives exist, this leather was selected because it is the toughest available/on the market, yet soft and quick to break in. Leather shell has been reinforced for wear and tear on palms and fingertips.

 Hipora Membrane

The second layer of the 4-Season Glove features a membrane that is wind-proof and waterproof, protecting your hands and keeping them warm and dry. This membrane features tiny microscopic perforations that enables water vapor to escape, keeping your hands ready for action.

Thinsulate Insulation

The third and innermost layer utilizes material that is breathable and moisture-resistant to keep you warm and comfortable. Thinsulate insulation works by trapping heated air molecules between you and the outside thereby keeping your hands warm and isolated from the cold.

Leather Skirt

Leather skirt keeps snow, moisture and other material out of the gloves when putting them on and while wearing them. The inner cuff of skirt provides the perfect canvas for the Give’r Crew to hand brand your initials.

Leather Strap On Cuff

Pull straps make it easy and non-damaging to put on or remove your gloves as quickly as as you like.

Elastic Cuff

The compact design of the elastic cuff provides a snug fit, yet flexible fit around your wrist. Keeps heat in and and everything else out while remaining comfortable enough to wear all day.

Evolved from our best selling Classic Give’r Glove, coined “The Glove of 100 Uses”. The demanding terrain and temperature extremes encountered by the Give’r community resulted in countless requests for a glove that retained the core of the Classic, but incorporated additional features and enhanced performance.

Over the past year and a half, we have designed and tested more than two dozen glove prototypes in our pursuit of this glove.

Give’r was founded in March 2012 in Jackson Hole, Wyoming. Our product line began with two t-shirts, two hats and a commitment to our customers that we’d stop at nothing to ensure they were happy with their Give’r Gear. Our dream has come to life through 4 years of working multiple jobs, taking challenges head-on, continuously learning, receiving a tremendous amount of help, and our belief that the world is a better place with Give’r in it.

 The road for a lifestyle apparel start-up company in Wyoming is not paved or easy-going, but we have been living by our motto, and have given our all to shape this vision into reality. We are beyond psyched with this opportunity made possible by Kickstarter and you, our backers, to write the next chapter of the Give’r story. Without your help, we wouldn’t exist. We are eager to set our roots and charge forward as a company that exemplifies what can be possible when you follow your heart. We take this step with confidence in our products and wholehearted gratitude for all those in our corner, cheering us on. 

 We strongly believe in giving back through service and financial support, and have worked with dozens of local, regional, national and international non-profits since our inception. We believe in forming community by working with local businesses and connecting our customers from across the globe. We are proud members of 1% for the Planet and 1% for the Tetons, and are committed to playing an active role in making the world a better place for generations to come.

Our goal is to bring to life the Give’r that lives within us all. Straightforward, fun, comfortable apparel and accessories were at our core on day one, and we have built upon this foundation over the last 4 years. Your support enables our team to be fully dedicated to Give’r while maintaining control of our mission and the ability to take risks that may not be possible through traditional fundraising means. 

 While the 4-Season Gloves were merely an idea 2 years ago, the opportunity to share a final product in the flesh is something we are extremely proud of. We have completed the initial short-run of production and are as psyched as our videos and pictures show. They are freakin’ awesome. We are a young company, and putting the 4-Season Gloves into full production takes a lot of work and capital. We are 110% committed to the work in front of us, but need your help in bringing the 4-Season Gloves to life at large-scale production. Take advantage of the big time discounts from retail pricing and join in the effort to support a company who is giving it their all to bring you the best damn gloves ever.

It all began in 2011 with the design and creation of custom hats commemorating an epic annual kayaking expedition in Ontario, Canada. These hats, featuring the skyline of the Tetons and the colloquial phrase “give’r”, were the seed from which Give’r was born. This team, with help from an awesome and ever-growing community, gave life to a philosophy and lifestyle that is perfectly embodied by these 4-Season Gloves...our greatest creation to date!

The world’s most comfortable, versatile, and durable pair of waterproof, leather gloves.
The 4-Season Glove is designed to endure all of life’s challenges and enable seamless transition between work, play, and everything in between.







 
Useful Ordering Information!

How do you choose your size?

We will send you a follow up survey in May asking for your sizes.
Do the 4-Season Gloves come with Wax Coating and Initial Branding?

After you order the 4-Season Gloves, we will send an email to you with options to upgrade your gloves with Wax Coating and Initial Branding.

 Choosing to Give’r doesn’t solely pertain to outdoor adventures, it’s about giving it your all in everything you do. If you’re trying a completely new hobby, starting a company, or even moving halfway across the world to discover new experiences, the 4-Season Gloves are here to put adventure back in your hands.





These gloves are designed and built to get the job done so you can Give’r however you choose! Whether you’re a man or woman, parent or child, student or teacher, professional or amateur, these gloves were designed for YOU!  Get out there and live it up!




















Designed for your day-to-day adventures, the 4-Season Gloves are perfect for travelers, adventurers, athletes, and everyone in-between. They’re  more than just great-looking comfortable gloves, they’re a daily reminder to seize opportunities in the everyday and live your life to the fullest.















The new 4-Season Gloves’ leather exterior provides superior dexterity, durability, and insulation for your hands. The gloves are waterproof and designed to handle colder temperatures and intense winter weather, while at the same time tough enough to literally hold a burning log. 















The 4-Season Gloves keep you warm and comfortable whether you’re gardening, skiing, chopping wood, climbing a mountain, or even dog-sledding. They make the cut for essential everyday gear that looks good, feels good and gets the job done.
Use the 4-Season Gloves for any cold-weather sport, work, or recreational activities. These gloves are as multifunctional as you are.





































                                 

Sizing (you will choose once the campaign is over):
















If you have longer fingers and are on the line between sizes then go with the larger size of the two. If you are in between sizes on the chart, and like a tighter fit, then go with the smaller size; if you like a roomier relaxed fit, then go with the larger size. 
Comparison to sizing on Classic Give’r Gloves: The 4-Season Gloves are designed to be more form fitting when compared to the Classic Give’r Gloves.  While most customers wear the same size in both styles, if you are between sizes, or find your Classic Gloves to fit snugly, we recommend you select the larger size of options.
Initial Branding: 





 
 Each glove is as unique as their owner, and we take great pride in the workmanship and attention to detail needed to make a pair of glove truly YOURS. Limit of three letters if you choose to have your gloves branded, branded on both the left and right hand.





Wax “Bomb-Proof” Coating:





We will hand-treat and bake your gloves with bee’s wax, saturating the all-leather shell, resulting in a look that is as tough as the gloves themselves.










We set out to design a timeless and stylish pair of gloves that is utilitarian through and through. Any day, any situation...this one glove does it all.





  Durable Shell





The outermost layer features top grade cow leather that is tanned and treated to be waterproof.  While cheaper alternatives exist, this leather was selected because it is the toughest available/on the market, yet soft and quick to break in.  Leather shell has been reinforced for wear and tear on palms and fingertips.





 Hipora Membrane





The second layer of the 4-Season Glove features a membrane that is wind-proof and waterproof, protecting your hands and keeping them warm and dry.  This membrane features tiny microscopic perforations that enables water vapor to escape, keeping your hands ready for action.





Thinsulate Insulation





The third and innermost layer utilizes material that is breathable and moisture-resistant to keep you warm and comfortable. Thinsulate insulation works by trapping heated air molecules between you and the outside thereby keeping your hands warm and isolated from the cold. 





Leather Skirt





Leather skirt keeps snow, moisture and other material out of the gloves when putting them on and while wearing them. The inner cuff of skirt provides the perfect canvas for the Give’r Crew to hand brand your initials.





Leather Strap On Cuff






Pull straps make it easy and non-damaging to put on or remove your gloves as quickly as as you like.





Elastic Cuff





The compact design of the elastic cuff provides a snug fit, yet flexible fit around your wrist. Keeps heat in and and everything else out while remaining comfortable enough to wear all day.













Evolved from our best selling Classic Give’r Glove, coined “The Glove of 100 Uses”.  The demanding terrain and temperature extremes encountered by the Give’r community resulted in countless requests for a glove that retained the core of the Classic, but incorporated additional features and enhanced performance.
Over the past year and a half, we have designed and tested more than two dozen glove prototypes in our pursuit of this glove.















Give’r was founded in March 2012 in Jackson Hole, Wyoming. Our product line began with two t-shirts, two hats and a commitment to our customers that we’d stop at nothing to ensure they were happy with their Give’r Gear.  Our dream has come to life through 4 years of working multiple jobs, taking challenges head-on, continuously learning, receiving a tremendous amount of help, and our belief that the world is a better place with Give’r in it. 





 The road for a lifestyle apparel start-up company in Wyoming is not paved or easy-going, but we have been living by our motto, and have given our all to shape this vision into reality.  We are beyond psyched with this opportunity made possible by Kickstarter and you, our backers, to write the next chapter of the Give’r story.  Without your help, we wouldn’t exist.  We are eager to set our roots and charge forward as a company that exemplifies what can be possible when you follow your heart.  We take this step with confidence in our products and wholehearted gratitude for all those in our corner, cheering us on. 

 We strongly believe in giving back through service and financial support, and have worked with dozens of local, regional, national and international non-profits since our inception.  We believe in forming community by working with local businesses and connecting our customers from across the globe.  We are proud members of 1% for the Planet and 1% for the Tetons, and are committed to playing an active role in making the world a better place for generations to come.





Our goal is to bring to life the Give’r that lives within us all.  Straightforward, fun, comfortable apparel and accessories were at our core on day one, and we have built upon this foundation over the last 4 years. Your support enables our team to be fully dedicated to Give’r while maintaining control of our mission and the ability to take risks that may not be possible through traditional fundraising means. 
 While the 4-Season Gloves were merely an idea 2 years ago, the opportunity to share a final product in the flesh is something we are extremely proud of.  We have completed the initial short-run of production and are as psyched as our videos and pictures show. They are freakin’ awesome. We are a young company, and putting the 4-Season Gloves into full production takes a lot of work and capital.  We are 110% committed to the work in front of us, but need your help in bringing the 4-Season Gloves to life at large-scale production.  Take advantage of the big time discounts from retail pricing and join in the effort to support a company who is giving it their all to bring you the best damn gloves ever.




















It all began in 2011 with the design and creation of custom hats commemorating an epic annual kayaking expedition in Ontario, Canada.  These hats, featuring the skyline of the Tetons and the colloquial phrase “give’r”, were the seed from which Give’r was born.  This team, with help from an awesome and ever-growing community, gave life to a philosophy and lifestyle that is perfectly embodied by these 4-Season Gloves...our greatest creation to date!

story:
Tired of always struggling items that need to be packed, and there's never enough room?  

No matter where we go...you could be flying somewhere for a family vacation, traveling on business, going on a camping trip, or even just heading to the beach, there are always items that need to be packed, and we’re never able to fit them all!

Does this look familiar?

Well, let us introduce you to the ultimate travel companion...

 

Revolutionary vacuum is smaller than an iPhone X with more power than other products

Pacum is the most powerful, multi-functional, handheld vacuum & air pumping device in the world... 

For its size, it packs a mighty punch with capabilities of compressing items 25% more than the other brand's  vacuum, and 4x faster than any device in its class.  Pacum will compress a vac bag full of clothes in just over a minute!

Take It Here.  Bring It There.  Pacum Can Go Anywhere.

Seriously though...For being as small as it is, Pacum packs a mighty punch!  About half the size of an iPhone X, you can bring Pacum ANYWHERE, in ANYTHING, making it your new essential travel tool. 

The Meaning of Convenience

Here at Pacum, we believe in convenience.  We know that remembering everything before you leave on a trip can be difficult.  The last thing you want to do is worry about what will, or will not fit in your suitcase, or whether or not you finished vacuum packing that last bag... 

That's why we made Pacum AUTOMATIC, with an intelligent design that's very easy to use!

✔  Panel lights indicate the function setting

✔  2 pump modes. "eco-mode" & "supermode"

✔  Pacum stops automatically

✔  Double your packing capacity in just over 1 minute

Check it out! ⬇

The Most Versatile Multi-functional Device On The Market

So you think Pacum is just a vacuum?  Think again!

Not only can it take the air out, but it can PUMP AIR IN!

Going to chill out at the pool?  Pacum will blow up you inflatables...

Your kids need to blow up some basketballs before practice?  Boom.  We got you!

Adaptable & Compatible

So, you already have some vacuum bags at home?  No problem! 

Pacum comes with our brand vacuum bags & accessories, but you will also be equipped with our "Padaptor", making any existing vacuum bags you own compatible with Pacum! 

Here's a closer look at the Padaptor...

With your order on Kickstarter you will receive at least one of each of the following items:

✔  Pacum Device

✔  Padaptor

✔  Pacum Bag

✔  USB Type-C Line

✔  Inflatable accessories ( 3 accessories in each pack )

Powering Your Pacum you have to do is plug it in using your wall charger or portable power bank!

What Can Pacum Compress?

Food Storage Bag

Pacum Bag

Other Brand Vacuum Bags

Pacum Bag Protection

Travel is fun, but what are you going to do when you need to carry all the dirty, sweaty clothes you wore during the trip? The Pacum bag takes care of this annoying problem, keeping them vac-packed away from odor and bacteria. 

How to add amount to your pledge for additional Pacum bag?

1. Calculate the amount in HKD.

2. Add that amount in HKD

Example: 

Buying 2 Pacum Bags means you need to pledge additional HK$39.

Standard Pack + Shipping to US + 2 Pacum Bags

= HK$ 283 + 79 + (19.5 x 2) = HK$401

Masterspace Limited
Address: Unit D 1/F Phase 1 Kwun Tong Industrial Centre Kwun Tong Road Kwun Tong
Email: hello@pacum.co

story:
(English version see below)

Ratet mal, wer zurück ist…Bear City Roller Derby!

Es ist wieder soweit, die Saison 2016 hat begonnen! 

Auch in diesem Jahr zieht es uns in die Staaten, um unseren Platz als eines der Top-D2-Teams zu verteidigen. Den ersten Stopp dieser Saison legen wir mitten im Herzen der USA, in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, ein. Dort nehmen wir an dem dreitägigen Midwest BrewHaHa-Turnier (3.-5. Juni) teil. Doch um dorthin zu gelangen, brauchen wir wieder Eure Hilfe!

Nur durch Eure Unterstützung konnten wir im letzten Jahr nach Detroit fliegen und dort einen phänomenalen sechsten Platz belegen. 

In dieses Jahr wollen wir aber mehr! Wir wollen Gold!

Wenn Ihr also den ein oder anderen Euro übrig habt, dann ermöglicht Euren Lieblingsrollerderby-Spielerinnen die Reise über den großen Teich.

Um den besten Spielerinnen von BCRD die Reise zu ermöglichen, veranstalten wir Bootcamps und verschiedene Fundraising-Aktionen. Das gesammelte Geld wird allein in Flüge, Hotel- sowie Mietwagen-Kosten investiert. (Alle Kosten, die nicht durch Spenden gedeckelt werden können, müssen leider privat von den Spielerinnen, dem Coach und der Bench getragen werden.)


Mit Eurer Teilnahme an unserer Indiegogo-Kampagne könnt Ihr nicht nur unsagbar viele Punkte fürs persönliche Karma-Konto sammeln, sondern auch coole Sachen ergattern. Ihr wollt wissen, was für coole Sachen das sind? Dann schaut kurz mal auf die rechte Bildschirmseite. 

Vorab geht ein ganz besonderer Dank für die Unterstützung an unseren Sportverein, dem Lurich 02 e.V. und an unsere Sponsoren:  Quad Roller Skate Shop ++ Facciola ++ Cooper's Cider


Spread the word! ...und seid dabei!!!
#bearhaha #honeybear #bcrd


++ English version here ist is ++

Guess who’s back, back again, Bear City’s back, tell a friend!!

It’s that time again - the 2016 season is starting and we are headed to America to secure our spot as one of the top D2 teams in the world! Our first stop is deep in the heart of the country at the Midwest BrewHaHa tournament in Milwaukee (June 3-5). But, we need your help to get there!

You helped us last year to get to Detroit and we won 6th place. We want more, though. We are going for gold and ready to win - for you (our fans), for us and for Europe! We want to show the derby world that Europe's got serious talent and we are determined to win.

So, can you spare a few Euros to allow your favorite Bombshells to spread their wings and fly across the Atlantic to America?

With your participation in this Indiegogo campaign you won’t only gather precious points for your karma account, but we have some nice perks to throw at you as well! Peep them on the side!

We thank our beloved home club and sponsors who brought us so far!
SC Lurich 02 e.V. ++ Quad Roller Skate Shop ++ Facciola ++ Cooper's Cider


Spread the word!
#bearhaha #honeybear #bcrd
Be there!



if not mentioned on photo 

(c) by  Nina Rose, Thomas Riedel, WFTDA, Jan Totzek / panographer.de

story:
The World Needs A HEYDO

Water is not only the most essential substance next to oxygen for human life. It is also complex, often containing hundreds of dissolved minerals and chemicals. Most water is also “structured” or clustered in complex ways. It is indeed a marvellous substance whose extreme value is often unrecognized and taken for granted.

In fact water is more than just a beverage. It is a particular type of energy that we need in a certain amount on a daily basis. If we do not obtain sufficient amount of it, health is negatively impacted. Like other whole foods, when it is tampered with, water loses most of its precious healing properties. Water is tampered with any time one adds anything to it, filters it using anything except carbon or sand, spins it, alkalinizes it, and perhaps does other things to it. All of these manipulations tend to ruin the quality of your water.

From plastic jugs to even cloudy type of plastic water containers found in supermarkets, the content stored may not ruin its properties, but adds a little contamination to it. But thanks to revolutionary team of iloof.com, not only will the world be able to enjoy safe and healthy drinking, the myth or delay of smart drinking will now be realised in 2016.

Introducing HEYDO,
The World’s Most Intelligent Cup

It combines revolutionary technology and a special algorithm tracking system to assure you are keeping yourself hydrated and consuming quality drinking water every day. To ensure your every sip is consuming non-contaminated water, but only clean-quality-drinking water, HeyDo cup comes with an advanced PPM measurement mode, which notifies you if your drink is compromised by unwanted pesticides, toxic wastes, and human tampering. In addition to this innovation, HeyDo comes with state-of-the-art communication technologies that allow you to chat, share, and be connected online with other HeyDo owners around the world in less than a second.

But don’t take our word for it. Check out what HEYDO can do and you’ll understand why it’s The World’s Most Intelligent Cup.

You Always STAY HYDRATED

Never miss another cup of water when your body needs it. The HEYDO Cup tracks your daily water intake so you know if are drinking enough according to your lifestyle, and when you’re not, the HEYDO Cup reminds you to take your next sip. This encourages you to stay hydrated and up with your diet routine, without a fuss.


You Always STAY HEALTHY

Even though water comes out of the faucet looking clean and clear, there is a good chance it has some pretty nasty stuff in it. Understanding the importance of having pure drinking water, HEYDO cup comes equipped with a built-in PPM probe, which indicates the purity level of your drinking water. Thus, ensuring your drinking water is safe for consumption and  every sip you take has health benefits.



You Always STAY SAFE 

HeyDo alerts you when the quality of your beverage has been compromised with any water solubles. This prevents unfortunate incidents, accidental or intentional, from happening. So you have the assurance, that the beverage you are consuming is contamination free.


You Always STAY IN SHAPE

Research has proven that weight loss can be achieved when one consumes sufficient amount of water at the right time each day. The HEYDO Cup comes programmed with The Water Diet to remind you to consume the optimal amount of water, at the optimal time, helping you to stay in shape with minimal effort.


You Always STAY CONNECTED

You can track the water intake of your loved ones and send them reminders to ensure they keep themselves hydrated throughout the day too. The HEYDO Cup color display screen allows you to view reminders to and from your loved ones using emoticons without having to check your phone. This encourages your entire family to stay healthy together, in a fun and interactive way.

You Always STAY PERFECT

The HEYDO Cup comes equipped with a TDS meter that measures the brew strength of your coffee. It gives you an indication on how to achieve the optimal intensity according to the Universal Brewing Control Chart. This is very useful for even the fussiest coffee lover who wants to ensure perfection in every cup!  So you can now enjoy the perfect cuppa, from the comfort of your home, everyday.


You Always STAY CLOSE-BY


Afraid of losing your favourite cup? The HEYDO Cup inbuilt tracker feature allows you to locate where you last placed it. So you spend less time on hunting your cup and more time drinking from it.


You Always STAY DRY

Gone are the days of loose caps and crack tumblers! The HEYDO Cup’s magnetic lid snaps right into place each time you cap it. And with just a single twist to lock the cup, you’ll never need to worry about water spillage in your bags or on your desks. No more messy spills whenever or wherever you fancy carrying your drink.


You Always STAY WIRELESS 

Forget long and tangled up cables. The HEYDO Cup allows you to charge effortlessly with its wireless dock. Now that’s hassle free each time you place your cup on the dock. No more charging cable problems!


You Need A HEYDO Cup

We consume water every day, but most of the time with nothing to reassure what we are drinking but a piece of information able which sometimes can be a little unreliable. Furthermore, we see a spike in cases related to food poisoning, and at times death – a consequence due to poor quality control for food and beverages around the world today.

To counter this fundamental problem, we got together a team of experts to design and build this state-of-the-art technology, which assist you to identify what your naked eyes can’t before you down your drink. After spending 1,180 days behind the lab, we are proud to present the world’s most intelligent cup  – The HEYDO Cup.

For further press enquiries, please email contact@iloof.com






ILOOF International Pte. Ltd. is a health technology company that brings cutting edge technology to everyday objects, to monitor and promote a healthy lifestyle.

Download Press Release & HEYDO Images on HEYDO Gallery : 


Risks and Challenges

We understand the challenges of bringing a brand new product to market, as well as the risks that we will face throughout this journey. We've already passed the stage of prototyping and are now in the midst of our first production test run.

We believe in being completely transparent to you guys, and promise to keep backers updated with our every progress with the HeyDo Cup

And with just a single twist to lock the cup, you’ll never need to worry about water spillage in your bags or on your desks. No more messy spills whenever or wherever you fancy carrying your drink.

You Always STAY WIRELESS 




Forget long and tangled up cables. The HEYDO Cup allows you to charge effortlessly with its wireless dock. Now that’s hassle free each time you place your cup on the dock. No more charging cable problems!


You Need A HEYDO Cup
We consume water every day, but most of the time with nothing to reassure what we are drinking but a piece of information able which sometimes can be a little unreliable. Furthermore, we see a spike in cases related to food poisoning, and at times death – a consequence due to poor quality control for food and beverages around the world today.
To counter this fundamental problem, we got together a team of experts to design and build this state-of-the-art technology, which assist you to identify what your naked eyes can’t before you down your drink. After spending 1,180 days behind the lab, we are proud to present the world’s most intelligent cup  – The HEYDO Cup.
For further press enquiries, please email contact@iloof.com


















ILOOF International Pte. Ltd. is a health technology company that brings cutting edge technology to everyday objects, to monitor and promote a healthy lifestyle.


Download Press Release & HEYDO Images on HEYDO Gallery : 






Risks and Challenges
We understand the challenges of bringing a brand new product to market, as well as the risks that we will face throughout this journey. We've already passed the stage of prototyping and are now in the midst of our first production test run.
We believe in being completely transparent to you guys, and promise to keep backers updated with our every progress with the HeyDo Cup

story: The video says it pretty well.  I am the gatekeeper for this park in Atascadero.  the facility provides free after school programs, camps, youth ministry, and lots of other events like contests, lock-in overnighters, parties, and more.  We provide free internet, magazines and paperbacks, and several lounges for family and friends to hang out while the athlete is in the park riding, scooting or skateboarding.  Its a great place, but it lives inside an uninsulated 8000 square foot building.  our hope is to get it updated with your help.  100% of your donation will go toward the insulation project.  We currently have $2100 into the City with a promise just in for $10K from a private donor.  our total need is $40K

story:
Help send Hacienda Maize to New Orleans for the Chile Pepper Extravaganza Sep 27-29, which promises to be a terrific platform for our particular specialty of hot pepper jelly bliss.  http://haciendamaize.com/maize/orders-hot-pepper-jelly/products-hot-pepper-jelly/

The show draws lovers of chile peppers from around the world.

The potential for building our business: tremendous.

The likelihood of our winning coveted industry awards: high.

The expense: ouch!  Especially on the heels of huge investments of late in contests, shows, production...

About Hacienda Maize:

  • We are a family business of three generations, built upon the adventurousness of generations before us.  Chapter 1: http://haciendamaize.com/maize/about-hot-pepper-jelly/story-hot-pepper-jelly/.
  • We source our chiles locally -- Milberger Farms of Pueblo Colorado -- and treasure supporting entrepreneurs at our every production stage. 
  • We help lift up other producers.  A very exciting prospect: recent entries in contests with foods that feature Jammin' Jelly will showcase other artisans in their areas of expertise.
  • We love what we do!  We do it better than all others, based upon what we hear (and know to be true ;-) ).  Hacienda Maize is a daily exercise of optimism, passion, and excellence!
  • Some testimonials:
    Khristopher's Culinaire, in Ouray CO (near Telluride) posted on Facebook: "...(Hacienda Maize was) recommended by a regular customer. We have carried pepper jellies for years, and I wasn't sure that this one would stand out among the rest. I was wrong. This pepper jelly is in a class all by itself. The best I have ever tasted." Jan 2013

http://yourhub.denverpost.com/denver/business-focus-hacienda-maize-denver/YM4F3CzdUa0SEByeQgvUwJ-story
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jzi-7iFU6vQ
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0LZIqi8HNmk
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QWX7jh-b3_I

The Mission: Charming The French Quarter and "The Industry"

The Chile Pepper Extravaganza is a very important venue for specialists in chile pepper foods, and we want to be there in (semi-) full force this year -- fuller force in years to come.;-) http://www.chilepepperextravaganza.com/

Dates of the event are Sep 27-29, location is the New Orleans Convention Center, Hall J, and sponsor of the event is Chile Pepper Magazine.

Attending the event will be chile pepper enthusiasts, media, restaurateurs, and reps of brokers/buyers/distributors -- all with whom we should be talking tete-a-tete!

  • These events are costly, and we're hoping for a lift-up from supporters.  A tentative budget for New Orleans is $7,000:
    Booth: $600
    Jammin' Jelly shipment: $400
    Goodies for attendees: $400
    Jammin' Jelly sampling materials:$400
    Air travel for 2, Denver to NOLA: $800
    Associated travel expenses: $300
    Van rental and gas, 2 ppl Houston to NOLA $600
    Hotel for 4ppl, 5 days: $1500
    Meals for 4 ppl, 5 days: $1000
    Advertising and promotion: $600
    Lagniappes: $400

(We KNOW!  Eye-opening, isn't it???  And this is unpaid labor!)

Regarding Perks/Lagniappes
If you prefer anonymity with your donation, please give us a delightful (and clean) code-word by which to list you.
Timing of delivery is estimated.
If you are donating from outside the U.S., please increase your contribution to cover shipping costs of the Lagniappes.  Can't promise what you'll receive -- it will be something fabulous!
We are happy to talk with you about unique orders and contributions.

Laissez les bon temps rouler!

What Is Accomplished

We fund the journey to The Chile Pepper Extravaganza and/or recoup some of our investment -- merci beaucoup -- with which we fund production for increased demand.

We meet with those in-the-know in the industry, opening up new channels for learning, promotion and distribution.

We grow, we build, we employ people, share our knowledge and engage experts that further our reach and effectiveness with the incomparable Hacienda Maize Fire-Roasted Chile Jammin' Jelly!

Next Steps
Time is of the essence!
> Donate what you can. 
> Share the Hacienda Maize campaign with others.  
> Keep abreast of our accomplishments on Facebook www.facebook.com/HaciendaMaize, and on our website www.HaciendaMaize.com
> Buy Jammin' Jelly and cook with it!  Absolute culinary brilliance with ease!
> Ask for us at your local grocer/gourmet food store/sumptuous foodie website.
> Tell others about Hacienda Maize Fire-Roasted Chile Jammin' Jelly!
> Gift Jammin' Jelly -- host/ess, house-warmings ;-), BBQs, celebrations, business, holidays...Perfect!

Please, also, browse Indiegogo for additional causes you would like to support. Easy. So much good to be done!  Gratifying! 

Thank you!

With respect, gratitude and very warm regards,

The Maize Family

! Savor !

story:
I come from a racing family. My father raced for about 10 years. At seven or eight years old is when is when I knew I wanted to drive some kind of racing thing (go cart, bike). My family helped me get my first race car when I was 15. At 17 I started racing and from that moment on I've been hooked. My mom always told me to never give up on my dreams! 

About 23 months ago as I was sitting at a red light I felt a pain in my head and it felt like the sun was in my eyes. I got to the side of the road and called my wife. After doctor visits and a CAT scan, the doctors determined I had an Optic Nerve Stroke and I lost vision in both eyes. I had 5% vision in my right eye and 50-60% vision in my left eye. I thought my racing career was over. My family helped me get through a rough time. My son and his friend quit their jobs to help me at my mechanic business. It was a tough time for us and we lost almost everything during that time. 

About a year ago John Cody asked If wanted to race in the Vintage Class. I said I'd be honored to, but in the back of my mind I was thinking I really can't see! My wife encourage to do it as my eye sight is getting better! The last major race of the year is the Snowball Derby in Pensacola, Floridia. In my heart I feel I am more than capable of taking first place at the Snowball Derby.


What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise 30,000 to get into a new Kyle Busch car and for your support we will reward you with different items to show our gratitude of your generosity!

The Impact

Your contribution helps Tommy Warren, Jr. live his dream to get in a Kyle Busch racing car! The 30K raised will help with the crew, equipment, fuel, etc.

    Risks & Challenge

    The money raised will go directly to getting the car. If we don't raise the money I will not get the Kyle Busch car but will make improvements to my existing car.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please post our links on your page and help up spread the word! Every little bit helps us reach our goals!

story:
Short Summary

We are three avid cyclists Mike Villeseche. (left) Michael Knight (middle) Kel Kiez (right) who love to ride bikes, we enjoy being in the great outdoors and going for long bike rides. We love participating in Winnipeg cycle events like the Muddy Waters Habitat for humanity Bike Ride which is put on by and helps raise money for Habitat for Humanity. Mike Villeseche is a Photographer, Michael Knight is a Graphic Artist, Kel Kiez is a Drafts man. We started thinking about how cool it would be to have a small light weight mini camper that would be big enough for one person to sleep in that could be towed by a bicycle anywhere! And so began the beginnings of our idea and dream.

We spent many long hours coming up with a design inspired by many home made campers that we had researched on the Internet, thinking about new Eco friendly light weight materials as most of the home made campers were made of heavy wood and steel construction and seemed very impractical for any kind of an extended bike trip. Our immediate goal was to design something simple, elegant, practical and light weight so as a cyclist could take our mini camper anywhere they felt comfortable.

We took our design to the Winnipeg Cyclovia street festival event which is a great place for cyclist and bike enthusiasts of all walks of life attend. The people we showed our design too absolutely loved it and we got asked many times where they could buy one! So just based on that and the many other people we have showed our design to we feel there is a strong market for such a product.

If we can get financial backing to help us take our design to the next level which is to have a prototype constructed we can then take our mini bike camper out to local events such as the MEC Bike Fest usually held at the Winnipeg Forks Market, The September Cyclovia street festival and many, other bike events, auto shows, green technology events, trade shows and show off our camper prototype. We just know that people will see this little camper around town and immediately fall in love with it just as we have. We feel very strongly that from that point our little mini camper will practically sell itself.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need funding to help us have a prototype of our mini bike camper constructed. Our goal is to have one ready for spring of 2013. We definitely would like it ready to show off for the MEC's Bike Fest.
  • We need marketing materials printed up to hand out at special events and trade shows.

We offer our contributors outstanding perks for helping us out.

  • Higher contributors will have their company logos and web addresses featured prominently at special events for a full year with an option to renew for only $500. At special events we will have our mini camper on public display along with a large colorfull display featuring company logos and web addresses so people can see who has provided funding to help our project achieve it's goal.
  • Company web addresses and names will also be featured on our blog and website.
  • We are also providing tee shirts, mugs, postcards and posters that feature our mini camper design to help show our appreciation for contributors at various levels.
  • With what most companies spend on just a simple ad in a newspaper that runs for just a week the benefits of our perks become obvious.

In the event that we do not reach our goal you still get all the perks we promised. The funds will be saved and added to whatever other monies we manage to raise outside of this campaign. No matter what we have great faith in this idea and product and we WILL Make It Work!

The Impact

What could be more Eco friendly than a solar powered light weight mini bike camper that can not only be towed by a bicycle? Now imagine it being towed by one of those mini "Smart Cars," a Moped or any other small Eco friendly vehicle.

  • Cyclists will be able to camp in comfort and style with this easy to tow mini camper.
  • Contributors will have their names and companies associated with a new and innovative Eco friendly green technology product.
  • With the worlds focus becoming more and more environmentally conscious the benefits become obvious.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any help is greatly appreciated, such as sharing our idea on your own blog, news web sites or even directing people who you know will love this idea to our blog and web site.

Use the Indiegogo share tools and help us to spread the word and generate a buzz about our innovative idea.

Share our blog and this campaign with local cycling groups, blogs, web pages friends, Green Technology companies or anyone that you can think of that would enjoy our project or that you think would like to contribute.

Click on our comments tag and give us your feedback.

story:
It is more than just taking photographs. Please read.

An Expedition through Photography

This photo of River Qinhuai in Nanjing, China was taken two years ago. It marks the start of my passion for photography. It was taken with a second-hand Nokia 5230 (the two processed pictures are displayed below); growing up in a poor family, a camera was a luxury we could not afford. I still made the best of whatever equipment I could find and learnt from a variety of online sources about photography. One year after I took the photo, I came abroad to the United States on my own, and then to Costa Rica to study in the United World College in Costa Rica with a full scholarship.

The UWC experience opened my eyes at the same time offered me so many opportunities. Now equipped with the school's camera, whose key features though are as excellent as several other DSLRs, I am marching on my journey of photography.

The Aim: A Summer at the End of the World

With a keen interest in exploring a remote land where few have set foot on, discovering the natural beauty of the landscape and interacting with the culture of an isolated community; I have chosen to visit a small island with approximately 650 residents in Denmark, two towns in Iceland, and two towns in Greenland, taking high quality photos. This is a quest for profound meaning. 

My family has had hardship financing the whole trip, yet I am determined to realize my dream. My journey to the northern end of the world has met some challenges with regards to funding from the college because 1) the amount is too large; 2) the project is not based on my home country; 3) I am not yet a senior. I’ve decided to strike it out on my own and believe I can transform my ideas into action. That’s why I need your help! The funds raised will be contributed to the following:

  • My own camera, lens and other accessories such as memory card and external hard drive for larger storage;
  • Travel expenditure;
  • A sound recording system as I will also be taking film footages; Submission fees to multiple exhibition selections;
  • Fine printing and non-profit postcard making;

A Reason to Fund:

Funding needs a reason. There are several reasons and any one of the following can be sufficient:

  • Provide a unique insight to the region: The impact of economics globalization and global warming will be registered in terms of changes in the landscape and people's lifestyle with the possible recording of a seal hunt and interviews of people's perspective to be taken.
  • Cover the debate on seal hunting: Help with the investigation and coverage of the Greenland seal hunt controversy. Approximately 89% Greenlandic population consists of Inuit people who make a living through hunting. Due to Greenland’s government’s aim of achieving prosperous modern economic growth, the practice of traditional hunting has been encouraged; on the other hand, if seal hunting is widely considered brutal, senseless, and unethical, what is the right thing to do: preserve indigenous culture or let Greenland lose its natural wildlife?

  • Help a young girl achieve her dreams. I do not think that photography and filmmaking are for rich kids and dreamers.
  • Help Iceland and Greenland gain more attention if the photographs can make be shown in exhibitions or online magazine selections or photography communities. Pictures and films will be sent to greenland.com as Greenland is targeting global attention through social media and the website is open to accept photographs or films. (read more about Greenland's intention of attract global attention http://www.get2press.dk/default.asp?show=showpm&pmid=7410)
  • Help contribute to sustainability, as the impact of several environmental issues will be addressed.
  • You will be able to receive beautiful digital images and postcards.

(Look at that! Greenland! Photo credits to Jesper Regin, who has been to Greenland. I will go there too!)

Other Ways To Help

Any funding is appreciated, although you can help with other aspects of the project if you are not willing or able to contribute financially:

  • If you have been to Iceland or Greenland or have friends living in the two countries, please email lishu.gang@uwccostarica.org to inform me of anything worth noticing or taking care of or just helpful tips.
  • Please share this indiegogo campaign with those who are able to fund and interested in funding. The URL of this campaign is https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/green-white-red-iceland-greenland-seal-hunt/x/7413358.

Thank you very very much!

A sound recording system as I will also be taking film
     footages; Submission fees to multiple exhibition selections;

Fine printing and non-profit postcard making;

A Reason to Fund:Funding needs a reason. There are several reasons and any one of the following can be sufficient:

Provide a unique insight to the region: The impact of economics
     globalization and global warming will be registered in terms of changes in
     the landscape and people's lifestyle with the possible recording of a seal
     hunt and interviews of people's perspective to be taken. 
Cover the debate on seal hunting: Help with the investigation
     and coverage of the Greenland seal hunt controversy. Approximately 89%
     Greenlandic population consists of Inuit people who make a living through
     hunting. Due to Greenland’s government’s aim of achieving prosperous
     modern economic growth, the practice of traditional hunting has been
     encouraged; on the other hand, if seal hunting is widely considered
     brutal, senseless, and unethical, what is the right thing to do: preserve
     indigenous culture or let Greenland lose its natural wildlife?

Help a young girl achieve her dreams. I do not
     think that photography and filmmaking are for rich kids and dreamers.

Help Iceland and Greenland gain more attention
     if the photographs can make be shown in exhibitions or online magazine
     selections or photography communities. Pictures and films will be sent to
     greenland.com as Greenland is targeting global attention through social
     media and the website is open to accept photographs or films. (read more
     about Greenland's intention of attract global attention http://www.get2press.dk/default.asp?show=showpm&pmid=7410)

Help contribute to sustainability, as the
     impact of several environmental issues will be addressed.

You will be able to receive beautiful digital
     images and postcards.
(Look at that! Greenland! Photo credits to Jesper Regin, who has been to Greenland. I will go there too!)Other Ways To Help
Any funding is appreciated, although you can help
with other aspects of the project if you are not willing or able to contribute
financially:

If you have been to Iceland or Greenland or have friends living in the two countries, please email lishu.gang@uwccostarica.org to inform me of anything worth noticing or taking care of or just helpful tips.
Please share this indiegogo campaign with those who are able to fund and interested in funding. The URL of this campaign is https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/green-white-red-iceland-greenland-seal-hunt/x/7413358.
Thank you very very much!

story:
Four years ago we launched the Lolo lid (now Trinken) on Kickstarter. Since then, we've had thousands of happy customers with rave reviews!  We've always wanted to match our lids with the perfect collapsible cup that can accommodate all drink types.

Holds over 25oz and rolls up to 2.5" 

 

Introducing the CWB cup. Coffee, Water, Beer, this cup can do it all!

A TPU outer cup, a silicone insert and our patented lid

 Our cup is an ultra lightweight collapsible TPU cup rolls up to fit in your bag or pocket so you'll always have it on you. Available in white and black.

Black and white with more colours on the way

It features a removable inner silicone bladder which forms a double wall insulation to keep hot drinks piping hot and cold drinks cool.

The patented lid that snaps on all can sizes 12-17 oz and turns your cup into an insulated can cooler keeping drinks cold and sneaky.

Our patented lid works on 12-17 cans, small, skinny or tall

Why settle for a cup that lets your drinks get cold almost instantly? Cups that need to be put down gently because they are too collapsible? Or tiny collapsible cups that seem like they're designed for ants? Our cup holds a proper amount of liquid and keeps it insulated like it should,  without having to haul around a giant steel mug.

story:
The Back Story: Arrowhead Ranch

Arrowhead Ranch & Retreat in Parksville, New York, in Sullivan County, is close to the site of the 1969 Woodstock Music & Arts Festival.  The site has stories dating back to the old days of the Catskills. This region was famous back in the 50s, 60s, and 70s as the "Borscht Belt", the resort playground of the NY metropolitan area.

The legendary Arrowhead Dude Ranch was the birthplace of the jam band festival scene.  During its heyday in the early 1990s, artists including Phish, Widespread Panic, Blues Traveler, The Spin Doctors, Ziggy Marley, Ritchie Havens, The Band, The New Riders, and Hot Tuna, and many more graced it's indoor and outdoor stages. 

After a dramatic fire, the property fell into disrepair and lay dormant for years.  We bought the property in 2017...we were not able to stand by and see it that way! 

Arrowhead Today:

Today, Catskills tourism is back... in a BIG WAY!   The Arrowhead Ranch & Retreat is perfectly poised to become a cultural resource for our community....We are creating jobs, providing entertainment, art, relaxation, and education.  We stand to become another great option to enjoy within a reasonably short drive for our guests from New York City and surrounding areas.  

The idyllic, untouched 70 acre setting is a place where magic still happens.  The layout, with its meadows, rolling hills, and lake is simply perfect!  We have already done a lot of work to restore and beautify the property!  With a whole lot of love and faith, work and money, we are bringing it back to its former glory... and beyond. We've hosted 7 weekend music events in the past 2 summers and have created a great buzz of enthusiasm!  

Our long term goals include residencies for artists and musicians, a health spa, restaurant/bar, an indoor event center for concerts, weddings, and private parties, and retirement community opportunities. 

Also, and certainly not the least of our goals, is we intend to make Arrowhead Ranch & Retreat  a shining example of sustainable living and technology.

This Campaign: 

...will fund the costs of site engineering, design, and legal representation needed for approvals... allowing us to open full-time, and bring the business into a positive cash flow, by the end of this summer! Phase 1 is to become a licensed campground with amenities, and 12 extended-stay hotel rooms.   Your generous contribution will enable us to complete the planning stages and achieve our Phase 1 goals. 

Our goal for this campaign is to raise $70,000 . We will welcome contributions at any level.  For larger funding, please contact us regarding Private Notes, and a limited number of Partnerships.   

If we don't reach our financial goal on this platform, we will explore other ways to raise the money. We will not stop until we reach our goal!

The Impact:

In these turbulent times, we need community more than ever, and a place to come together, enjoy the moments, create memories, escape from the rat race, and enjoy peace of mind, in the beauty of nature! Our team of enthusiastic and talented professionals is poised to deliver a first-class experience for all our valued guests, friends and family!

 

Ways You Can Help:

Please share this campaign and help us get the word out about Arrowhead Ranch & Retreat!
