story:
Never settle for a tool less worthy. The DMOS Delta Shovel is the answer to your outdoor needs. Whether you’re out on safari or just keeping the campgrounds clean, this is your ultimate companion.

The Delta Shovel is designed for optimal digging and shoveling. From the handle to the head, you’ll experience dirt-digging nirvana as you break apart the toughest ground and toss payloads of earth with ease.

The Delta Shovel is made to take on anything and everything Mother Nature might throw at you. Whether it’s Bigfoot himself or the deepest pit of mud, the Delta Shovel will handle it all.

Do yourself a favor - get the Delta Shovel now. 

At the end of the campaign, you may also choose two additional color options:

Those of you who crave everything ALL BLACK can opt for the Delta ELITE, an upgraded Delta with blackout, anodized finish and a milled aluminum grip.

 We will also offer:

The tooling is dialed in and production can begin as soon as we get funded (so if you want your Delta sooner, make sure to share our campaign). 

We promise to deliver your shovel by December, but make no mistake, we will make every effort to put your Delta in your hands as soon as possible.

 

DMOS wishes to thank all who worked on this campaign or helped us with the Delta development.  There are so many names, please see this as a starter list.  Off the top, DMOS wishes to thank Jason Ramos, Emily Miller and her team at the Rebelle Rally as well as the entire Rebelle Rally community of competitors, journalists, and volunteers, Dan Mayfield for the amazing film work, Jay Goodrich for the amazing photography, Orijin Media and Zach Montes on video of our Alpine Wyoming shoot, Ken Cameron and his team at 7P, Clay Croft and the XO crew, Ranyon D'Arge and his Park and Pipe crew at Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, Kevin Harper, Laura Wanlass, Mercedes Lilienthal, Harry Wagner, Matt Scott, The Sportsmobile team of Allen, Jonathan and Andrew Feld, Nathan Wright of CBI Offroad Fab, Total Chaos Fab team, the team at Baja HQ, Fremont Toyota Lander and for our awesome vehicle wraps, the talented Cody McCreary of Shirts and More, Noah Clark, Fabien Dodard, Shane Percival, Craig Neugeboren, Charles Ciaccio and the entire team at KO in Denver, Peter Rigby and the entire Astia Angel team, Lindsay Aspegren, Jeff Ishmael, Jeff Yapp, Bill Watkyns and the entire Lions Pride, Emmanuel Eleyae, Casey Brown, Chris Jennings, Christopher Long and his team at Capisco, the Silicon Couloir Board and community in Jackson Hole, John Bradley and his team at Global Exploration and Recovery, Travis Rice, Tim Durtschi, Cody Hunt, Andrew Burns, Phil Hessler, Galen Knowles, Zeppelin Zeerip, Cam McCaul, Cody Matechuck, and Marty Carrigan and the Global Sales Guys who helped us get our start, the Mountain X team in Calgary, Vanessa Block, the team at The Hub, Jeff Moran and the Jackson Hole Ski and Snowboard Club, Jack Koehler, former DMOSers including Ryan Freeman and LB Haney, PR shout outs to Chris Dickey and Purple Orange, Sonia Hendrix, Leslie Norris, and Curt Blakeney, all of our retail partners and buyers, our friends at Next Adventure, Rack Attack and Basecamp brewing who are helping us celebrate this launch; our friends at Cruiser Outfitters in SLC and the Land Cruiser Museum, the entire Overland Journal team and Overland Expo team, and all of you who have previously been customers of DMOS.  Many thanks to DMOS’s investors who believed in us when we were just the germ of an idea. Additional thanks to diggers everywhere who have inspired us and helped us and told us how to build them the best shovels and tools.  We are so grateful to all of you for your generosity, input, and support.   

We’re throwing enough trash into landfills - it’s time to make a change. That’s why DMOS is committed to environmental sustainability. Each shovel is made with the highest quality materials that will stand the test of time without pollution. No more cracked plastic filling up our planet - with DMOS, you get the best for you and Mother Earth.
story_txt:
Meet the Delta Shovel. A compact, portable feat of engineering from DMOS, the makers of the Alpha Shovel, the most crowdfunded shovel ever on Kickstarter, and the award-winning Stealth Shovel. State of the art engineering and American manufacturing combine to create a full-sized shovel that's durable, versatile and unstoppable. 
 



Constructed of premium American materials, the Delta Shovel comes in two impressive forms - 6061 Aircraft Grade Aluminum and 12 Gauge Cold Rolled Steel - both proudly American made in our Oregon factory.

The Delta is the result of two years of research and development. It exists because for us, and those we serve, there was a gap in our quiver. 
So, we set to work with our collective: offroad instructors, wildland firefighters, professional drivers and explorers, park trail builders, and more.
We iterated our designs and put the Delta to the test. We even made 100 pre-production prototypes and, when our collective gave feedback, we incorporated the feedback into the Delta and made it better.
This Delta is the result of our co-creative process and is our seventh shovel and dare we say our "seventh son."

The Delta Shovel operates in the area between E-Tools and full-sized contractor shovels. It’s got all their strengths, and none of their weakness - it’s a full-sized shovel you can take with you anywhere. It’s an E-tool that doesn’t suck to use. It’s the Goldilocks Shovel. Whatever you want to call it, it’s got some serious advantages over other tools.
Strength: The Delta boasts the best strength-to-weight ratio of any full-sized shovel. Masterful engineering and premium materials bring out the best in the Delta’s compact, ridiculously tough design.
Versatility: Bringing one shovel is a challenge as it is. Bringing one that can work as a shovel or a hoe at three different shaft lengths gives you six options for optimal digging and leverage, whether you’re digging out a stuck truck or planting trees.
Quality: The market is flooded with cheap shovels and E-tools, most of them of dubious quality and specifications. The Delta, on the other hand, is the result of American engineering, ultra-premium materials, and meticulous attention to detail. Once you feel it in your hand, you’ll know.
Portability: Compactability, portability, packability, rackability… Whatever you want to call it, the Delta’s got ability to spare, and it’ll go with you anywhere thanks to the compact design and a mount that’ll keep it rattle-free wherever you roam. Because the best shovel on earth won’t help you if you leave it in your garage. 
We’ve been making shovels for four years. In that time, we have had an exceptional quality track record. On top of that, under any human-powered load, not one of our shafts have ever failed. The Delta is no exception.The shovel is tested to lift over 1000 lbs, so it won’t bend - even under the toughest situations. The superior materials combined with our innovative engineering make sure the Delta Shovel will never fail you.

With the foldable 3-position head, the Delta can be used as a shovel, a hoe, or fold it up for compact stowing. The collapsible shaft also lets you use the Delta at 3 different lengths. Combined together, you get a powerfully versatile tool that’s perfect for every situation.



The Delta Shovel integrates seamlessly with other DMOS products. Change heads and shafts as needed to fit your specific situation and preferences. (After the campaign, you will be offered options to add DMOS-compatible shovel blades and mounts to build your quiver.)

DMOS Collective shovels have impressed the testers at the best gear review sites across the outdoor industry.

 In addition, DMOS has partnered with:


Stuck in rough spot? Don’t worry - the Delta Shovel’s got your back.

We tested the Delta Shovel through everything we could think of - sand dunes, muddy riverbeds, and tough gravel. We’ve had fire departments use this shovel for salvages, and we’ve recovered vehicles. No matter the terrain, the Delta Shovel will carry you through.


The Delta shovel is a tool worthy of its place on even the most discerning 4x4, adventure van or RV. But the best tool in the world won’t make a difference if you leave it at home, so we built a dedicated vehicle mount for the Delta. 
The DMOS Delta Mount is built to DMOS’s tough and light design specs to keep your Delta securely stowed when you’re not busting dirt with it. There are two options:



 

 

Choose between two superior USA-sourced materials for your Delta Shovel’s construction. Each are ultra-strong and guaranteed against manufacturer’s defects for life.



Want strength without the weight? The 6061 Aircraft Grade Anodized Aluminum Delta Shovel is the one for you.

Ultra-light and ultra-strong, 6061 Aluminum. So unless you’re applying more pressure than a thousand pounds of cargo, mach 3 winds, or a sonic boom - your Delta Shovel will be fine.

In addition, the aluminum shaft is anodized to prevent rust, scratches, and corrosion. The blades are powder coated for a durable, yet environmentally-friendly finish.

For increased power and strength, you can choose our classic 12 Gauge Cold Rolled Steel shovel.

We cold form our steel - it’s a complex process but makes our steel 20 percent stronger than typical hot-rolled steel. So go ahead - do your worst. The heavy-duty, USA-sourced, 12-gauge steel will stand up to every crunch, slam and scoop you put your Delta Shovel through. 




Our shaft is indexed into three interlocking parts that allows it to be fully collapsible without compromising strength or integrity. Our engineers specifically designed the shaft and its components to bear the full force of a truck leveraged against it.

 
Plus, because of its lightweight and extendable design, you’ll get full leverage and strength of a full-sized shovel without the back-breaking weight or bulk of one. 
Compact your Delta down from a full-size shovel to the length of your forearm. Stow away your shovel anywhere you want or use our mount to have it securely stowed and readily available without taking any extra space.

The Delta’s 12 Gauge Steel Connector is an engineering marvel and is hands down the most powerful and versatile shovel bracket EVER MADE.



12 oversized flush rivets securely embed the bracket to your shovel head - there’s no separating these two. An easy-access T-Handle allows the Delta Shovel to fold up halfway, into a hoe, or fully for packability.

We squared off and sealed the connection to fit perfectly around the DMOS shaft - so no dust, dirt, or mud gets in. The bracket girdles the shaft - making the Delta Shovel much stronger and capable of lifting incredible weight, all while staying completely collapsible.

No doubt - this is the strongest shovel bracket you’ll ever find.


The nylon is ultra-strong as well as lightweight. Keep a good handle on your shovel in every situation. 

Our shovels are manufactured in Oregon by the best manufacturers of high-strength, high-durability, and high-engineered products in the world. These guys make a living making the most badass, strongest, and nearly indestructible products, tools, and components on the planet. 
 
 
Now, they’re making you the Ultimate Shovel and Survival Tool Ever - with absolutely zero compromise.


Quality and community matters - that’s why DMOS sources, designs, and manufactures everything in the USA. From the metal we use, to the engineers, to the manufacturers and assemblers, every part and aspect of the DMOS Delta Shovel is 100% American.

We’re making shovels the only way we know how - made in the USA.

We’re absolutely sure this is the best outdoor and survival tool you’ll ever use. As such, we guarantee your shovel will be free of any manufacturing defects. Period.  


Note, this doesn’t apply to finish wear. If your gear isn’t salty, scuffed, and grimy, you’re not running it hard enough. Your Delta should wear scars with pride. 

DMOS is known for making the world’s best shovels out of premium materials and designing them to tackle the toughest adventures.
We’re a crowdfunded company, created by the people for the people. This is our third Kickstarter campaign, and our seventh shovel. Our last campaign was the most funded shovel in Kickstarter history. 
From smokejumpers to backcountry enthusiasts, we’re the go-to choice for anyone who needs fail-proof gear they can trust. The reviews speak for themselves. We have over 300 5-star reviews from all over the world.

As with all our products, the Delta Shovel has been an ongoing collaboration between, overlanders, elite military personnel, pro athletes, first-responders, outdoor enthusiasts, engineers, designers, and users alike.
 Here's a first look from some members of our DMOS Tribe:​

 Never settle for a tool less worthy. The DMOS Delta Shovel is the answer to your outdoor needs. Whether you’re out on safari or just keeping the campgrounds clean, this is your ultimate companion.The Delta Shovel is designed for optimal digging and shoveling. From the handle to the head, you’ll experience dirt-digging nirvana as you break apart the toughest ground and toss payloads of earth with ease.The Delta Shovel is made to take on anything and everything Mother Nature might throw at you. Whether it’s Bigfoot himself or the deepest pit of mud, the Delta Shovel will handle it all.Do yourself a favor - get the Delta Shovel now. At the end of the campaign, you may also choose two additional color options:Those of you who crave everything ALL BLACK can opt for the Delta ELITE, an upgraded Delta with blackout, anodized finish and a milled aluminum grip. We will also offer:The many names, please see this as a starter list.  Off the top, DMOS wishes to thank Jason Ramos, Emily Miller and her team at the Rebelle Rally as well as the entire Rebelle Rally community of competitors, journalists, and volunteers, Dan Mayfield for the amazing film work, Jay Goodrich for the amazing photography, Orijin Media and Zach Montes on video of our Alpine Wyoming shoot, Ken Cameron and his team at 7P, Clay Croft and the XO crew, Ranyon D'Arge and his Park and Pipe crew at Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, Kevin Harper, Laura Wanlass, Mercedes Lilienthal, Harry Wagner, Matt Scott, The Sportsmobile team of Allen, Jonathan and Andrew Feld, Nathan Wright of CBI Offroad Fab, Total Chaos Fab team, the team at Baja HQ, Fremont Toyota Lander and for our awesome vehicle wraps, the talented Cody McCreary of Shirts and More, Noah Clark, Fabien Dodard, Shane Percival, Craig Neugeboren, Charles Ciaccio and the entire team at KO in Denver, Peter Rigby and the entire Astia Angel team, Lindsay Aspegren, Jeff Ishmael, Jeff Yapp, Bill Watkyns and the entire Lions Pride, Emmanuel Eleyae, Casey Brown, Chris Jennings, Christopher Long and his team at Capisco, the Silicon Couloir Board and community in Jackson Hole, John Bradley and his team at Global Exploration and Recovery, Travis Rice, Tim Durtschi, Cody Hunt, Andrew Burns, Phil Hessler, Galen Knowles, Zeppelin Zeerip, Cam McCaul, Cody Matechuck, and Marty Carrigan and the Global Sales Guys who helped us get our start, the Mountain X team in Calgary, Vanessa Block, the team at The Hub, Jeff Moran and the Jackson Hole Ski and Snowboard Club, Jack Koehler, former DMOSers including Ryan Freeman and LB Haney, PR shout outs to Chris Dickey and Purple Orange, Sonia Hendrix, Leslie Norris, and Curt Blakeney, all of our story:
My eCommerce site is now on-line as of February 11, 2020 and the Indiegogo campaign has run its course.  Thank you to everyone who participated in making this a very successful crowdfunding effort.

Please visit: www.grillblazer.com

 

Light your Charcoal Grill in 60 Seconds! Sear your Meat with Real Hot Fire!  Also the best torch for picnics, campfires, bonfires, etc.

Never before has lighting your outdoor charcoal grill, fireplace, campfire, or searing meat, been so fast, fun, or cool.  The GrillGun lights your grill in just a couple of minutes, while being entirely portable, easy to use, with a great feel in the hand - all this while looking awesome.  Virtually everyone that I've shown it to has said "I want one!"

Get them both... they have different purposes

The picture above helps you understand what the GrillGun is and how it is configured.  The GrillGun and Su-VGuns are powerful and cool looking torches that are easy to use for all your "big" fire starting or meat searing needs, but are intentionally designed to be comfortable, safe and easy to use.  They either mount atop a propane bottle or connects to a propane tank using an 8' adapter hose.

To light your grill, you just put your charcoal in the grill, arrange it the way you want it and then fire up the torch and let'er rip!

The GrillGun: A 400,000+ BTU torch that looks really cool!

The Su-V Gun: A shorter barrel and more focused intense flame for searing meat.

Finally, a high powered, quick way to light your grill without looking like a nerd!

When people realize they can have healthy, delicious food, cooked over real hardwood charcoal, in less time than gas grilling, there is going to be a new revolution in grilling.  

Guga "Sous Vide Everything" Loves the GrillGun 

"T-Roy Cooks" Loves the GrillGun 

The BBQ Pit Boys Love the GrillGun

Darrin Wilson "Fire and Water Cooking" Demos

Competition: The GrillGun vs the Su-VGun

The GrillGun vs The Searzall vs The TS8000 Searing Dry Aged Steaks

Competition: Lighting a Charcoal Grill

Indiegogo works like this: 

  • YOU decide how much money you want to spend to back the project
  • YOU decide which premiums (perks) you would like to receive in return for your support
  • YOU back the project and select the premium(s) you want... it's that simple

 

 
So I'm an engineer and I decided enough is enough.  If I was ever going to have my Dream Torch, I was going to have to design it and build it myself. First I asked friends and family to help me create a list of features that would make it the absolutely most rock-awesome torch that everyone would want to own.
  • It had to have a built in spark igniter, for safety and convenience. CHECK! 
  • It had to be really hot to get the charcoal going super fast, 400,000+ BTU. CHECK! 
  • It had to be more efficient than other high power torches. CHECK! 
  • It had to run on small portable propane bottles for portability. CHECK! 
  • It had to attach to economical 20lb propane tanks for stationary use. CHECK! 
  • It had to completely consume its fuel and produce an entirely blue flame. CHECK! 
  • It had to be made of high-quality materials and last a long time.  CHECK! 
  • It had to be easy and intuitive to operate. CHECK! 
  • It had to be able to be used safely. CHECK! (See "Safety" section below) 
  • It had to be fun and able to be used spontaneously when friends dropped by. CHECK! 
  • It had to look really cool, so that friends would see it and want one too.  CHECK! 

This was a tall order, but the resulting GrillGun hits every one of these marks.  Consequently it's the only torch of its kind. Nothing else out there has all these design elements.  It's an amazing tool that you'll want on your birthday list, Father's Day list, Graduation list, Christmas list.. It's truly a "Best in Class" torch.

 

Fun, Time, Taste, Health and Happiness 

Oh Happy Day!!!

Fun - It's hard to describe how fun it is to operate a GrillGun and use it to start all types of fires.  It is lightweight, comfortable to hold and easy to use, plus it looks and sounds like a jet air plane.

Time - Now you can wait for your friends to arrive before you start the grill, because whenever you want dinner, you just start the grill and your cooking in minutes instead of half.  Not only is it the fastest way to grill over charcoal. but it is even faster than cooking on a gas grill. 

Taste and Health - The output from the GrillGun is fully consumed propane gas, in other words, pure fire, pure heat, no hydrocarbon contamination from any petrochemicals poured onto your charcoal or emitted from your gas grill burners.  This makes for the best tasting, most healthy, most  beneficial hardwood charcoal grilling available.

Happiness - Philosophically, happiness comes from true friendships.  The GrillGun facilitates friendships on a multitude of levels -- visiting with friends on the porch while the grill is sizzling and the kids are playing, camping at the lake with your children and grand-children, tailgating with college friends before the big game, the romantic dinner for two under the moon-lit night sky -- and all of these made painless and easy with the amazing GrillGun.  And even if it's just you and you're a single person... using this fun tool just relieves your stress from the day and makes you feel good. 

No more...

 

Perhaps you want to see me light the grill, cook hamburgers and put out the charcoal in under 8 minutes.  It's worth it just to hear it roar and see it in action and in real time.

The next three videos step you through the process.

Video 1 - Setup the Charcoal to grill and explain the process - 53 seconds 

 

Video 2 - Light the charcoal, heat up the grill, start cooking - 3 min 53 sec 

 

Video 3 - Cook the Burgers, put out the fire - 2 min, 8 sec 

 

Helpful tip: My wife doesn't tell me to start the grill until she has everything ready to go on it; otherwise I'm just wasting charcoal.

 

We've collected numerous Google reviews and video testimonials.  We've shown it to strangers, friends, and family. asking them all to give us online reviews. You can find all of them or at GrillBlazer.com, some of which I've linked to this campaign for your enjoyment, as they tell you what people think, directly from their hearts... Happy watching!

 
 

The GrillGun is a very powerful torch.  For safe operation, follow these simple rules:

  • The Grill Gun can potentially burn anything up to 5 feet from its fire bell (flame end) when it is lit and fully operating.  Always be responsible to allow plenty of space around you and the GrillGun when using it. 
  • Always use the GrillGun outdoors in a well-ventilated area.
  • The fire bell will get very hot within moments of use.   Allow plenty of time for the fire bell to cool down before touching it or laying it down on a melt-able or flammable surface.  The GrillGun is sold with a stand and a hanging ring so it can either be stood up or hung in an upright position to cool.
  • If children are present when the GrillGun is cooling after use, disconnect the propane and hang the GrillGun out of reach to prevent accidental burns or mishandling by the curious.
  • Always teach someone how to properly operate the GillGun before allowing them to handle it.  Only allow someone to use it, if they respect its power and will operate it safely.
  • As with any powerful tool, keep the GrillGun and its propane bottles safely stored out of reach of children and other untrained, unwise people.
  • When the GrillGun is not in use, it is always safest to separate the GrillGun from the propane. 
  • The GrillGun is a very powerful tool that, when used correctly, will make your charcoal grilling and other fire-starting needs fun, simple, and safe.
  •  

 For my whole life, I've been an entrepreneur bottled up as a businessman and an engineer, working for other successful companies and start-ups.  Now I'm taking my years of practical experience and applying everything I've learned to this new venture.

My career has been focused on bringing high quality products to market.  From fish-finders to wind turbines and solar panels, from Non-Profits startups to cattle ranching, my range of product development experience and business development is far reaching.  I have successfully coordinated new product development all over the world - across the US, China, India, Australia, and the UK. Now it's time to build a really fun business that serves an under-served and very-deserving population: the Charcoal Griller!

 

 Our manufacturing companies need a minimum financial commitment from us to get started on a large manufacturing run. 

Manufacturing and administrative costs for starting a company capable of producing and delivering products like the GrillGun require an enormous amount of capital. Traditional investment firms, Venture Capitalists and Angel Investors have no frame of reference for funding a project like this since are no similar products out there.

The crowdfunding platform offers many backers, "risk free", the ability to support new and innovative ideas like this one.  As long as we entrepreneurs are  honest with you, then you have no risk, and I am honest through and through.  

We had to start somewhere and Kickstarter seemed like a perfect match.  Now after a very successful campaign, we've moved on to Indiegogo Indemand to allow interested backers a place to go while we are getting our retail e-commerce site up and running. Please back us and spread the word.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

 

GrillBlazer is a company focused on giving you top quality outdoor grilling accessories, the GrillGun and the Su-VGun being the first of many to come.  Our company is dedicated to giving you the best and most well-designed products possible.  Beyond justs making cool products, our company is dedicated to fostering healthy human interactions that build community.

Over the past 12 months we studied the market, human interaction, and the competition, in order to rise to the level of excellence, that you would expect from a company that intends make 40 million charcoal grillers happy over the next several years.

You can tell we did our homework right if you watch the reviews on this site, as well as many more at GrillBlazer.com.  The amount of product research and market research that we did will pay dividends in the future for both our backers and for us. 

Our manufacturing companies are is ready to go. All we need is your support.  So how soon can we deliver the "Ultimate Grill Torch... The GrillGun" to you or to someone(s) in your life?

 

We really do know exactly what we are doing and to help you know what our current expectations are.  Below, you will see a Production Schedule that all signs seem good to go!
story_txt:
My eCommerce site is now on-line as of February 11, 2020 and the Indiegogo campaign has run its course.  Thank you to everyone who participated in making this a very successful crowdfunding effort.Please visit: www.grillblazer.com Light your Charcoal Grill in 60 Seconds! Sear your Meat with Real Hot Fire!  Also the best torch for picnics, campfires, bonfires, etc.Never before has lighting your outdoor charcoal grill, fireplace, campfire, or searing meat, been so fast, fun, or cool.  The GrillGun lights your grill in just a couple of minutes, while being entirely portable, easy to use, with a great feel in the hand - all this while looking awesome.  Virtually everyone that I've shown it to has said "I want one!"Get them both... they have different purposesThe picture above helps you understand what the GrillGun is and how it is configured.  The GrillGun and Su-VGuns are powerful and cool looking torches that are easy to use for all your "big" fire starting or meat searing needs, but are intentionally designed to be comfortable, safe and easy to use.  They either mount atop a propane bottle or connects to a propane tank using an 8' adapter hose.To light your grill, you just put your charcoal in the grill, arrange it the way you want it and then fire up the torch and let'er rip!The GrillGun: A 400,000+ BTU torch that looks really cool! The Su-V Gun: A shorter barrel and more focused intense flame for searing meat. Finally, a high powered, quick way to light your grill without looking like a nerd!When people realize they can have healthy, delicious food, cooked over real hardwood charcoal, in less time than gas grilling, there is going to be a new revolution in grilling.  Guga "Sous Vide Everything" Loves the GrillGun "T-Roy Cooks" Loves the GrillGun 


The BBQ Pit Boys Love the GrillGun


Darrin Wilson "Fire and Water Cooking" Demos


Competition: The GrillGun vs the Su-VGun


The GrillGun vs The Searzall vs The TS8000 Searing Dry Aged Steaks

Competition: Lighting a Charcoal Grill

Indiegogo works like this: 

YOU decide how much money you want to spend to back the project
YOU decide which premiums (perks) you would like to receive in return for your support
YOU back the project and select the premium(s) you want... it's that simple

 

 
So I'm an engineer and I decided enough is enough.  If I was ever going to have my Dream Torch, I was going to have to design it and build it myself. First I asked friends and family to help me create a list of features that would make it the absolutely most rock-awesome torch that everyone would want to own.
It had to have a built in spark igniter, for safety and convenience. CHECK! 
It had to be really hot to get the charcoal going super fast, 400,000+ BTU. CHECK! 
It had to be more efficient than other high power torches. CHECK! 
It had to run on small portable propane bottles for portability. CHECK! 
It had to attach to economical 20lb propane tanks for stationary use. CHECK! 
It had to completely consume its fuel and produce an entirely blue flame. CHECK! 
It had to be made of high-quality materials and last a long time.  CHECK! 
It had to be easy and intuitive to operate. CHECK! 
It had to be able to be used safely. CHECK! (See "Safety" section below) 
It had to be fun and able to be used spontaneously when friends dropped by. CHECK! 
It had to look really cool, so that friends would see it and want one too.  CHECK! 
This was a tall order, but the resulting GrillGun hits every one of these marks.  Consequently it's the only torch of its kind. Nothing else out there has all these design elements.  It's an amazing tool that you'll want on your birthday list, Father's Day list, Graduation list, Christmas list.. It's truly a "Best in Class" torch. Fun, Time, Taste, Health and Happiness Oh Happy Day!!!Fun - It's hard to describe how fun it is to operate a GrillGun and use it to start all types of fires.  It is lightweight, comfortable to hold and easy to use, plus it looks and sounds like a jet air plane.Time - Now you can wait for your friends to arrive before you start the grill, because whenever you want dinner, you just start the grill and your cooking in minutes instead of half.  Not only is it the fastest way to grill over charcoal. but it is even faster than cooking on a gas grill. Taste and Health - The output from the GrillGun is fully consumed propane gas, in other words, pure fire, pure heat, no hydrocarbon contamination from any petrochemicals poured onto your charcoal or emitted from your gas grill burners.  This makes for the best tasting, most healthy, most  beneficial hardwood charcoal grilling available.Happiness - Philosophically, happiness comes from true friendships.  The GrillGun facilitates friendships on a multitude of levels -- visiting with friends on the porch while the grill is sizzling and the kids are playing, camping at the lake with your children and grand-children, tailgating with college friends before the big game, the romantic dinner for two under the moon-lit night sky -- and all of these made painless and easy with the amazing GrillGun.  And even if it's just you and you're a single person... using this fun tool just relieves your stress from the day and makes you feel good. No more... 
Perhaps you want to see me light the grill, cook hamburgers and put out the charcoal in under 8 minutes.  It's worth it just to hear it roar and see it in action and in real time.

Video 1 - Setup the Charcoal to grill and explain the process - 53 seconds 

 
Video 2 - Light the charcoal, heat up the grill, start cooking - 3 min 53 sec 

 
Video 3 - Cook the Burgers, put out the fire - 2 min, 8 sec 


 

Helpful tip: My wife doesn't tell me to start the grill until she has everything ready to go on it; otherwise I'm just wasting charcoal.

Happy watching!

story:
THE STORY

(Please mind: Ukrainian-English language mix below) 23rd of July, The Riverbird's Nest after the first 2,5 weeks of construction.

Наша місія — створити найкращий маленький дерев'яний будинок поза Києвом для тебе, для нас, для наповнення красою незайманої природи, усамітнення, здорового життя та ідеального виду на річку Дніпро.

We are on a mission to create the most perfect little wooden house outside of Kyiv, for you, for us, to enjoy wilderness, solitude, healthy living, and a perfect view onto the Dnipro river.

A digital preview of the Riverbird's nest, embedded between two old pear trees.

Наша — це швейцарського режисера Марка Вілкінса та бельгійського бізнесмена Філіппа д'Хав... І може твоя? 

Ми відкрили для себе цю фантастичну земельну ділянку, лише 60 км на південь від Києва, з неймовірним панорамним краєвидом, безпосередньо за межами мальовничого села Витачів.

We, this is the Swiss filmmaker Marc Wilkins and the Belgian businessman Philippe d'Have.. and maybe you!?

We discovered the most magical plot of land, just 60km south of Kyiv, with a breathtaking panoramic view, right outside the picturesque village of Vytachiv. 

The main view from our future cottage-deck.

4000 м² цих райських кущів знаходяться на зеленому схилі, з видом на величну річку Дніпро, оточені дубами, волоськими горіхами та в'язами.

The 4000 м² little wild paradise is on a grassy hill, overlooking the majestic Dnipro River, surrounded by walnut-, oak-, and elm trees.

Approximately where the car is now, we will build The Riverbird's Nest

 

CROWDFUND 50% OF THE CONSTRUCTION COST

Ми придбали цей прекрасний шматочок землі та запрошуємо тебе приєднатись до нас, профінансувавши половину витрат на будівництво, повна вартість якого складає € 56,000. Філіп та Марк інвестують €28,000, а ти, разом з громадою Indiegogo, інвестуєш інші €28,000.

Отримай гарантовану можливість провести в будинку ніч, вихідні, тиждень або цілий місяць із 30%-50% знижкою від майбутньої ціни бронювання. Наприклад, тут на Indiegogo ти можеш забронювати перебування у вихідний день за €40, в той час, як тільки проєкт буде завершений, ціна такого бронювання складатиме €80. Ти також можеш зібрати своїх друзів та скинутися разом з ними, групою.

We purchased this beautiful piece of land and invite you to join us, to finance half of the construction-costs of EUR 56,000: Philippe and Marc invest EUR 28,000 and you with Indiegogo invest the remaining EUR 28,000

Secure yourself a night, a weekend, a week or a whole month for a 30% to 50% discount on the costs of a future reservation. For example: You can reserve a weekday for EUR 40 here at INDIGOGO, but it will cost EUR 80 once the project is completed.

You can also gather your friends and crowdfund as a crowd.

60m km south of the center of Kyiv.

Before sunrise. This will be the view from your pillow.

 

THE ARCHITECTURAL VISION

Будинок площею 75 м² буде збудований на палях для мінімального впливу на довкілля та виконаний із місцевої сосни.

Наш архітектор — Володимир Вештак, молодий талановитий майстер, ентузіаст роботи із деревом та принципів сталого розвитку. 

Композиція Річкового Гніздечка орієнтована на річку. З кожної кімнати вам буде відкриватися прекрасна панорама. Дві спальні кімнати та два маленьких "гніздечка на горищі" зможуть розмістити до 6 людей. 

The 75 м² cabin will be built on poles, for minimal environmental impact, and constructed of local pinewood.

Our architect is Volodymir Veshtak, a young and talented creator, who is passionate about working with wood and the principles of sustainability.

The design of the Riverbird's Nest is oriented to the river. From every room you will be able to enjoy the beautiful panorama. Two bedrooms and little "attic nests", will be able to host up to 6 people.

The current floor-plan of The Riverbird's Nest.

Посеред вітальні ми розташуємо романтичний дров'яний камін, невеликі письмові столи в спальних кімнатах стануть твоїм ідеальним місцем для творчості, а вид на дерева з кухні надихатиме та даруватиме відчуття, наче ти — везучій шукач пригод у дикій природі.  

A romantic wood-fire-place will be centered in the living-room, small writing desks to serve your creativity in the bedrooms and a tree-view from the kitchen will inspire you to feel like a spoiled adventurer in the wilderness.

The cross-section of the cottage, looking towards the river.

Завершення будівництва заплановано на початок вересня 2020 року. 

Гості Річкового Гніздечка опиняться в оточенні природи, проте зможуть насолодитися комфортом сучасного життя, як то централізоване опалення, пральна машина, підлога з підігрівом у ванних кімнатах, WiFi, сучасна кухня та... вініловий програвач з власною добіркою платівок Річкового Гніздечка. 

У спеціальному довіднику нашого будинку ти дізнаєшся, де у селі можна знайти найсвіжіші яйця, найсмачніші соління, найсолодші яблука, найдосвіченішого наставника з рибалки  або в якому напрямку тобі відправитись у подорож на велосипеді, щоб натрапити на лісове озеро для освіжного купання. 

The residents of The Riverbird's Nest will find themselves surrounded by nature, but enjoy the  comfort of contemporary life like central heating, a washing machine, floor-heating in the bathroom, WiFi, a modern kitchen and..  a vinyl player with its own Riverbird's record collection

End of construction is planned for mid September 2020.

In the cabin’s handbook you will learn about where in the village you get the freshest eggs, the most delicious pickled vegetables, the sweetest apples, the most experienced fishing guide or which direction to ride with your bicycle to discover a forest lake for a refreshing swimming session. 

 

THE FOUNDERS

Марк Вілкінс, народжений у Швейцарії, — режисер, який переїхав з Нью-Йорка до Києва, натхненний Революцією гідності у 2013-2014 роках. Окрім зйомок фільмів та рекламних роликів (його останній короткометражний фільм BON VOYAGE потрапив у шорт-лист 89-ї премії Академії), він є співзасновником київської художньої галереї THE NAKED ROOM та одним із URBAN SPACE 500.

Філіп д'Хаве, затятий рибалка, переїхав до Києва у 2004 році, у самий розпал Помаранчевої революції, щоб запустити L'OREAL в Україні. Родом з Бельгії, він жив і працював в Африці та різних країнах Східної Європи, перш ніж знайти свій дім в Україні.

Marc Wilkins, born in Switzerland, is a film-director who moved from New York to Kyiv, inspired by the Revolution of Dignity in 2013/2014. Besides directing movies and commercials (his latest short film BON VOYAGE was shortlisted for the 89th Academy Award), he is a co-founder of the Kyiv Art Gallery THE NAKED ROOM and one of URBAN SPACE 500.

Philippe d'Have, a passionated fisherman, move to Kyiv in 2004, right into the Orange Revolution, to establish L'OREAL in Ukraine. Originally from Belgium, he lived and worked in Africa and various Eastern European countries, before finding his home in Ukraine. 

 

RISK + CHALLENGES

Засновники та архітектор мають досвід у розвитку проєктів з нерухомості в Україні. Ми впевнені, що зможемо реалізувати цей проєкт. 

Юридичні аспекти щодо земельної ділянки та наших планів були вивчені та підтверджені незалежними юристами.

Ми повні рішучості досягнути нашої мети та завершити будівництво на початку вересня.

 

Напротивагу токсичній традицій будувати паркани та огорожі в Україні, ми плануємо не псувати нашу землю, закриваючи краєвид стіною та парканом навколо будинку. 

Однак, ми наймемо компанію з охорони для захисту будиночка та познайомимось з мешканцями Витачова для встановлення дружніх відносин та економічних партнерств. 

Філіпп та Марк мають додаткові фінанси для завершення будівництва у випадку неочікуваного збільшення бюджету.

The founders and the architect are experienced in developing real-estate in Ukraine. We feel confident and comfortable regarding the feasibility of our project.

The legal situation of the land-plot and our plans have been monitored and confirmed by two independent lawyers.

We are passionate about keeping our goal to finish construction early September. 

 

Opposed to the toxic tradition of fences and walls in Ukraine, and plan to not spoil our land with a view-blocking wall and gate around the property. 

Nevertheless, we will hire a security company to protect the cottage and connect to the residents of Vytachiv to create friendships and economical partnerships.

Philippe and Marc have additional funds available to complete the construction, should unexpected costs arise.

A little fishermen's harbor, just a 10 minutes walk away.

 

THANK YOU

Будь ласка, приєднуйтесь до команди з краудфандінгу та створіть місце для романтичного уікенду, часу з сім'єю, активного відпочинку або для написання вашого першого роману.

Please join the crowdfunding-crew and create a place for romantic weekends, family-moments, sports challenges, or to write your first novel. 

A digital preview of The Riverbird's Nest at its original location.

 

PLEASE JOIN + SHARE OUR CROWDFUNDING-CALL

AND SEE YOU SOON AT THE RIVERBIRD'S NEST.
story_txt:
THE STORY
(Please mind: Ukrainian-English language mix below) 23rd of July, The Riverbird's Nest after the first 2,5 weeks of construction.
Наша місія — створити найкращий маленький дерев'яний будинок поза Києвом для тебе, для нас, для наповнення красою незайманої природи, усамітнення, здорового життя та ідеального виду на річку Дніпро.
We are on a mission to create the most perfect little wooden house outside of Kyiv, for you, for us, to enjoy wilderness, solitude, healthy living, and a perfect view onto the Dnipro river.

A digital preview of the Riverbird's nest, embedded between two old pear trees.
Наша — це швейцарського режисера Марка Вілкінса та бельгійського бізнесмена Філіппа д'Хав... І може твоя? 
Ми відкрили для себе цю фантастичну земельну ділянку, лише 60 км на південь від Києва, з неймовірним панорамним краєвидом, безпосередньо за межами мальовничого села Витачів.
We, this is the Swiss filmmaker Marc Wilkins and the Belgian businessman Philippe d'Have.. and maybe you!?
We discovered the most magical plot of land, just 60km south of Kyiv, with a breathtaking panoramic view, right outside the picturesque village of Vytachiv. 

The main view from our future cottage-deck.
4000 м² цих райських кущів знаходяться на зеленому схилі, з видом на величну річку Дніпро, оточені дубами, волоськими горіхами та в'язами.
The 4000 м² little wild paradise is on a grassy hill, overlooking the majestic Dnipro River, surrounded by walnut-, oak-, and elm trees.

Approximately where the car is now, we will build The Riverbird's Nest
 
CROWDFUND 50% OF THE CONSTRUCTION COST
Ми придбали цей прекрасний шматочок землі та запрошуємо тебе приєднатись до нас, профінансувавши половину витрат на будівництво, повна вартість якого складає € 56,000. Філіп та Марк інвестують €28,000, а ти, разом з громадою Indiegogo, інвестуєш інші €28,000.
Отримай гарантовану можливість провести в будинку ніч, вихідні, тиждень або цілий місяць із 30%-50% знижкою від майбутньої ціни бронювання. Наприклад, тут на Indiegogo ти можеш забронювати перебування у вихідний день за €40, в той час, як тільки проєкт буде завершений, ціна такого бронювання складатиме €80. Ти також можеш зібрати своїх друзів та скинутися разом з ними, групою.
We purchased this beautiful piece of land and invite you to join us, to finance half of the construction-costs of EUR 56,000: Philippe and Marc invest EUR 28,000 and you with Indiegogo invest the remaining EUR 28,000
Secure yourself a night, a weekend, a week or a whole month for a 30% to 50% discount on the costs of a future reservation. For example: You can reserve a weekday for EUR 40 here at INDIGOGO, but it will cost EUR 80 once the project is completed.
You can also gather your friends and crowdfund as a crowd.

60m km south of the center of Kyiv.

Before sunrise. This will be the view from your pillow.
 
THE ARCHITECTURAL VISION
Будинок площею 75 м² буде збудований на палях для мінімального впливу на довкілля та виконаний із місцевої сосни.
Наш архітектор — Володимир Вештак, молодий талановитий майстер, ентузіаст роботи із деревом та принципів сталого розвитку. 
Композиція Річкового Гніздечка орієнтована на річку. З кожної кімнати вам буде відкриватися прекрасна панорама. Дві спальні кімнати та два маленьких "гніздечка на горищі" зможуть розмістити до 6 людей. 
The 75 м² cabin will be built on poles, for minimal environmental impact, and constructed of local pinewood.
Our architect is Volodymir Veshtak, a young and talented creator, who is passionate about working with wood and the principles of sustainability.
The design of the Riverbird's Nest is oriented to the river. From every room you will be able to enjoy the beautiful panorama. Two bedrooms and little "attic nests", will be able to host up to 6 people.

The current floor-plan of The Riverbird's Nest.
Посеред вітальні ми розташуємо романтичний дров'яний камін, невеликі письмові столи в спальних кімнатах стануть твоїм ідеальним місцем для творчості, а вид на дерева з кухні надихатиме та даруватиме відчуття, наче ти — везучій шукач пригод у дикій природі.  
A romantic wood-fire-place will be centered in the living-room, small writing desks to serve your creativity in the bedrooms and a tree-view from the kitchen will inspire you to feel like a spoiled adventurer in the wilderness.

The cross-section of the cottage, looking towards the river.
Завершення будівництва заплановано на початок вересня 2020 року. 
Гості Річкового Гніздечка опиняться в оточенні природи, проте зможуть насолодитися комфортом сучасного життя, як то централізоване опалення, пральна машина, підлога з підігрівом у ванних кімнатах, WiFi, сучасна кухня та... вініловий програвач з власною добіркою платівок Річкового Гніздечка. 
У спеціальному довіднику нашого будинку ти дізнаєшся, де у селі можна знайти найсвіжіші яйця, найсмачніші соління, найсолодші яблука, найдосвіченішого наставника з рибалки  або в якому напрямку тобі відправитись у подорож на велосипеді, щоб натрапити на лісове озеро для освіжного купання. 
The residents of The Riverbird's Nest will find themselves surrounded by nature, but enjoy the  comfort of contemporary life like central heating, a washing machine, floor-heating in the bathroom, WiFi, a modern kitchen and..  a vinyl player with its own Riverbird's record collection
End of construction is planned for mid September 2020.
In the cabin’s handbook you will learn about where in the village you get the freshest eggs, the most delicious pickled vegetables, the sweetest apples, the most experienced fishing guide or which direction to ride with your bicycle to discover a forest lake for a refreshing swimming session. 
 

THE FOUNDERS
Марк Вілкінс, народжений у Швейцарії, — режисер, який переїхав з Нью-Йорка до Києва, натхненний Революцією гідності у 2013-2014 роках. Окрім зйомок фільмів та рекламних роликів (його останній короткометражний фільм BON VOYAGE потрапив у шорт-лист 89-ї премії Академії), він є співзасновником київської художньої галереї THE NAKED ROOM та одним із URBAN SPACE 500.
Філіп д'Хаве, затятий рибалка, переїхав до Києва у 2004 році, у самий розпал Помаранчевої революції, щоб запустити L'OREAL в Україні. Родом з Бельгії, він жив і працював в Африці та різних країнах Східної Європи, перш ніж знайти свій дім в Україні.
Marc Wilkins, born in Switzerland, is a film-director who moved from New York to Kyiv, inspired by the Revolution of Dignity in 2013/2014. Besides directing movies and commercials (his latest short film BON VOYAGE was shortlisted for the 89th Academy Award), he is a co-founder of the Kyiv Art Gallery THE NAKED ROOM and one of URBAN SPACE 500.
Philippe d'Have, a passionated fisherman, move to Kyiv in 2004, right into the Orange Revolution, to establish L'OREAL in Ukraine. Originally from Belgium, he lived and worked in Africa and various Eastern European countries, before finding his home in Ukraine. 
 


RISK + CHALLENGES
Засновники та архітектор мають досвід у розвитку проєктів з нерухомості в Україні. Ми впевнені, що зможемо реалізувати цей проєкт. 
Юридичні аспекти щодо земельної ділянки та наших планів були вивчені та підтверджені незалежними юристами.
Ми повні рішучості досягнути нашої мети та завершити будівництво на початку вересня. Напротивагу токсичній традицій будувати паркани та огорожі в Україні, ми плануємо не псувати нашу землю, закриваючи краєвид стіною та парканом навколо будинку. 
Однак, ми наймемо компанію з охорони для захисту будиночка та познайомимось з мешканцями Витачова для встановлення дружніх відносин та економічних партнерств. 
Філіпп та Марк мають додаткові фінанси для завершення будівництва у випадку неочікуваного збільшення бюджету.
The founders and the architect are experienced in developing real-estate in Ukraine. We feel confident and comfortable regarding the feasibility of our project.
The legal situation of the land-plot and our plans have been monitored and confirmed by two independent lawyers.
We are passionate about keeping our goal to finish construction early September.  Opposed to the toxic tradition of fences and walls in Ukraine, and plan to not spoil our land with a view-blocking wall and gate around the property. 
Nevertheless, we will hire a security company to protect the cottage and connect to the residents of Vytachiv to create friendships and economical partnerships.
Philippe and Marc have additional funds available to complete the construction, should unexpected costs arise.


A little fishermen's harbor, just a 10 minutes walk away.
 
THANK YOU
Будь ласка, приєднуйтесь до команди з краудфандінгу та створіть місце для романтичного уікенду, часу з сім'єю, активного відпочинку або для написання вашого першого роману.
Please join the crowdfunding-crew and create a place for romantic weekends, family-moments, sports challenges, or to write your first novel. 

A digital preview of The Riverbird's Nest at its original location.
 

PLEASE JOIN + SHARE OUR CROWDFUNDING-CALL 

AND SEE YOU SOON AT THE RIVERBIRD'S NEST.

story:
✅ 12000mAh battery

✅ Chargeable via Solar Power

✅ Chargeable via Hand-crank

✅ Chargeable anytime anywhere 

✅ Small size perfect for travel ✈️

✅ Up to 23% off retail prices

✅ Recommended By Skilled Survival

With a 12000mAh battery capacity, the X-Generator lets you fully charge the latest mobile phone models between 2-3 times on a single charge. Dual USB outputs offer fast charging of 2 devices simultaneously with power to spare. 

 

Invaluable in an emergency situation and perfect for the outdoor lifestyle, the X-Generator is equipped with a high-efficiency solar cell providing an eco-friendly, renewable and portable power source wherever the sun shines. With 200mA power for every sun hour, you can enjoy the full benefits of the X-Generator when camping, hiking, boating, and other outdoor recreational activities where electricity can quickly become a distant comfort. 

 

It takes virtually no strength to rotate the X-Generator’s hand-crank charger, but every crank adds available power for charging your favorite devices and the X-Generator’s integrated LED flashlight. With 400mA for every 1 hour of hand-crank charging, the X-Generator comes in handy during power outages and emergency situations where a device charger and sustainable light source can make all the difference. 

The X-Generator comes equipped with an integrated LED flashlight and 3 levels of brightness for the perfect visibility-to-efficiency ratio and maximized use of solar, hand-crank and electric charging capacity. Its flashlight SOS mode produces an instant emergency signal useful in a wide-range of real-life situations where signaling may be essential to your safety and security.

Live and travel worry-free with the X-Generator — designed for life’s most demanding situations and manufactured with safety and durability in mind, featuring overcharge protection, overheating protection, short-circuit protection, and leakage protection alongside unlimited power on demand.

CONTACT US for even more discounts and to learn more about X-Generator today.

story:
Overview

Fully Funded! Order Here from Manhattan Portage Here

The Atlas Sling is a dual-purpose sling bag and travel organizer pouch for your everyday carry (EDC).

You can wear it on your back or on your chest as a crossbody EDC bag to keep all your gear within reach.

Detach the shoulder strap to transform the sling into a travel organizer pouch.

Thanks to its multiple pockets and internal grid system, it can organize loose items and keep cables tangle free, making it easy to pack your essentials into another bag.

Never travel with a cluttered bag again.

The Atlas Sling is the result of feedback-driven design from EverydayCarry.com's team of experts and community of gear enthusiasts, produced by Manhattan Portage with premium materials in their world-class manufacturing facilities.

We proudly back the Atlas Sling with a limited lifetime warranty.

The first 500 domestic orders will deliver in time for the holidays, guaranteed.

  • Dual-purpose sling bag / travel organizer pouch for daily carry designed in New York, NY
  • 1680D CORDURA® Ballistic Nylon Exterior, 420D nylon interior
  • Custom YKK zippers, buckles, and hardware
  • Mil-spec MOLLE-compatible exterior webbing
  • Adjustable, detachable shoulder strap with quick release buckle
  • Multi-width interior organization loop system
  • Internal and external zippered pockets
  • Discreet co-branded Black Label detail
  • Limited lifetime warranty

Carry Your Way: Sling It or Pack It

Click HERE to watch a short demo of the sling bag and shoulder strap in action!

Everything In Its Place

Premium Materials

We stand by our selection of premium materials and hardware to make the Atlas Sling truly EDC-worthy. We're proud to back the bag with a limited lifetime warranty through Manhattan Portage.

Endless Customization

Your All-in-One Carry Companion

    Who We Are

    Why Travel with the Atlas Sling?

    For more information and press assets, please view our Media Kit.

Our 1-piece carabiner only weighs 6 grams (0.2 oz) but is stronger than you can imagine!

Made of aircraft grade 5 Titanium, our carabiner is lightweight and super strong. Made from a single piece, so there are no moving parts to wear out. 

Attach to your keychain for instant access.  Can also act as a bottle opener in a pinch.

2.5mm thick, solid Titanium, but astonishingly weighs less than 6 grams (0.2 oz)!

Solid 6AL4V grade 5 aircraft titanium.

EDM construction from a single piece of Ti.

No springs or levers to break, lose or wear out. Just a lifetime of reliable, strong service.

The 1 piece construction looks cool and unusual. Pledge now and get yours today!

story:
The latest generation of Hubsan Technology: ZINO​



Redefine flying and change the way you live. Look around the world, let flying be more accessible.

1. Foldable design and more compact. The Zino has been designed for you to take it anywhere.

2.Zino has a 3-axis stabilized 4k camera equipped with F2.2 aperture and 89° wide-angle lens. HD photos with 3840*2160 effective pixels allows you to capture more details than you can imagine. Record your own movie at the touch of a button.
 


 

3.It is your photographer. Use image tracking, select the area to record and keep the wonderful moments.




4. Breaks the traditional aerial photography limits, whether you are swimming, climbing or contesting in a competition.



One-button record mode: Panoramic filming, Line Fly mode, and a video with movie qualities.

 

 



      Zino is simple but omnipotent!
 

Before Zino, only more expensive and more professional drones can achieve this


 





Why support us?
The design
The flight
The photography
The uniqueness
Then
Participate in our project.
With a touch of a button to save a large piece of your memory.
To get an aircraft but also the next era of life. A developer of drone and convenient living.


Why invest us?

Hubsan Technology Co., Ltd. is a high-tech enterprise that consist of its own R&D, production, sales, training and technical support teams that specialize in unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV).
Hubsan follows the business philosophy of create the future and fly with your dreams to develop unique and high quality UAV for its customers worldwide.

Creating an accessible, affordable and lovable UAV is our business vision.

CES 2016



H501S

In 2015, Hubsan H501S was officially launched and as soon as H501S entered market, this model quickly became well known. The sales volume reached 500,000 units and it became one of the most popular drone in this industry.

The reason behind Hubsan’s success was that Hubsan understands what the market needs.
Hubsan H501S is a drone for beginners but it is also a mainstream drone that dominated the market.

Comparing to other drones, Hubsan H501S not only has the ability to do HD photography but it is also affordable and accessible and that is what made it a popular choice for most.
H501S helped the entire community to gain more knowledge in the drone industry and gave people the dream of becoming a professional aerial photographer and this is what motivates us.
The latest Hubsan Zino is a release of a convenient and professional drone, before Zino, only more expensive drones can achieve this.

We look forward to seeing Zino to make a difference in the market again.



 

Experience the latest technology and a smarter drone

Hubsan is always been striving for innovation. The aerial photography lens is excellent and provides great quality images. Whether it is creating professional photography or flying, Zino gives a better user experience.

Your support will give us more funds and help us increase our research and development budget which will allow more people to see our products.




 


If you believe it, everything is possible. With the intention of serving the community, we want everyone to start enjoying flying.

Hubsan has been making progess and has been innovating with an excellent R&D team, and more importantly, Hubsan gives hope and passion to those that support us. Letting people realize that technology can change your life so get involved and join us.

story:
Kiss Luggage Fees Goodbye!

Remember your last trip?: Waiting behind 50 people to check in your bag? Hauling all your suitcases though customs...and then back to the very same gate!! and "You're telling me my suitcase is in a different time zone?!?" 

PillowPack: A neck pillow you pack.

  • Sneak more of your stuff on an airplane; It's not a suitcase, it's not a personal item.
    It is invisible to airlines!
  • Bring an empty PillowPack for your return flight when all your belongings no longer fit in your suitcase. (It's not only me, is it?!:)
  • Pack a change of clothes and essentials so you can tan on the beach waiting for your lost luggage to arrive! 
  • Pack a PillowPack with your clothing so you can bring a smaller bag. Traveling with less stuff is less stress. And less cost.

Ask yourself: "What experiences will I invest in?" "What extra excursions will I take?" "What luxury will I treat myself to?"  And message me: I want to know !!

    Benefits of Packing Light

    This PillowPack campaign is at a perfect time in travel:

    • As baggage fees rise and travel is commonplace, it is a waste of money and a burden to bring excess with you.
    • America is (almost) post-materialism. We are tired of our stuffed houses and the debt our spending binges bring: we are heavily burdened.
    • We desire experiences over materialism; We see less as more.
    • Tiny Houses and the gift of Sweden -- IKEA --are helping change the way we live, what we value owning, and how we travel. And don't forget all the Tidying Up that's happening!!

    What We Need & What You Get

    The breakdown:

    • We need funds to hire a local, Kansas City, Missouri, manufacturer to make PillowPacks.
    • We are also saving a percentage of our funding to pay for the $8,000 patent fee in October 2020.
    • We want to sell a lot of pillows to prove to Shark Tank it's a viable product. We want to take this idea to everyone!
    • All supporters who choose a prize will receive a PillowPack from the first manufactured lot. 
    Design, Simplicity, and Frugality
    We took our two children to Cancun, it was their first time to see the ocean. It was a big trip for our family. Our budget airline was going to charge us an insane amount for carry-ons and I was determined to circumvent ALL baggage fees.
    • Hi! My name is Amber Waldeier and I love design, simplicity and frugality.
    • I found under-utilized space on an airplane.
    • Pack clothes in a neck pillow to skip baggage fees. 
    • I did *not* want have to look into my kids' eyes and tell them we couldn't go on the super-awesome excursion because we spent our excursions budget on baggage fees. 

    Risks & Challenges

    My family and I are rebuilding our life after three years of my illness and pain. While I didn't
    think I would start a company: I knew I was up for an adventure. And look what God has
    dropped in my lap.

    • That said, I have never done this before. I did not know that there were Cut & Sew Companies in my city. I didn't even know that's what they are called. 
    • The last three years of hardship have proved (and shocked!) me at how much endurance I have. I am able to research, persevere and find the answers I need when I need them. I imagine the business and manufacturing industry will be less intimidating than the medical field. 
    • My graphic design training, photography skills, and non-profit fundraising experience are coming in quite handy.
    • I plan to grow PillowPack into a successful business, proving PillowPack as a viable travel accessory for all travelers. And who knows what other accessories we will dream up.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    I know you can't all contribute right now, but that doesn't mean you can't join in:

    • Help me get the word out and make some noise about the PillowPack campaign. Consider sharing where you are able.
    • Tell your friends who travel about my story and the new PillowPack! Give them my number.

    Thank you for your support! I keep pinching myself: this is amazing. 

    PillowPack brings freedom to a world of travelers who can now spend their money on extra excursions, elegant meals and exciting experiences!
story_txt:
Kiss Luggage Fees Goodbye!
Remember your last trip?: Waiting behind 50 people to check in your bag? Hauling all your suitcases though customs...and then back to the very same gate!! and "You're telling me my suitcase is in a different time zone?!?" 
PillowPack: A neck pillow you pack.

Sneak more of your stuff on an airplane; It's not a suitcase, it's not a personal item.It is invisible to airlines!
Bring an empty PillowPack for your return flight when all your belongings no longer fit in your suitcase. (It's not only me, is it?!:)
Pack a change of clothes and essentials so you can tan on the beach waiting for your lost luggage to arrive! 
Pack a PillowPack with your clothing so you can bring a smaller bag. Traveling with less stuff is less stress. And less cost.

Ask yourself: "What experiences will I invest in?" "What extra excursions will I take?" "What luxury will I treat myself to?"  And message me: I want to know !!

Benefits of Packing Light
This PillowPack campaign is at a perfect time in travel:

As baggage fees rise and travel is commonplace, it is a waste of money and a burden to bring excess with you.
America is (almost) post-materialism. We are tired of our stuffed houses and the debt our spending binges bring: we are heavily burdened.
We desire experiences over materialism; We see less as more.
Tiny Houses and the gift of Sweden -- IKEA --are helping change the way we live, what we value owning, and how we travel. And don't forget all the Tidying Up that's happening!!


What We Need & What You Get
The breakdown:

We need funds to hire a local, Kansas City, Missouri, manufacturer to make PillowPacks.
We are also saving a percentage of our funding to pay for the $8,000 patent fee in October 2020.
We want to sell a lot of pillows to prove to Shark Tank it's a viable product. We want to take this idea to everyone!
All supporters who choose a prize will receive a PillowPack from the first manufactured lot. 


Design, Simplicity, and Frugality

We took our two children to Cancun, it was their first time to see the ocean. It was a big trip for our family. Our budget airline was going to charge us an insane amount for carry-ons and I was determined to circumvent ALL baggage fees.


Hi! My name is Amber Waldeier and I love design, simplicity and frugality.
I found under-utilized space on an airplane.
Pack clothes in a neck pillow to skip baggage fees. 
I did *not* want have to look into my kids' eyes and tell them we couldn't go on the super-awesome excursion because we spent our excursions budget on baggage fees. 

Risks & Challenges
My family and I are rebuilding our life after three years of my illness and pain. While I didn'tthink I would start a company: I knew I was up for an adventure. And look what God hasdropped in my lap.

That said, I have never done this before. I did not know that there were Cut & Sew Companies in my city. I didn't even know that's what they are called. 
The last three years of hardship have proved (and shocked!) me at how much endurance I have. I am able to research, persevere and find the answers I need when I need them. I imagine the business and manufacturing industry will be less intimidating than the medical field. 
My graphic design training, photography skills, and non-profit fundraising experience are coming in quite handy.
I plan to grow PillowPack into a successful business, proving PillowPack as a viable travel accessory for all travelers. And who knows what other accessories we will dream up.

Other Ways You Can Help
I know you can't all contribute right now, but that doesn't mean you can't join in:

Help me get the word out and make some noise about the PillowPack campaign. Consider sharing where you are able.
Tell your friends who travel about my story and the new PillowPack! Give them my number.

Thank you for your support! I keep pinching myself: this is amazing. PillowPack brings freedom to a world of travelers who can now spend their money on extra excursions, elegant meals and exciting experiences!

story:
For our new products, please check out our website:

https://www.iforway.com

Introduce PowerElf

Designing an outdoor power supply is challenging to ensure safe and sufficient power for hungry outdoor equipment. Our 1st generation product PS300 power station (462W/124,865mAh, multiple outputs ports including 2 AC output ports, raised over 10,000,000 Yen in Makuake, Japan) is one of the most powerful and safest power supplies.  However, for some outdoor activities, like backpacking and hiking, a lightweight power supply would be more useful. To fill this need, iforway designed the PowerElf, which is a lighter version of the PS300.

The PowerElf is compact (1.2kg/2.65lb) – one-sixth the volume of the PS300 power stations) and IP64 waterproof shell, making PowerElf more suitable for tough outdoor activities. PowerElf includes the important features from the PS300: multiple power output ports (45W Type-C, USB, DC output, and 12V cigarette ports), 3 ways of charging (wall outlets, solar panels, and 12V cigarette plugs), and most importantly, 10 layers of power protection.

Reviews

 

 

click here to read the full review article

click here to read the full review article

Click here to read the full review article

click here to read the full review article

Share PowerElf all over the world! For your 1st successful referral, you will get $20 refund money. For each additional successful referral, you’ll get a $10 refund money. So the more you refer, the more money you will get, up to the perk price you purchased. Check the more details here.

One click to share and quickly participate our referral program:

Product Highlights

Even when you are in the middle of nowhere, you can still recharge this mini power station by solar panels or cars.  This mini power station is also integrated with an LED flashlight when you need extra light.  Take PowerElf mini power station with you on your next adventure! Enjoy your trip without worrying about a power crisis!

 

 

 

When Do You Need PowerElf?

The PowerElf will charge your electronic devices anytime, anywhere.  Use it for outdoor activities, such as camping, backpacking, fishing and partying. Or, keep the PowerElf nearby in case of a blackout emergency.

Charge Free From the Wall Outlets

With PowerElf, you can charge your devices without using wall sockets. This is especially useful for CPAP (Continuous Positive Airway Pressure) users!

What Can You Do with PowerElf?

 

Faster Solar Power Recharge

Solar panels are useful for recharging outdoors but can be very inefficient. PowerElf employees MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracking) solar charging controller, which delivers maximum power to loads to the batteries. This solar charging efficiency results in 10% higher than other batteries to save you recharging time *.

*: Due to the shipping policy and customs duty requirement, please note that solar panel is not included with this product. We recommend you buy solar panels directly from your local store or Amazon. Any 60W solar panel with a DC5521 port  and a 14-25V output voltage works with PowerElf.

Car Charging

PowerElf can be charged via 12V vehicle cigarette plug, which is a substitute for solar power in poor weather.

 

Waterproof and Shockproof Shell

Waterproof, shockproof, and dustproof, the IP64 shell provides maximum protection from harsh environments. Water sprayed from any angle will not damage PowerElf's internal battery.

 

High Intensity LED Light 

In case of emergency, the integrated LED flashlight is ready for you to send out an SOS signal. 

 

The Safest Outdoor Power Solution

We care about your devices as much as you do, so we have designed multiple layers of protection in the PowerElf:

Maximum Battery Capacity

Improved battery efficiency, reducing wasted capacity from the thermal and self-consumption loss:

•     Improved Battery Management System to reduce overcharging risk

•    Thermal consumption decreased via DC synchronous rectification

•    MPPT solar charging controller efficiency increased by 10%

•    Reduced self-consumption current to less than 10uA allowing the PowerElf to hold more than 90% charge after a year

•    Auto sleep function.

Tech Specs

Team

 iForway is a company inspired by technology and the promise of the future.  Since 2006, we have developed different power storage series products lines and provided OEM service for North America, EU, and Asia companies. Our main customers includes O2, Nissan, Canon, OPPO etc.

We applied for BMS(battery management system ) patent and broad to use in portable storage products. Our products are certified by UL/TUV GS/CE/FCC/RoHs/UN38.3 etc. We have an R&D team of more than 30 experienced engineers focusing on new battery products development, BMS, and battery safety.

The pilot production of PowerElf is finished in March 2018. We will ship the first patch of PowerElf in July 2018, right after the Indiegogo campaign begins!

PS300

With a Mega-capacity of 462Wh (124,800mAh), PS 300 is one of the most powerful power stations you can find in the market. PS 300 has 2 AC output ports (300W for each port, 600W total), a 60W type-c port,  3 USB ports(one is QC3.0), 3 DC output ports, and a cigarette lighter socket. All these powerful output ports make it possible to charge 10 devices synchoronously！PS300 can be charged in 3 ways: wall outlet, solar panels, and car cigar lighter. So even when you are in the middle of nowhere,  you can still charge PS300. This power station is also integrated with a LED flashlight and a Bluetooth speaker for special occasions. Take PS300 portable power station with you on your next adventure!

 

An award winning photographer (USA Nature's Best International Photography Awards, British BBC Wildlife photography Awards), Yukihiro Fukuda, gave a detail review for PS 300. He has used PS 300 for 3 months. Here is his personal website:

http://www.fukudayukihiro.com

PS300 can power up to 10 gears simultaneously!

PS300 is solar rechargeble, free your charging process from the wall!

Main features of PS300:

  • two AC outputs (each has 110V, 60Hz, 300W total power output);
  • a 60W type-C port ;   
  • a QC 3.0 USB port (5V, 2.4A);
  • two USB ports (each has 5V, 2.4A);
  • three DC output ports (each has 9-12V, max 5A);
  • a cigarette lighter socket (9-12V);
  • a LED flashlight (5W);
  • a Bluetooth speaker (10W);
  • DC input port (support wall outlet, solar panels and car cigarette lighter power inputs), 19V, 4.5A;
  • 4 LED indicator lights for battery usage.

story:
Plus+ is offered at an amazing pre-order deals. Made with premium quality. Made with premium quality materials, Plus+ is a perfect jacket that will last for a long time. The perfect companion for your travel needs anywhere, anytime. 

 

 

 

 

3 - in - 1 Jacket

Wear your Plus+ Jacket in three different styles.  Bomber,  Hoodie & A Combined Jacket

Smart Pocket System

Individual Pockets & Removable Pockets

Every pocket is designed to your needs. Store your belongings in different pocket sizes and  Easily remove and interchange the different pocket sizes whenever you want.

 

Built-In Storage for Heavy Items

A perfect storage perfect for heavy items like Laptop. With an added support strap, you can carry your laptop, notebook and tablets comfortably

Nano - Technology Fabric

With the latest nano-technology treatment, Plus+ is made a superior quality of fabric to ensure a long lasting jacket.

Nano-Tech Treatment

  • Improves fabric with permanent effect
  • Treats textile up to 1 to 100nm in length to the smallest scale to improve the structure of fabric
  • Maintains breathability and natural fabric feel
  • Prevents sweat from the growth of bacteria that absorbs through the fabrics helps the fabric stays fresh at all time

 

Liquid & Stain Repellent 

  • Nano-Tech Fabric gives the  Plus+ Jacket  Zero-Tolerance for odor, stain, moisture, oil & protein stains
  • The highest resistance feature while wicking perspiration from the body, promoting accelerated evaporation and comfort.

 

Anti - Microbial Fabric 

The Plus+ Jacket is treated with anti-microbial treatment. This will prevent odor-causing bacteria to build up, so your jacket stays fresh all day!

 

 

 

 

We've been making and developing the Plus+ Jacket for about a year, and we are confident to bring a superior Plus+ Jacket to everyone. We also have our logistics already handled, and we're working with experienced manufacturing partners from textile/garments to shipping that tell us what to expect.

We've also tested Plus+ Jacket all around in different weather & situation, and we're so confident that no matter where you are, Plus+ Jacket will serve you the best!

Plus+ Jacket gives you a lifetime warranty that covers manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship, regardless of the age of the product, but it does not cover normal wear and tear.

 

 

 

 

About Our Team

We’re a team of fashion designers and enthusiasts from Los Angeles, California.  With our love to create we came together to bring something unique into the fashion industry. We work tirelessly for over a year and put together a diverse team to introduce to you the Plus+ Jacket. We want to revolutionize outer wear and give you a cool and versatile all in one jacket everyone will be proud to own.

Our experience in the fashion industry helped us bring a unique team our team from the most experience pattern makers to graders. We worked with experienced design team that worked with major brands we know today. Our team introduce to you the next step in wearables in a unique timeless, sleek, and functional jacket ready to share your adventures anywhere.

 

 

 

Join Us on Indiegogo Today and Pre-Order your Plus+ Jacket NOW!

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Working with the top fashion designers of Los Angeles gained us a big edge establishing connections to work with the top pattern makers responsible for some of the top fashion brands we are not allowed to mention. We have also signed with trusted manufacturing used by known brands in the fashion industry to assure you are wearing the latest fashion trend with the highest quality. 
We have made early arrangements from our jacket manufacturing partner, fabric manufacturers, and various hardware suppliers we will be using to bring to life the Plus+ Jacket. We’ve made arrangements ahead of time with various shipping fulfillment partners to streamline logistics to get the Plus+ Jacket to our Backer’s doorstep as quickly as possible. 
We believe the arrangements we’ve executed ahead of time will help prevent any delays that may occur. The only exception we see are the unforeseen events such as natural disasters or extreme weather we can’t avoid. If any of these events occurs we will make sure you will be the first to know. We will do everything in our power to ensure your continued satisfaction.
