story:
We did our part developing safe and trusted platform with only one goal, to create and support network for off the grid local businesses. Everything is set but we need a bit of financing for Localdoo project to take off. Please take a minute to read more what is it all about.

THE PROBLEM
Wherever you traveled around the world you must have experienced difficulty to connect directly with local people and establishments not being mentioned in one of the mainstream travel guides, hoping your tourism dollars will help the local economy and people, not big tour operator and large corporations.
Local people often have a valuable product, skill, or knowledge base to offer - and are looking for opportunity - but lack ways of marketing themselves to travelers online or those traveling through the region.


LOCALDOO IS THE WAY TO CHANGE THAT
In order to connect local farmers, producers and sellers with travelers visiting the least developed parts of Croatia we are developing Localdoo. Least developed part of Croatia, was heavily affected by the war for country's independence during the 90's is the region with one of the most beautiful wonders of nature, Plitvice lakes national park. Although this national park is being visited by thousands of people daily during the season local people, their crafts, products and heritage are being avoided and neglected for decades due to poor government politics, absence of interest by the tourist board and the tour operators and the lack of sustainable development projects. All those factors forced younger generations to emigrate from the region with the ambition to find a better life and perspective somewhere else in Croatia or around the world. Today mostly elder people inhabit the area and the total population decreased almost 4 times numbering only around 50 000 today.
Our goal is to help locals create a network which would enable them to put their own small businesses on the map, offer their products, services, knowledge and experience and provide themselves with extra-income to lead an honorable and diligent life in dignity.

 
LOCALDOO HELPS LOCAL BUSINESSES FIND THEIR PLACE ON THE TOURISM MAP
According to the Croatian tourism board statistics around 1.4 mil travelers visit Plitvice lakes national park every year. The vast majority, who are on tours operated by large tour operators, leave the region the same day after the visit without being informed about local products, customs and many small businesses.
Currently, many skilled micro-entrepreneurs are excluded from the tourism sector and are looking for opportunities to sustain and grow their small business. Two major obstacles to growth include 1) a lack of access to financing and working capital, and 2) insufficient access to markets. Localdoo addresses both.
Some of the mentioned activities hoping to get marketed include beekeeping, honey production, honey inhalation therapy, local farming, animal husbandry, cheese making (and other dairy products), watermilling, therapy horse riding, fishing, production of herbal liquors, wood crafts and wooden cottage industry, etc.
How does it work. All businesses, small entrepreneurs and farmers are displayed on the Localdoo platform. Travelers can easily browse through and choose the activities/locals/services they would like to visit/meet on their tour. Payments are made securely via PayPal and entrepreneurs receive direct confirmation/booking via email/sms. Localdoo presents true marked-based transaction between travelers and locals with valuable skills or products.


OUR REACH OUT TO HELP EFFECT CHANGE IN TOURISM
We hope to help to connect travelers with hundreds of off-the-grid entrepreneurs. Most of the local small businesses and farmers can double or tripple their monthly income with just two or three bookings per month, and by sharing what they are already doing as part of their livelihood strategy. Localdoo directly connects curious travelers with micro-entrepreneurs, and creates a positive impact promoting small and traditional crafts and businesses rather than main stream „fast food“ tourism products and services which can be found worldwide often hit by big tour operators and large groups.


THE SOCIAL IMPACT
Concerning the fact that this region in Croatia was heavily affected by war 22 years ago and it has lost ¾ of it's inhabitants, with practically all industries and farming devastated, it is not hard to imagine what kind of social impact could be made helping locals create a network and market for their products and services. Starting from the scratch most of small entrepreneurs and farmers did not get the same staring position like other regions in Croatia where the  tourism industry makes it close to 20% in national GDP.
Localdoo platform has two major goals, to: 1) increase working capital at the entrepreneur level through bookings and 2) increase access to new markets for entrepreneurs and associated producer groups.
To help increase the social impact, over 60% of entrepreneurs and farmers on the Localdoo platform will be female entrepreneurs. This way we can set a positive example not only to other women but also for young people to be able to secure the future with their skills, knowledge and tradition instead of looking for a better future in emigration.


OUR STORY
The idea to create a platform to link travelers with local producers and farmers came a cross to me, Localdoo founder, Marko Vlahov, after number of years working in the tourism industry, running a travel agency and being a tour guide. My professional background in tourism goes back for 15 years. I have been working with leading companies in the tourism industry as well as managing my own small travel business, developing day trips and multi day tours in Croatia and the region with special attention to sustainable development and support to local communities.
For years I have been seeing locals often selling their goods and products next to the road or displaying hand made boards and directions advertising their services, most of the time their efforts were neglected or ignored by local administration and/or national tourist board. It made me think what could be done to help these people come to the surface and help them get their share of the market.
I have received positive feedback from many guest and for a number of years, being asked how come local producers and entrepreneurs ar not supported more and displayed better for travelers who want to experience genuine Croatia and it's tradition and products.
In order to get Localdoo fully off the ground, we need your support!


WHAT ARE WE HOPING FOR
We are hoping to collect $20,000in order to launch the Localdoo platform in Croatia. We have established a network with a goal to identify, link and support local entrepreneurs to create their online profiles and offer their services and products.
Of course, financial contribution has the greatest direct impact, but we also need your support in helping us build awareness about local businesses and promote the campaign.
Please feel free to share our link to help us in getting out the word.


BUDGET BREAKDOWN
To be specific, our funding goal will cover IT costs (web page and app), marketing costs for 2018., travel and production costs, purchase a used van and education and licencing of two Localdoo guides. We have set our funding amount relatively low to have a better chance to reach our goal and hit our priority, launching the Localdoo pilot in Plitvice lakes NP region. In case we surpass our goal our aim is to continue expansion on all of Croatia with special attention to other underdeveloped regions.
The breakdown below provides an overview of how meeting and exceeding our funding goal will be utilized.

 

 

PERKS
In exchange for your contribution, we have some great perks, most of them sourced from local entrepreneurs we are hoping to support and help them get on the tourism map. This is a great opportunity to pick up genuine and traditional products while supporting entrepreneurs and helping get Localdoo off the ground.
Thank you for taking time to learn more about Localdoo! We're extremely excited for this project and grateful for your contribution to our campaign!
story_txt: We did our part developing safe and trusted platform with only one goal, to create and support network for off the grid local businesses. Everything is set but we need a bit of financing for Localdoo project to take off. Please take a minute to read more what is it all about.THE PROBLEMWherever you traveled around the world you must have experienced difficulty to connect directly with local people and establishments not being mentioned in one of the mainstream travel guides, hoping your tourism dollars will help the local economy and people, not big tour operator and large corporations.Local people often have a valuable product, skill, or knowledge base to offer - and are looking for opportunity - but lack ways of marketing themselves to travelers online or those traveling through the region.LOCALDOO IS THE WAY TO CHANGE THATIn order to connect local farmers, producers and sellers with travelers visiting the least developed parts of Croatia we are developing Localdoo. Least developed part of Croatia, was heavily affected by the war for country's independence during the 90's is the region with one of the most beautiful wonders of nature, Plitvice lakes national park. Although this national park is being visited by thousands of people daily during the season local people, their crafts, products and heritage are being avoided and neglected for decades due to poor government politics, absence of interest by the tourist board and the tour operators and the lack of sustainable development projects. All those factors forced younger generations to emigrate from the region with the ambition to find a better life and perspective somewhere else in Croatia or around the world. Today mostly elder people inhabit the area and the total population decreased almost 4 times numbering only around 50 000 today.Our goal is to help locals create a network which would enable them to put their own small businesses on the map, offer their products, services, knowledge and experience and provide themselves with extra-income to lead an honorable and diligent life in dignity. LOCALDOO HELPS LOCAL BUSINESSES FIND THEIR PLACE ON THE TOURISM MAPAccording to the Croatian tourism board statistics around 1.4 mil travelers visit Plitvice lakes national park every year. The vast majority, who are on tours operated by large tour operators, leave the region the same day after the visit without being informed about local products, customs and many small businesses.Currently, many skilled micro-entrepreneurs are excluded from the tourism sector and are looking for opportunities to sustain and grow their small business. Two major obstacles to growth include 1) a lack of access to financing and working capital, and 2) insufficient access to markets. Localdoo addresses both.Some of the mentioned activities hoping to get marketed include beekeeping, honey production, honey inhalation therapy, local farming, animal husbandry, cheese making (and other dairy products), watermilling, therapy horse riding, fishing, production of herbal liquors, wood crafts and wooden cottage industry, etc.How does it work. All businesses, small entrepreneurs and farmers are displayed on the Localdoo platform. Travelers can easily browse through and choose the activities/locals/services they would like to visit/meet on their tour. Payments are made securely via PayPal and entrepreneurs receive direct confirmation/booking via email/sms. Localdoo presents true marked-based transaction between travelers and locals with valuable skills or products.OUR REACH OUT TO HELP EFFECT CHANGE IN TOURISMWe hope to help to connect travelers with hundreds of off-the-grid entrepreneurs. Most of the local small businesses and farmers can double or tripple their monthly income with just two or three bookings per month, and by sharing what they are already doing as part of their livelihood strategy. Localdoo directly connects curious travelers with micro-entrepreneurs, and creates a positive impact promoting small and traditional crafts and businesses rather than main stream „fast food“ tourism products and services which can be found worldwide often hit by big tour operators and large groups.THE SOCIAL IMPACTConcerning the fact that this region in Croatia was heavily affected by war 22 years ago and it has lost ¾ of it's inhabitants, with practically all industries and farming devastated, it is not hard to imagine what kind of social impact could be made helping locals create a network and market for their products and services. Starting from the scratch most of small entrepreneurs and farmers did not get the same staring position like other regions in Croatia where the  tourism industry makes it close to 20% in national GDP.Localdoo platform has two major goals, to: 1) increase working capital at the entrepreneur level through bookings and 2) increase access to new markets for entrepreneurs and associated producer groups.To help increase the social impact, over 60% of entrepreneurs and farmers on the Localdoo platform will be female entrepreneurs. This way we can set a positive example not only to other women but also for young people to be able to secure the future with their skills, knowledge and tradition instead of looking for a better future in emigration.OUR STORYThe idea to create a platform to link travelers with local producers and farmers came a cross to me, Localdoo founder, Marko Vlahov, after number of years working in the tourism industry, running a travel agency and being a tour guide. My professional background in tourism goes back for 15 years. I have been working with leading companies in the tourism industry as well as managing my own small travel business, developing day trips and multi day tours in Croatia and the region with special attention to sustainable development and support to local communities.For years I have been seeing locals often selling their goods and products next to the road or displaying hand made boards and directions advertising their services, most of the time their efforts were neglected or ignored by local administration and/or national tourist board. It made me think what could be done to help these people come to the surface and help them get their share of the market.I have received positive feedback from many guest and for a number of years, being asked how come local producers and entrepreneurs ar not supported more and displayed better for travelers who want to experience genuine Croatia and it's tradition and products.In order to get Localdoo fully off the ground, we need your support!WHAT ARE WE HOPING FORWe are hoping to collect $20,000in order to launch the Localdoo platform in Croatia. We have established a network with a goal to identify, link and support local entrepreneurs to create their online profiles and offer their services and products.Of course, financial contribution has the greatest direct impact, but we also need your support in helping us build awareness about local businesses and promote the campaign.Please feel free to share our link to help us in getting out the word.BUDGET BREAKDOWNTo be specific, our funding goal will cover IT costs (web page and app), marketing costs for 2018., travel and production costs, purchase a used van and education and licencing of two Localdoo guides. We have set our funding amount relatively low to have a better chance to reach our goal and hit our priority, launching the Localdoo pilot in Plitvice lakes NP region. In case we surpass our goal our aim is to continue expansion on all of Croatia with special attention to other underdeveloped regions.The breakdown below provides an overview of how meeting and exceeding our funding goal will be utilized.  PERKSIn exchange for your contribution, we have some great perks, most of them sourced from local entrepreneurs we are hoping to support and help them get on the tourism map. This is a great opportunity to pick up genuine and traditional products while supporting entrepreneurs and helping get Localdoo off the ground.Thank you for taking time to learn more about Localdoo! We're extremely excited for this project and grateful for your contribution to our campaign!

story:
You maybe already helped us few months ago to make it to the North American Bike Polo Championship in Lexington. Thanks you! And today the real dream is coming - we are really excited to announce that we qualified for the 2016 World Hardcourt Bike Polo Championship VII in... NEW ZEALAND!!!


A NEW PROJECT

We did it! Our team Les Beehive Boys ended up 13th at the North American Bike Polo Championship which gives us a spot for the next World Bike Polo Championship in Timaru, New Zealand! It's a first for Utah to make it to an international bike polo event!

The city of Timaru will host 5 days of intense international games with players from all over the world - February 1st to 6th, 2016. 

New Zealand? That is right, this is a 24 hours trip from Salt Lake City! Here is the schedule:

- 1-2 Feb = Wildcards

- 3 Feb = Rest day, Opening Ceremony

- 4,5,6 Feb = World Finals - Les Beehive Boys qualified.


                                                    > Check the event <


THE FUNDRAISING

New Zealand is maybe the furthest place from Salt Lake City. This is also good news as it shows that bike polo is becoming more and more global. The southern hemisphere will organize the Worlds for the first time and we want to be part of this story.


By supporting us in this fundraising you will help us to finance the project. We need your help to purchase 3 tickets round trip to Timaru with bikes, registration fees, hostel and food.

You will find perks available to support us: stickers, patches, shirts, hoodies, diner at the Frenchies...

Here is the hoodie and the shirt with the visuals from Jimmy!




LES BEEHIVE BOYS

Our team Les Beehive Boys is ecstatic to represent Salt Lake City and Utah in regional, national and now international bike polo events. Our team is composed of 3 players:


  • Jimmy "The Killer" Araneda

"Not only did the republic of Chile rise up between the Andes Mountains and the Pacific Ocean but an emerging polo player was also rising up and coming to SLC. That player is Jimmy “The killer” Araneda. Jimmy quickly caught on to the game of polo having indepth knowledge of soccer, team play, bike handling and athletic prowess. His creative art background in digital media as well as being a skilled welder helped put the BBPC on the map in a multitude of ways: crafting the logo, his own bike and bombproof goals. The killer was the first to perfect the cross body bullet shot while holding off defenders on the strong side."

  • Gabe "The Destroyer" Mejia

"If you’ve played in Salt Lake in the past 3 years, you’ve played with Gabe. If you’ve ridden a bike in Salt Lake, you’ve most likely met Gabe. The influx of players and newbies we’ve had in the past year is mainly due to Gabe’s efforts and good spirits about the sport. His invention “The Polo-Q” (Polo+Barbeque) was a huge success in getting the word out about polo in the city."

  • David "Dove" Barthod

"Mr. French. David came to the club last year and quickly burrowed his way into our hearts. His skills on the court are exquisite, as are his tastes in cheese. A class act on and off the court, Dove loves polo and his enthusiasm for it is very easy to see. One of the dudes that upped the level of play in BBPC."

Our story started this year at the South West Qualifiers in Folsom, CA where Les Beehive Boys took 4th and qualified for the National. A long trip for the weekend but a first tournament together with great moves and intense games. 

Because Utah is far from most of the bike polo places where tournaments happen, we trained hard in Salt Lake and went straight to Lexington to compete at the continental level playing the North American Championship during 3 days. After we played 13 games we tied 13th over the 54 teams.

We want to continue this beautiful adventure and represent our club, our state and our city during a world-class bike polo event.


HARDCOURT IN FEW WORDS

Hardcourt Bike Polo is the modern version of grass bike polo.  2 teams of 3 players riding single speed bikes and playing into an enclosed rectangular area -such as a street hockey court - have to score with a little ball on the opposite goal using mallets.

The sport is played worldwide in most middle to big cities. Europe and U.S. are mostly leading the major tournaments but south america, asia and pacific are also showing that this urban sport is growing.

It is a combination between collective sport, individual bike and ball handling skills with a big place for FUN too!


  • https://beehivebikepolo.wordpress.com
  • Facebook: Beehive Bike Polo
  • #lesbeehiveboys
Credit photo: Jennifer Kutzleb and Gabriel Mejia

story:
For my Eagle Project, I am going to install a map of the Crescenta Valley High School cross country course in Crescenta Valley Park, as well as mile markers.


A high quality sign like the one I plan to commision costs $1000. I have budgeted another $200 for cement and mile marker materials.


These additions will benefit high school athletes from all over Southern California who compete in Crescenta Valley Park every year, as well as countless recreational walkers and joggers who will have a better idea of the distance they are completing.

I am a Life Scout from BSA Troop 317.

story:
Our Story ...

FLIGHT 18 is a galactic experience where audiences are cast as passengers on a journey through outer space.  Passengers revel inside a 360Â° video installation of the Universe through which our Spaceship Kaleidoscope sails with an all-star cast of performing artists and disc jockeys.   The only rule on-board is to 'feel free'.


Each cosmic joyride is accompanied by a spectacle of poems, songs, dances and spontaneous outbursts.  Pilots instantly intersperse images and text generated live while mixing voices, videos, sounds and light in real time. 


FLIGHT 18  flew thirty trips in 2010 with a grant from Lower Manhattan Cultural Council to great critical and popular success.  Now with support from chashama and 3-Legged Dog Art & Technology Center, FLIGHT 18 will rise again bringing people into the great beyond.


Flight Schedule: 

September 27, 2012 - December 2, 2012, 6 flights per week

3-Legged Dog Art & Technology Center in Lower Manhattan  

Tickets range from $18 to $72 depending on time of purchase.  



Loving with reckless abandon is the best act of revolution
Because we are less different than we are the same
Because there is no game to win
It is just this interconnectedness that blesses us.     â€’  Rachel Kann

             




The Impact ...

We are here to bring together Earthlings in celebration of the life we are living and the worlds to come.  Cyber-passengers are also welcome to our general assembly of those who hold the future in their hands.  FLIGHT 18 supports and encourages the broadening global community who are aware, awake and alive.

 

We impact global peace and prosperity by being another functioning model of the horizontal dispersal of power and the joy of cooperation.

 

We impact the space travel community as we discover humane ways of escorting people through transcendent experience.

 

We impact the visual and performing arts by being a spectacle that rewrites itself in the moment.  A whole new world of live art making is born where the audience is the primary ingredient and a script is unnecessary.

 

We impact New York City as we bring a healing spirit to Lower Manhattan calling for creative response to the world around us.




What We Need & What You Get ...

This Winter Fund Drive is set to raise at least $18,081 of our $100,000 + budget.  We need at least $18,081 by April 27 in order to begin the visual design of the Universe.  Video animators and computer programmers must begin their good work by April.  The rest of our budget (for building supplies, uniforms, personnel, technology etc.) gets us to our official launch on September 27.

 

What you get is the deep satisfaction of knowing you are enabling the journey of the first ever Earth-bound spacecraft, harkening a free age of exploration.  Moreover, you will receive recognition, free tickets, music and more. 

See perks.




Other Ways You Can Help ...


Friends who can't come to New York can still journey with us via Skype,

so please tell everyone.

Like FLIGHT 18 on Facebook and enjoy.

story:
Une famille, 2 adultes, 3 enfants et 1 chat.
Le tour des Amériques,
7 Mois.

Par ce voyage en famille autour des Amériques, nous désirons promouvoir l'éco-voyage, c'est à dire comment faire profiter les locaux du tourisme, mettre les relations humaines et les rencontres à l'avant plan.
Démontrer que la valeur de liberté que l'on a en chacun de nous peut être honoré moyennant quelques efforts et concessions.

Maman, professeure de Yoga et propriétaire/fondatrice de ÔmYoga, vous propose de la suivre durant un voyage dédié au Yoga autour des Amériques et au voyage en famille.
Nous ferons régulièrement des Vidéos, pour parler de ces 2 sujets.

- Le yoga au Canada d'est en ouest.
- Le yoga dans l'ouest américain, en Californie et en Amérique centrale.
- L'organisation d'un voyage avec 3 enfants durant 7 mois.
- La scolarisation des enfants sur la route.

- L'organisation d'un long voyage en famille.



Beaucoup de plaisirs, de péripéties et d'aventures en perspective.

Vous êtes une compagnie ?

Vous aurez la possibilité d'avoir votre marque mise en avant sur nos vidéos (vu sur instagram par plus de 22K personnes, sur facebook par 12K personnes et enfin sur notre infolettre 7K personnes), choisissez la mise que vous désirez, l'exposition sera fonction de votre investissement.

Vous préférez faire du Yoga dans notre studio de Charlesbourg ?

Aucun problème, nous vous offrons des rabais exceptionnel pour l'occasion !

Choisissez selon vos besoins et budget.

Ce financement nous permettra de faire l'achat de notre véhicule (qui sera aussi notre maison) durant ces 7 mois.

story:
NEVER TRAVEL IN YOUR SUIT AGAIN

The PLIQO bag: the smartest garment bag in the world.

WELCOME TO OUR CAMPAIGN!

WHAT'S THE STORY? 

The PLIQO folding garment bag means you need never travel in your suit again - no matter how light you're packing.

An ingenious, patent pending folding garment hanger lets you fold your suit down to the size of a laptop bag – with minimal creasing.

The PLIQO bag is the brainchild of Patrick Tatham, who used his own travel experiences - and his network of frequent flying friends - to design a product that will make business travel and commuting more comfortable and convenient that ever before. “I want to be relaxed when I’m on the move, not worrying that I will appear in a crumpled suit at the start of my meetings. The PLIQO bag is the solution.”

CHANGING BUSINESS TRAVEL FOR GOOD 

The result is a bag that's large on the inside and ultra-compact when folded up. When fully open, the PLIQO bag’s usable area measures 127 cm by 66 cm (50 inches by 26 inches) – making it big enough for even the largest items of formal wear.

PACK IT IN - OR SIMPLY CARRY IT ON 

When normally packed, the PLIQO bag measures only 39 cm by 30 cm by 8 cm (16 inches by 12 inches by 3.5 inches) – making it simple to pack the PLIQO bag into every type of cabin luggage.

Excitingly for air travellers, the PLIQO bag is classified as a ‘laptop bag’ or ‘handbag’ by many major airlines – meaning it can be carried into their cabins in addition to a piece of conventional carry on luggage.

SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE 

The PLIQO bag will also fit into many cycle panniers, backpacks, messenger bags and even briefcases, so the morning commute or evening date can be equally hassle free.

That makes the PLIQO bag ideal not just for business travellers, but also active commuters and anyone who needs to dress formally, but prefers not to travel in a suit.

BAGS OF INGENUITY 

Prototypes have been extensively field-tested on real business journeys over the past two years, and feedback has been exceptionally positive. We believe the PLIQO  bag will rapidly become a widely recognised British design classic – and that’s why we call it ‘the smartest garment bag in the world’.

 

BENEFITS 

TEAM 

Meet the team behind the PLIQO bag.

 

SPECIFICATIONS AND FEATURES 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

REWARDS 

PROJECT TIME LINE 

WHAT WE'RE FUNDING 

The major development costs associated with the project have already been funded – including product development and industrial design, IP protection and tooling of the folding and trouser hangers.

The funds we are raising through this crowdfunding campaign will be allocated solely to the production of the first batch of bags and hangers.

WEBSITE, SOCIAL MEDIA AND CONTACT DETAILS 

If you'd like to know more about the PLIQO garment bag, or have any questions, we'd love to hear from you. Please get in contact at: info@pliqobag.com

If you'd like to know more about what we're up to at PLIQO, or if you'd like to follow or campaign on social media, please visit out website: www.pliqobag.com

CHANGING BUSINESS TRAVEL FOR GOOD 
The result is a bag that's large on the inside and ultra-compact when folded up. When fully open, the PLIQO bag’s usable area measures 127 cm by 66 cm (50 inches by 26 inches) – making it big enough for even the largest items of formal wear.
The PLIQO bag: large inside, surprisingly compact when folded
 
PACK IT IN - OR SIMPLY CARRY IT ON 
When normally packed, the PLIQO bag measures only 39 cm by 30 cm by 8 cm (16 inches by 12 inches by 3.5 inches) – making it simple to pack the PLIQO bag into every type of cabin luggage.
Excitingly for air travellers, the PLIQO bag is classified as a ‘laptop bag’ or ‘handbag’ by many major airlines – meaning it can be carried into their cabins in addition to a piece of conventional carry on luggage.

SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE 
The PLIQO bag will also fit into many cycle panniers, backpacks, messenger bags and even briefcases, so the morning commute or evening date can be equally hassle free.
That makes the PLIQO bag ideal not just for business travellers, but also active commuters and anyone who needs to dress formally, but prefers not to travel in a suit.

BAGS OF INGENUITY 
Prototypes have been extensively field-tested on real business journeys over the past two years, and feedback has been exceptionally positive. We believe the PLIQO  bag will rapidly become a widely recognised British design classic – and that’s why we call it ‘the smartest garment bag in the world’.

 
BENEFITS 
 
TEAM 
Meet the team behind the PLIQO bag.



 


 


SPECIFICATIONS AND FEATURES 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

REWARDS 










PROJECT TIME LINE 
 
WHAT WE'RE FUNDING 
The major development costs associated with the project have already been funded – including product development and industrial design, IP protection and tooling of the folding and trouser hangers.
The funds we are raising through this crowdfunding campaign will be allocated solely to the production of the first batch of bags and hangers.
Third factory sample - detail
WEBSITE, SOCIAL MEDIA AND CONTACT DETAILS 
If you'd like to know more about the PLIQO garment bag, or have any questions, we'd love to hear from you. Please get in contact at: info@pliqobag.com
If you'd like to know more about what we're up to at PLIQO, or if you'd like to follow or campaign on social media, please visit out website: www.pliqobag.com

story:
Globalization is one of the main aspect in today's modern society. Therefore, to learn or master a new language is one of the most essential skill. But what if we didn't have the time to learn a new language and still want to travel? Or we have to make a business trip? Language barrier should not hinder you from achieving the things you want to do. 

Language barrier should not hinder you from achieving the things you want to do.

However, you don't have to worry anymore. Because we are presenting the one stop solution you ever need to solve language barriers. Introducing our new innovation... 

Mesay is a portable machine that can translate into 16 different languages, with each translation will costs you no more than 1 second! The usage of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in translating can be guaranteed that 97% of the translations are accurate. It is a really light device, 0.1 pounds, that you can bring everywhere.   

Translation for 16 languages (English, Chinese, Cantonese, Thai, Vietnamese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Arabic, Portuguese, Dutch, German, French, Italian, Russian, Greek) can be translated simultaneously back and forth.

 

 

"Jehovah scattered them from there over all the surface of the earth, and they gradually left off building the city. That is why its name was called Babel, because there Jehovah had confused the language of all the earth." - Genesis 11:8, 9 

 

The narrative of Tower of Babel explained that God was concerned that humans are disrespectful towards God by building the tower to escape the impossibility thoughts of living in God-creation world. Thus, God brought in the existence of different language to the world and scattered the people around the world so they were unable to understand one another. 

However, for thousands of years until now, humans are still searching for a better way to communicate and understand each other.

As we can see, the world is filled with pain. If only language barrier isn't the problem, the world could perhaps not have any war. People will live peacefully without any miscommunication because miscommunication leads to a lot of conflicts. If only people around the world speak the same language, the world will be different. More positivity, less negativity, this will be the dream of the world.


Before the 21st century, people solved this problem by studying each and every language. Interpreters that are experts in the languages are hired to translate. However, this is not effective enough for people since the World has all kinds of languages. Plus, humans have limited capabilities and limited time to learn every language spoken in the world.

As technology gets better in these recent years, Artificial Intelligence(AI) is introduced in the interpretation industry. AI now can outnumber human in many ways when it comes to languages.   

What makes us being determined to do this project was because a friend came on June 6th, 2015; and talked about traveling abroad. During their conversation, he commented that traveling abroad has become much more convenient because there are more international flights with a lower price, and traveling visa is easier to get.  

We were feeling very excited but then a question arose,  

"How did you communicate with foreigners when traveling abroad?"  

The conversation fell into a total silence.  

My friend admitted that he felt embarrassed and it wasn't so convenient when he was traveling abroad. Although he had a great time, there are also times because he wasn't able to communicate. He also joked that he had trouble approaching some ladies but gave up due to language problems.  

To cut the long story short, the conversation made us realize about the importance of language. Thus, the idea is approved by our friends. So we proceed to the development of the first generation of Mesay translation device. 

 

During the period of development of the first product, we met a lot of difficulties regarding high material prices, the development of the translation APP and the process of building 8 layers of PCB in the limited spaces. To create a perfect translation machine, we constantly improved the models to cater the utilization habits. At the same time, we modified the software again and again to overcome operation problems and bugs. We prioritize quality over quantity, but also think about the attractiveness of the product.   

 

As of right now, we are developing the second generation of Mesay. More features enhancement will be included in the newest generation. We still hold on to our main purposes, which are to make cross-culture communication more convenient and creating a better world where all countries around the world become united.

Please give us your support if you have a shared mission with us!
 

Firstly, Mesay 2.0 uses AI technology for its translation. As experts in the translating technology, Mesay is always updating its technology to increase the accuracy of the translation.   

Secondly, mobile phones might be convenient because you can do everything on one device. Phone batteries won't last long since we need to use it to open a lot of applications which eventually drains the battery. On the other side, Mesay's battery will last longer and you can even use it as an internet hotspot!

 

1. Input microphone to reduce noise and out-put loudspeaker to maximize your voice. Mesay uses special input microphone to reduce the noise wherever you are and uses a loudspeaker to raise your voice, making the conversation more clearly.   

2. Support earphones (wire or wireless). Mesay uses input microphones to gather information and then output it through earphones, which is convenient for meetings. Meanwhile, you are free to listen to music to relax yourself during a break.  

3. Support 4G mobile communication ( 4G SIM card or WIFI).

 

Risks and challenges

We’re thrilled to launch this campaign. This device arrives after countless months of dedicated work, all to achieve the best imaginable solution for you.

Still, we understand that risks and challenges lay ahead.

Delivering upon our promise to ship all of you the Mesays on time and fulfill your expectations are the final challenges that await us—and ultimately, the perfect reward.

MANUFACTURING & SUPPLY CHAIN

Before the campaign, we’ve spent over 12 months with manufacturers and suppliers. We found the right factory to have a cooperation in Shenzhen, the city of electronic products.

At the same time we started campaign, we have already started manufacturing small quantities of 100 products. Because too many people are interested in Mesay and want to give it a try, we pushed production and the first 50 products we made were sent out.

Mesay co-founder, Seven, has worked in the Chinese Manufacturing company for over 10 years, and has enough ability and experience to control the supply chain.

We will keep you updated our journey from pre-production, tooling, manufacturing, to fulfillment so you understand what is happening behind the scene.

OUR PROMISE TO YOU

We will continue to work hard, and of course, whether positive news or not, we will update you early and often. Our entire team is passionate, lean, and want to make a difference in your life through our product.

Our team is committed to continuously improve the quality of the product, optimize the experience, and upgrading the product features, specifications or design. We might change some of our products attributes, these changes may not be notified, please forgive us! But please be assured that we will only get better!

No one can guarantee that there is no problem at all, especially in the complex manufacturing process. We have made two batches of products, and the problem has lessen a lot.

If there are any delays or issues along the way, we will inform you and tell you how our team will deal the problems.

We have overcome the common or complicated hurdles. Our boots are already on the ground and we can walk over to the factory on a daily basis if needed.

We are certainly up for this challenge and confident that we will tackle it head-on!

Company Address

 

Zhongshan Hongshengda Electronics Co., Ltd.

2nd Floor, Building C, No. 108, Weimin Road, Dongsheng Town, Zhongshan City

story:
Introducing The Packsture Jacket

Trekking through the mountains demands the perfect balance of protection, breathability, and weight, and our weatherproof, windproof, 3M™ Thinsulate™ jacket delivers maximum protection all year round, everyday! 72% OFF DISCOUNT AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED TIME.

How to get the Packsture Jacket

Become a backer of this campaign and receive a reward. You will be pre-ordering one of the most rugged and durable outdoor jackets. Super early backers get a special discount of more than 72%, and you'll receive your jacket before it is available in stores. Interested in buying more than one jacket? Check out all rewards & add-ons. Thank you.

 

The Packsture Jacket Talk (Exclusive Video)

 

Storage capabilities:

Here is a video by one of our staff members talking about some Packsture Jacket features, storage capabilities and more. Enjoy!!

 

Packsture Jacket Capabilities

The Packsture Jacket is 100% waterproof, windproof, and breathable. It is designed to provide maximum protection against the elements and is rugged enough for all outdoor activities.

Sustainability (Packsture Recycles)

Packsture Jacket uses Thinsulate™ insulation fabric which is consistently awarded the OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 Class I Certificate meeting the human-ecological requirements for products for future generations.

Breathability

The 3M™ Thinsulate™ unique composition allows millions of tiny pores to breathe at their full potential. Sweat vents directly to the outside of the fabric in one easy step.

Waterproof

Packsture Jacket 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation opens up a whole new world of warmth and comfort for the outdoor community. Made with hydrophobic fibers for advanced water resistance, the Packsture Jacket will keep you warm, comfortable and dry, without unnecessary weight.

Ventilation

Packsture Jackets have a well designed ventilation system that allows air to flow, which makes you feel comfortable throughout your outdoor adventures.

Windbreaker

Packsture Jacket is designed with an extra inner membrane and elastic drawstrings to shield you from strong winds during your everyday adventures, and does it with incredible functionality and style.

Lightweight

Packsture Jacket uses the latest 3M™ Thinsulate™ fabric technology to keep the weight to a minimum (less than 2 lbs/1 kg), and is packable (approx. 9” long and about 14” inches around).

Let's Get Technical

Our powerful weatherproof, windproof, breathable and lightweight 3M™ Thinsulate™ Jacket is equipped with sought after features for maximum protection including:

Construction:

UNDERARM VENTING - The underarm ventilation system will keep you cool at all times. It is designed to release any and all excessive heat that accumulates during activities.

YKK® AQUAGUARD® ZIPPERS - YKK® AquaGuard® Zippers are waterproof with powerful strength and a smooth finish.      

TAPED SEAMS - If you love winter sports, then you know all about fully taped seams. Our high end jacket seams are fully taped and water tight.   

 

HIGH COLLAR - The high collar is an important feature to ward off the elements during extreme weather conditions.    

REMOVABLE POWDER SKIRT - The removable snow skirt is an additional barrier against wet and powdery snow for those who love skiing or snowboarding.    

HELMET COMPATIBLE HOOD - The helmet compatible hood can be adjusted from different directions to fit your helmet size.  

  

ADJUSTABLE SNOW CUFFS - In addition to the internal thumb holes, the adjustable cuffs ensure a great and snug fit.  

   

JACKET TO PANT INTERFACE - This feature turns your jacket-and-pant combo into one piece for total snow and wind protection.     

ANTI SLIP SHOULDERS - Prevent your backpack from slipping off your shoulders with our built in non-slip firm grip patches.   

    

LASER CUTTING FINISH - Extreme accuracy, clean cuts, and sealed fabric edges to prevent fraying.     

THUMB HOLE SLEEVES - The thumb holes prevent the sleeves from riding up, leaving your hands covered to keep them warm.    

THREE LAYERS - The Packsture Jacket is built with three layers to be warm, breathable and waterproof. All together in the same design.     

STORM FLAP - We have added a storm flap to the front of the jacket to block the icy wind and protect your face during extreme weather conditions.   

 

WRIST CLOSURE - The adjustable wrist closure is a great feature that allows you to keep the cold and wind out.      

DETACHABLE HOOD - Allows flexibility when the hood is not needed, and is easily stored in one of the many pockets.

SOFT CHIN GUARD -  Protects the chin and face from the elements.

HEM DRAW CORD WITH SIDE ADJUSTMENTS - Use for a customized fit that keeps out the wind and cold.   

MICRO LINING MESH - Mesh is incredibly breathable and regulates temperature well.

ALL SEASON DESIGN - Although the jacket is great for keeping you warm in below zero weather, it is also designed to adjust for warmer weather with features such as its removable hood and snow skirt, and the ventilation system. 

3M ™ THINSULATE ™  - One of the highest quality and effective fabrics created.   

Properties:

BREATHABLE - To regulate temperature and keep you dry.

WATERPROOF - To increase comfort by protecting you from rain and snow.

ANTI SHRINK - So you can always have a good fit with your jacket.

ANTI BACTERIAL - Prolongs the life of the jacket and protects the person wearing it.

WIND PROTECTION - To help you stay warm.

TEAR RESISTANT - This tough material resists rips and tears.  

PROTECTS UP TO -4°F -20°C - 3M™ Thinsulate™ and the Packsture features allow maximum warmth with minimal weight and bulk.

STAIN REPELLENT - To keep your jacket looking clean, sharp, and new. 

LIGHT WEIGHT - Keep warm with less than 2 lbs/1 kg of weight.

FAST DRYING - In case of spills inside the jacket, or when washing it.  

MOISTURE WICKING - To keep you dry and comfortable.

DURABLE - So your jacket will last a very long time!

SLIM FIT - For a sleek look and less bulk.

Storage Features:

SKIING PASS SLEEVE POCKET - Keep your skiing pass easily accessible for swiping in either of these two convenient sleeve pockets.

GOGGLE POCKET - Quickly access your goggles to join in the fun right away.

LEFT SIDE MOBILE DEVICE POCKET - Keep your phone right at hand and protected.  

  

RIGHT SIDE MOBILE DEVICE POCKET - Another option, or if you have more than one device.

  

PEN HOLDER POCKET - Have quick and easy access to a pen or stylus.    

TABLET POCKET - The tablet pocket is an outstanding storage addition.      

PASSPORT POCKET - We understand how important it is to have fast and easy access to your passport while keeping it safe.    

INTERNAL MEDIA POCKET WITH HEADPHONE PORT - No more headphones tangling.  

 

TWO HAND WARMER POCKETS - In addition to the thumb holes, The Packsture jacket comes with two front side pockets that are built with insulation to keep your hands warm.   

SUNGLASSES FRONT POCKET - Know exactly where to find your sunglasses when you need them.   

BACK POCKET FOR POWER BANK - The Packsture Jacket comes with two back side pockets to store your battery power banks and any other miscellaneous gadget items.     

 

Safety:

SAFETY REFLECTIVE STRIPS - Stay safe at night and during extreme weather conditions and be visible to oncoming traffic.

SURVIVAL OUTDOOR WHISTLE - Small, portable, but loud - use in case of emergency, or if a party gets separated.    

Bonus Items:

KEY CHAIN & A BONUS CARABINER - Attach your keys to your jacket to prevent loss using the carabiner (NOTE: carabiner is NOT designed to hold weight)

BOTTLE OPENER - A convenient item for relaxing with a cold one at the end of a long day hiking.

PORTABLE COMPACT COMPASS - This is an amazing addition to Packsture's Jacket when you are exploring new, unfamiliar territories.    

 

LENS CLEANER - Taking pictures is a common activity when outdoors.  Make sure you have a clean lens for clear images.  

Why you need The Packsture Jacket

COMFORT:

Keep dry and comfortable all day, everyday.

COST: PACKSTURE JACKET IS AFFORDABLE    

Packsture Jacket is offered for as much as 72% OFF during Indiegogo. Make sure to grab one, two, or more. This is a golden opportunity for all.

HEALTH: SUSTAINABLE AND ECO FRIENDLY MATERIALS.     

Packsture cares about the environment.

MATERIAL: 3M™ THINSULATE™ FOR SUPERIOR WARMTH.     

3M™ Thinsulate™ fabric helps keep you warm during winter and cool during the summer.

SAFETY FIRST: STAY SAFE AND VISIBLE.     

The distinctive location of Packsture’s reflective strips adds a bold look to the Jacket and makes you visible in poor weather conditions.

 

Who is it for

Classic, rugged and multi use Packsture Jacket is ultralight for everyday use, and is available for pre-order on Indiegogo. It is designed for everyone.

  

Packsture Jacket vs. What's Out There

Designed with precision for the toughest conditions, our innovative Jacket is affordable. Here is a run down on how you can get the best quality outdoor jacket without breaking the bank.

 

What if I already have a jacket?     

Unlike anything you have seen before, Packsture Jacket combines everything you have in your closet into ONE rugged piece of gear! De-clutter your closet of all the jackets you have accumulated over the years, and donate them.  Join us and pledge now to get the only jacket you will ever need.

Why Indiegogo Community?     

We at Packsture have limitless ideas, but without the support of a community none of it would be possible. Indiegogo aims to give each one of us a chance to produce an idea and discover that we can offer each other value through creation without a middleman dictating the product and terms.

Reward Tiers

There is a limited quantity for the super early bird backer 72% OFF deal so get it right away before it's gone!

See our packages below to find out more.

*NOTE: you'll choose the Jacket size shortly after the campaign ends. All jackets come with a bottle opener,  compass, outdoor survival whistle, lens cleaner cloth, and carabiner keychain (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)

 

✓  Indiegogo Early Bird Special

$189 - One Packsture Jacket at a massive 72% off discount (Save $510 off the planned $699 MSRP.) // Your choice of size (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). The Jacket includes:

Bottle opener

Compass

Outdoor survival whistle

Lens cleaner cloth

Carabiner keychain (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)

✓  Love Bird Special

$330 - Two Packsture Jackets at a massive 76% off discount (Save $1,068 off the planned $1,398 MSRP for two.) // Your choice of sizes (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). Each Jacket includes:

Bottle opener

Compass

Outdoor survival whistle

Lens cleaner cloth

Carabiner keychain  (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)

✓  Three Jacket Special

$480 - Three Packsture Jackets at a massive 77% off discount (Save $1,617 off the planned $2,097 MSRP for three.) // Your choice of sizes (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). Each Jacket includes:

Bottle opener

Compass

Outdoor survival whistle

Lens cleaner cloth

Carabiner keychain (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)

✓  Five is a Team Special

$750 - Five Packsture Jackets at a massive 78% off discount (Save $2,745 off the planned $3,495 MSRP for five.) // Your choice of sizes (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). Each Jacket includes:

Bottle opener

Compass

Outdoor survival whistle

Lens cleaner cloth

Carabiner keychain (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)

✓ Ten is a Power Bundle Special

$1,400- Ten Packsture Jackets at a massive 79% off discount (Save $5,590 off the planned $6,990 MSRP for ten.) // Your choice of sizes (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). Each Jacket includes:

Bottle opener

Compass

Outdoor survival whistle

Lens cleaner cloth

Carabiner keychain  (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)

 

Our Community

Being outside is a learning experience for all. Packsture values protecting what sustains us and building relationships with the outdoors and each other. Join us and be part of our fast growing family! Be kind and courteous. No hate speech or bullying.  Respect everyone's privacy.

 

Sizing chart for any gender.

Packsture will collect sizes during the survey, right after the campaign ends. Please measure your chest, waist, and hips, and order based on the largest number to ensure that the jacket will fit. If you measure accurately, the jacket will fit. If you gain or lose enough weight after ordering to change the size, it can be exchanged per our exchange policy.

 

 Timeline     

We’re dedicated to delivering an amazing product, and you can rest assured that we will do everything in our power to fulfill your expectations and deliver a high quality product before October 1, 2019. We promise to work hard to get your product(s) to you quickly, and keep you informed of any delays.

 

The Last Magical Ingredient: You      

As we embark through this amazing endeavor through Indiegogo with you, we would like to thank you from the bottoms of our hearts! Because of your support, it is possible for us to pursue success.

Do you have questions?   

If you have any questions related to Packsture, during or after the campaign, you can always reach out to us at contact@packsture.com

Shipping Policy

Please check in with your post office and make sure you can receive your Packsture order at your address.

Packsture on social media

Follow us on your favorite social network for the latest. 

  • Follow us on Facebook
  • Follow us on Instagram
  • Follow us on Twitter

Fulfillment and surveys     

The purpose of surveys is to collect information from our backers to fulfill the order. We will require your shipping address, size(s) you desire, and reward selection, but that will only be when our project is successfully funded.

Indiegogo has a great system to send out surveys to collect important shipping information from you so we can deliver your product.

If a backer hasn’t answered our survey, the Indiegogo system will show them a reminder on Indiegogo next time they visit. We will not chase you down with multiple E-mails or phone calls to get answers from you. You are obligated as a backer to provide us with an active email and legitimate shipping address and make sure you have a forwarding address if you move. We will attempt to reach out to you “ONLY” THREE (3) times through E-mail.

We are bound to privacy and are very protective of our backer’s confidential information. You have trusted us and we trust you back. Your information will only be used to communicate with you and ship the rewards to you. We will NOT SELL or SHARE your info with a third party. We understand how important this is to you and are bound to follow through with our promises.

Risks and challenges

Over the past few years we’ve been working very hard to bring Packsture to life. We are well aware that there is always an element of risk involved in these kinds of projects, though. HONESTY is the best policy! We have been doing extensive research and have added the information we’ve found to what we have experienced, and we know that miniature surprises are to be expected. However, it’s nothing we can’t handle.

We’re dedicated to delivering an amazing product, and you can rest assured that we will do everything in our power to fulfill your expectations and deliver a high quality product on time. We work and collaborate very closely with the best manufacturers in the world to ensure that everything runs smoothly. We promise to keep you informed at all times and on every step of the production line. Our backers will be the first to get a glimpse, including photos and videos of everything that we do so you can follow up with us with questions, make comments, and track our progress.
story_txt:
Introducing The Packsture JacketTrekking through the mountains demands the perfect balance of protection, breathability, and weight, and our weatherproof, windproof, 3M™ Thinsulate™ jacket delivers maximum protection all year round, everyday! 72% OFF DISCOUNT AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED TIME.How to get the Packsture JacketBecome a backer of this campaign and receive a reward. You will be pre-ordering one of the most rugged and durable outdoor jackets. Super early backers get a special discount of more than 72%, and you'll receive your jacket before it is available in stores. Interested in buying more than one jacket? Check out all rewards & add-ons. Thank you. The Packsture Jacket Talk (Exclusive Video) Storage capabilities:Here is a video by one of our staff members talking about some Packsture Jacket features, storage capabilities and more. Enjoy!! Packsture Jacket CapabilitiesThe Packsture Jacket is 100% waterproof, windproof, and breathable. It is designed to provide maximum protection against the elements and is rugged enough for all outdoor activities.Sustainability (Packsture Recycles)Packsture Jacket uses Thinsulate™ insulation fabric which is consistently awarded the OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 Class I Certificate meeting the human-ecological requirements for products for future generations.BreathabilityThe 3M™ Thinsulate™ unique composition allows millions of tiny pores to breathe at their full potential. Sweat vents directly to the outside of the fabric in one easy step.WaterproofPacksture Jacket 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation opens up a whole new world of warmth and comfort for the outdoor community. Made with hydrophobic fibers for advanced water resistance, the Packsture Jacket will keep you warm, comfortable and dry, without unnecessary weight.VentilationPacksture Jackets have a well designed ventilation system that allows air to flow, which makes you feel comfortable throughout your outdoor adventures.WindbreakerPacksture Jacket is designed with an extra inner membrane and elastic drawstrings to shield you from strong winds during your everyday adventures, and does it with incredible functionality and style.LightweightPacksture Jacket uses the latest 3M™ Thinsulate™ fabric technology to keep the weight to a minimum (less than 2 lbs/1 kg), and is packable (approx. 9” long and about 14” inches around).Let's Get TechnicalOur powerful weatherproof, windproof, breathable and lightweight 3M™ Thinsulate™ Jacket is equipped with sought after features for maximum protection including:Construction:UNDERARM VENTING - The underarm ventilation system will keep you cool at all times. It is designed to release any and all excessive heat that accumulates during activities.YKK® AQUAGUARD® ZIPPERS - YKK® AquaGuard® Zippers are waterproof with powerful strength and a smooth finish.      TAPED SEAMS - If you love winter sports, then you know all about fully taped seams. Our high end jacket seams are fully taped and water tight.    HIGH COLLAR - The high collar is an important feature to ward off the elements during extreme weather conditions.    REMOVABLE POWDER SKIRT - The removable snow skirt is an additional barrier against wet and powdery snow for those who love skiing or snowboarding.    HELMET COMPATIBLE HOOD - The helmet compatible hood can be adjusted from different directions to fit your helmet size.    ADJUSTABLE SNOW CUFFS - In addition to the internal thumb holes, the adjustable cuffs ensure a great and snug fit.     JACKET TO PANT INTERFACE - This feature turns your jacket-and-pant combo into one piece for total snow and wind protection.     ANTI SLIP SHOULDERS - Prevent your backpack from slipping off your shoulders with our built in non-slip firm grip patches.       LASER CUTTING FINISH - Extreme accuracy, clean cuts, and sealed fabric edges to prevent fraying.     THUMB HOLE SLEEVES - The thumb holes prevent the sleeves from riding up, leaving your hands covered to keep them warm.    THREE LAYERS - The Packsture Jacket is built with three layers to be warm, breathable and waterproof. All together in the same design.     STORM FLAP - We have added a storm flap to the front of the jacket to block the icy wind and protect your face during extreme weather conditions.    WRIST CLOSURE - The adjustable wrist closure is a great feature that allows you to keep the cold and wind out.      DETACHABLE HOOD - Allows flexibility when the hood is not needed, and is easily stored in one of the many pockets.SOFT CHIN GUARD -  Protects the chin and face from the elements.HEM DRAW CORD WITH SIDE ADJUSTMENTS - Use for a customized fit that keeps out the wind and cold.   MICRO LINING MESH - Mesh is incredibly breathable and regulates temperature well.ALL SEASON DESIGN - Although the jacket is great for keeping you warm in below zero weather, it is also designed to adjust for warmer weather with features such as its removable hood and snow skirt, and the ventilation system. 3M ™ THINSULATE ™  - One of the highest quality and effective fabrics created.   Properties:BREATHABLE - To regulate temperature and keep you dry.WATERPROOF - To increase comfort by protecting you from rain and snow.ANTI SHRINK - So you can always have a good fit with your jacket.ANTI BACTERIAL - Prolongs the life of the jacket and protects the person wearing it.WIND PROTECTION - To help you stay warm.TEAR RESISTANT - This tough material resists rips and tears.  PROTECTS UP TO -4°F -20°C - 3M™ Thinsulate™ and the Packsture features allow maximum warmth with minimal weight and bulk.STAIN REPELLENT - To keep your jacket looking clean, sharp, and new. LIGHT WEIGHT - Keep warm with less than 2 lbs/1 kg of weight.FAST DRYING - In case of spills inside the jacket, or when washing it.  MOISTURE WICKING - To keep you dry and comfortable.DURABLE - So your jacket will last a very long time!SLIM FIT - For a sleek look and less bulk.Storage Features:SKIING PASS SLEEVE POCKET - Keep your skiing pass easily accessible for swiping in either of these two convenient sleeve pockets.GOGGLE POCKET - Quickly access your goggles to join in the fun right away.LEFT SIDE MOBILE DEVICE POCKET - Keep your phone right at hand and protected.    RIGHT SIDE MOBILE DEVICE POCKET - Another option, or if you have more than one device.   PEN HOLDER POCKET - Have quick and easy access to a pen or stylus.    TABLET POCKET - The tablet pocket is an outstanding storage addition.      PASSPORT POCKET - We understand how important it is to have fast and easy access to your passport while keeping it safe.    INTERNAL MEDIA POCKET WITH HEADPHONE PORT - No more headphones tangling.   TWO HAND WARMER POCKETS - In addition to the thumb holes, The Packsture jacket comes with two front side pockets that are built with insulation to keep your hands warm.   SUNGLASSES FRONT POCKET - Know exactly where to find your sunglasses when you need them.   BACK POCKET FOR POWER BANK - The Packsture Jacket comes with two back side pockets to store your battery power banks and any other miscellaneous gadget items.      Safety:SAFETY REFLECTIVE STRIPS - Stay safe at night and during extreme weather conditions and be visible to oncoming traffic.SURVIVAL OUTDOOR WHISTLE - Small, portable, but loud - use in case of emergency, or if a party gets separated.    Bonus Items:KEY CHAIN & A BONUS CARABINER - Attach your keys to your jacket to prevent loss using the carabiner (NOTE: carabiner is NOT designed to hold weight)BOTTLE OPENER - A convenient item for relaxing with a cold one at the end of a long day hiking.PORTABLE COMPACT COMPASS - This is an amazing addition to Packsture's Jacket when you are exploring new, unfamiliar territories.     LENS CLEANER - Taking pictures is a common activity when outdoors.  Make sure you have a clean lens for clear images.  Why you need The Packsture JacketCOMFORT:Keep dry and comfortable all day, everyday.COST: PACKSTURE JACKET IS AFFORDABLE    Packsture Jacket is offered for as much as 72% OFF during Indiegogo. Make sure to grab one, two, or more. This is a golden opportunity for all.HEALTH: SUSTAINABLE AND ECO FRIENDLY MATERIALS.     Packsture cares about the environment.MATERIAL: 3M™ THINSULATE™ FOR SUPERIOR WARMTH.     3M™ Thinsulate™ fabric helps keep you warm during winter and cool during the summer.SAFETY FIRST: STAY SAFE AND VISIBLE.     The distinctive location of Packsture’s reflective strips adds a bold look to the Jacket and makes you visible in poor weather conditions. Who is it forClassic, rugged and multi use Packsture Jacket is ultralight for everyday use, and is available for pre-order on Indiegogo. It is designed for everyone.  Packsture Jacket vs. What's Out ThereDesigned with precision for the toughest conditions, our innovative Jacket is affordable. Here is a run down on how you can get the best quality outdoor jacket without breaking the bank. What if I already have a jacket?     Unlike anything you have seen before, Packsture Jacket combines everything you have in your closet into ONE rugged piece of gear! De-clutter your closet of all the jackets you have accumulated over the years, and donate them.  Join us and pledge now to get the only jacket you will ever need.Why Indiegogo Community?     We at Packsture have limitless ideas, but without the support of a community none of it would be possible. Indiegogo aims to give each one of us a chance to produce an idea and discover that we can offer each other value through creation without a middleman dictating the product and terms.Reward TiersThere is a limited quantity for the super early bird backer 72% OFF deal so get it right away before it's gone!See our packages below to find out more.*NOTE: you'll choose the Jacket size shortly after the campaign ends. All jackets come with a bottle opener,  compass, outdoor survival whistle, lens cleaner cloth, and carabiner keychain (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING) ✓  Indiegogo Early Bird Special$189 - One Packsture Jacket at a massive 72% off discount (Save $510 off the planned $699 MSRP.) // Your choice of size (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). The Jacket includes:Bottle openerCompassOutdoor survival whistleLens cleaner clothCarabiner keychain (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)✓  Love Bird Special$330 - Two Packsture Jackets at a massive 76% off discount (Save $1,068 off the planned $1,398 MSRP for two.) // Your choice of sizes (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). Each Jacket includes:Bottle openerCompassOutdoor survival whistleLens cleaner clothCarabiner keychain  (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)✓  Three Jacket Special$480 - Three Packsture Jackets at a massive 77% off discount (Save $1,617 off the planned $2,097 MSRP for three.) // Your choice of sizes (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). Each Jacket includes:Bottle openerCompassOutdoor survival whistleLens cleaner clothCarabiner keychain (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)✓  Five is a Team Special$750 - Five Packsture Jackets at a massive 78% off discount (Save $2,745 off the planned $3,495 MSRP for five.) // Your choice of sizes (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). Each Jacket includes:Bottle openerCompassOutdoor survival whistleLens cleaner clothCarabiner keychain (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING)✓ Ten is a Power Bundle Special$1,400- Ten Packsture Jackets at a massive 79% off discount (Save $5,590 off the planned $6,990 MSRP for ten.) // Your choice of sizes (XS to XXXL - it’s unisex!). Each Jacket includes:Bottle openerCompassOutdoor survival whistleLens cleaner clothCarabiner keychain  (NOTE: carabiner keychain is NOT SAFE FOR LOAD-BEARING) Our CommunityBeing outside is a learning experience for all. Packsture values protecting what sustains us and building relationships with the outdoors and each other. Join us and be part of our fast growing family! Be kind and courteous. No hate speech or bullying.  Respect everyone's privacy. Sizing chart for any gender.Packsture will collect sizes during the survey, right after the campaign ends. Please measure your chest, waist, and hips, and order based on the largest number to ensure that the jacket will fit. If you measure accurately, the jacket will fit. If you gain or lose enough weight after ordering to change the size, it can be exchanged per our exchange policy.  Timeline     We’re dedicated to delivering an amazing product, and you can rest assured that we will do everything in our power to fulfill your expectations and deliver a high quality product before October 1, 2019. We promise to work hard to get your product(s) to you quickly, and keep you informed of any delays. The Last Magical Ingredient: You      As we embark through this amazing endeavor through Indiegogo with you, we would like to thank you from the bottoms of our hearts! Because of your support, it is possible for us to pursue success.Do you have questions?   If you have any questions related to Packsture, during or after the campaign, you can always reach out to us at contact@packsture.comShipping PolicyPlease check in with your post office and make sure you can receive your Packsture order at your address.Packsture on social mediaFollow us on your favorite social network for the latest. 
Follow us on Facebook
Follow us on Instagram
Follow us on Twitter
Fulfillment and surveys     The purpose of surveys is to collect information from our backers to fulfill the order. We will require your shipping address, size(s) you desire, and reward selection, but that will only be when our project is successfully funded.Indiegogo has a great system to send out surveys to collect important shipping information from you so we can deliver your product.If a backer hasn’t answered our survey, the Indiegogo system will show them a reminder on Indiegogo next time they visit. We will not chase you down with multiple E-mails or phone calls to get answers from you. You are obligated as a backer to provide us with an active email and legitimate shipping address and make sure you have a forwarding address if you move. We will attempt to reach out to you “ONLY” THREE (3) times through E-mail.We are bound to privacy and are very protective of our backer’s confidential information. You have trusted us and we trust you back. Your information will only be used to communicate with you and ship the rewards to you. We will NOT SELL or SHARE your info with a third party. We understand how important this is to you and are bound to follow through with our promises.Risks and challengesOver the past few years we’ve been working very hard to bring Packsture to life. We are well aware that there is always an element of risk involved in these kinds of projects, though. HONESTY is the best policy! We have been doing extensive research and have added the information we’ve found to what we have experienced, and we know that miniature surprises are to be expected. However, it’s nothing we can’t handle.We’re dedicated to delivering an amazing product, and you can rest assured that we will do everything in our power to fulfill your expectations and deliver a high quality product on time. We work and collaborate very closely with the best manufacturers in the world to ensure that everything runs smoothly. We promise to keep you informed at all times and on every step of the production line. Our backers will be the first to get a glimpse, including photos and videos of everything that we do so you can follow up with us with questions, make comments, and track our progress.

story:
KiMiFi is the best 4G LTE hotspot with innovative CloudSIM technology (we also have eSIM technology) that supports up to 5 devices at the same time. It allows you to stay connected in over 144 countries and 450+ carriers. It is also the first mobile router that presents a perfect combination of powerful features and a minimalist look. Choose a suitable data package according to your needs with the best price as cheap as a local pre-paid plan. Pay as you go. No contract, no subscription, and no expensive international roaming charges anymore!

Until now 23 May 2020, we have shipped more than 100,000PCS to all the world, and the reviews from the backers and our B2B customers are very high! Everyone knows that the customers' comments are the best important thing for a product or a company! So we want to say 'We have a real wonderful and great product! KiMiFi'!

Put the traveling troubles of switching SIM cards or high roaming fees behind your head. Only need to use KiMiFi, which is born to solve these annoying problems for all travelers and business people.

 

List of above carriers for reference, more and more will be added in our service

Wherever you are in the world, whether it be for business, or to simply keep in touch, KiMiFi’s high-quality connectivity helps to make sure that you’ll have access to the Internet at any time of the day without a hitch.

 

 

With a third-party speed test app, we tested the download and upload speed of a KiMiFi
supported server in Shenzhen, China on an iPhone and a server in Tokyo, Japan on android phone.

Need to work on something on the go? No problem. Simply share your KiMiFi 4G connection with up to 5 devices - your iPad, tablet, laptop, personal phone, and work phone! What's more, you can share it with your family and friends!

Customize Your Data Solution- KiMiFi’s user-friendly app makes it easy to update and keep track of your usage.

With the KiMiFi app, you can easily access and manage your device from your smartphone and all usage and fees are transparent, let you pay only you used.

In KiMiFi’s portal management website 192.168.43.1, you can set to open or close the update the App to save your data costs, actually, for the user experience, we forbid this by default.

And in the interface of App, you’ll get a clear view of traffic usage, unlike the expensive and unclear usage rates offered by local carriers.
KiMiFi is equipped with a powerful 3500mAh battery. On its own, it can work effortlessly up to 2 days at full capacity (calculation based on 8 hours usage per day). In addition, KiMiFi can be recharged via a micro USB cable connected to a laptop, portable charger or adapter for endless hours of 4G sharing. It also will remove “oh shoot, my MiFi battery is dying” syndrome completely and making KiMiFi your best travel buddy.

 

Easy management with exclusive KiMiFi app, SIM-free, hassle-free, no extra roaming charges, we promise high-cost performance.
1. Scan the QR code on the device to download App (or search ‘KiMiFi’ in App Store or Play Store).
2. Register an account by E-mail.
3. Scan the device’s QR code again in the App for activation.
4. Purchase data package by PayPal, Visa, MasterCard, JCB and so on.
5. Press the “Power” button on the device to turn it on.
6. Wait for the device to connect the network, the signal light will turn on once connected successfully.
7. Connect Wi-Fi by the name and password shows on QR label.  

So easy!

iOS & Android App Download

 
Purchase Data Package on KiMiFi App
 
 
System Connect
 

 

At present, KiMiFi truly supports the 4G LTE network in 144+ countries and supports the TOP 3 carriers in each country. A lot of countries and regions are being tested, will be added onto the list after the test finished.

Support Global 2,000,000 Users Online Simultaneously

24/7 multi-language customer support. We are here to make your journey more enjoyable.

 

We are absolute minimalists, so we designed that the whole internal structure of KiMiFi would be without any soldering, it mainly includes outer case, battery, antenna (divide into the main antenna and diversity antenna, and debugging twenty-one 4G bands is a very challenging thing), main board, FPC for switch, this structure is also very simple for assembly. Now top companies like Apple, Samsung and Huawei are using this minimalist design for their products.

In addition, we use a steel sheet to fix the battery to prevent power loss. This design also maximally protects the motherboard from damage, especially when falling down.

Thirdly, if there is any after-sales problem, we can trace the QR code on the battery in our production system to the date of production and which station has the problem and solve the problem quickly.

Finally, all our components are purchased from famous manufacturers all over the world, such as MURATA, SKYWORKS, WISOL, EPCOS, Prisemi, SAMSUNG and so on.
