story:
Shipping Now!

Made for global adventurers like you, Langogo eliminates language barriers for you, helps you stay connected to the Internet around the world and side-kicks your trip with the power of AI.

 

70 LANGUAGES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

 

SPEAK LIKE A LOCAL

Powered by AI and big data, Langogo learns the way a local speaks! Langogo is connected to the largest language database, integrating 24 translation engines, just to make sure its translations sound as natural and accurate as possible. 

Meet new people, express yourself freely in conversation and experience more!

 

TRANSLATE IN 1 SEC

In order to create real-life conversations experience, we decided that Langogo should translate in less than 1 second. To achieve this target, we not only hard-coded a Bi-Lingual Streaming Technology, but also deployed more than 30 Translator Servers all over the world, and that number is still increasing.

The outcome is exciting! People just love it!

 

A TRUE LISTENER

Unlike cellphones, with built-in Microphone Array and Noise-Canceling Chip, Langogo picks up human voice cleverly, hence translates what you say accurately even in the streets.

 

 
 

STAY CONNECTED WITH MOBILE HOTSPOT

Roam freely in 72 countries (see the FAQ for the country list) and share Wi-Fi with cellphones and laptops. With eSIM Technology, You don't need a physical SIM card. Just switch it on and it automatically connects to the best local networks.

 Tap to turn on Wi-Fi hotspot and connect with up to 6 devices. Share the Internet connection with your own devices and your real travel buddies, saving your data costs and phone battery!

 

 

LANGOGO GOT SKILLS+

Traveling outside your comfort zone is good, traveling worry-free is even better! Bring Langogo as your AI voice assistant with you around the world.

 

Travel Questions? Ask Euri!

Find A Restaurant? Ask Euri!

Get directions? Ask Euri!

Exchange Rate? Ask Euri!

 

 

 

WHO’S TALKING ABOUT US

 

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

“We asked our Google Home to translate a number of statements from English into German and Polish. We then had the Langogo translate these into English. The Langogo got 100% accuracy.”

“ If you were in a country where you spoke NOTHING of the language, the Langogo would be indispensable.”“The translation response time is incredibly fast for the work it’s doing- 10 years worth of language learning classes in one little device answering in real-time!”“We use Langogo in our own city as much as we use it during our travels. Living in Montreal, the official language is French, but our knowledge of the French language is limited. Langogo allows us to explore the city without language restrictions.”

 

 

TRAVEL AND CONNECT

WITH LANGOGO ON YOUR NEXT TRIP

 

COLOR YOUR TRAVEL

TECH SPECS

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

 

LANGOGO IS NOW IN PRODUCTION


OUR GOALS?

YOUR BEST LANGUAGE ASSISTANT

EVER FOR GLOBAL TRAVELING

Traveling is fun. However, when you got lost on your travels, find it difficult to order food, or get on the wrong train, bus or even plane- due to a language barrier- you might feel discouraged, even wanting to stop or slip back into your comfort zone. With this in mind, our founder Ryan Zhang and his team combined the knowledge of translation, the expertise in AI research and development, the ability to design portable electronics and the know-how in noise canceling and voice recognition to help you experience the better and immersive travel experience you deserve.

“We believe better communication makes a better world. We want to start with lowering language barriers so that we can connect with local people, experience their cultures, understand people who live on the same planet with us. ”

Ryan Zhang

Founder of Langogo

 

 

TIMELINE

FAQ

 

When will Langogo be available and shipped? 


Langogo will be ready to ship in November.

 

What countries does Langogo ship to? 


We ship to all of the countries and regions. The estimated deliver time varies – typically more than one week.

 

How much is the shipping fee? 

We provide worldwide free shipping. However, the backers are responsible for VAT/ GST and any additional import taxes that may apply. 

 

What kind of warranty does Langogo offer?

We offer one-year warranty. The one year starts counting from the day you receive our product. For more details, please visit our official website: www.langogo.ai. 

 

How many languages are Langogo supported?

Langogo offers voice translation between 60 languages, including Arabic，Bulgarian，Catalan，Czech，Danish，German, Greek，English, Spanish，Finnish, French, Hindi, Croatian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Chinese etc.

 

How to connect Langogo to the networks?

Langogo connects to both cellular network and wireless network. There are three options to connect it to the networks: 

1. Switch on and it will automatically connect to the best local network. Purchase the Langogo data plan before turning it on. 

2. Insert a physical Sim Card to connect Langogo to the cellular network. 

3. Connect Langogo to a Wi-Fi network or share the data from your mobile phone.

 

In what countries is the data service available?

The data service is available 74 countries and regions, including:

Argentina, Australia, Austria, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Belgium, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, Chili, Columbia, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech, Denmark, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Italy, Ireland, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Kirgizstan, Laos, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxemburg, Macao, Malaysia, Malta, Mexico, Montenegro, Netherlands, New Zealand Norway, Pakistan, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Porto Rico, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Korea, South Africa Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Thailand, Tajikistan, Taiwan, Turkey, UAE, United Kingdom, Ukraine, United States, Vietnam,

*Supported countries might subject to change.

 

How is the accuracy of the translation?

Langogo invites AI and Fusion Translation Engines to optimize the process of speech recognition and offer the best translations at all times. Whether you are travelling or talking with local people, use Langogo to help you bridge the language gap. 

 

How fast does Langogo translate?

Langogo translates speeches in less than 1 second. However, the translation speed might be affected by the condition of the networks and the complexity of the speech input.

 

How can I purchase the data plan?

Directly purchase the data plan on Langogo. Navigate to “Store”, select the plan and make payment.

 

Is Langogo compatible with earbuds?

Yes. Langogo has a universal type c connector, either available for earbuds or USB charging. 

 

Can I change my shipping address?

If you need to change address, please email us your updated shipping information via support@langogo.ai.

 

Who should I contact if I have other question?

Media Enquiry: media@langogo.ai

Crowdfunding Questions: support@langogo.ai

General Support: marketing@langogo.ai

What are the prices for data plans? 

What shipping company you’ll deal with?

We consign a third-party company to deal with the shipping, who will cooperate different courier companies according to different regions, include URL, TNT, UPS, FEDEX and others.

Can I use Langogo with any Wifi or an physical SIM card?

Yes. you can use it with any WiFi if you have the password and SIM card.

Will there be offline translation?

Langogo doesn't need offline cause there is not translate can perfectly translate with offline model. Langogo designed with eSIM(same as iPhone xs max) so that can keep online all the time.
story_txt:
Shipping Now!Made for global adventurers like you, Langogo eliminates language barriers for you, helps you stay connected to the Internet around the world and side-kicks your trip with the power of AI. 70 LANGUAGES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS SPEAK LIKE A LOCALPowered by AI and big data, Langogo learns the way a local speaks! Langogo is connected to the largest language database, integrating 24 translation engines, just to make sure its translations sound as natural and accurate as possible. Meet new people, express yourself freely in conversation and experience more! TRANSLATE IN 1 SECIn order to create real-life conversations experience, we decided that Langogo should translate in less than 1 second. To achieve this target, we not only hard-coded a Bi-Lingual Streaming Technology, but also deployed more than 30 Translator Servers all over the world, and that number is still increasing.The outcome is exciting! People just love it! A TRUE LISTENERUnlike cellphones, with built-in Microphone Array and Noise-Canceling Chip, Langogo picks up human voice cleverly, hence translates what you say accurately even in the streets.   STAY CONNECTED WITH MOBILE HOTSPOTRoam freely in 72 countries (see the FAQ for the country list) and share Wi-Fi with cellphones and laptops. With eSIM Technology, You don't need a physical SIM card. Just switch it on and it automatically connects to the best local networks. Tap to turn on Wi-Fi hotspot and connect with up to 6 devices. Share the Internet connection with your own devices and your real travel buddies, saving your data costs and phone battery!  LANGOGO GOT SKILLS+Traveling outside your comfort zone is good, traveling worry-free is even better! Bring Langogo as your AI voice assistant with you around the world. Travel Questions? Ask Euri!Find A Restaurant? Ask Euri!Get directions? Ask Euri!Exchange Rate? Ask Euri!   WHO’S TALKING ABOUT US
 WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING“We asked our Google Home to translate a number of statements from English into German and Polish. We then had the Langogo translate these into English. The Langogo got 100% accuracy.”“ If you were in a country where you spoke NOTHING of the language, the Langogo would be indispensable.”“The translation response time is incredibly fast for the work it’s doing- 10 years worth of language learning classes in one little device answering in real-time!”“We use Langogo in our own city as much as we use it during our travels. Living in Montreal, the official language is French, but our knowledge of the French language is limited. Langogo allows us to explore the city without language restrictions.”   TRAVEL AND CONNECTWITH LANGOGO ON YOUR NEXT TRIP COLOR YOUR TRAVELTECH SPECSWHAT’S IN THE BOX
 LANGOGO IS NOW IN PRODUCTION
OUR GOALS?YOUR BEST LANGUAGE ASSISTANTEVER FOR GLOBAL TRAVELINGTraveling is fun. However, when you got lost on your travels, find it difficult to order food, or get on the wrong train, bus or even plane- due to a language barrier- you might feel discouraged, even wanting to stop or slip back into your comfort zone. With this in mind, our founder Ryan Zhang and his team combined the knowledge of translation, the expertise in AI research and development, the ability to design portable electronics and the know-how in noise canceling and voice recognition to help you experience the better and immersive travel experience you deserve.“We believe better communication makes a better world. We want to start with lowering language barriers so that we can connect with local people, experience their cultures, understand people who live on the same planet with us. ”Ryan ZhangFounder of Langogo  TIMELINE
FAQ  When will Langogo be available and shipped?  Langogo will be ready to ship in November.
  What countries does Langogo ship to?  We ship to all of the countries and regions. The estimated deliver time varies – typically more than one week.
  How much is the shipping fee?  We provide worldwide free shipping. However, the backers are responsible for VAT/ GST and any additional import taxes that may apply. 
  What kind of warranty does Langogo offer? We offer one-year warranty. The one year starts counting from the day you receive our product. For more details, please visit our official website: www.langogo.ai. 
  How many languages are Langogo supported? Langogo offers voice translation between 60 languages, including Arabic，Bulgarian，Catalan，Czech，Danish，German, Greek，English, Spanish，Finnish, French, Hindi, Croatian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Chinese etc.
  How to connect Langogo to the networks? Langogo connects to both cellular network and wireless network. There are three options to connect it to the networks: 
1. Switch on and it will automatically connect to the best local network. Purchase the Langogo data plan before turning it on. 
2. Insert a physical Sim Card to connect Langogo to the cellular network. 
3. Connect Langogo to a Wi-Fi network or share the data from your mobile phone.
  In what countries is the data service available? The data service is available 74 countries and regions, including:
Argentina, Australia, Austria, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Belgium, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, Chili, Columbia, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech, Denmark, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Italy, Ireland, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Kirgizstan, Laos, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxemburg, Macao, Malaysia, Malta, Mexico, Montenegro, Netherlands, New Zealand Norway, Pakistan, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Porto Rico, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Korea, South Africa Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Thailand, Tajikistan, Taiwan, Turkey, UAE, United Kingdom, Ukraine, United States, Vietnam,
*Supported countries might subject to change.

story:
Now available at thescrubba.com and thescrubba.com.au.

 

In 2012, we launched the original Scrubba wash bag (the world's smallest washing machine) which has provided a convenient way for over 140,000 travellers and campers to pack less and clean their clothes anywhere in just minutes. 

Over the years we have had requests from our supporters to create a bigger bag to allow more items to be washed but also a smaller, lighter bag.  A couple of years ago we launched the Scrubba stealth pack, which was 50% larger than the original Scrubba wash bag (and doubled as a weatherproof backpack).

We are now tackling the other request to make the Scrubba wash bag lighter and smaller.

Weighing just 70g (3 oz.) the Scrubba wash bag MINI is more than 50% lighter than the original Scrubba wash bag and more compact:

 Despite its incredibly small size, the Scrubba wash bag MINI is still able to wash multiple socks and jocks (Australian slang for underwear) or a T-shirt in one load: 

Who the Scrubba wash bag MINI is for:

The Scrubba wash bag MINI is perfect for ultra-light hikers, campers, holidaymakers and business travellers.  Those times where we want to pack as light as possible but still have clean underwear and socks for a fresh day on the trail or as we visit our next tourist destination.  

The Scrubba wash bag MINI still features our patented washboard-in-a-bag design, which allows a machine quality wash anywhere in just minutes.  

How the Scrubba wash bag MINI works:

To clean socks and jocks anywhere, you simply add water and cleaning liquid, close the bag, remove air through the twist valve and rub the clothes against the washboard for as little as 30 seconds (3 minutes provides a machine quality wash).  Then just rinse in the bag and hang to dry.

 And here is how the 6 easy steps look in real life:

Not convinced that such a simple washboard-in-a-bag design can really work?  Here is what Gear Editor said when they tested the original Scrubba wash bag:

Designed for those who travel light and free:

Ultra-light hiking and camping:

For ultra-light hikers and campers, there is nothing better than putting on a fresh pair of socks and underwear at the start of the day and the Scrubba wash bag MINI allow you to do this while only packing a couple of pairs.  

By using the Scrubba wash bag MINI each night, you can have fresh socks and underwear to welcome each day's adventures.

Multi-functional and lightweight:

As any through-hiker would tell you, every gram (or ounce) counts.  However, the Scrubba wash bag MINI's job doesn't finish at washing your clothes.  Between washes, the Scrubba wash bag MINI multi-functions as a compression dry bag to keep gear dry, a wet bag or laundry bag until the next load, extra storage space that can be clipped onto your backpack, an iPhone protector (operable through the window) or a free-standing camp bucket for washing dishes, washing your face or shaving - all without polluting water-ways.

Good for the environment:

The Scrubba wash bag is an eco-friendly product.  It is designed to last for years and many hundreds of washes.  It is electricity-free, uses minimal water and allows grey water to be disposed of away from water-ways. 

Ultra-light holidaymakers and travellers

For holidaymakers and business travellers, there are times where you just need to wash a few items of clothing and it isn't enough to justify searching for a Laundromat or paying exorbitant hotel laundry fees.  Plus, do we really want to hand over our dirty socks and underwear to hotel staff?  The design of the Scrubba wash bag's washboard has been shown to be twice as effective as handwashing in a basin and also avoids clogging up what may be the only basin in the hotel room - and also the same basin we wash our dirty hands and spit out toothpaste. 

The Scrubba wash bag MINI lets holidaymakers and business travellers hygienically wash their socks and underwear in just minutes saving money and time.  By washing socks and underwear and hanging them in your hotel room at the end of each day, you have clean and dry socks for the next day.

New parents on the go

For those of us with babies or toddlers, we know how dirty their clothes can get particularly with food, dirt, liquids or leaky nappies.  When travelling, the Scrubba wash bag MINI can be used to quickly clean their clothes anywhere to ensure they are ready to wear again the next day.  This can help reduce the numerous changes of clothes you need to pack.  When just out for stroll, the Scrubba wash bag MINI makes a handy wet bag for keeping soiled clothes separate until you are back home and ready to wash them.

 

Features:

Manufacturing and Shipping

Our success on another crowdfunding campaign has meant that production began in May 2019 of the first batch of Scrubba wash bag MINI's.  These are being shipped to the original backers by the end of June 2019.

We have some extra units of the Scrubba wash bag MINI from this initial production run.  As such, on 10 July 2019, we started shipping IndieGoGo orders. 

Here is some of the stock that is completed and ready to ship:

Product images shown in our videos and images are pre-production samples and actual products from our first production run. 

The Scrubba wash bag MINI utilises the same materials, technology and design as the original Scrubba wash bag, which makes us confident that we are creating another high quality, durable product that will be useful for travel and camping.  Here is what some of our 140,000 customers of the original Scrubba wash bag have said:

 

Perks

By backing our campaign you can select from 2 types of perks.  You can either pick up the new Scrubba wash bag MINI or you can couple the Scrubba wash bag MINI with one of the original Scrubba wash bags (with a washing capacity of 2 days of summer wear) for the ultimate in travel laundry flexibility.  Either way, you get great savings on the expected retail pricing.

The original Scrubba wash bag offered as part of the MINI AND ORIGINAL PACK weighs around 142g (5 oz.) and measures 54cm x 32cm (when laid flat) - 21.3" x 12.6" and  16cm x 6cm x 6cm (when rolled for storage) -  6.3" x 2.4" x 2.4".  The original Scrubba wash bag can easily wash 2 T-shirts, 2 pairs of underwear and 2 pairs of socks in one load.

In comparison, the Scrubba wash bag MINI weighs around 70g (2.5 oz) and measures 36cm x 23cm (when laid flat) - 14.2" x 9.0" and around 11cm x 5cm x 4cm (when rolled for storage) - 4.3" x 2.0 x 1.6".  The Scrubba wash bag MINI can easily wash 2 pairs of underwear and 2 pairs of socks in one load or one T-shirt and a pair of socks or underwear.

Australian Shipping

 Please note that to enable free shipping for Australian orders and to minimise waste, Australian orders of the Scrubba wash bag MINI will be shipped without retail packaging and in branded envelopes.  If you are located in Australia and require retail packaging (e.g. for gifting), please pledge an extra $7.

Shipping of the Scrubba wash bag mini perk within Australia is included free unless you require your products in retail packaging, in which case you will need to add an extra AUD7.00 onto your pledge.  Shipping of the Scrubba MINI and Original pack within Australia is AUD7.00 and this includes both products in retail packaging.

Australian GST is included in our prices for orders shipped to Australian addresses.

Global Shipping

Global shipping is AUD8.00 (~USD6) for the Scrubba wash bag mini perk and AUD12.00 (~USD9) for the Scrubba MINI and Original pack.  If you pledge for multiple units, you only need to add on the shipping fee once. 

To keep your shipping costs low, we will be using tracked international economy shipping services.  These services have estimated shipping times to most countries of 2-3 weeks. Some shipments may take longer depending on customs.  Shipping to remote locations may also take longer.

Please note that our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country-specific taxes. Depending on where you are located, you may need to pay import duties or taxes. This tool may assist you in estimating duties and taxes that may be payable for your order:

http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a...

Product Warranty

We back all our products with a 12 month warranty against manufacturing defects and the Scrubba wash bag MINI is no exception.  If a manufacturing defect isn't repairable, we will replace the defective unit.  Our defect rate for other Scrubba products is less than 1% so we are confident that the vast majority of our backers won't have any issues with their Scrubba wash bag MINI.

Timeline

 

Risks and challenges

This is our seventh crowdfunding campaign (the previous 6 were successful on IndieGoGo and Kickstarter) and despite hurdles along the way, we completed and fulfilled both within a few months of the campaigns ending. We have also learned from these experiences, which gives us the confidence that we will be able to ship most (if not all) orders within a month of the campaign closing.

On the manufacturing side of the equation, we are sitting pretty as our first production is almost complete and we are just waiting on more fabric to start the second production run for IndieGoGo backers.

We believe in honesty and great customer service, so in the unlikely event that a delay does pop up, we will let you know and also provide our strategy for getting back on track.

The following are links to our previous crowdfunding campaigns for other products which we delivered on as promised: 

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/489632425/... 

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/calibre8/s... 

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/scrubba-the-... 

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-scrubba-...

Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

story:
NOTE: A carabiner and microfiber pouch are included.  

If a traditional travel pillow works for you, so will the BullRest. Our engineers developed a world-first ergonomic shape that supports the upper vertebrae C1-C7 (critical for correct neck alignment). The BullRest is designed for both men and women.

We used to travel a ton for work. Cross country red-eyes, business meetings, security lines, delays, etc, etc. Like most business travelers out there, we couldn't sleep on planes, yet refused to carry a travel pillow. They were simply too big to fit into our small carry-ons, not to mention they looked ridiculous. So like many, we preferred to suffer through our travels. 

That's when it hit us, there had to be a better way. A device that not only was smaller and looked different, but a pillow that functioned unlike any other. Working with our medical design team, our product engineers developed a patented ergonomic design that functions by correctly supporting both the head and vertebrae, thus holding the neck in straighter alignment, for better comfort and superior rest.

Why the name BullRest? Well, bulls have the strongest necks in the animal kingdom. They also are a nice representation of our customer’s bullish attitude towards work and life. 

How do I choose the color I want? We will send out a survey in a few days following your pledge to ask for your color choice and shipping address.

How do I specify my shipping address? Same as above. We will ask for all your choices and juicy details in the survey we send out.

Who can use a BullRest? We conducted numerous ergonomic studies to ensure that the BullRest can meet the needs of most adults - both male and female. If a traditional travel pillow fits, so will the BullRest.

Does it come in different sizes? No. Not yet at least. We conducted extensive tests and analysis to ensure the BullRest is designed to fit approximately 80% of the adult population. 

What about kids?: Unfortunately, not yet. The BullRest is designed for adults. 

Can it be washed? Yes. Hand-wash only at this stage. We have selected 'high-wicking' fabrics that allows for easy cleaning and disinfecting with anti-bacterial wipes, or a wash cloth and minimal elbow grease.

When will I receive it? All product will be shipped in January 2017 on a rolling basis as more orders are placed. You can ensure that your order is processed in a timely manner by filling out your survey promptly upon receiving it from BackerKit (note: it takes approximately 11 days for us to send you the survey after you place your order per Indiegogo guidelines).

Customer Care: Should you have any questions, feedback or any other type of request, please reach out to us as info@bullrest.com 

Thanks for reading and happy travels.

The BullRest is not only small, but comfortable. Memory foam specifically molds to each user's neck (regardless of size) providing support and comfort where it's needed most.  
The BullRest has completed the manufacturing phase and is ready to ship. Below are images of the product coming off the production line. We worked with some of the world's best product engineers to ensure the quality lives up to our promise. 
(NOTE: The law tags featured are easily removed.)

Working with our medical design team, our product engineers developed a patented ergonomic design that functions by correctly supporting both the head and vertebrae, thus holding the neck in straighter alignment, for better comfort and superior rest.
Why the name BullRest? Well, bulls have the strongest necks in the animal kingdom. They also are a nice representation of our customer’s bullish attitude towards work and life. 


How do I choose the color I want? We will send out a survey in a few days following your pledge to ask for your color choice and shipping address.
How do I specify my shipping address? Same as above. We will ask for all your choices and juicy details in the survey we send out.

Who can use a BullRest? We conducted numerous ergonomic studies to ensure that the BullRest can meet the needs of most adults - both male and female. If a traditional travel pillow fits, so will the BullRest.
Does it come in different sizes? No. Not yet at least. We conducted extensive tests and analysis to ensure the BullRest is designed to fit approximately 80% of the adult population. 
What about kids?: Unfortunately, not yet. The BullRest is designed for adults. 
Can it be washed? Yes. Hand-wash only at this stage. We have selected 'high-wicking' fabrics that allows for easy cleaning and disinfecting with anti-bacterial wipes, or a wash cloth and minimal elbow grease.
When will I receive it? All product will be shipped in January 2017 on a rolling basis as more orders are placed. You can ensure that your order is processed in a timely manner by filling out your survey promptly upon receiving it from BackerKit (note: it takes approximately 11 days for us to send you the survey after you place your order per Indiegogo guidelines).
Customer Care: Should you have any questions, feedback or any other type of request, please reach out to us as info@bullrest.com Thanks for reading and happy travels.

story:
The KargoKase™

Brought to you by the INVENTOR of the VinGardeValise® Wine Suitcase...

Expanding on my success in developing and globally selling the very first suitcase to protect wine while traveling—the VinGardeValise®--I am now venturing into protecting other types of valuables for fellow traveling collectors.  So, applying the same logic and approach I used in developing the VinGardeValise®, I plan to  develop, manufacture and sell a new line of protective luggage: the KargoKase™.

Based on my experience in creating and bringing to market a suitcase to protect wine, spirits and craft beer, I believe very strongly that I can create a similar suitcase to protect other collectables, for example, art.  These suitcases could also  transport jewelry, cameras, drones and other  breakable goods.  And, they could also serve as OUTSTANDING regular travel suitcases--large, safe, secure and easy to use.

At present, I am envisioning two different suitcases: one about  28”x20"x14” and the other, boxier in design,  30”x16”x16”.  Both pieces of luggage would be consistent with and in compliance with all airline, TSA and FAA regulations and guidance for checked luggage .

Contributions and support from the Indiegogo community are essential for this product  to see the light of day.   After three years of development (and five prototypes), we brought the VinGardeValise® to market; and for the past seven years we have served customers worldwide who want to travel safely with their bottled beverages.  We have three sizes of the VinGardeValise® and would offer  any one of those as a perk for support from the Indiegogo community for this new venture.  A second perk for your contribution is that you go to the head of the line to secure a KargoKase™ at 2/3 off its retail price.  Please see the Perks section for more information and visit VinGardeValise.com to learn more about the first perk.

The  development of the first prototype will take 6 to 8 months.  We will not bring the KargoKase ™ to market until Covid-19 is in the rearview mirror and we are again able to travel freely.

Thank You.

Barry Wax

story:
When not being used as a pillow, the PackPillow is reversible to protect the face-friendly fabric and expose the water resistant rip-stop nylon for you to use as a seat cushion. 

While other backpacking pillows take up space, the PackPillow reduces space while functioning as a stuff sack that is specially designed to conform to the shape of your backpack.  

 

For day hikes where your large backpack isn't necessary the PackPillow has an optional strap, so you can leave your large pack at base camp and use the PackPillow as a lightweight summit pack.

The PackPillow has 6-Liters of internal space; which is plenty to hold water bottles, food, and clothing layers. The PackPillow also has a hole for a hydration bladder and tube.

The single strap is comfortable for all day hiking and reduces weight since it is only one strap. 

  • Width: 14 inches (35.5 cm)
  • Length: 10 inches (25.5 cm)
  • Height (widest point): 4 inches (10 cm)
  • Weight: 4.5 oz (127 grams, 0.28 lbs)
  • Internal capacity: 6 liters
  • Fabric (blue): 30D soft polyester, knitted
  • Nylon (black): (70D+210D)*(70D+210D)  rip-stop nylon, water resistant coating 
  • Nylon (green): (70D+40D)*(70D+40D) spandex, rip-stop nylon 
  • PackPillow Strap Weight: 2 oz (56 grams, 0.12 lbs)

 

Production Information

We are currently shipping.  Shipping time will take 2 weeks.  By November we will have shipping time down to 3-4 days. 

Here is a fun image of the quality control inspector smelling the final production units for any off smells or offensive odors. 

Here is an image of some stock that is ready to be placed in boxes to ship to your home

story:
This November, I will be traveling to Costa Rica to help build a house from start to finish for (and alongside) a local family.

On our trip, we'll be meeting people from around the world through Habitat for Humanity, experiencing another culture, and doing some immediately effective good.

I am whole-heartedly thrilled to do this and have already scouted out future Habitat trips for years to come. This has quickly become important to me and I hope that you'll support this cause.

As a thank you for your donation, I've setup a number of handmade or hand-selected gifts to thank you for your contribution.

 

Please note that you can donate directly to our trip here: http://share.habitat.org/caylee-betts-costa-rica-fortman-team-2013-gv14239 (which should make tax deductible information easier to obtain) -- these funds will go towards our accommodations once in the country. Any funds raised here on Indiegogo will either go towards airfare getting to Costa Rica, or directly to the Habitat for Humanity trip fees I owe on October 10th, 2013. Any remaining money will go straight to Habitat for Humanity as an additional donation.

 

I appreciate your support!
Caylee

story:
*Update:*

Thanks to you we went to CrossFit Regionals Latin America and we crushed it! We took 3th place of the Region and were the first Mexican Team on the Podium.  
Here is the Team CrossFit Revolver:


Here is the Medal:


The Revolver T-Shirts and Tank Tops Have been Shipped and will be arriving between a week or so (2 weeks for outside the USA). 

The Special Edition T-shirts are here and will be shipped today and you can always pick them up at the gym.

Please be patient as Mexican Mail can be a little bit slow... 

Send any questions to hector@crossfitrevolver.com

-------------

Grab A T-Shirt And Help The Team Like Them:





Who Are We? And How Can You Help Us Get To The CrossFit Games.

Hi, Im Hector a co-owner and coach of CrossFit Revolver down here in Cancun, Mexico.

We were lucky enough to put together a team of athletes that against all odds manage to qualify to the CrossFit Games Regionals as one of the top 5 teams in Latin America.

Help Team CrossFit Revolver Represent our box, and our community:


  • This campaign is to raise funds so our team can travel to chile and compete at our first big CrossFit competition.

  • We have a fighting chance but we need to get there first. That’s why we need YOU.

  • You can be a generous online supporter for our team and in return we will send you some really cool swag from CrossFit Revolver so you can brag to your buddies back at your box.

  • Every dollar that we get from your donations will go directly to financing our trip to regionals.

  • Every supporter will get free Drop Ins at our box on their next vacation to Cancun.

What Do We Need And Most Important...What Do You Get In Return For Your Generosity.

Here are the details of our campaign:

  • Flights from Cancun to Chile are way more expensive than the team can afford. At more than $1000 bucks per ticket flying the team of 6 and myself will cost over $7000 USD.

  • Accommodations for the 7 of us on the cheapest hotels that we could find are around $1500 usd for the whole week.

  • The trip will cost us about $8500 USD so that is the goal of our campaign.

What Do You Get :

  • We put together a package of a lot of really nice things that we know that any CrossFitter will enjoy and brag about.

  • Crossfit Revolver Supporter  T Shirts and Tank Tops

  • CrossFit Revolver Special Edition Team Competitios T-Shirts. (Picture Coming Soon!)

  • CrossFit Revolver Drop In Passes

  • A VIP CrossFit Vacation Week in Cancun, Mexico.

SPONSORSHIP SPOTS in our Team Uniform, Facebook Page and Website.

*If you get a tshirt or tank top, please send an email to hector@crossfitrevolver.com with the subject: indiegogo tshirt, and on the message include the tshirt or tank top size and the user name or the name that you used to make your donation.

This is The CrossFit Revolver Supporter Tshirt:

Girls Tank Top:

This is the Special Edition T-Shirt, the one the team will use for Regionals:


Here are some people that already picked up a perk:


How Far Can Your Help Reach?

CrossFit is growing in Mexico and you can help the community grow even more!

Imagine being a definitive part at helping out a team that has a big chance to make it to the Games this year. We will be forever grateful.

  • Help Blanca, Eli, Sandra, Ara, Avi, Gibran and Roberto  and myself to get to Chile.

  • We are a very young box, and underdog and we manage to get to the 5th place in Latin America we know we have what it takes to win at Regionals.

  • Help us to reach our dream.

Sponsor Opportunity!

Do you have a brand that is related to CrossFit or Fitness? We will love to offer you some advertising space in our team uniform, links to your site in our website and facebook page with over 12,699 likes.

Even better... we will spot our sponsors logos for 6 months in all of the tshirts that we sell at our facility, we get CrossFitters from all around the world and all of them take a tshirt home for them and their friends. Imagine the targeted exposure that your brand could have!

  • You brand in our Team Uniform At Regionals
  • Your Brand at the Front Page and WOD page in our Website.
  • Your Brand on the Cover Page Of our Facebook Page.
  • A Link of your brand products/services in our daily WOD post on Facebook for 6 months.
  • A Customized hight quality video of the CrossFit Revolver Team featuring your brand's logo and products. 
  • Your Brand in EVERY tshirt that we sell for the next 6 months. 
  • We get over 5 Drop Ins per day from different CrossFit Boxes from around the USA and the world. 
  • Thats OVER 1500 tshirts advertising your brand for life!

How Else Can You Help

It doesn't matter if at this time you can't help us by funding the campaign. We are sure that you have friend that will love to take home some of our supporter T-shirts. Give us a hand by just sharing this campaing on Facebook or Twitter.

  • Share this campaing with your friends and possible sponsors using indiegogo.com share tools.
  • Send us a support message via Facebook at facebook.com/CrossFitRevolver
